112131.content:
You decide to do what your mommy says. She's always been there for you; she'll know what to do now.

"Where are we going Mommy?" You ask.

"We need to get back home; we'll find some way to get you back to normal size," she says.

"Can I pick you up? I can walk faster than you now," you say. Your mommy only came up to your knee by now.

Your mommy looks up at her giant naked boy and nods. "Ok, put me on your shoulder, but be careful. I don't want to fall."

"I won't drop you," you smile. Reaching down, you wrap your hand gently around her and place her on your shoulder. You feel her grab onto your hair as she finds her balance. Slowly you walk forward, keeping yourself as steady as you can. "Am I doing ok?"

"You're doing great Ryan," Mommy says. "Keep going and turn right at the next street."

You follow your mommy's directions, recognizing some houses as you pass by. People look up at the 25 foot naked 7 year old walking by. Some run back into their houses, others get into their cars and drive away. Others just stare and don't move. "They're afraid of me," you sniffle.

"It's ok, they just don't understand what's happening," Mommy says. "Don't worry, I'll find a way to make everything better.

"Ok Mommy," you smile. You recognize your street now. Your house is just ahead. "Now what?"

1121311.content:
"You sit here in the backyard and don't move. I'm going to try and find someone who can help you," mommy says before she runs into the house.

You sit on the grass and watch mommy argue on the phone. The wind blows over you, but it feels good instead of cold like usual. Reaching down, you pick up a wheelbarrow that got left out. You could barely move it before, but now it feels like a plastic toy in your hands. Clenching your fist, you crush it with barely any effort. "Cool," you whisper. You're super strong now it seems. On an impulse you toss the wreckage in your mouth. To your surprise it tastes like...a cracker? The wood and metal crunch easily between your jaws and you swallow. "Way cool!"

Looking around you spy a small tree that mommy planted last year. "Well, I AM supposed to eat my veggies," you giggle, pulling the tree out of the ground no problem. Opening your mouth you toss it in, and the taste of graham crackers and chocolate floods your mouth. "Mmmm," you moan. "Does this mean I can eat anything?"
1121311.title: You sit in the backyard

11213112.content:
Even though mommy told you to stay in the yard, your stomach growls and hunger rumbles in your tummy. Standing up, you quietly make your way back into the front yard and from there the street. You quickly grab a pair of bicycles and eat them one by one. As you swallow you feel yourself grow another five feet as your body digests the tree and bikes. "Eating makes me grow?!" A surge of excitement races down your spine. The earlier fear and sadness are going away; right now you need to eat! Squatting down you pick up a car and eat the whole thing in three quick bites; it tastes like candy. Three more cars are parked nearby, and all three are quickly sent into your tummy. Your growth surges another ten feet, and it feels soooo good as you expand.

Going on your hands and knees, you devour four more cars and a truck and grow to fifty feet tall. By now people are watching you eat their cars and run away. You ignore them and keep crawling down the street, eating every vehicle you can grab. By the time you reach the end of the street you've grown to nearly 70 feet tall. You grab a tree and start taking huge bites, sending thousands of pounds of wood into your belly. As you eat you keep growing, reaching a hundred feet as the last roots slide past your lips. Standing up, you smile as you tower over the houses.

A car crashes into your foot as you step onto another street, but you barely feet it. You quickly grab the car and toss it into your mouth, but this time a new taste fills your mouth, better than anything you've eaten so far. You realize it must have been the driver. "I....I just ate someone!" You say as sadness floods into your heart. You nearly break out in tears, but the feelings from your belly send a wave of warmth through your body and relax you. "Well, he WAS in my food. And he tasted really good." As big as you are, maybe people are food now too. Not mommy of course, but there are tons of other people around.

Sure enough, it DOES taste like a gingerbread house. You quickly devour the roof and start shoveling handfuls of the walls into your growing mouth. Water that tastes like soda sprays from ruptured water pipes, and furniture tastes like graham crackers.

In only a few minutes the entire house is inside your tummy, and your height stands at 140 feet tall. At your new size the next house is consumed in only two minutes, and the next in only one. You lose track of time as you eagerly consume the entire block. People flee from the giant naked kid eating whole houses. Your hand exposes a water main beneath the street as it sinks down, and you eagerly suck every last drop of what tastes like sweet lemonade until the pipe runs dry.

When you finally feel full, it lasts only a few seconds as you stand up and your shadow covers the entire next block. You must be at least two hundred feet tall, and you can see the entire city. "Wow, I'm super huge now!" You shout. Even the tallest trees only come up to your penis, and you grab them and chow down, adding another twenty feet to your growth. Leaning down, you can now eat a house in only a few bites, and you eagerly chomp dozens more structures into food. The apartment buildings are next, and they're big enough that it takes you a while to eat through them, but each bite tastes better than the last. You see waves of darting jets circling around you, while on the ground tanks are moving in from outside the city. "Oh, you want to stop me?" You ask with a smile. "Well I guess you can try." Striding forward, you bat at the darting jets, which dance around your arms and send missiles streaking into you. It feels like someone poking you with a sharp stick, and each hit leaves a little soot mark on your skin.

The tanks fire their cannons, but these barely feel like you're getting tapped by a finger. "You're not trying hard enough," you giggle as you catch a few of the tanks and toss them into your mouth, crunching them like skittles. The jets keep firing missiles, but after a few minutes they're starting to run out and switch to their machine guns. You manage to hit a few of them as they pass too close, turning them into small explosions. The tanks begin to turn and run, but your stomach doesn't want to let them go. Sprinting after them, you easily catch up and start devouring the armored vehicles one after the other. Each it barely like a gumball to you, but dozens add up to a few tasty mouthfuls. You ignore the jets firing their last missiles into your back, though you giggle when one detonates on your butt hole. Some of the tanks fire inside your mouth, adding a spicy aftertaste to their demise.

The military's defiance lasts only a few minutes, but you allow them to fire as much as they want while you eat them. The last tanks slide down your throat like chocolate, leaving the few remaining jets to retreat back to their base. 11213112112.content:
The ships sound like fun stuff to play with, and you've always liked swimming. Turning away from the city center, you stroll across the road towards the harbor. You can see the military ships already heading out into open water. The few jets still in the air circle above them, and you wonder how many missiles they have left since they actually hurt.

The ships open fire as you clear the last of the suburbs, shells and a few missiles striking your chest and belly. One hits your forehead, and you shut your eyes from the flash. These missiles hurt more than the ones the jets used, and looking down you see that you're actually bleeding from several small wounds. Now you're angry! "You're gonna be sorry!" You shout, breaking into a run. More weapons strike on and around you, but you don't slow down as you stomp past the docks and into the sea. The ocean water is pleasantly cool to your dust coated skin, and you sigh as it washes away the crumbs of your food. You gasp a bit when the water rises up to your penis, but by now you can dive once you take a deep breath. Your cuts sting in the salt water, but underwater you're safe from most of the ships weapons.

Depth charges explode around you, but compared to the missiles they hurt way less. Coming up under one of the smaller ships, you grab into the hull and pull it under. Your hand crush the metal easily, and you watch as tiny people swim towards the surface. You'd eat them, but you don't want to drink the salt water. Your lungs are starting to burn as you swim on, dragging down another of the small ships before you have to come up for air. You surface behind one of the largest ships where its big guns can't hit you. Taking several deep breaths, you brace yourself as the other ships fire at your exposed neck and head. The hits hurt, but so close to their friend the ships can't use their biggest guns on you. Leaning in, you quickly start taking big bites out of the hull, devouring the propellers and engines in seconds. The metal tastes like mints, mixed with the wonderful flavors of the crew.

As the ship meets its end you feel your cuts healing themselves, and now the hits from the other ships don't hurt as much. All the iron from the ship is making your skin tougher, and you smile. Dunking your head back underwater, you swim towards the carrier at the heart of the fleet. Its jets are circling above, but you smile as you turn over and swim under it. With two fingers of your hand you break a hole in the ship's bottom, then maneuver your penis in through the breach. The cold metal sends a shiver down your spine, but the though of what you're about to do widens your smile as you relax and let loose. A torrent of warm yellow pee floods up into the hull of the carrier, filling entire compartments in seconds and wrecking any equipment it washes over. You've been holding it in all day, and your piss seems to be endless, filling up deck after deck and trapping nearly half the crew in your warm liquid.

Finally you've emptied your bladder and slowly pull your penis back out of the hull. Yellow seeps out into the water, spreading like a stain from the flooded ship. You can see the carrier is already starting to sink, so full it is with your pee. Breaking the surface like a great sea monster you let out a roar, the water running down your glimmering skin in small rivers. Grabbing the front of the ship, you pull it under, taking bites of the hull as it goes down. The jets fire everything they have into you, but your hardened skin only takes a bit of damage. A few cuts are opened, but your meal quickly heals them. The remaining ships are moving away as fast as they can, focusing their fire on your eyes. You hold a hand over your eyes as you take a few breaths before going under again.

Swimming under the largest of the remaining ships, your grab the area around its propellers and wreck its means of moving. Leaving it alone, you bring three of the other ships down under the water easily, crushing their hulls against your chest and tummy in bear hugs. The remaining two ships keep moving away, and you decide to let them go. You have a bigger toy to play with. The huge battleship is dead in the water, though its guns keep firing as you paddle toward it. Keeping the front of your body under the water, you circle around the ship, explosions blooming across your back and butt. You splash the ship a few times, sending huge walls of water over the hull and knocking many into the water. Swimming under it, you smack it with your penis, denting the hull and rocking the huge ship. Surfacing, you lean in close to the ship and one by one you eat the guns. Finally the ship has nothing left to hurt you with. Smiling, you slowly begin consuming the ship, starting from the bow. Your growing jaws crunch through the metal like toast. Many of the crew jump into the water to avoid your mouth, until a few bites later the stern vanishes down your throat. Looking down at the hundreds of people frantically swimming towards the shore, you decide they're not worth taking the time to collect.

After your feast you've grown to five hundred feet tall, your skin now having a slight sheen as the steel armor of the ships is now yours to protect you from anyone who tries to stop your feast. The retreating ships are barely visible now, but you know you could still catch them if you tried. Maybe they'll lead you to more ships you can play with and eat. But the city is still there, and others down the coast. You think for a minute before deciding to....

112131121121.content:
You think for a moment and realize that greater "hunting grounds" may be found wherever the ships are going. Looking to the people you give a large toothy grin causing a great chorus of screams on shore. You wave saying, "See you guys later!" Now over 500 feet tall, you stomp out into deeper water letting the cool ocean waves cover you thighs and finally rise up above your crotch. You decide that wherever you head next, you'll put together some kind of loincloth or underwear. Squinting you spot the ships and dive into the water, causing a great splash as your 50 foot long soles kick the surface of the ocean. Down beneath the waves its a surreal experience with your enormous eyes able to see much further than any normal human. Seeing where the ocean rises up onto land you swim breaststroke along the coastline, surfacing when you need air and to check on the position of the ships as they continue their journey. The entire time, they never realize that a 500 foot long human shark is following them. As you follow the ships you hardly see anyone along the coastline. At one point you find a small shack sitting on the coast and you swipe it off it's foundation in one giant hand before cramming it into your mouth and crunching it down like crackers. "Not a bad snack", you remark to yourself as you dive back beneath the waves. As night begins to fall the ships slow and begin to turn back towards the coast (they'd been following the coast from quite a distance up to this point). Seizing upon the moment, you take one last gasp for air and dive beneath the waves, speeding up to catch the ships.

         At this point you realize you've been following them for more than 3 hours and chuckle in your mind, realizing that you now have an endurance greater than any regular human. Seeing the bottom of the ships you did what you did before and dive up from underneath to bight off the propeller and engine room. Not realizing that you're bigger than the destroyers in the group you accidentally put your mouth around the entire back of one the smaller ships biting it clean off. In the split second you face is above the water you look to your left just in time to see the shocked faces of the sailors on the ships. You chew down the back part of the small ship and set your sights of one of the big battleships. Because this one is a lot bigger, you can't quite fit the entire back end in your mouth, but you still take off a good chunk. Chewing the tough beef jerky like metal you can taste the dozens of people that must have been in the engine room and you savor every bit of it. Once you bitten off the engines of the ships in the task force, you surface to get a good look around. Even with only your head and shoulders poking up out of the water you're still massive, able to look down on the smaller ships and almost able to see into the bridge of the battleship. With your prey no longer able to move, you grin at the ships and dive back beneath water to finish them off. the first ship you disabled has already sunk for the most part and you can see the sailors floundering around it. You wonder what nothing but human tastes like and you surface next to it raising your hand underneath the remains of the crew. Waiting for the water to drain out from beneath your bus like finger you look down at the sailors, now appearing to be only half an inch tall to you. You throw them into your cavernous mouth and immediately slam your mouth shut. You chew slowly closing you eyes when you feel the indescribably wonderful taste hit your tongue. You moan in delight and swallow your unfortunate prey. Looking back at the small ship you grin before wrapping one hand around the entire front of the ship, using your strength to lift it out the water and high into the air. Holding it like an overgrown candy bar you devour it in just a few quick bites.

         Chewing down the now more tender small ship you suddenly feel your feet touch the bottom of the ocean. While you hadn't realized it this entire time, your massive body splashing around the ships had driven them even closer to land. Although you have no idea how tall you are, you smile because you notice that you could have never touched the bottom at this depth before. Having abandoned the idea of fighting you most of the crews of the ships are now jumping into the water to escape their sinking ships. You lick your lips and thinking out loud, "this gonna be delicious". Using your hands like giant nets you scoop up the crews by the handful throwing them into your mouth and chewing them down with no resistance, but one DELICIOUS taste. When your done devouring the crews, you begin to work on the ships themselves picking some of the smaller ones up like chocolate bars, but finding yourself still unable to quite lift the battleship. Since you cant lift the battleship, you do the next best thing, break it up. Wrapping your long fingers around the front of it(only just unable to touch your fingers to your thumb) you push down, breaking it off. Throwing the piece into your mouth, you place your expanding hands back onto it and pull a good quarter off the rest of the hulk, finding the armor to give little to no resistance. Pulling or breaking apart the rest of the ship, the great fleet soon lost its last ship.

         With the fleet now gone and you standing in waist deep water you stomped your way onto solid ground, knowing that a city must have been what the fleet had been turning towards. Stepping onto the beech, you notice some cliffs lining the coast that you found barely taller than your ankles. Remembering their height from a geography book you do some math in your head to realize that you are now 900 feet tall! Feeling quite sleepy however, you soon lay down on a great forest, using the 20 foot tall trees as little more than a floor mat. Waking up the next morning you find you skin still shining nicely thanks to all the steel you absorbed yesterday. When you look a little closer however, you notice that almost no fat remains on your body. Now your limbs are longer more slender and lined with taught muscle. You even have a six-pack. Thinking for a moment you realize that all the protein you ate yesterday must have been absorbed by your growing body and you instinctively flex a little bit, noticing how limber and strong you feel. Looking to your left you see a small town waiting to be snuffed out under your massive soles. Looking to your right you see the city that looks perfect for knocking down. Thinking for a moment you decide to...
112131121121.title: Follow the ships like a shark

1121311211211.content:
You'd always had big feet for your age and you wonder to yourself, "what would tiny humans versus my feet look like?", and you take one big step left towards the town. Noticing a highway connecting the town and the city you decide to take a "leisurely stroll down it". Looking at the highway you giggle at the thought of whats about to come. Having lost contact with the fleet and having heard about what happened in your home town, the freeway is packed with cars trying to leave the city. While the cars are still moving, you can barely see the highway itself thanks to sheer amount of traffic on it. "No one's leaving this city!" you yell, placing your massive tread across the width of the interstate. Being more than 900 feet tall, your massive tread barely covers the entire width of the highway, severing the connection to the city. You frown and thinking out loud say, "I wish they were a little bigger". Kneeling down with your right foot still covering the highway, you grab up a chunk of the highway cars, road, and all leaving a massive hand shaped crater. Unlike the ships, the metal from the cars offers no toughness, and your mouth is filled with a deliciously minty flavor mixed with the people inside them. While the dirt offers adds a bitter taste to the handful, it still doesn't offset the flavor of the cars. As you chew you notice a bit of blood dripping down your chin and you quickly wipe it away. "I need to be neat with my eating..." you giggle, reaching for another handful of cars. After a few handfuls, you look back down to your feet watching them expand as your body grows once again. With your small bites digested you stand back up to your mountainous height placing your left foot next to your right foot. Satisfied by the fact that your toes hang well off the highway(with the balls of your feet sitting on the edge of it), you step backwards of the highway. You look down and giggle at the cars and people crushed into your deep footstep, each flatter than pancakes from your massive weight. Satisfied by the size of your feet you turn back towards the town and begin to walk slowly down the highway, making sure to plant your feet directly on the highway giving you the feeling of walking on crackers, tinfoil, and tiny grapes all at the same time! Looking back over your shoulder you see that the flow of traffic has been successfully halted making you giggle. Saying to no one in particular, "the city should have plenty of people to crush when I get back".

         Looking down at one point you notice just how nude you are, making your cheeks blush in embarrassment. Thinking out loud again you remark,"a good pair of underwear would be nice", visualizing your blue boxers at home you think about how great it would be to just wear those. Suddenly you feel the soft touch of fabric against your thigh and look down once again to find yourself wearing those blue boxers. "Awesome!" you exclaim. Stopping for a moment, you stand on the highway deep in thought. "Wait a minute, if I can make boxer briefs appear, I must be developing some god-like powers. I'll need to test them out when I get to that town!" With renewed joy in your heart you break out into a sprint and crash your way down the highway covering nearly an 1/8th of a mile with each ginormous and sending shock waves out with each footfall.

         Arriving at the town not even breathing heavily, you scan the streets with your superhuman eye-sight. A coastal town, the building are concentrated all in a town center with each of the buildings separated by nothing more than a two-lane street. From your perspective the town is no more than 15 feet wide and about 12 feet deep. Grinning you quickly come up with a plan of action. Walking to the edge of the town, you look down at a little house on the edge of the town and stare directly at the terrified faces of the people in the streets. Lifting your thigh so that its parallel with the ground, you let your foot dangle in the air for a moment before using you muscular legs to bring it down with all of your awesome strength. Your foot crashes down on the house and the house across the street from it with enough force that you can barely even feel the houses. At the same time your stomp also creates a shock wave with enough force to blow over all the buildings immediately surrounds the house, leaving nothing more than foundations while the debris hurtles like shrapnel through the adjacent buildings. The people and cars immediately outside the house are either crushed by your foot or immediately vaporized from the shock wave, while people 2-3 buildings away from your stomp are thrown across the town. Laughing a little bit, you let a roar that shatters all the windows in the town, causing many people surrounding you to go deaf. Laughing maniacally you begin to stomp your way around the edges of the town crushing buildings, cars, and people mercilessly. With each step your feet become caked with a mixture of gore, concrete, and mud and its only a few steps before your feet are absolutely filthy. As you work you way around town however, you make your way slowly. While many are still crushed or killed from your stomps many more are able to flee from your rampage, running towards the coast. After about 20 minutes of this, what was once a pretty town is now nothing more than rubble and 100 foot long footprints embedded deep into the earth. However, in the center of the town, you've left an area just a few buildings deep surrounding a fountain. Taking long strides over to that part of the town you scan the crowd that's gathered around the fountain in the center of the town. As you let your eyes scan the crowd you pick out a familiar face, your friend David from school! You remember that he was out of town and realize that he must be here on vacation. Instead of crushing the crowd in one step as you planned, you lay down on your stomach propping your head up on your elbows. With your gore caked feet swinging behind your head you move them just to the left and right enough for the crowd to see them. Seeing them, the entire crowd lets out a scream.

         Looking at your friend, you notice he doesn't seem to recognize you but wears an only slightly scared looked on his face. Letting out a little "hmph" in perplexity, you think about your friend. You close your eyes and imagine your friend almost 100 feet tall wearing nothing but his underwear. Concentrating on that thought your open your eyes and look directly at him. Suddenly a warm pleasurable feeling flows through your body and something begins to happen. The crowd lets out a collective gasp as Davids clothes begin to stretch. Looking around in surprise David grows to 6 feet. At this height his clothes have stretched to their limit and begin to tear. At 8 feet his t-shirt (having long exposed his belly) tears completely and falls off. Only a few seconds after that, his pants tear off completely, leaving him wearing nothing but a pair of brown underwear. Suddenly his growth begins to accelerate and only 3 seconds later, he's 25 feet tall. Seeing the towering boy, the crowd begins to panic and tries to escape to the left and right. Yelling, "oh no you don't!", you plant your 50 foot tall pointer finger in the ground and drag it through the buildings surrounding the crowd knocking them over and crushing anyone in the streets next to them. Noticing his new found size, David begins laughing and walking around the crowd, knocking over people and stomping them under his tread. As he turns towards you however, he stops and studies your face. Reaching 50 feet, David is more than twice the height of the two story buildings left in the town. Realizing this he looks at the buildings then at you, wordlessly asking, "can I crush them"? You giggle and reply, "Go for it!". Putting on a fresh grin David crushes about a half dozen people as he walks over and kicks the side of a building, causing it to collapse. Still growing David continues to crush people and continues to knock over buildings. By the time he's reached 100 feet tall only a half dozen buildings are left which he quickly walks through, coming up to only his shins! Panting a little bit from chasing all the people David smiles and looks back up at you. "Do I know you?" he asks. Frowning you reply, "of course you do, its your friend Nick from school remember?" Thinking for a moment a wave of realization comes over him and he yells, "Oh that's right! Good to see you! But why do you look like your older?" You sit there in shock for a moment before stuttering, "I-I haven't had a chance to look at myself...when was the last time you saw a thousand foot tall mirror?" You both laugh for a moment before he asks,"where do you plan to head to next?"
"I plan to head to the city. There's also a lake next to it though, I might be able to use that as a mirror!" Before David has a chance to respond you grab him like an action figure and thunder away from the town...
1121311211211.title: Snuff out the town under your massive feet.

choices: Go to the military base and get some nice "upgrades".
Have you give him the powers you got earlier and go destroy the city.
11213112112111.content:
Stomping your way to the lake at break neck speed you suddenly hear, a yell from down in your hand, "Hey let me out of here!" Laughing nervously you apologize to David before setting him on your shoulder and continuing to move towards the lake, just at a much slower pace! Arriving at the lake you set David down on the ground and look over your shoulder. Looking over your shoulder you can see the massive footprints you've imprinted into the forest and the trees uprooted around them from the shock waves your feet now generate. Scratching the back of your head you laugh nervously and whisper, "Sorry mother nature." Looking back to the lake you see the lake has become choppy from the vibrations your steps put out. Closing your eyes you imagine the lake and a mirror like still surface. Feeling the warmth travel through your body again you open your eyes to see the lake is crystal clear. As your about to look at yourself, you hear a great splash and the surface of the water once again becomes disturbed. Looking down, you see David has been testing out his strength by uprooting the waist high trees surrounding him. "Hey!", you yell, "I need the water to be calm if I want to be able to see myself!" Realizing his mistake David replies with a quick, "Okay! Sorry!". Calming the waters once again you bend over to look at yourself. Instead of the 7 year old boy you used to be, you see the face of someone who looks like he's about 11 or 12. Studying it for a little longer, you begin to put together the fact that this really is you, just you a few years older. You say to David, "My body must have matured a little bit while I was growing! I have grown a lot after all."
"Cool! Think you could give me a growth spurt as well?"
"Yah! Sure thing."
Closing your eyes and imagining how tall you are now, you think to yourself,"make David that size!" Feeling a massive wave of warmth move through your body you open your eyes to see David rapidly growing. After a few seconds David has actually grown taller than you(he was always taller than you when you were normal sized). Just like you, David has matured a little bit and now appears to be around 11 or 12 despite being only 7 years old. Looking at him a little closer however, you frown noticing that he doesn't have the metallic sheen that would imply tougher skin, or the muscular physique you have (not that he was overweight by anyone's definition!). "When I ate all those ships earlier the steel toughen my skin, and all the people I ate made me stronger, do you want me to give you these things?", you ask. Thinking for a moment David replies,"I don't think you need to."
"How come?"
"There's a military base my family and I drove past when we were coming up here, I could just eat all the vehicles and buildings at the military base to get that. It would be a lot more fun as well!"
"True, but so would smashing the city!...I'll let you decide David."
After giving both options some thought, David decides to...
11213112112111.title: At the lake...

choices: Crush it with your fist (Knock over the city at your current size)
Pop it into your mouth (Eat the city so that you can grow!)
112131121121112.content:
"You know what, screw that military base! Its about time we took care of that city!", David exclaimed. You giggle replying, "alright David, here comes some upgrades!" Concentrating on your own muscular image and tough skin you imagine David with the same abilities, letting the warmth flow through your body. You open your eyes to see David's muscles getting some definition. A nice six-pack forms on his stomach, while his pecs grow out forming a nice little canyon. On his arms and legs any fat evaporates and is replaced with lean muscle and you notice him starting to sink into the ground a little more thanks to the extra wait. Once his muscles have finished a slight sheen begins to spread across his skin starting from his chest and working its way out towards his limbs and their respective digits. Grinning at his new form, David clenches his fist creating a small shock wave from his awesome strength. With a wet sucking noise David steps back from where he was standing leaving two enormous footprints in the dirt. After inspecting himself for a moment David finally asks, "ready for some destruction?" "Oh yeah!", you reply.

         Walking back towards the freeway you traveled down earlier you and David walk side by side back towards the city. By now, the freeway is long abandoned and you're both a little disappointed at not being able to crush anything. Beginning to reach the outskirts of the city, you and David split up working your way around the city dispatching highways and bridges with one massive stomp from your feet. As the sun begins to climb high into the sky you and David meet up just to the west of the city, having destroyed any remaining paths out of the city. Turning towards the city you cup your hands and yell playfully, "Ready or not here we come!" Giggling at the comment, the two of you let take your first steps into the city, crushing several houses to dust under your feet. Crouching down, you eye a peculiar yellow house in the middle of the suburb. Reaching out with one hand, you scoop the house up like a small sapling, taking care not to damage it. You laugh a little bit as you spot the terrified couple living inside of it. Eyeing it for a moment you...
112131121121112.title: Have you give him the powers you got earlier an...

choices: Eat them so that you can start growing again.
1121311211211121.content:
You smirk and with inhuman speed clamp your hand shut creating an explosion of dirt, dust, and splintering wood. Raising you hand high above your head, you turn towards the city slowly opening your hand to let the debris from house slowly rain down in front of your muscular body. Sighing with content you place your hands behind your head and take a massive stride forward. Wanting to ensure no one survives your footsteps you roll your feet from heel to toe with stride laughing a bit as you feel the houses disintegrate beneath your stride like eggshells. Anyone unlucky enough to be out in the open or foolish enough to try and escape soon hears the roaring of your mighty foot barreling towards them. Reaching the denser part of the city, you change course to walk straight though a line of brick apartments!

         Meeting the first of the 5 story apartments, you playfully yell "Look out, Giant coming through!" With your left foot completely covering the the first building, you bring it down without any extra force, letting the weight of your sole crush the building into dust. As you bring your right leg forward however, you change your stride. Lifting your foot off the ground, you point your toes and use your muscular thighs to high kick the apartments! With your muscular legs you're able to lift your leg up past your waist to a 45 degree angle from your body! The length of your leg and the strength of your kick immediately vaporizes 4 apartment buildings at once, sending bricks and wooden splinters thousands of feet into the air to rain down like snow onto the terrified residents. Bringing your foot back down you plant it squarely onto the apartment building at the end of the row, crushing it and some vehicles driving down the street perpendicular the apartments. Having misjudged just how big your feet are, your 12 foot long toes slice off the front of the apartments across the street, leaving the bewildered tenants staring at your ankle and shin.With your legs now stretched out, you drag you left foot up the street on the left of the apartment buildings you just crushed, bulldozing any cars or people caught out in the open and ripping up the asphalt like wafers. Not realizing your foot is too wide for the street however, your pinkie toe ends up cutting through the townhouses lining the street, knocking out their foundations and causing them to fall over. Standing up to your full 1,000 foot height you scan the skyline. Spotting a pretty office skyscraper you turn towards it and methodically make your way there.

         Looking down at your feet, you laugh and remark,"I'm a little big for these streets". Thanks to your 1,000 foot height, your feet are now to wide for the narrow streets crisscrossing the city. Even if you take the time and effort to plant your foot perfectly along the length of the road, the sides of your feet often shave off the fronts of the buildings. With the streets still incredibly narrow, you have to straddle the buildings only able to plant one foot on a street at a time. Coming onto a wider street, you bring your left foot through a few offices so that it can join your right foot, only barely able to fit both on the street. Spotting a crowd of people trying to leave a small office building, you change the trajectory of your right foot so that it lands directly on top of the building. Crushing it to dust, but leaving the stunned crowd in front untouched. Not wanting to stop, you swing your left foot low across the ground, contacting the crowd at the mid point of your stride, allowing the full force of it to obliterate anyone touched by your foot. "Looks like they make good nail polish",you remark, seeing the bright red blood dripping from your toes as you walk. Hearing a group of cars honking in the middle of an intersection you aim your right foot at the group letting the ball of your foot and toes crush them into the road with a satisfying "crunch!" Bringing your left foot in front, you stop and kick your right foot backwards, scraping the ground up with it. The flattened cars along with sections of asphalt, concrete, and piping hurtle into the buildings behind you ripping holes in them like a shotgun blast.

         Stomping your way through a few final buildings, you crash to a stop in front of the pretty office building you saw earlier. Although not the tallest building in the city, the skyscraper is the exact same height as you. Stepping back you admire yourself in the building, flexing your arms in the mirror surface of the glass. Looking at the base of the building, you see the buildings occupants making their way out, trying their best to remain calm as they fan out into the street in vast courtyard in front of the building. Thinking about what to do with the buildings many people, you decide to...
1121311211211121.title: Crush it with your fist (Knock over the city at...

11213112112111211.content:
As you look at the people, you suddenly feel you stomach let out a booming growl. Looking at it and placing your hand on it, you realize you haven't eaten anything since you devoured the Navy yesterday.

Looking directly at the crowd of people you run your tongue over your lips, thinking out loud "Sorry David, I might outgrow you today!" Hearing and seeing your actions, the once orderly crowd erupts into panic and screaming.
"Hey! Don't run away!", you yell, "I haven't even started!" Using just a fraction of the strength stored in your legs, you sprint down the long avenue leading the front of the building. Your powerful feet pound into the road, tearing into the concrete like its made of crackers.

About 500 feet from the building you leap into the air, hoping to land directly on top of the crowd trying to make its way into the parking garage on your left. Feet first, your frame lands directly on top of the crowd, crushing dozens to a bloody pulp.

Not realizing just how much momentum you generated however, you slide right into the parking garage! Your toes smash through the wall on the first floor of the garage like its made of paper mache, allowing your feet to slide all the way in followed by your ankles and shins.

Your feet are so big in fact that the tops of your feet are actually too tall for the first floor and begin to tear up the second floor! As you slide into the center of the garage however, all of your millions of tons becomes too much for the garage floor to handle and you smash through into the basement floors! Your massive feet crash through all 3 basement floors of the garage, making you feel like you...misplaced your step when stepping over a ledge. Despite the fact that you've barely fallen any distance(from your perspective) this combined with the slide, puts you off balance making you flail your arms wildly to regain it. Leaning forward and then backwards, you swipe the side of the building before falling back onto your massive rump.

         Letting out a little "OOF!" you massage your rear end, unaware that your massive behind has crushed 3 buildings and is covering the entire road.
"Looks like I should've listen to the lifeguard when they said don't run" you chuckle, turning your head towards the surviving crowd. Stunned by the the amount of destruction you've caused just by running the entire crowd stares at you unable to move.

Smiling, you reach out a hand big enough to cover two basketball courts scooping up a couple dozen people. Once again coming to their senses, the remaining office workers once again turn and flee, vainly hoping to escape being eaten.
Tossing the first handful into your mouth you chew them down quickly, while extending your arm again. Hoping to cut off their escape you extend your arm out in front of them and drag it towards you, like a kid trying to scoop up sand at the beach.

Once again oblivious to your true strength, your arm doesn't scoop the people towards you, and instead smears them into the road. You frown, studying your red smeared arm, letting out an "Awww", before once again standing up.

Lifting your concrete caked feet out of the ruined garage, you step back onto "solid ground", almost falling back into the hole as your weight collapses the sides of the foundation.
Clapping the dust off your hands your formulate a new plan to get your lunch. Walking through the next door buildings you place yourself back in front of the building "inches" from the glass panes. With your feet having already crushed the lobby and blocked off the front door, you squint into the building.

Smiling at the terrified faces of the people foolish enough to stay in their offices, you place your open hand delicately on the surface of the building, you slowly close it. Leaving a 10 story hole in the building you bring the handful of building up to your face and take a bite. You let out a moan of delight as the concrete, steel, and people mix together into a wonderful taste.
Cramming the remainder of your handful into your mouth you reach forward a LOT less gently and rip another chunk out of the building, tearing into the skyscraper with new found gusto.

         As you devour the building, you also grow, allowing your expanding hands to take greater and greater chunks out of the building.
When your about halfway through the building, your growing feet punch through the building to the other side destabilizing it and putting it at risk of falling over. This doesn't bother you however as you simply grab the sides of the building and pick it up, eating it like an over sized chocolate bar! When only a quarter of the building of the building is left, you sit down cross legged onto the rubble of the foundation oblivious to the buildings knocked over by your knees.

After about 30 minutes of eating, the last piece of chunk of the building is tossed into your cavernous mouth and unceremoniously sent into your belly. Letting out a window shattering burp, you smile with content saying to yourself, "Now that was a hearty meal!"
Scanning the streets, your disappointed to see that the streets surrounding you are now deserted. Anyone who survived your saunter through the city fled elsewhere while you were devouring the building. Thinking that it would be great to hunt some people down with a friend, you suddenly ask out loud, "Wait a minute where's David?" As you say this however, a helicopter rushes over your head, perking your curiosity.

You decide to...
11213112112111211.title: Eat them so that you can start growing again.

112131121121112111.content:
An hour earlier...

         David grinned as he watched the suburb disintegrate beneath his 150 foot long tread. Just a couple hours ago, he'd been just an average 8 year old kid on a vacation. His parents had never cared an awful lot for him and when you'd found him, he was on his way to an isolated summer camp.

The original plan had been for him to travel by boat to an island where he would have attended a summer camp for the next two months! Before he could be exiled off to that boring place however, something magical happened.
Suddenly a boy the size of a mountain had shown up and begun to grind the town into dust. While he'd been a little scared (like anyone else) somehow he'd known in the back of his mind that something REALLY big was about to happen.

Before he knew it, the boy mountain had laid down in front of him and he was growing! Now, just a short while later, he too was a boy mountain.

He'd aged to look closer to the age of twelve, and thanks to his lanky form he hadn't lost his height advantage over his friend.

Suddenly he spotted a car out of the corner of his eye trying to escape the neighborhood. Lifting his foot, he curled his toes and aimed his big toe at the fleeing car. Giggling he pursued the car with his big toe, following the car around as if it was a monster by itself, all the while knocking over houses from merely brushing them with his foot. Just as he was about to over extend himself, he drew his foot back giving the people driving the car the mistaken impression they had escaped.

He imagined them letting out a sigh of relief before slamming his entire foot down onto the car, covering the entire road and blasting away the houses surrounding his stomp.
Leaning into his foot with his millions of tons, the cracks surrounding his footprint began to spread further and further like a great spider web, rupturing water pipes and power lines two streets over. Stepping forward, he giggled as he lifted his foot out of the footprint with a wet sucking noise, leaving his foot caked in mud from all the ruptured water mains.

         Lifting his foot up to inspect it, he giggled mischievously saying, "Better not track THIS into the house!".

Setting it down (ironically) on two houses, he scuffed his foot like they were little more than a welcome mat, tearing them apart like they were wet cardboard. Turning to say something to you he suddenly noticed you were missing.
"Hmmm, guess I might as well try some things out on my own", David mumbled, turning towards the city. Wanting to relish every step in the suburbs, David added a little extra force to each step, sending tremors through the neat little houses and deep into the city.

Spotting the first rows of multi-story buildings, David began to pick up the pace. A deafening "THOOM THOOM THOOM THOOM" echoed through the city as David increased his speed until he was in a dead sprint, his lanky form bounding over a 1/4 of a mile with each step. Just a few feet (by his perspective) away from the first buildings, David put a last little bit of spring into his step and soared towards the city, staying low over the ground. Like a soccer player chasing after a ball, David wrapped his left leg close to his body, and extended his right leg and foot outwards. Wanting to increase the destruction, he relaxed his rock hard abs, and let his 500 foot long torso crash to the ground as well, extending each of his muscular arms like block sized sweepers. His massive stomper smacked squarely into the side of the first brick apartment building, barely coming up to the arch of his foot.

David's momentum carried him through the entire row of apartments and into the next, barely slowing down. The brick buildings put up such little resistance in fact, that David didn't come to a stop until he was in a section of warehouses...five blocks away from where he started sliding.

         Standing up to his mind-boggling height, David turned around to survey his carnage. His sliding body had cleared a swath 4 blocks wide and 5 blocks deep. The massive weight of Davids body had ground everything to little more than dust.

A 300 foot wide trench had been carved into the earth with only a few fragments of brick pressed into the side of the trench. Around the trench was what was left of the area after David arms swept through them like a hurricane. Any buildings taller than his arms littered the area in sad little heaps while the smaller buildings had also been ground into dust. His destruction was so utterly complete in fact that the only evidence of people ever having lived in that section of the city was stuck to him! Examining his dust caked body David giggled at the sight of the long blood streaks covering his legs, arms, and behind. Beginning to dust himself off David chuckled muttering,"Now that's how you do some demolition."

Slapping the dust off his behind, David noticed a little prick of light on his arm. "What was that?" he yelled. Suddenly another prick of light flashed, this time on his massive thigh. Turning to his right he let out a snort of laughter as he found the culprit; a little toy army.

Bending over double, Davids snorting laughter rattled the windows of the warehouses at his feet. After a few moments of laughter David addressed the army. "Do you guys really think you can fight me?", he roared,"Okay, I'll be a nice guy, I'll give you guys til the count of 5 to stop me!" The army gave a quick reponse as a great chorus of gunfire erupted from city below.

Rockets, artillery shells, and even tiny bullets all slammed into Davids gigantic body, ricocheting off or exploding harmlessly on Davids armored skin. David let out a fake yawn and began to drum his toes, sending fear pulsing through the armies ranks. "One!", the armies fire intensified along with David's toe drumming. "Two!", the helicopters fired off their remaining rocket pods. "Three!", the hail of bullets began to subside as the soldiers fled. "Four!", David began to squat on his massive thighs as the fire died out, before he finally roared, "Five! Times up, here I come!"

         Using his building sized thighs and quads David leap into the air, his mountainous body roaring towards the army.

Like a ninja he landed feet first in the middle of an intersection, his thighs bulging as they absorbed the shock of his frame crashing to earth. The shock-wave from his landing blasted through the city, shattering windows as it weaved its way through the maze like city.
Grinning down at the astonished soldiers he rose up to his full height, the 30-story buildings not even coming up to his waist. Rather unceremoniously, he planted his 150 foot long tread on top of the massed soldiers with a wet crunch.

Curling his long toes, a mixture of blood and gore oozed up from beneath his toes causing him to giggle at the ticklish sensation. Suddenly David remembered his chat with you and he thought to himself, "I'll need to eat if I want to get any bigger!" Addressing the soldiers at his feet he flatly said, "Looks I'm gonna need to eat you now."
Unable to bend over from a standing position thanks to his lanky form, he plopped down onto both his knees, crashing into the sides of the buildings with his broad shoulders.

Oblivious to the damage he was doing to the buildings around him, David reached a long arm and scooped up a dozen or so soldiers. A little bit tentatively, David raised the handful of soldiers up to his face looking at it with curiosity and hesitation. Shrugging, David tossed them into his mouth like a handful of skittles. Chewing slowly, as if in anticipation, David 's eyes suddenly perked up and he let out a groan as his tongue communicated the delicious taste to his brain. Looking back down to his prey with a toothy smile he said to himself, "This'll be good..."
112131121121112111.title: Go find David.

choices: Find you and continue your adventure.
Find the ocean and take a relaxing bath.
1121311211211121111.content:
Ravenous was one of many words you could have used to describe Davids hunger. Over and over again his hands blurred as they reached down to grab another handful of his prey, before practically throwing them into his mouth. Every once in a while, he would miss his mouth and instead of landing in his cavernous maw the soldiers would bounce off his lips. This was no mercy for them however, as they then would fall nearly 700 feet to their certain doom. Quickly exhausting his supply of foot soldiers however, he wiped the blood from his mouth and began to scoop up handfuls of 70 ton tanks! Despite their 6 inch thick armor and tremendous weight however, they offered no more resistance than M&Ms on a hot day. Thanks to his growing, he soon found himself unable to reach the streets below him standing on his knees, forcing him to plop down onto his thighs like a karate student. In just a couple quick minutes, the army had been all but devoured (save for a few men that ran down the tight alleyways), but despite having eaten at least 1,000 people David still found his stomach growling. Bending his head down to look into the buildings, David was delighted to discover that there were still people trapped inside them. Standing up to his full height (ripping the fronts of many buildings from the tight fit), David eyed a "cute" 40 story building on his right.

         Before eating the army, David had been somewhere's in the neighborhood of 1200 feet tall (just a bit taller than you), now that he'd eaten they army however, he'd grown a tad bit. Although he hadn't grown that much, it was still enough that he basically no longer fit on the street, in fact he'd basically just knocked enough material out of the buildings to create a hole wide enough for him to stand up in. Frustrated by this lack of movement he turned to the 20 story building behind him and placed his meaty sole on top. He giggled at the fact that his foot was now as longer than the square building was deep, letting his long toes dangle over the front. Like an annoying sandcastle, he crushed it all the way down to its foundations before doing the same to the buildings adjacent to it. Having finally cleared some room around his "prize" building, David set his rump down on the rubble of the three buildings, folding his legs against his torso so that he could down in front of his new meal. Despite his sitting position, the building only came up to his neck, allowing him to still dwarf it. Forming his hand into a dagger David gently pushed his hand into the building about 6 floors from the top before pushing his hand up, pulling off six floors like a piece of toast. Biting into his "building toast", David once again chewed slowly, processing the new tastes of the concrete, steel, and people. Letting out an, "Mmmm" in satisfaction David repeated his earlier move, eating it down to his foundation. Still not full, David moved on to the next building, and the next building, and the next building. By the time he was done eating, six 30 story buildings had been eaten down to their foundations, with the final building simply being grabbed in one gigantic hand and eaten like an oversized granola bar.

Finally content with his meal, David stood up from his meal and clapped the dust off his hands. The sun was beginning to set and it had been at least an hour since he'd last seen you. Looking over himself however, he could see his rampaging had made him filthy, covering his body in long streaks of blood caked with dust.

Thinking for a moment David set off to...
1121311211211121111.title: Continue...

11213112112111211111.content:
Like a small mountain rising out of the city, David got to his feet and looked placed his hand on his forehead scanning the skyline for your form. Grinning, he spotted a towering cloud of dust rising out of the downtown area. Hearing you call out his name, David turned and began to make his way towards you, his heavy footfalls making the city quake with terror.

         "David?...DAVID?", you called out. "Wonder what he's been doing...", you muttered under your breath. As the words left your lips, your sensitive feet picked up vibrations and you looked around for a lanky towering form. Cupping your hands to your mouth you let out an windowshattering, "OVER HERE!". You smiled as the vibrations increased in their rhythm and intensity. Placing your hands on your hips, you turned with a grin to look down the tight corridor of buildings. Suddenly David's lanky form literally leapt into view, as he came down with a great crash in the middle of the street. Well...sorta in the middle. Beginning to outgrow the "puny" city Davids massive feet couldn't fit on the street and instead crushed buildings on either side of the street. While the arch of his foot landed on tarmac, his heel and toes coming down on some unfortunate shopping centers. Using his mind boggling weight and strength, David turned to you with a smile and opened up a path by the mere act of walking, kicking the ankle high buildings to dust. Imitating a surprised adult David jokingly remarked,"My my haven't you grown!". Giggling, you replied,"I know, it must be something they've been feeding me." Embracing, each of you told the other about what had transpired. "Wow so you really ate a 100 story building by yourself?", David asked in wonder. "Uh huh, since we grow as we eat, there's a lot greater limit on how much we can eat. Its possible there isn't even a limit.", you replied. "Wow, that's pretty cool. Not as cool as me wiping out a military however!", David boasted, flexing each of his skyscraper sized biceps. "That sounds like it was pretty cool.", you giggled. Noticing the blood streaked all over arms and body you imitated a stern parent and gasped, "You can't be seen like that! You need to get that off you immediately!" Laughing, David sassily replied,"Well you find a bathtub and some soap! Then I'll get clean!" Laughing in return, you pretended to get something from your 'back pocket' and made a ferry sized bar of soap appear in your hand. Outstretching your hand to his shocked face you smiled and flatly replied, "Here you go."
11213112112111211111.title: Find you and continue your adventure.

choices: Yawned before going to bed with you.
Trudged off for some late night snacking!
112131121121112111111.content:
Walking out of the densely packed downtown area, you and David coolly made your ways towards the ocean, taking care not to knock over any of the taller buildings as your massive forms made their way east. While you both took exceptional care around the skyscrapers, the two of you could have cared less about anything else unfortunate enough to get in your way. With you now close to 1600 feet tall, and David close to 1800 feet tall each of your feet were now the size of football fields! Walking side by side, the two of you cleared a 4 block wide swath of destruction, leaving the perfect imprint of your soles like the ground was made of clay. Finding the beach, you both crushed the tourist shops and gear rentals to dust. Neither one of you bothered stopping for them as they were now insignificant, barely half the height your toes. Calmly entering the water, the two of you chose not to take off your underwear, too embarrassed at the thought of seeing each other naked. Using the ferry sized blocks of soap you'd conjured up earlier, the two of you scrubbed away the blood and dust caked onto your bodies, letting it melt away into the water. Wanting to ensure your hair was clean as well, you conjured up a giant sized bottle of your favorite strawberry scented shampoo, delighting at the familiar smell. With the two of you washed squeaky clean, the last thing left to do was dry off. Conjuring up two gleaming white towels on the shore, you stepped out of the bay dumping thousands of gallons worth of water onto the beach and shore-front. Followed shortly by David, the two of you dried off before blaisely dumping the towels onto the ground, unceremoniously crushing dozens of buildings underneath.

         Simultaneously letting out a sigh of content, you and David plopped down onto the shore-front, letting your long legs rest on the beach while letting your feet sit in the warm ocean water. The two of you sat on the beach for a little bit, soaking in the ocean breeze oblivious to the sirens echoing behind your backs. After relaxing for a few minutes David was the first to speak. "Today was...AWESOME!", he bellowed raising a fist into the air. Giggling, you smiled and replied, "I thought you might like it up at my size." "Are you kidding me!", David bellowed, "Today was the greatest day of my life! I ate an entire army for dinner plus an entire city block!" "Now, no one's gonna mess with me, or order me around! From now on David's at the top of the world!" Smiling from your friends excitement, you looked over your shoulder at the swath of destruction you'd cut through the city. Turning back around, you spoke to the blissfully happy David, "Hey David?" "What?", David replied.
"What do you wanna do with the rest of the city?"
"Hmmm, well we grow if we eat right?"
"Right."
"Well shouldn't it be obvious then? Lets eat it!"
Placing your hand on your chin, you thought about his idea for a moment. "Well...wouldn't it get kinda boring if we were too big?"
"Yah thats true...but can't you shrink us down?", David inquired.
"Well I haven't tried it, but if I can make the both of us bigger, I don't see any reason why I can't make us smaller."
"So its settled then?"
You smiled slyly replying,"You bet!" Letting out a ground-shaking yawn, you suddenly realized just how tired you were. "But first.", you said, "I need a little rest!" Frowning David pleaded with you, "Oh come on! Can we just do a little more destruction?"
Pitying your friend you replied,"Sorry David I've been playing since first thing in the morning. So first-", you were interrupted by a yawn, "I need to sleep. But we'll start first thing in the morning!" Clearly disgruntled by this answer David crankily replied, "Fine...but we'd better start first thing in the morning!" "Thanks David!", you replied before laying over on your back and entering a deep sleep.

         Just as you fell asleep, the sun finally set behind you and nighttime enveloped the city. Looking at your sleeping form and then the city, David seemed to be hatching something.

Silently standing up David turned to the city and...
112131121121112111111.title: Continue...

choices: Something happens before the Next day comes.
1121311211211121111111.content:
Even though he'd claimed he wasn't that tired, David flopped down next to you and almost immediately fell asleep. When you both woke up in the morning, the true fun started.

Strolling back towards the downtown area, you and David made your way towards the tallest building in the city. Once a towering symbol of modernity and engineering, the final floor of the sleek glass building now only came up to your shoulders, with the radio tower still only managing to touch the top of your neck.

Positioning yourselves on the north and south sides of the skyscraper, you and David squatted down to a sitting position showing off your massive thighs. Clamping your hands onto the edges of the building, you both simultaneously cocked your heads to the side so that you could see each others faces. Grinning mischievously you spoke to David, "Ready?" Returning your grin David replied, "Absolutely." Your thighs tensed and swelled in anticipation as you pushed against the ground lifting the tallest building in the city! The ground rumbled and a deafening cracking noise echoed throughout the city as you and David used your incredible strength to rip the building off the ground and into the air! Unfortunately for the building however, your strength was applied to quickly and the building separated from the bottom floor, leaving a roofless lobby and a couple basement floors. Bracing yourself for the weight of the building your tensed face changed to one of bewilderment as you realized it was ridiculously light!

         "Hey David? Let go for a second?", you called out. "Sure!", came the swift reply. As David let go the building did increase in weigh (not to mention the bulk), but you found yourself having no problem holding it. You were now holding a 1,400 foot tall building like it was little more than an oversized stuffed animal! Looking at it in surprise for a moment, your surprised look changed to a toothy grin.

Chuckling a little bit you turned West to look down a mostly intact avenue, letting your 1,600 foot tall frame cast a menacing shadow as you stood in the rubble of the buildings your football field sized feet had just crushed. "Now this is real strength!", you bellowed, swinging the bottom of the building up and rested it on your left shoulder! This little stunt however proved to be too much for the frame of the building and a metallic groan erupted from the building as it split in two, your shoulder acting as the fulcrum point. You let out an, "Oops!" as your lightening fast reflexes kicked in and your other hand caught the bottom "half" of the building. Turning around you grimaced expecting to find the top of the building lying in a pile of rubble.

To your pleasant surprise however, David's lightening fast reflexes had also kicked in and you found him grasping the top half of the building in his long fingers. "I don't think this thing is gonna last much longer", he remarked. Looking at your half of the building you noticed that your powerful hands were beginning to mangle the building, bending the steel frame and shattering what few windows were left. "Yah sorry, let's just sit down and eat!", you responded. Setting your behind down on a few buildings, you giggled as you used your powerful glutes to grind the rubble into dust.

         Over the next half hour or so, you and David chatted like normal boys as you each consumed your "serving" of skyscraper. Up until this point, neither one of you had consumed something so proportionally big and the tallest building in the city gave the two of you one BIG gift.

By the time the two of you had finished, you each stood up to shoot a half mile into the air! At this size, the two of you were truly unstoppable as normal humans became barely a tenth of an inch tall from your perspective. Rather than a maze to make your way through, the city now became a wading pool as your 450 foot long stompers smashed their way through the city.

Taking a break from eating, the two of you spent most of the morning playing "games" like who could crush more cars in one step, who could throw a cargo ship the furthest, and your undeniable favorite "snowball fight". Finding some smaller buildings, you and David would rip them out of the ground and form them like a snowball into a round-ish projectile.

After a few minutes of making ammunition, the two of you would stand some distance apart before marking out a few blocks of city as your "arena". After a heart pounding countdown, the two of you would duck and dive like ninjas all the while trying to hit each other with your building snowballs. The game would end when you'd either hit each other three times or the arena had been flattened. There was a lot of playful banter as you each accused each other of not calling out hits. This didn't bother either one of you two much as these arguments usually ended in block-leveling rough housing as you wrestled each other into the ground.

         Eating half of the remaining skyscrapers for lunch, the two of you continued to rough house into the early evening until the two of you ate the other half of the notable skyscrapers for dinner. Sleeping like rocks for another, you both woke up at sunrise to finish what was left of the city. Eating the smaller 30 and 40 story buildings for the rest of the day, the two of you finished off any buildings of note in the city. Content and exhausted, the two of you finally waded into the bay that night to scrub off the dust and debris. Thanks to your new height however, the two of you couldn't "swim" in the warm waters of the bay as you had two nights prior and you both had to walk a dozen miles or so out into the ocean before the water got deep enough to be usable. After washing off in the cool ocean waters, you both stomped your way back onto land. Drying off with towels the size of small islands you laid them out on the city before laying down on them for a good nights rest. Tomorrow was going to be a special day.
1121311211211121111111.title: Yawned before going to bed with you.

choices: Small town and its surrounded residents.
11213112112111211111111.content:
The morning sun flashed in your eyes, and you held up your hand in annoyance trying to block out the sun. Groaning as you stretched and sat up, you didn't even open your eyes as you grunted out a, "Morning David...AH...how was your night?" No response came. "David?", you asked in surprise. Not hearing a response you opened your eyes to find the morning sun shining on an empty towel. Groaning as you finally stood up, you muttered under your breath,"Whats he doing now?" Unlike the last two times you'd gotten up, something had changed, more importantly you'd grown a little. Rising up like a mountain you stood up to your 2 mile height! Still half asleep, you swung your foot forward onto the blank landscape that had once been a city and began plodding your way inwards. Now nothing of note was left. As if an atomic bomb had gone off, the area where the city had once stood had been cleaned of all but a few structures. Thanks to you and Davids "activities" over the last three days or so, the only remnants of the city were a few foundations and bits and pieces of skyscrapers that had been too insignificant to bother eating. Footprints of varying sizes covered the cityscape, signs of the extreme growth you and David had experienced over the last three days. The only thing you hadn't touched were the abandoned suburbs that lined the outskirts of the city, the houses not offering enough "substance" to be worth trying to eat. Scanning the ground for signs of where David might have gone, you spotted a line of foot prints trailing off into the distance leading off to a group of hills. Letting out a heavy sigh you changed course to follow the footprints, taking you northwest.

         Each step you took put out a tremendous shock-wave that scoured the earth of any standing wall or debris, leaving nothing but the outlines of foundations and roads. What did remain after the shock-wave was soon swallowed as your massive weight caused massive cracks to splay out in all directions, the earth barely able to hold you. Each of your footprints left a permanent mark of your power and strength. Not paying attention to where you were going, you suddenly felt a tiny "crunch" under your foot. Bewildered by the feeling you looked down and found you were standing in one the suburbs. You snorted as you noticed how each of your steps destroyed houses as much as 1000 feet away from where your foot landed. Wiggling your toes to create earthshaking tremors, you suddenly noticed a "small foot print". Squinting you realized that this was one of YOUR footprints, leftover from when you were a 'mere' 1000 feet tall. Being as delicate as you could, you lifted your foot into the air and pressed it into the ground next to your old footprint. Like a child writing his name in concrete you stabbed your finger into the earth and wrote your name below your quarter-mile long footprint, leaving a smiley face at the end for a bit of humor. Content with your 'signing' you stood back up and stomped your way out of the neighborhood, literally blowing away the suburb as you walked.

         Cresting the hills you'd followed David's footprints to, you looked down and found David messing with a...
11213112112111211111111.title: The Next Day...

112131121121112111111112.content:
Over the last couple days, the town had watched the news and felt the great rumbles coming from the great city on the coast as the two boys had crushed it to dust. Unfortunately for them however, the roads going into and out of the city had been closed by both the rampaging feet of the two boys, and the army imposing martial law on the surrounding areas. After a couple days of this however, something changed. On the morning of the third day, the town awoke as the rumblings grew far more intense, causing walls to crack and some of the weaker buildings to fall down. Then they saw him. The taller and skinnier of the boys was leisurely strolling towards the town, his eyes scanning the ground for potential targets. A chill ran down their spines as his eyes locked onto their pitiful town and he began sauntering directly towards them. Just as he was about to wipe them out with the shockwave's of his footfalls, his feet changed trajectory and instead landed far away and in front of the town. Then, the boy mountain began to sit down. With his legs spread wide, he squatted down and planted his massive hands behind him, the shockwaves rolling through the town like a gentle breeze. With his enormous behind dangling in the air, he slowly began to set it down, causing screams to erupt from the town in a chorus as it appeared to be barreling straight for them. Lucky for them however, the boy's massive behind sailed directly overhead and instead landed a few hundred feet behind the town with a gentle thud. While it was apparent that the boy was trying to be as gentle as possible, the simple act of him sitting down sent an earthquake like shockwave through the ground, knocking the entire townspeople to the ground and causing a few more buildings to collapse.

         David giggled at the sight of the town between his massive thighs. Just a few days ago, he would've been walking around at a height of around 5'4", now the town was no bigger than a paper plate to him. He precariously poked the town with his 500 foot long pointer finger, giggling further as he watched the town hall collapse from the mere touch of his finger. "Wow, you guys are weak", he boomed, shattering every window in the town and temporarily deafening the population. Not even thinking, he dragged his legs inward, scraping up enormous chunks of earth as his lower legs bulldozed anything in their path. The town cowered in fear as his lower legs moved like unstoppable dams towards them, believing it was truly the end. Rather than unceremoniously bulldoze the town like they though however, his lower legs stopped as his quarter mile long stompers came together, forming a diamond shaped box that completely surrounded the town. Swishing his mouth, David began to generate hundreds of gallons of saliva before puckering his lips and sending a massive ball of spit at the town, generating a shrieking roar as it traveled. The wad of spit landed like a building sized bomb in the center of the town literally washing away dozens of buildings and trapping hundreds of people in sticky saliva. "You guys can't even survive my saliva? I don't think I can do an awful lot more here.", he muttered in disappointment. "Oh well, I guess you'll make a good breakfast!", he exclaimed. As if he was scraping a bit of sauce off his meal, David leaned down with his finger and brushed the saliva off the town, wiping it on a patch of grassland next to his leg. Forming his hands into daggers, he plunged them into the ground, instantly breaking through and digging hundreds of feet underneath the town. Then, with extreme care and deliberateness, he began to slowly lift his hands up, the ground quaking as the 2-mile tall boy dug up the town and the dirt cake beneath it in one motion. Unfortunately for David however, his strength was a little too much. As he picked up the town like a sandwich, the earth the town was planted on began to crumble in his hands. Instead of making one thick cake that he could eat, the earth fractured into a half dozen pieces before tumbling out of his hands and onto the ground, leaving him staring at a couple chunks of earth with town on top, barely a mouthful.

         Starting from the moment David had spit on the town, you'd managed to sneak up behind him and watch in fascination as he toyed with the town. Now, David was glaring with a look of intense annoyance at the chunk of town, still having failed to notice you standing just off to the side. "Breakfast not going as planned?", you asked. "You might say that", David replied angrily. Suddenly, to your surprise, his hand closed with lightning speed on the town, crushing any remaining chunks. Leaping to his feet in a not so gentle fashion, he glared at the farms surrounding the town, already flattened by the shockwaves generated by him jumping up. Raising his foot high into the air, he brought it down with all of his strength on the ruins of some old farm house, leaving a quarter mile long footprint and sending dirt shooting into the air as the force of his stomp tore the earth to pieces. Again and again he stomped his feet onto any object he could spot, oblivious to the fact that his earlier stomps had already wiped out pretty much anything in a mile radius around him. Stomping over to one of the abandoned highways, a column of tanks sitting on the road began to fire at him, their shots forming little pricks of light on his thighs and lower legs. Ironically enough, David couldn't even feel their shots. In fact, the only thing that tipped David off to their presence was the flashes of light caused by their guns firing. "OH, now you wanna fight me?!", he boomed,"Let's see how you like THIS!" Not even taking a step towards them, he simply aimed his foot at the highway and slammed it down on top of the tanks with a deafening "BOOM!", his middle toe completely occupying the entire width of the highway. Driving his point home, David twisted his foot back and forth on the roadway, tearing up acres of earth as he ground the flattened outlines of the tanks into the ground. The entire time, you'd stood there astonished by David's rage(then again, you'd always been the calmer one). Sauntering over to his side, you patted him on the back and spoke reassuringly to David, "Got that out of your system?" "Yah", he replied coolly, "let's get back to your big idea."

         Turning away from David you closed your eyes and began to conjure up some items. First, a pair of khaki shorts for the both of you, then topped with a blue polyester shirt in one hand and a longer red shirt in the other. Lastly on top of the shirts, a pair of brown flips flops with fabric straps, one pair a scaled up size 10 and the other a scaled up size 10.5(David was just taller, and you'd always had big feet). Turning around you held out the two neatly folded piles of clothes and smiling told David,"Take your pick, Red or Blue." Taking the pile with the red shirt(Which you had thankfully created a little larger than your own), David slid into the khaki shorts and pulled the red t-shirt over his head. Following suit, you put on your clothes before dropping the flip flops on the ground, unceremoniously flattening a small forest at your feet.
