Then, you delicately slid your massive stompers into the flip flops drumming your toes on the squishy foam when they'd slid in all the way. As soon as David had slipped on his flip flops, you spoke to him,"Ready to go David?" "Sure! But first, where are we going?", he inquired. "Well..."
112131121121112111111112.title: Small town and its surrounded residents.

choices: Be a little sneaky this time around...
1121311211211121111111121.content:
"Home?!", David yelled in excitement, "That sounds awesome! I can't wait to put that stupid school under my foot!" "Yah, you and me both!", you replied.
Turning around, the two of you headed back towards the ruined city before following the highway south back towards your hometown. The two of you made idle conversation as your quarter mile long feet crashed their way across the countryside.

Any sections of highway not engulfed by your flip flop clad feet were thrown into the air from the force of your feet landing. You never noticed any of this however as even the highest flying debris still only reached a couple thousand feet off the ground, smacking into your shins. Thanks to your size, even building sized chunks of concrete failed to register on your bunker like skin. Surprisingly enough to the people below, the two of you rarely deviated from your path back to civilization, instead following the freeway as closely as a two mile tall boy could.

This didn't mean your trail was free of destruction however, in fact the flat bottoms of your flip flops amplified the force of your footfalls and sent tremendous SLAP's echoing for miles, followed immediately by an apocalyptic shock-wave.

You of course had planned this. Every once in a while you'd stop and look down as the shock wave from one of your previous steps made its way across the land, fascinated as it leveled entire towns and flattened great swaths of forest. After only a half hour of walking, you and David stopped at a familiar place.
Although you and David's eyesight was beyond super-human, it was still not quite good enough to make out smaller details at two miles into the air.

Squatting down on your thighs, you squinted and saw the foundation of a visitor center, with a sign welcoming you to your home state embedded into the ground. "Looks like the highway carried us a bit west of home", you told David. "Oh, that explains all the mountains on our left", he remarked. Standing back up and looking at the mountains, you noticed that you and David were still barely out of sight to the city. Suddenly an idea popped into your head and a broad grin appeared on your face, turning to David you told him that you wanted to:
1121311211211121111111121.title: "We're headed home!"

choices: Did nothing and waited until the ride was over before acting.
11213112112111211111111211.content:
"I want to get into the city without anyone knowing!", you told David. Pondering this idea for a moment, David replied,"That sounds cool, but how are we gonna do that?" "Like this!", you exclaimed, snapping your fingers. Suddenly you and David both began to shrink down at a rapid rate, shrinking smaller and smaller as the earth seemed to rush up towards the two of you. You laughed as David stumbled from the sudden vertigo, falling backwards onto the ruins of the visitors center at about a thousand feet tall, completely engulfing it. Getting back on to his feet while shooting a quick glare your way, both you and David continued to shrink until the two of you were a "measely" hundred feet tall. "Hopefully no one in the city will spot us now, but I don't plan on walking there either", you told David mischievously. Hearing this, a big grin spread across David's face and he replied, "I think I have this figured out now..."

         Using the highway for guidance, you and David ran southwards, astonished by the destruction the two of you had caused from simply walking. Despite running at close to 180 mph (relative to normal humans), it took the two of you a couple of minutes before you began to enter an area not damaged by the force of your footsteps earlier. Naturally of course, the road along this section was all but deserted with only a few abandoned cars dotting the highway. Even still, you found plenty of fun in aiming you 16 foot tread at these little stepping stones, relishing the feeling of them crunching under your flip flop clad feet. Passing a sign showing that there was a tunnel up ahead, you shrunk down even further until the two of you were around 20 feet tall. Thanks to this decrease in size, the run through the tunnel took a little while, but your fit body had plenty of stamina for the trip. Exiting the tunnel the two of you found yourselves looking out at an intersection full of cars. The two of you could see the roadblock that explained why the stretch of freeway you had run along was so abandoned. Meanwhile, vehicles were flowing freely onto a road that headed east towards the coast and more importantly, your home city. The two of you were a little surprised to see that the traffic was behaving normally, no crushing traffic jams or panic as you'd expected. Turning with a smile towards David, you remarked,"This'll be easier than I thought."

         Entering the thick trees on the side of the road, you and David quietly made your way forest, taking care not to knock over too many trees or talk too loudly. After a half hour of navigating through the forest, you spotted one of the concrete pillars holding up the freeway through the trees. Turning to David and touching your finger to your lips, you motioned for him to come towards you. Shrinking the two of you back to your normal heights of 5'2" and 5'5" you conjured up some new clothes for the two of you. Handing a backpack to David, and putting one for yourself on the ground, you instructed him to put his flip flops in the bag along with the polyester running shirt he'd been wearing up to this point. To replace these items, you handed him a pair of sneakers complete with a pair of snow white socks and a Navy polo shirt. As he did this, you followed suit and put on a matching polo shirt and slipped a matching pair of shoes and socks onto your feet. With your wardrobe change complete, you and David appeared to be normal schoolboys. Exiting the forest, you and David spotted a truck stop a short distance away and the two of you walked underneath the overpasses as cars zoomed over head. Just as you were both about to exit the area a truck suddenly blared its horn overhead, startling you both. Stopping, David looked up at the highway with a glare and yelled, "Stupid Trucks! Why can't you be more quiet!" Slamming a clenched fist on the concrete pillar next to him, David was startled as the entire overpass vibrated, raining dust down on the both of you. Walking over to the pillar with curiosity, you grabbed the corner and squeezed your hand. To your amazement, the concrete cracked beneath your hand and you pulled a hand sized chunk of concrete right off the pillar! "Looks like we're not just stronger when we're giant sized", you said in amazement. Realizing his new found strength, a grin spread over Davids face and he turned to the pillar with a mischievous look. Pulling his arm back, the taught muscles on his arm swelled in preparation to obliterate the concrete column in front of him. Seeing what he was about to do you grabbed his wrist yelling,"WHOA WHOA WHOA, don't do that!" "Why not, it'd be pretty cool wouldn't it?", he replied cockily. "If you do that, the highway might collapse on top of us, plus it would close the roads into town. I think we'd be fine, but I don't wanna test it!" Smirking at your concern he relaxed his arm and replied, "Okay, but I hope we destroy this thing later!" Returning his smile, you responded,"Oh yeah, you bet we will."

         The two of you exited the woods behind the truck stop and sauntered over to the lines of parked trucks outside the main building. Scanning the parking lot for any drivers, you and David spotted a amicable looking truck driver making his way towards the truck. Putting on your best nervous face, you approached the truck driver, piping up, "Excuse me sir? We got left behind by our school trip, think you could help us?" Taken aback by your sudden appearance, he looked down to you and with a friendly smile said, "Sure, you happen to have a cellphone on yah?" Looking down at the ground with a nervous face you nervously tapped your fingers together and said, "Well, we lost our cellphones at the museum we were visiting and I can't remember my parents number. We were hoping you could drive us into town." Letting out a sigh, the Truck driver pondered your request for a moment before responding,"Alright, but you'll need to explain this to your parents when you get home, I don't want to get in trouble on your behalf." Turning towards his truck, he climbed into the cab motioning for you to get in. Shooting each other a grin, the two of you opened the passenger door and climbed into the cab, plopping down onto the sofa like backseat.

During the trip you...
11213112112111211111111211.title: Be a little sneaky this time around...

choices: Sure! Let's try growing slowly for a bit!
Nah!... Let's get bigger. (A LOT BIGGER!)
112131121121112111111112111.content:
As the truck rolled down the freeway, the driver turned on the radio and attempted to catch the latest news on the "Giant Kid Attack" as they were now calling it. It turned out that the kids who'd grown earlier had all shrunk back down to normal after not eating anything for a bit.

It appeared that if they didn't eat something immediately after their growth had started, they wouldn't be able to grow any bigger than about 10 or 15 feet tall before slowly shrinking back to normal. Adding on to all of this, only kids in the big cities grew(explaining why David hadn't grown when you found him). Any of those who had grown taller had been taken away to various government camps to be "studied"(what that meant was unknown). As for you and David however, the details about your identities was hazy.

The only transmissions that had made it out of the city that you two had destroyed were radio before they were cut off by the government. While some media sources had tried to monitor you and Davids behavior from a distance, they'd been too far away too learn your identities.
Adding on to that, one of your flip flop clad feet had landed directly on top of one of the media gatherings as you and David made your way back South, meaning your saunter back towards your home city had gone without any kind of coverage. According to the world, you and David had mysteriously "vanished" after the last few images of your flip flop barreling towards the media gathering.

Somehow, you could feel a ceiling that was the limit to how big you could grow before you would have to eat more. You could somehow tell that eating again would allow you to raise that ceiling and allow to grow taller and taller at will.

         Looking out the windshield of the truck, you smiled as you spied the skyscrapers of your home city along with a city limits sign. Silently, you pulled off your shoes revealing your big sock clad feet and stowed your sneakers in your backpack.
Gently setting your feet down onto the cab floor, you slumped down in the chair so that your legs were extended as far as possible and began to grow. Just like before, your clothes grew with you as your feet spread their way across the floor.
The passenger seat was nearly 5 feet away, but your size 15 tread was already touching the base of the seat in front of you. As your slumped form began to fill the back seat, you took your enormous socked feet and kicked them up onto the front seat.

Smirking you yelled to the driver, "Hey mister?" "Yah?", he replied. "I think I'm having a bit of a growth spurt." Turning around, the color immediately drained for the driver's face as he saw your 8 foot tall form seeming to occupy the entire cab, your socked feet big enough to engulf his entire face.
Instinctively, the driver reached for the gear lever, ready to slow down the truck as fast as possible. Frowning, you used your gargantuan foot and stomped the floor, rattling the entire cab and causing the driver to visibly shudder. "I'll make a deal, you continue to drive us into town and I won't turn you into a stain on the bottom of my foot. Deal?" Nodding his head, the driver turned back to the road, gripping the steering wheel with white knuckles.

Letting out a fake yawn, you grinned and pretended to slump down onto the floor, this time letting your enormous feet rest onto the dash. Glancing over at David you closed your eyes and inhaled deeply, silently restarting his growth. By now, you'd hit 9 feet tall and were getting a little big even for the truck cab. Your head was already touching the ceiling forcing as your size 18 feet pressed against the windshield, leaving the sweaty outline of your feet on the glass.
Suddenly, you felt the sole of a sneaker touching your thigh and glanced over to see David desperately trying to position himself to allow his expanding body some room. Realizing that you and David would outgrow the "puny" cab before you could reach your original destination of downtown. Rolling your eyes you barked at the terrified truck driver, "Forget about driving us any further, pull over at the next exit." Nodding nervously, the truck swerved over into the next lane and careened down the ramp.

         Thanks to the your 9 foot tall forms, a good amount of weight had been added to the truck and it wasn't til the last second that the driver realized just how much. Seeing that he wasn't slowing down as planned, the driver locked up the brakes with a ear piercing squeal, running into the car in front of him with a great 'Crash!' Slightly shaken and severely annoyed by the fender bender, you decided you'd had enough. Plunging your fingers through the roof of the cab like daggers, you peeled away the roof like it was aluminum foil.

Rising up through the hole in the roof, your torso towered over the truck and the shocked bystanders. Rocking the cab violently, you used your tree trunk sized legs and simply kicked out the walls of the cab, your shin tearing through the steel walls like they were made of paper. Stepping onto the sidewalk with a ground vibrating "THUD!", you turned back to the "open top" cab as David stepped out of the wreckage, quickly rising up to meet your 12 foot height. "I made an agreement, that you wouldn't be harmed", you boomed at the truck driver,"now I honor that agreement". With a quick snap of your fingers, the truck driver vanished into thin air, leaving no trace he'd ever been there. "What'd you do with him?", David inquired. "Sent him somewhere else, we'll catch up with him later", you replied giving a reassuring wink.

Shrugging, you and David turned to your surroundings. Having had to jump off the freeway early, you found yourself in some random intersection on the outskirts of the city with only forest framing the streets. Hitting 20 feet tall (thanks to the slow growth you'd activated), David turned to the twisted remains of the truck and tapped the top of the hood with his sneaker.

Frowning at the lack of feeling, David followed your lead and tore off the sneakers, revealing two enormous socked feet. Dropping the originally size 10.5 sneakers on the box trailer(caving in the roof slightly), David once again planted his foot on the hood of the truck, this time pushing into it with his muscular legs. The engine bay immediately caved in as the rear end of the truck bucked into the air, lifting the trailer off the ground as it became pinned on the frame of the truck. Taking his foot off and letting the trailer fall to the ground, David turned to you and remarked, "I wouldn't mind being bigger, but this smaller size isn't bad either, might even give us a 'challenge' for once", adding air quotes to the word challenge. "What do you think, wanna grow bigger or try this for a bit?"

Thinking about his suggestion for a moment, you told him...
112131121121112111111112111.title: Got michevious and started growing.

choices: A train station packed with people!
A nuclear power station, that you can't help but be drawn towards!
1121311211211121111111121111.content:
Shrugging indifferently you told David, "Okay, lets try this for a little bit, but I'm not holding back if I see something to eat! Deal?" Smiling mischievously and giving you a thumbs up David replied, "Deal!" Turning towards the city you and David began to march down the road, ready to have some fun with your old home city.

         Minivans, coupes, trucks, and many other vehicles were crushed underfoot as you and David walked down the road leading into the city. Your socked feet could cover half a vehicle in on stomp and you had to admit that you were getting more fun out of each car at this size. At one point your foot plunged completely through a car, becoming stuck to your foot. You giggled as you did the same with your other foot, using the cars as "shoes" before they disintegrated under the sheer force of your steps. To your left, there was a wide open field with a dense forest on your right telling you that you were in the little nature preserve not far from your city. As you hit 50 feet tall, you spotted a clearing in the trees just off the road, and you marched off the road into the undergrowth. Normally, you would've had to weave through the trees, but your 50 foot frame easily pushed through, allowing you to simply knock trees out of the way with ease. Walking into a campground filled with vacationers, you and David came upon a feast of RVs, cabins, and cars. The 30 foot RVs were out of your reach at first, but after picking apart the cabins and eating the logs like mini pretzels, they became quite manageable. Combining a few structures with your slow growth, it was only a few minutes before you were back to 100 feet tall, allowing you to feast on anything in the campground. RVs were ripped apart with you bare hands and messily crammed into your expanding mouth. Cars and their trapped passengers slipped into your stomach with one gulp, before you and David chased the remaining campers through the forest, many naively believing that the trees would offer some protection from your massive forms.

         Splitting the camp lodge equally between the two of you, you both stood up and clapped the dust off your hands before trudging ahead. Exiting the forest at 200 feet tall, trees were even less of a problem as you each used your massive socked feet to crush them to splinters. Just as Noon arrived, you and David stomped to a halt in one of the old townhouse neighborhoods on the outskirts of the city. Thanks to the slow growth you'd activated earlier, you and David stretched nearly 250 feet into the air with your socked feet occupying 40 feet from heel to toe. Having grown so quickly in less than an hour, the city had been taken completely off guard and the rows of townhouses still had plenty of people milling about in the streets, staring up at the two of you with stunned faces. Spotting a group of 5 or 6 residents clustered rather closely together, you raised your foot into the air and wiggled your toes at the people below. Coming to their senses, screams rang out through out the neighborhood and some people even began to move from their rooted stances. Not giving them a chance to escape, you slammed your size 10 foot down onto the group with a wet 'CRUNCH', knocking over people from the force alone.

         Having finally been shaken from their positions, people ran in all directions, not necessarily knowing or caring where they were running as long as it was away from you. Giggling at the sudden panic, you and David sprung into action crushing anyone insight. Folding your arms behind your head, you looked to the sky and simply walked down the avenue pretending not to notice the people below, easily catching up with your 100 foot stride. Feeling them crunch under your feet was one of the greatest feelings in the world and you couldn't help but smirk as your felt them squish into the road. Walking up and down the road you crushed dozens of people under your steps while David took the street next door. Finding it more amusing, David wiped his feet on the crowds below while also moving up and down the road, staining his socks with long streaks of red as the thick fabric absorbed anyone crushed underfoot. After several minutes of this, the streets had been emptied of any pedestrians and were covered with dozens of red spots and smears. Your little game had also made a mess of your socks and the once pure white garments were now almost completely red underneath.

         Letting your legs do the work, you simply walked through the brick townhouses in order to get closer to your friend, the 3 story buildings now only halfway up your shins. Stepping into what had been someone's front yard, you talked to David about the next step, "I think we should just grow from eating for now, sound good?" "Sounds good to me.", David replied indifferently. Turning off the slow growth, your sharp hearing suddenly picked up a droning noise in the distance. Bringing your hand to your brow, you scanned the horizon spotting a flight of helicopters making their way towards you, complete with the flashing lights of what you assumed to be police cars beneath them. Giggling, you told David, "Looks like they've moved in some reinforcements since the last time I was here. I pretty much wiped them out the last time they tried to fight me." Snorting at the idea of helicopters the size of hummingbirds trying to stop him, David remarked, "Shouldn't have any problems fighting them, right?" Putting your hand on your chin for a moment you replied, "I can't think of any, but it'll be quicker if we split them up. Did you have anywhere you wanted to go?" "Yah, I can think of a few places. You know of somewhere?", he replied grinning slyly. "Oh yah!", came your response, an equally large grin spreading across your face. Giving each other one last wave, the two of you once again separated and headed off in different directions, traveling at a relatively slow jog so that the military would have time to follow your massive forms. Where did you decide to head?
1121311211211121111111121111.title: Sure! Let's try growing slowly for a bit!

11213112112111211111111211111.content:
The asphalt exploded like wafers beneath you as your socked feet made their way down familiar streets. Because you were still on the outskirts of the city the roads beneath your feet weren't personal to you, but were still recognizable. Your now filthy socks crashed their way through a supermarket you remembered stopping at once, you'd asked to get something to drink on the way home from one of your Little League games. A little restaurant you'd tried once with your family vanished beneath your tread, small enough to not even require a second step to finish off. It was far too late at this point to try and be a "nice" giant and you knew that, even if you did start to try to be more careful at this point, the slightest movement from your 250 foot tall frame could rip up streets, bulldoze houses, and cause all out chaos.

         Suddenly, a blow to the back of your head snapped you out of your thoughts and you wheeled around to find the military helicopters starting to attack you. Missiles flashed out of their rocket pods and screamed their way towards you, slamming into your body. While they weren't drawing any blood or really harming you, the prickly explosions were getting annoying in a hurry. Bending down and scooping up a section of road, you ground it into smaller pieces in your fist before flinging it at one of the helicopters. Your aim was naturally dead on and ripped the helicopter to shreds as the shotgun like blast of asphalt tore through it. Noticing this however, the helicopters lit off an even more intense barrage of missiles, making your body erupt in more annoying pricks. Getting ready to fling another blast at the helicopters, a new and different wave of pricks began to make its way up your shins. Looking down to the road, you saw several columns of tanks making their way through streets beneath you, seeming to form a half circle around you. Just as you were about to turn your attention to them, a fresh wave of missiles slammed into your chest, singing your polo shirt and creating a noxious cloud of smoke. Swiping away the smoke with your hands, you came to the conclusion it would be easier to deal with the military at the train station, especially if you could separate the helicopters from the tanks.

         Trying your best to hide your frustration, you stuck out your tongue at the forces below you and turned to break into a dead sprint. Thundering your way through the neighborhood, you didn't even bother to try and follow the streets, instead letting your momentum obliterate anything in your path. Just as you thought you were out of range of the forces behind you, you suddenly felt the pricks of cannon fire on your shins. Glancing down in just in time, you saw the top of a tank turret before it vanished underneath your tread. Not breaking your stride, you looked up to see another swarm of helicopters flying towards you bristling with missiles. Letting your legs pound into the earth one last time, you leapt into the air as high as you could outstretching your arms. Glimpsing the shocked faces of the pilots of one helicopter, you swiped at as many helicopters as you could using your open palm to smack them out of the sky. Managing to hit 3 or 4 with your attack, you sent half the squadron spiraling down to the earth erupting into fireballs as they smashed into the ground. Coming down to the earth yourself, you found your enormous frame sliding across the ground uncontrollably. Thanks to your enormous size, the ground beneath you had turned into a slick floor, with your socks doing little to help the matter with the thick fabric preventing you from moving your toes to dig in. As you tried to dig your heels in instead, you slipped backwards falling onto your behind with an earthshaking crash, creating an enormous cloud of dust as you crashed into the ground.

         Coughing a little bit from the cloud of dust surrounding you, you stood up and tried your best to wipe the dust off your clothing. Looking down at your feet, you came to the decision that it was time to get rid of those pesky socks. Lifting your feet off the ground one at a time, you gave the military below a good view of your massive stompers as you peeled the bloodied garments off your feet. Thanks to all the activity you'd been doing over the last hour, the socks were soaked in sweat and came off your feet rather reluctantly. Holding one up to your nose you gave it a little sniff and wrinkled your nose at the musky odor. Peering over your shoulder at the tanks, you saw them trying to turn themselves to pursue you like the other group behind them. Eyeing the socks in your hands an idea popped into your head. With a mischievous grin spreading across your face, you turned around and made your way back to them. As you got closer, the tanks finished turning around and began to fire, peppering your shins with tiny cannon shells. Ignoring the shells, you pretended not to even see them remarking out loud, "Jeez I need somewhere to put these...", before dropping them onto the columns. Blinded by the white fabric draped over the top of them, the tanks desperately tried to escape from underneath your socks crashing into one another and found themselves unable to push the fabric out of the way. Satisfied that they were disabled for the time being, you turned around and resumed your sprint towards the train station.

...


         A throng of people had gathered outside the train station desperately trying to get into the dull concrete building. You were standing in the parking lot, soaking in the terror as you grinned down at the crowds. Suddenly a gunshot rang out and you noticed a little spark appear on your ankle, breaking your smile. Now frowning you used your inhuman eyesight and scanned the crowds 250 feet below you, able to pick out the tiniest facial details. Then you saw him, a middle aged man wearing a red baseball cap holding a black pistol. Smiling you lowered your massive frame down to the ground, sitting down cross legged just in front of the crowd while letting your enormous feet barely brush the crowd, forcing people to dive out of the way. As you did this another gun shot rang out, followed by another, and another until the station was echoing with the pops of gunfire, a whole group of vigilante "heroes" taking aim at you with pistols. "You guys really don't get it do you?", you boomed, "Nothing can stop me now." Using nothing more than your pointer finger, you singled out the original shooter in the crowd and crushed him into the sidewalk like a pesky ant. Singling out the sources of the gunfire, you used your finger to snuff out any sources of resistance until the annoying pops of gunfire had stopped.

         Letting out a relaxed sigh, you gazed hungrily down at the crowds below you, instinctively licking your chops. Reaching down you scooped up a mass of screaming people and brought them up to your lips. Leaning your head back, you opened you cavernous maw and let them slowly pour into your mouth, as if you were eating a handful of skittles. Chewing slowly, you couldn't help but let out a moan of contentment as you chewed down the tender morsels. Reaching back down you scooped up another handful and simply crammed them into your mouth, chewing as quickly as you could. Realizing what was happening, the people outside the station began to take flight, scattering in all directions hoping to escape being devoured. As your hands darted down again and again you noticed a swift decline in the number of people in each hand as you brought them up. "Oh well, time to go indoors", you remarked. Standing back up, you made sure to crush as many people as possible beneath your barefeet, before turning your attention to the station itself. The station barely came up to your knees and you made short work of the roof with one mighty kick to the top of the building, the concrete breaking apart like crackers. Finding the interior also packed with people, you dropped to your knees in order to reach the crowds below. Unlike the outside, you let no one escape, even using your fingers to chase down every last person in the station. Some you pinched between your fingers in order to simply toss into your mouth, while some more unlucky ones where simply squashed beneath your fingertips in order to be licked into your mouth like crumbs.

         With the station itself now completely empty, you finally moved to the yard itself, carelessly walking through the remains of the station. You giggled as the steel super structure bent like soft wax and the concrete exploded into dust like hardened sand. Being the careless youngster you were, a few of your steps ended up landing on train cars crushing them like soda cans. Looking down and mumbling out a little, "Oops...", you scanned the train yard for an empty place to sit. Unable to find one, you shrugged and simply planted your behind on top of a couple freight cars, the splintery wood making you giggle a bit as you felt it crush beneath your pants. Over the next few minutes, your hands prowled the yard, looking for the full passenger cars you so desired. Upon finding one, you would pick it up with both hands before pulling it apart in order to shake their contents into your mouth. Then your hands would crush the cars with hundreds of tons of pressure in order to compact them into neat little balls to toss into a growing pile behind you. After 10 minutes of this procedure, you began to notice the passenger cars disappearing from the yard, and those that were there being disappointedly empty. Just as you were about to stand up and move away, you suddenly felt your eyelids begin to droop and an earthshaking yawn erupted from your mouth. "Looks like I'm pretty tired", you remarked, "maybe a little nap will help." Letting your body flop down onto the remnants of the train yard, your eyes immediately shut putting you into a deep sleep.

When you woke up, something had changed...
11213112112111211111111211111.title: A train station packed with people!

choices: A new force compels you to eat the reactor!
A voice talks to you in your head!
11213112112111211111111211112.content:
As you'd been talking to David something had "clicked" in the back of your mind and you'd began to feel some sort of invisible force tugging on you. With David running off into the distance (military in tow) you turn to face this invisible force. Frowning, you realize your facing away from the city, not towards it as you'd hoped. As you try to turn away from it and try to take a step however, the feeling gets stronger and you feel like you're...missing out? Letting out a groan of frustration you yell out, "Ugh, fine! This had better be worth it, but I'm getting something to eat on the way!" Then with almost angry stomps you turned back towards the invisible force and broke into a jog, the neighborhood breaking apart like paper mache beneath you.

         Quickly leaving the neighborhoods you found yourself running through boring plots of forest and the occasional farm, the ground squishing like clay beneath your socked feet. However, just as you were coming to believe that the rest of your journey would be uneventful, you spotted an airplane flying low in the sky! Stopping, you held your hand to your brow and squinted at the gleaming white jet. The plane had its landing gear down and was sinking lower and lower into the sky meaning that it must be landing! Breaking into dead sprint you pounded across the countryside following the jet in hopes of finding the airport it was landing at.

         If you had been in a car on the ground, you might have been able to recognize some of the streets and realized just how close you'd been to the airport, but lucky for you, an airplane had become an unwitting guide towards your next meal. While it'd been difficult trying to close the gap with it, you could already see the long stretch of runway the plane was barreling towards. Keeping an eye on the airplane as you sprinted, you found yourself about 400 feet behind it as it was just about to touch the tarmac. Just as you felt the perimeter fence crunch beneath one of your treads, you saw the wheels touch the ground with a little puff of smoke. Unable to resist yourself, you dove after it like a football player going in for a tackle. Unfortunately for the plane, your aim was almost dead on and your 250 foot tall body crashed down onto the plane like a landslide. With what sounded almost exactly like a landslide, you and the plane slid along a quarter of the runway crushing any asphalt you came in contact with. While you'd planned on stopping the plane, your aim had turned out to be a little too good, and most of the fuselage had ended up crushed between your muscular torso and the unforgiving asphalt of the runway. Picking up the small front section that had survived in your hands, you turned around to see bits and pieces of airplane skin mingled into the rubble, the wings of the planing burning on the grass next to it. Laughing a bit apprehensively under your breath you surveyed the damage before letting out a little, "Oops..."

         Tossing the surviving chunk into your mouth, you savored the aluminum fuselage intermingled with just a few people. As you chewed down the remnants of the airplane, you came to the realization that you'd gotten rather sweaty as you chased the airplane. Discovering that your polo and shorts had been badly ripped by your "tackle", you peeled of your shirt before dropping your pants onto the ground leaving you once again wearing nothing but your blue briefs. "Uh, thanks," you giggle. "So, what should we do now?"

"Come on, I'll take you to the others!" Sally takes your hand, leading you over to where Jake and the 5 year old girl you saw earlier were talking. "Guys, Aiden grew too, and he's the biggest kid yet!"

"Wow Aiden, you really grew," Jake smiles. "This is Heather," he places a hand on the girl's shoulder.

"Hi," Heather whispers, her hands cupped around her crotch.

"Nice to meet you," you smile, crouching down so you can look her in the eyes. "It's ok, I'm scared too, but I promise things'll be ok."

Heather gives you a tiny smile and nods. "Thanks."

"I guess this is what that virus does," Sally says "I think it's great! Being a giant is the best; I can see half the town, and no one can tell me what to do!"

"Yeah, no more big brother making me do his chores," Jake smiles.

"I want my mommy," Heather sniffles. "She ran away when I started growing. She probably hates me now!" Tears start falling down the blond haired girl's face.

You wrapped your arms around Heather, bringing her in for a gentle hug. She tries to pull away at first, but gradually relaxes and cries on your shoulder. After a while she stops and stands up. "Thanks Aiden, I feel better now. Will you help me find my mommy?" She asks.

"Sure," you say. "We'll all help right?" Jake and Sally nod.

"Thank you," Heather smiles, wrapping her hands around your friends.

"Do you know where your mommy ran to?" Sally asks.

"That way," Heather says, pointing toward the center of town.

"Let's go," you smile, taking Heather's hand. Sally takes the other one, and together five giants walk down the street. You see people below running on foot and in their cars as five giant naked kids came towards them. "Heather's mommy, are you around here?" You call. "She's sorry she scared you, please come out."

"I just want to see you Mommy," Heather adds. No one comes forward, and you keep looking. After a few minutes you arrive at the center of town and hundreds of people are running everywhere, trying to get away. "Mommy? Please come out, I'm sorry I grew!"

"Someone has to know you here," Jake said, stepping in front of some people and squatting down over them. "We're just trying to help Heather, why won't you just talk to us?!"

"They're scared, just like I was," Heather said, looking down at the people running by her feet. "Maybe we should just go somewhere where people won't be scared of us."

No, we're gonna help you find your mommy," Sally says, bringing her foot down in front of a car and causing it to crash into her foot. "Maybe we just have to MAKE them listen to us."

"Aiden!" You hear your mommy calling up at you. Looking down you spot her standing on the porch. Crouching down you give her a sad smile.

"I'm sorry Mommy; I didn't mean to grow," you say.

"I know, I'm not mad at you," she says. "But we need to talk about what to do next."

"I'm gonna take Aiden to meet my friends," Sally says as she stands beside you. "We're gonna have loads of fun!"

"Why should we do that?" Sally asks. "There's nothing to do out there."

"Because at your size you could hurt someone by accident, or the police or even the army could hurt you if they think you're dangerous."

"We're too big for the little police to hurt us." Sally smiles, but you can see her thinking face forming.

"But what about jets and tanks Sally?" Your mommy presses. "Their weapons are much bigger. Besides, you don't want to hurt people do you?"

"Hey look!" Jake shouts, pointing to the woods nearby. You see the trees moving and soon four more giant kids appear; three girls and a boy. They all look around 10 or 11, and the boy gives you a wave as he catches sight of you.

"Hey there," the boy smiles. "I'm Ryan; what are you guys doing just standing here?" He asks as he walks up.

"I'm Aiden. We left the town when we grew," you answer, looking up at him. The new kids are at least thirty feet taller than you. "My mommy thinks we could hurt someone if we stayed there."

"Hurt them how?" One of the girls asks, brushing her blond hair out of her eyes. "We just watch where we're going. None of us have stepped on anyone. Well, there was that car, but it was empty."

"But if you just didn't see anyone, or sneezed and tripped, you could," your mommy shouts at the new kids.

"Who's this?" A raven haired girl with a long braid asks as she leans down. "She's so cute, like a little doll."

"She's my mommy," you say, bringing your hand closer to your chest.

"Hi there Mrs. Aiden. I'm Kelly," the girl smiles. "It's cool you're trying to protect the town, but it's boring to just stand here isn't it?" She asks you.

"Maybe, but Mommy says people will come and talk to us soon. Maybe they can shrink us and let us play our favorite games again," you say.

"And sleep in our old beds," Sally adds.

"And my mommy can hug me again," Heather says as she stands up. "My mommy ran away when I grew, and I really want to see her again."

"Why would you want to shrink?" Ryan asks. "Just watch where you step. Trust someone older than you; it's not hard to be careful when you walk."

"Well my mommy's older than you, so maybe she knows more," you say.

"She's not a giant; she can't know what it's like to be big," Kelly frowns. "You should listen to giants like you Aiden. We've been having tons of fun, and no adults have tried and tell us what to do!"

"Because they're probably scared of you Kelly," your mommy says. "They know that if you get angry you could really hurt them, even if you just push them with your hand."

"You should wait with us," you say. "When the people come to help us maybe they can help you too."

Kelly takes a step back and the new kids huddle for a minute before...

You hear something coming down the road behind you. Turning, you see four or five back vans speeding towards you. Overhead a helicopter starts circling just out of reach. "Are these the people you said would come?" You ask you mommy.

"I'm not sure, but probably," she replies.

The vans come to a stop a short distance away and people in uniforms climb out and walk toward you. "I am Colonel Janis of the United States Army. Are any of you the leader of this group?" One man asks through a megaphone.

"Isn't that you Mommy?" You ask. "You're the adult."

"Yes, but you're the one who led us all here," she replies. "Put me on the ground and I'll talk to them."

You carefully set your mommy down and she jogs over to talk with the man. They talk for several minutes before your mommy comes back over. "What did he say?" You ask as you squat down.

113322211232.content:
"They're asking for our help," your mommy replies. "Three more giants are attacking a city a ways away, and they can't stop them. Their equipment can barely give them scratches, and they don't want to talk or stop what they're doing."

"They're...stepping on people?" You hesitantly ask.

"Yes, and worse things," she says. "A lot of people are in danger, and you're the first giants they've found who are talking to them."

"I wanna help!" You say. "If they're hurting people we have to do something. I'll talk to the new kids and see if they'll help too. Wait right here." You walk over to where Ryan, Kelly and their friends are still talking. Heather and Sally come with you.

"We're still talking," Kelly says. "Who're the new tinies?"

"They're from the army, and they want our help," you reply. "Some other giant kids are hurting a lot of people in a city, even stepping on them. My friends are gonna help, and we want you to help too."

"They're being bullies, Heather says in an angry tone you haven't heard from her before. "They're hurting people who can't do anything to them. I HATE bullies like that!"

"Hmm, they ARE ruining the chances of us being able to have good fun in the cities ourselves," Kelly says. "Ryan, I think this guy has a point. Did they little guy say how many of them there are?"

"Three," you answer. "If we all help we should win."

"Eight on three, sounds like good odds," Ryan nods. "When we all grew we made a promise that we wouldn't hurt anyone while we had fun. These jerks are really killing people?"

You swallow, not wanting to think about what the mean giants could be doing to the little people of the city. You slowly nod.

"Megan, what do you think?" Ryan asks a blond haired girl with twin braids.

"I say we help. These asses are gonna make things hard for us when we wanna talk with the little people. We help now and we can set our terms for when we help next time. Plus if we don't help who says the next time the odds won't be against us."

"Good point," Ryan says. He takes your hand and the two of you walk back over to the vans. "All right little guys, you can count on us."

"Thank you," Colonel Janis shouts up. "The city is about ten miles north of here. We have forces in the area who will help when they can. Our weapons can't hurt them badly, but we can blind them for a short time if we hit their eyes. Once you get them on the ground we're shipping in cables to tie them up. They'll be here in about twenty minutes."

"We'll get them," Ryan nods. "All right everybody!" He says, standing tall. "Let's save ourselves a city!"

"Uh oh," Sally says as she holds her hands to her tummy. "I feel tingly; that means I'm gonna grow."

"This feels great!" Jake smiles, while Heather sniffled as she holds his hand.

After a minute or two your growth stops, leaving you at least two hundred feet tall, while the other kids come up to just under your chest. Your mommy is still in your hand, looking up at you in fear. "Are you all right Mommy?" You ask, bringing her up to your face so you can hear her better.

"Aiden, you have to get your friends and get to the fields right now!" She shouts. "If you all grow again you could get so big you'll start destroying buildings without even moving! Please, you have to go now!"

"Mommy's right," you say. "If we grow again we might not even be able to see people when we're walking."

"Yeah, you're right," Sally says. "As fun as growing is, if we hurt someone I'd feel super bad."

"I hate growing!" Heather cries. "My mommy'll never want to talk to me now!"

"Hey, it'll be ok," you say, giving her a gentle hug. "Let's go ok?"

It was just another ordinary day for you, 2 year old baby Conner, wake up at the crack of dawn and play in your crib until mommy comes to get you. "There's my big strong boy!" She enthusiastically says as she comes over to your crib. You smile up at her with your arms reached out. "Aww come here Conner." She picked you up and checks your diaper. "Someone's got a stinky butt!" Your mom playfully says as she carries you over to the changing table.

Conner was already a big boy, a little over 3 feet tall and weighing in at 55 pounds, he wore the biggest size diapers available.
Placing you on the changing table she begins to work her mommy magic. "We are gonna have to start potty training soon or we're gonna be in BIG trouble" she said as she tickles you belly.
You laugh and continue to enjoy your changing. Your mommy reaches your wee-wee and takes a takes a step back. "Hmm?" She thinks to herself as she looks down at you. "I don't remember him being quite that big downstairs.

Oh well, I guess it isn't anything to be conserned about." Your mom cleans you up and starts to put on your fresh diaper. "Holy crap!" She yelled as she noticed your package isn't quite fitting into your diaper. "It's gotta be at least 5 inches soft!" She attempts to adjust you all into your diaper.

You squirm around in pleasure. "That feels really good!" You think to yourself as you try to prolong the event. "There we go! All better and all in!" Your mommy says, after she managed to fit your wee-wee inside your diaper. "Now lets go get some breakfast!" She pickes you up and makes her way to the kitchen. In your mommy's arms, all you can think about is how great it felt when mommy was playing with your wee-wee and how good a tight fitting diaper fells.

A tingly feeling rushes over you and you get the chills. It might just be you but you feel yourself grow a few inches and your diaper get significantly tighter. "Oh my goodness!" Your mommy said as she sits you down in your highchair. CREEK!!! Goes the highchair. "You weigh a ton kid! But I bet you're hungry!" You smile up at her in approval as you still are accompanied by that tingly feeling. Mommy heads into the ajacent kitchen to make you some breakfast. As you excitly wait for your food you dance around a little in the highchair.

Waving your arms and swinging your feet, the highchair begins to give under your weight and size. You continue to swing your feet impatiently waiting on mommy when all of the sudden. Flop! Your wee-wee falls out. "Oh! I know where this is going!" You think to yourself. Your mommy appears around the corner with your plate of food. "Okay here you go honey! Eat it all so you grow up big and strong!" She places the food in front of you and you look up at her still shaking your legs knocking your wee-wee around like its a fishing lure.

"Oh no! It's trying to escape!" She yelled as she notices your package has made it's way out. "What are we gonna do with you Conner?" She said attepting to put your, now over 5 inches, wee-wee back into your diaper. That tingly feeling rushes over you once again but more intense than the first time, as you sit in your highchair enjoying your breakfast and your mommy playing with your wee-wee.

You stop eating because you notice something strange.You are growing as mommy is still fumbling around with your wee-wee. You feel your highchair tighten around you as you grow past 4 and a half feet tall, to almost 5 feet tall, all the way to 7 feet tall. The highchair breaks into pieces and falls apart around you as you stand up. Your diaper has completely be ripped apart as you stand in the carnage that was a kitchen a moment ago. Your mommy, still on her knees, is in shock as she is now face to face with a 11 inch long toddlers penis.

Your mommy, being the optimistic person she was, stood up, composed herself, looks up at you and says, "Oh well baby! Accidents happen! Let's get this cleaned up and then we'll figure out what to do with you." She takes you by the hand and walks you to your room because she isn't able to carry a 300 pound 7 foot tall baby. "Okay Conner, you sit in here and play with your toys while I clean up." Standing in your room you look around at all of your toys, which are too small to play with. You sit down by your crib and think to yourself,"hmm what should I do?"
