Picking up one of your action figures you notice how small he is compared to you. "What if everyone was this tiny?" You think, as you hold the action figure down to your wee-wee to see which ones bigger. Just as you are measuring, you get that tingly feeling again.
You feel yourself start to grow once more. Mommy walks into your room just as you reach 8 and a half feet tall and interrupts your concentration.
"Conner sweetheart! I'm coming in, and I have something for you!" Mommy is holding a bunch of sheets, towels, yarn and a needle, and a box of diapers. "Aww! Looks like my little baby boy grew a bit more.

Well we're gonna need to get a diaper on that butt! Lay down please." She says while arranging the bed sheets and towels. "God help us if you have to go potty without some kind of diaper on!" She cheerfully said to you as she tickles you into changing position. "Okay let's see." Mommy said as she assesses the situation. "Maybe if we do this." Taking a bunch of towels and lining the bed sheets with them. "That should work." She began sewing all of it together for your makeshift diaper. "And then I'll take some of these."

Mommy said as she grabbed hand fulls of diapers and tucked them inbetween the towels. "Okay baby! Feet up!" Mommy said as she playfully slapped your bottom.
You raise your feet as high as you can as Mommy slips the new giant diaper under your butt. Your legs come down with a loud BOOM! "Okay now! Just to make sure, we'll take two more little diapers and put them around your wee-wee." Mommy is barely able to fit your now 13 and a half inch package into the diapers you were wearing earlier this morning. She struggles with your giant wee-wee for a minute but makes it work. "Alright let's put it all together."
She said as she began folding the bed sheets up and around your bottom and belly.

She walks around you sewing up your diaper to make sure it says together. "There we go! All done! Hope that's not to tight honey." Mommy said as she pulled and tugged at and around your wee-wee making sure it wouldn't fall out. "Can you stand up for Mommy?" You smile, nod your head, roll over, and stand up.
Now towering 3 feet over your Mommy, she steps back to take a look at you, so she can thoroughly check her work. "Alright Conner we are all done.
Lets take you outside for some fresh air and so you can show off your new diaper Mommy made for you!" She encouragingly said to you.

Having to crawl, because you can't fit standing up, you squeeze through the doorframe and follow Mommy down the hallway to the back door. "Common baby!" Said Mommy as she coaxes you into the backyard. You stand up and take a look at the backyard from your new size. "I can see over the fence!" You think to yourself as you make your way over to all of your outside toys. Bending over to look down on all of your little toys, you pick up the slide that you love so much, with one hand.
Inspecting the slide you set it back down and attept to slide down it. The second you put your full weight on the slide, CRUNCH! It shatters into pieces under your immense weight. You get up from the fall, a little sad and shaken, and crawl over to your sandbox.

You sit down right in front of your sandbox because you can't fit inside it anymore. You pick up a tiny shovel with your thumb and index finger and start to play in the sand. Pushing all the sand to one corner you make the biggest sand mountain you can. Without having to get up, you reach over to grab your favorite Tonka Truck and proceed to drive around your sand mountain. As you are playing you begin to wounder,"What if Mommy's car was this small?" Holding the truck in comparison to yourself, you start to feel that tingly sensation again. Accepting and embarrassing the feeling this time, you can't help but to play with your wee-wee.

The tingly feeling gets stronger as you notice yourself start to grow. Quickly shooting up past 10 feet tall you feel you diaper getting tighter and tighter. Your growth subsides at 13 and a half feet and your diaper is now more of a white speedo supporting your almost 2 foot long wee-wee, which has knocked over your sandbox. Mommy hears the ordeal from across the yard and comes running over to you. "Conner honey are you okay? I heard a loud..." She stops as she sees you stand up. "Oh my God!" Mommy said as she looks 8 feet up at you.

"Conner you are growing up so fast! I love it!" You smile and let out a loud thunderous laugh. HA HA HA!!! Mommy walks around you inspecting your new size. "Well it looks a little tight but I'm glad to see your diaper is still in one piece." As she reaches up to slap at your wee-wee to make sure it won't shake it's way out. "You've got quite a hog there kid. Pretty soon I'm gonna be able to put a saddle on it and ride you around town!" "Well Conner I'm going to start working on a new diaper that's a little bit more... accommodating for you." "Come here and give Mommy a kiss!" You bend 8 eight feet over to give your Mommy a kiss. "MWAH!!! That's Mommy's good boy! Now you stay out of trouble while I make you a bigger diaper." You watch Mommy walk into the house, which you can no longer fit into. "Hmmm...well I broke my slide and spilt my sandbox already. What should I do?"
1153312111.title: Wait for mommy to come get you.

choices: You are getting hungry. Time to find something to eat.
11533121111.content:
After you watch Mommy disappear into the house you go back to playing in the backyard. You make your way over to your outside playhouse.
Once you get to the playhouse you stop and look 9 feet down at it.
"It's small!" You think to yourself as you sit down with a loud THUD! Reaching your hand inside the door, you feel around to see what you can find. Causing a playhouse earthquake as you dig around, you feel your stroller and pull it out of your playhouse.

You hold it up to your face so you can examine it. "I used to fit in there!" You think to yourself in amazement as you compare it to your enormous size.
Placing the stroller down in front of you, you think to yourself "Hmm I wonder if my wee-wee would fit? It's about the same size I used to be.
You lift up your package with one hand and roll the stroller under it with your other.
Your 2 foot long wee-wee, now casting a shadow over your stroller, is ready for its stroller ride.
Letting go of your package, it flings down towards the stroller with such force it buckles under the weight, and your wee-wee hits the grass with a THWACK! Lifting your wee-wee back up again you think to yourself, "Oh! I like that. It feels real good."

Repeating the act a few times you completely destroy your stroller and make a small crater in the grass.
You stop when you feel that tingly sensation once more. Beginning to understand that your growth has something to do with your wee-wee, you feel yourself getting bigger.
Your diaper starts ripping at the seams and is no longer capable of housing your growing wee-wee.

As you pass 16 feet tall, the remainder of your diaper is torn to shreds. Losing your balance, but still growing, you fall to the ground with a immense BOOM!!! Your growth staggers at 23 feet, as you sit naked in your backyard. Mommy emerges from the house and with a concerned tone says "Conner honey? Are you okay? I heard some noises."
As she walks up to you. Towering 8 feet over your Mommy sitting down, she stops and looks up at you. "Oh Conner! You're growing up so fast! You could carry Mommy around now!" You smile down at your Mommy she says, "Looks like your diaper didn't stand a chance against your growth spurts." Having to climb over your legs, Mommy walks around you examining your new size. "Well I think you will love the new diaper I made for your Conner! Stay here, Mommy will be right back!" Mommy ran back into the house and came out a minute later, dragging your new giant diaper. "Alright Conner! You're gonna have to help Mommy out with this. Stand up please!" Standing up,
you are almost 18 feet taller than your Mommy. You look down to see Mommy dragging the new diaper between your legs.

After Mommy lays out the diaper underneath you, she moves out of your way, looks up at you, and says, "Okay baby you can sit down!" Weighing over ton, you shake the ground when you sit. Mommy walks up to you and sews up both sides of your new bigger diaper. She makes her way to the front of you, inspecting her work as she goes. "This diaper should be able to grow with you a little better than your last one honey." Walking inbetween your legs she makes her way up to your wee-wee.

"Oh my goodness!" Mommy said, dropping her jaw.
The head of your, now 32 inch long, wee-wee is hanging out of your diaper.
"That thing has a mind of its own." Mommy said as she places both if her hands on the head of your wee-wee, beginning the arduous task of pushing your giant wee-wee inside your diaper.

You start to giggle as Mommy fumbles with your wee-wee. "Her tiny hands tickle." You think to yourself, looking down at her. That tingly feeling rushes over you as Mommy finally gets everything inside your diaper. No sooner than Mommy can take a step back, you begin to grow.
This time the tingly feeling is more intense and you shoot up to 34 feet tall. Thanks to Mommy's bigger and better diaper it stretches, so it's still on but it's a tight fit now.
"Oh Conner! What are we gonna do with you now? You're so big!" Mommy said, as she walks up to your 4 and a half foot long wee-wee.

She slaps her hand on it, thinking to herself, as she examines your diaper. "I've got it! Stay here baby, I'll be right back." Mommy ran into the house and came back out with some materials to sew with. She runs back to you, climbs up on your wee-wee, and begins to sews a pouch on the front of your diaper. "There! Now you can take Mommy with you wherever you go!" Mommy said, as she climbs into the pouch. "Okay honey you can stand up now!" Looking down at your Mommy, she is almost smaller than your wee-wee now. You smile at her and stand up. Scanning the neighborhood from your new size, everything seems so small! Casting a shadow over your entire backyard and house you think to yourself "Look at all my new toys! What should I play with first?"
11533121111.title: Wait for Mommy and play in the yard.

115331211112.content:
You see a mini van driving by with two teenaged girls in it. And think back to your toy truck and decide to play with the van. "New toy!" you think and reach out to grab it.the two girls haven't noticed you about to grab them.you start to feel the sensation in your wee wee again.

Your mom still in her little pouch starts to feel your wee wee throb against her back and push her more onto the wall of the porch.She starts to move around sending tingles all over your wee wee."this feels good" with your spare hand you put it against her and gently push her onto your wee wee.

You grab the van and started picking it up with ease. You turn it to where the hood is facing you chest. You lift the van to your face and see the girls one is a red head with a D cup and looks amazingly skinny you make out green eyes. She stares at you in amazement. She looks around 18-20. The other one is a blond with misty looking eyes and is a B cup. She stares at you with a mixture of fear and wonder.
115331211112.title: You wanna play!

11533121112.content:
"Maybe I can find some more toys out front," you think to yourself. "Mommy won't mind if I come right back." You make your way around the side of the house and step into the front yard. Mommy's car is sitting in the driveway, and you smile as you give it a push, rocking the car backwards nearly a foot. "It didn't break, maybe I can use this as my new toy!" You get in front of the car and start pushing it towards the street, but your foot slips on the driveway and you fall on top of Mommy's car, crushing the top under you. "Uh oh, I broke Mommy's car!" You realize. Looking down the street you see a few other cars parked in front of houses. "Maybe I can find Mommy a new car."

Stepping out into the street and look at each of the cars, seeing if any of them are a dark green like Mommy's. Suddenly you hear screams from behind you. Turning you see two people running away down the street. "They wanna play!" You realize, running after them. Your bigger legs quickly let you catch up to them, and you grab them in your hands. "What should I do with them?" You wonder.
11533121112.title: Make your way out into public.

choices: Cars with flashing lights come towards you
115331211121.content:
You still need to find a new car for mommy, so you pull open the front of your diaper and drop them in. They fell against your wee-wee and struggled against its weight. Their struggles felt good, and you felt the tingling again. You were about to grow bigger! The cars below got smaller and your diaper kept getting tighter until with a rip the sides split and your latest diaper, along with the people you'd stashed there, fell to the ground. People looked out of their houses and watched the giant naked boy growing in the street. Your head started to rise above the roofs of the houses, and your feet pushed cars up onto the sidewalk.

Finally your growth stopped, leaving you at over 50 feet tall. Raising one foot, you easily crushed a car flat. Giggling, you keep walking down the street, looking for a car for mommy, when....
115331211121.title: Stick them in your diper

1153312111211.content:
Six cars with flashing red and blue lights come down the street, loud noises coming from them. "Stay where you are," a grown up shouts through something in his hand. "You are under arrest."

You don't understand what he means, but you can't stop until you find a car for mommy. So you give him a smile and walk on, but a stinging in your leg stops you. The group up man hit you with a piece of wire from something he was holding. "Ow!" You shout, now angry. Raising your foot, you bring it down hard on the car, crushing it easily and stopping the ouch wire from hurting you. The other cars start backing up, and you see other grown ups bringing out more ouch wires. "No!" You cry, stomping forward. Two of the cars are crushed quickly, but the others start circling around you and making you dizzy. You fall back onto your butt, feeling one of the cars going squish under your cheeks.

The three cars still moving shoot their ouch wires at you. Two hit your legs, but the third gets you right on your wee-wee. The tingling quickly returns, but much stronger than before. Your body quickly starts growing again, your legs blocking two of the cars from escaping and allowing you to crush them with your chubby thighs. The last car, the one that got your wee-wee you pick up as you pass sixty feet tall. Placing it on the ground, you start banging it with your wee-wee, crushing it and the bad man inside. The tingling comes back again as you crush the car, and by the time you stand again you are eighty feet tall.

You still haven't found a car for mommy, but your mind is starting to wander. As you step over the crushed cars you decide you should...
1153312111211.title: Cars with flashing lights come towards you

1153312111212.content:
You feel a pressure in your wee-wee and know you need to pee. But mommy always said not to go outdoors, so you make your way over to the closest house, flattening a yellow car in the driveway. Some of the house's windows are just level with your wee-wee, so you smash it through the glass and let loose. A massive stream of piss floods the house, quickly filling up the bottom floor until the windows break, letting a flood of yellow rush down the street. Once you're done you rip a hole in the roof and squat down over it. Your poop comes rushing out, thick logs and spurts of saucy brown filling the house until it overflows and runs down the walls.

You feel the last of your poop stop and stand up. Looking behind you, you're proud of your new toilet. The people who live in the house should be happy too, since they helped you not go to the potty outside. Mommy always wipes you, but without her you walk over to a tree and rub your butt over the leafy branches until you feel all clean.

With the potty taken care of, you should keep looking for a car for mommy. But you also start to think about having some fun first. The park is close by, and playing there always put a smile on your face.
1153312111212.title: You have to go potty

choices: Devour the neighborhood and everyone as well.
115331211122.content:
"I know I'll eat them anyway," you think to yourself. "After all a growing baby's gotta eat." You start shoveling both people into your mouth as you swallow them whole.

After wards, you burped like no tomorrow, as you felt pretty content about eating those two people. "Delicious, yet tingling indeed" as you started to have a tingling feeling while your size doubled to that of almost being 30 feet tall as your shadow loomed over the neighborhood itself.

"Oh boy now that I'm a giant baby, what will I do next?" You wondered to yourself.
115331211122.title: Eat them

1153312111222.content: You start to eat more ant then ...... happens?
1153312111222.title: Something changes

11533121112221.content:
As you were eating more you growth doubled as you were at least a 50 foot tall fat baby who's shadow was looming over the neighborhood itself.

"Now that I'm a fat giant baby, what will I devour next?" You wonder.
11533121112221.title: Growth doubles

choices: Playfully wreck or devour an entire unsuspecting city.
11533121112222.content:
In other words your appetite grew bigger than ever before as you were about to devour everything in sight until you realize your diaper's feeling just too tight for you while you were transforming into Antoine the coyote from Sonic the hedgehog as well, while you removed your diaper and was now bigger bloated bulgier and animated than ever before.

"Ah now that's more like it since I am a gentle giant and all that." You thought, "Now it's time for this animated coyote to eat" as you made your way towards every supermarket fast food joint and restaurant in town while devouring everything in sight as your mass increased until you reached a giant size of some sort.

"Now that I'm a gentle giant of a baby animated coyote, what can I do next?" You wonder.
11533121112222.title: You get a bigger appetite

1153312112.content:
'I wanna feel tingly again, you think to yourself. Looking around, you spot your rocking horse. You're much too big to ride on it, so instead you push it with your wee-wee, sending it sliding back. You push a few more times, then the tingling feeling comes back! With a giggle you feel yourself growing, rising to eight feet tall as your wee-wee knocks the toy horse over. Turning, you start smacking your growing wee-wee against your crib, cracking a few of the bars. Your wee-wee feels good as your height surges up to ten feet and your head knocks against the ceiling.

You sit down, causing the floor to groan underneath you. 'Am I getting too big for the floor?' You ask yourself. The tingling is starting to fade, so you start grabbing handfuls of your tiny toys and dropping them over your wee-wee. Stuffed animals, toy blocks and anything else you can grab bounce and slide off your huge wee-wee. Your head again hits the ceiling, and this time you have to lay down on your side, your butt shoving your crib into the wall hard enough to splinter it. Your wee-wee grows across the floor, every inch of growth pushing it further and keeping the tingling feeling strong.

Soon you're filling almost your entire room, curling up more and more as the walls press against you. The tingling is starting to go away, so you now start bouncing your wee-wee against the floor, heavy thumps echoing as your growth keeps going. The floor is starting to bow under your growing body, until you suddenly crash down into the living room. Your mommy is in the kitchen and looks over at you in surprise. "Oh Conner, you're really a growing boy now!" She smiles. You smile back as you....
1153312112.title: Try to make yourself get that tingly feeling ag...

11533121121.content:
Your wee-wee pushes up against the couch, sending it sliding across the floor as your growth continues. It slides under the couch, quickly flipping it over as the tingling feeling keeps getting stronger. You reach over and start dropping the couch cushions onto your wee-wee, then the contents of the bookshelf. Each impact keeps the tingling going, and your growth speeds up. Your head hits the ceiling you fell through, sending your head back up into your room. Not being able to see what's going on below seems to only make the tingling feeling stronger.

Your butt starts pressing up against the kitchen wall, and you giggle at the feeling of your butt spreading over the wood and plaster as your feet come up against the opposite wall. You look out your window and see mommy running out into the front yard. She must want to watch you keep growing. Your butt breaks through the wall at the same time as your feet emerge into the front yard. Your wee-wee is smashing through things downstairs, and with each impact the tingling feeling gets stronger. Your shoulders and chest rise up into your room, and the floor gives up, collapsing onto your chubby belly and down your back.

Your head breaks into the attic, and all around you the house is groaning as it struggles to contain your growing body. You feel your wee-wee run into the wall and start to slide up. The tingling surges under the sliding sensation, and your head crashes though the roof into the bright morning light. Looking down, you see mommy smiling as she watches you growing out of the house. Your wee-wee breaks through the wall and starts growing across the grass. This is the best feeling yet you think as your growing wee-wee digs a trench through the grass and dirt.

After another minute the remains of the house collapse around your body, leaving you at least forty feet tall. You smile down at your mommy. "Oh Conner, you're my VERY big boy!" She shouts up at you. Leaning down, you....
11533121121.title: Grow out of the house

11533121122.content:
You reach down and pick your mommy, brining her up to your face. "Oh Conner, you're such a strong boy!" She claps. You smile, hugging her tightly. As you embrace her the tingling returns, but fainter than before. You feel yourself growing slowly, your butt pushing against the couch as your feet hit the wall. As your head hits the ceiling, you look down at you wee-wee. It's pushing under a rug, the fabric brushing around it and restarting the tingling. You watch as the rug lifts up as your wee-wee rises. The walls are starting to crack under your feet.

As the walls start to break you get an idea. Throwing off the rug, you bring your mommy down to your wee-wee. "Conner, what are you-" your mommy starts to ask before you push her against your crotch. The tingling comes back, much stronger than before. As your mommy struggles against your wee-wee your growth surges. Your head breaks through the ceiling, coming up in your mommy's bedroom. Quickly your shoulders follow as you rub your mommy up and down your wee-wee. "Conner, please stop," she asks nicely, but you don't listen, too absorbed in your growth. By now your chest has emerged into mommy's bedroom, and your feel break through the wall into the front yard.

More and more tingling fills your body as your head breaks through the roof and you squint against the sunlight. The house crumbles against your growing body as you reach forty feet in height, still pumping your mommy against your crotch. The hole at the tip seems to be getting bigger. Maybe your wee-wee is hungry? Looking around, you decide...
11533121122.title: Play with Mommy

choices: See what mommy wants you to do
115331211221.content:
Dropping your mommy gently onto the grass, you start crawling across the yard toward the nearest house. With your own reduced to rubble, you need a new toy to make the tingling feeling come back. A fence shatters under your hands and knees, and you smile as your wee-wee pushes a swing set over. The cold metal brings back the tingling for a moment, adding another foot to your growth. You spy a few people looking out at you from inside the house and you smile and give them a wave.

Getting to your feet, you lean over a bit and give the house a hug as you shove your wee-wee inside. Wood and plaster crumbles against your huge rod as you wiggle your hips. Instantly the tingling comes back and your growth starts again, your arms wrapping further around the house as your chest and tummy start making the house bow under your weight. In and out you rock your hips, your height passing thirty feet, then thirty-five. Forty! As you hit forty-five feet the whole house crumbles and you slide to the ground. Your wee-wee pushes a path through the wreckage, adding even more tingling growth to your body.

The next house looks even tinier as your growth continues. Taking a lawnmower and several large rocks from the garden, you fling them at your toy, watching as you break big holes in the walls. Fun! One of the holes serves as the perfect entrance for your wee-wee as you bring back the tingling again. Your growth is even faster this time! Your thrusting hips gouge massive holes in the walls as your clenching hands crunch through the roof tiles. By the time the house comes apart under your expanding flesh you've reached fifty feet tall.

You look back to your mommy, who is watching you with...a frown on her face? "Conner, you know you're not supposed to play with other people's things without permission!"

You sniffle as you remember she's right. You didn't ask the people if you could use their houses. Thinking, you decide to...
115331211221.title: Play with some houses

choices: Jess is too excited! Play with some houses and explore their naughty bits!
Jess maintains discipline and they go to the countryside to play.
1153312112212.content:
You sniffle and sob a little as your mother looks on, her stern face softening a little.

“Now, now, Conner, I think you were just a little excited, hm?” She said, patting your huge foot.

You rub your nose, snorting a bit, and nod.

“Okay. It looks like you’ve too big for me now, but I know what to do.”

You watch her curiously, sat in the middle of your road, as your mother pulls out her mobile phone and calls someone.

“Hello, Jenny? Hello! How are you doing? Oh, that’s good! Yes, I’m fine, but I’ve got a bit of an emergency, I’m afraid. Could you bring Jessica over? Bit of a babysitting situation. Yes, thank you so much. See you soon! Bye!”

You perk up when you hear Jessica’s name. She was the young babysitter your mother would have help her sometimes if she was really busy, a chubby young girl. You liked Jessica. She was pretty and loved hugging you a lot, which you really enjoyed.

It didn’t take too long for Jenny to arrive in her car and step out with her daughter, both gazing up at you with gaping expressions. Just that send a small tingle through you and you giggled and waved at them below.

“Goodness! Conner really has grown, hasn’t he?” Jenny said as the pair reached your mother.

“Yes, he has,” your other replied with pride in her voice, standing straight with her hands on her hips. “But unfortunately he’s been a little naughty-“ she glanced up at you as she said this, and you hung your head. “-and he’s a little too big for me to watch now. I’m already grown up, but I was hoping Jessica would be willing to grow up to him and look after him.”

Jenny clapped her hands and laughed.

“Of course! I’m sure you would love that, wouldn’t you Jess?”

Jessica had been staring at you the whole time with wide eyes and a slack expression, her cheeks flushed, before her mother tore her from her thoughts.

“Oh, I’d love to, Mrs Jones, but I don’t know how to get that big!”

“Please, call me Abby,” your mother replied with a warm smile. “And it’s quite simple - just think about how big you want to be, really hard!”

Jessica crossed her arms and cocked her head, puzzled. “Just think about it?”

“That’s right!” Jenny agreed, moving behind her daughter and placing her hands on the young girl’s shoulders, giving them a gentle squeeze. “Just focus on Conner and imagine yourself bigger!”

Jess looked at you again, her bright blue eyes roaming across your whole gigantic body, lingering quite a bit on your enormous wee-wee, her cheeks going bright red. You waved at her with a giggle before spreading your arms for a hug.

“See, Conner is waiting for one of your hugs!” Your mother said to her with a smile.

Jessica giggled and nodded. “Okay! I’ll try!”

She closed her eyes, frowning and clenching her hands at her sides as she concentrated. Her short, curly blonde hair bobbed as she dipped her head a little bit. Jessica was wearing a pair of blue jeans with pink accents and a sizeable pink belt, her chubby legs and backside filling them quite tightly, and a frilly pink t shirt that clung to her portly belly and bumpy chest. You liked her chest bumps a lot.

“Mommy! A-Abby! I think it’s...workingggh!”

The young girl started trembling as she grunted and swelled up one inch and then another, her clothes shifting to adjust to her growing body.

"There we go, honey, I knew you could do it!" Jenny gushed, moving her arms to embrace her daughter from behind and kiss the top of her head.

"Good girl, Jess," your mother cooed, gently taking the girl's hands in her own. "Keep going! We know you can do it! Bigger and bigger!"

Jess looked at the two women around her with a flushed, sweaty face, panting slightly and smiling shyly. She closed her eyes again and concentrated again.

"Nnngh!" She groaned as her body resumed its growth, slowly climbing higher and higher.

Her t shirt rose up her expanding body, her belly pushing up and out against her jeans causing the belt to creak in protest, while the hems slowly slid up her thickening legs. Jessica was panting quite heavily now, sweat running down her bare skin, as the top of her head reached the grown women's chins.

"It feels really...good!" The girl said breathily as she looked up at her mother.

Jenny kissed her daughter's forehead. "That's my girl, keep going!"

"You're doing really well, sweetie," your mother commented, gently squeezing her growing hands.

Jessica groaned again as her clothes protested even louder, the seams down her legs starting to split while her swelling arms started tearing her sleeves apart. Her belly was bulging heavily over her belt now, the metal clasp starting to warp with metallic creaking, gradually giving way to the girl's growing body. You saw Jenny look down behind Jess and grin, moving her hand down her daughter's back. You heard a faint slap and a yelp from Jessica as Jenny grinned at your mother.

"She's got a bottom like her mother, and it's only getting bigger!"

"M-mooom!" Jessica tried to complain but it melted into a moan as her feet burst from her shoes and her thighs split the seams of her jeans, bulging through and slowly widening the holes.

Jessica was equal to the height of the two adults now and soon surpassed them, though she was bigger in every way. Her growth was speeding up as Jessica seemed to get better at focusing on it and soon her belt and waistband button burst open, her belly wobbling out in freedom with a heavy sigh of relief from the girl. She locked eyes with your mother, panting and grinning, as she watched her go lower and lower. Jess's hands soon completely encompass hers. Six year old Hailey dumped her backpack at the door as she ran inside her house. It was almost time for her favorite cartoon! Kicking off her shoes, she skipped into the living room and grabbed the remote. The TV came on with a flash and she frowned when she saw it was set on the nature channel. "Now everyone," Bearington the Scout Bear smiled. "Put your hand on the TV and let's sing the Scout Bear Song!"

She trailed off as she felt a strange feeling, like something was flowing into her arm. Her hand started taking up more of the TV screen, and she felt her cloths get tighter on her body. Her socks slid down her calves to her ankles as her shorts tightened around her waist and butt. Slowly her shirt tightened around her shoulders and slid up her tummy. Letting go of the lamp as she hit fifteen feet tall, Hailey sat on the couch, crushing it under her huge butt. "Guess we need a new couch," she giggled. Looking around, her eyes came to rest on the power socket for the TV. "Mom always says never to touch that. Maybe lots of power comes from in there."

With a powerful punch, Hailey shot her hand forward into the wall. Instantly a surge of power flowed up her arm, drawing a moan from her throat. Her growth instantly started again, fifteen feet turning into twenty in less than a minute. Her head and back started to press up against the ceiling, spreading cracks across the plaster. The ceiling crumbled through the ceiling while her ass knocked down the wall between the living room and the kitchen. "Growing feels soooo good!" She sighed as she grew up into her room, knocking her bed down through the shattered floor. As her shoulders expanded the breach, she felt the flow of power come to a stop. "Awwww, something must have stopped it from flowing," she grumbled.

The dozen people on the street screamed and ran for their lives, some jumping into cars while the rest sprinted as fast as they could. In less than a minute Hailey was alone on the street. "Well that was rude," she huffed. "Now what am I gonna do for fun?"

Stomping down the street, Hailey started stepping on the parked cars. Each one crumpled under her feet, and surprisingly enough she felt no pain. "Huh, its like I'm stepping on plastic," she giggled. Each car she stomped on gave her a brief tingle and an inch or two of height as their batteries' charge was absorbed into her body. The power lines running along the street drew her attention. She could feel the power flowing through them. "I could get super big from these things, but if I get too big it'll be hard to have fun," she said.

"Hey!" A voice from below caught Hailey's attention. Looking down, she saw a pair of kids looking up at her. A brown haired boy wearing a blue shirt and shorts was the one who had shouted, and a younger girl in a pink dress held his hand. "You're so cool being so big!"

"Thanks!" Hailey smiled, squatting down to hear him better. "I thought everyone ran away when I grew out of my house."

"We snuck out," the girl said. "I'm Jamie, and this is my older brought Derrick."

"Nice to meet you. So, you wanna play with me?"

"Sure!" Derrick replied. "But what should we play? With you so big tag is out."

"Hmm," Hailey pondered. "How about we..."

"Why don't you two try and grow?" Hailey suggested. "Then we can all play games if we're giants."

"Great idea!" Jamie shouted. "How did you grow?"

"Anytime I touched energy I grew," Hailey said. "Just find something that uses electricity and it'll make you grow."

"We should start with something small," Derrick said. "If it doesn't work we could get hurt."

"Try a lamp or something," Hailey smiled. "Or a TV, that's how I started growing."

"Let's try the crossing light over there," Jamie said, pointing to a Don't Walk sign.

"Good idea," Derrick smiled. The two kids jogged over to the sigh and stood on a bench and placed their hands on the flashing panel.

"Oohh," Jamie moaned as she felt energy flowing into her body. Her sandals were getting tight on her feet so she kicked them off. Her dress was sliding up, revealing more of her legs as it tightened around her shoulders and chest. Derrick sighed as his height didn't change at all. "Aww, you're not growing," she said sadly.

"It's ok," Derrick said, a sad smile on his face. "At least it's working for you."

"Hey, no matter what, you're still by best friend," Jamie smiled. By now she was six feet tall and her dress was starting to tear, revealing her back and tummy. Pushing forward her hand broke through the metal grill and hit the lights inside the sign. Immediately the flow of energy tripled and her growth accelerated. Her dress lost the battle against her growing body quickly, falling to the ground in tatters as she hit ten feet and had to crouch down to keep her hand inside the sign until it broke and shorted out.

"Wow sis, you're huge!" Derrick looked up at his giant sister. His head barely came up to her thighs, and he could hear her panties straining to keep on her.

"Yeah, this feels awesome!" Jamie beamed. "But I need something stronger to keep growing."

"What about the traffic light box?" Derrick asked, pointing to the pale green box on the other side of the intersection.

"Yeah, that'll work!" Jamie raced across the street in only a few steps and punched her hand through the metal shell of the box. Her growth resumed quickly, ten feet turning into twelve, then fifteen in seconds. Her panties could take no more and snapped, leaving Jamie naked as the nine year old hit twenty feet. Peeling back the shell of the box further, she jammed her other hand deep inside, and managed to his twenty-five feet before the energy stopped flowing.

135132122.content:
We’re down to the final two here people, let’s try and make a choice. Except this time, lets try at some actual back-story, eh?

We’ve got the scientific hunger, similar to the one for the boys with the starring girl being the same age of eight years. Allison, a little bit taller than most girls her age, with short boyishly cut blonde hair and brown eyes. She’s the very definition of tomboy and does her best to try and emulate her big brother whom she adores to the point of questionability. Her tale starts the day after a school field trip to the local science center gone wrong, where a small gas leak had struck the visiting students of her entire class. So far, there haven’t been any side effects but the dawn has only begun to break and breakfast is the most important meal of the day…

Last, and certainly not least, we’ve got the appetite hunger. Simple put, when puberty begins to hit preteen Tiffany, it hits her hard in the stomach. With an appetite unlike any she has ever had before, one that she will try her hardest to ignore though others, particularly her younger siblings, will take notice of and try to rectify whether she likes it or not though Tiffany might give in to her hunger long before any helping/forceful hands become necessary. Being an aspiring cheerleader, Tiffany is quite the looker with red hair and stunning green eyes, and though she tries her best to avoid extra portions, she’s got a small bit of pudge around her waist though she’s still stick thin everywhere else. But she can hardly be blamed for it really, when her family lives above and owns the local sweetshop.

choices: Nothing. Just your sister grabbing a bowl of cereal.

1351321221.content:
“Allison! You’ve got to stop!”

“I’m sorry bro! Bu-But I’m—”

GROWL!

“I’m just so HUNGRY!”

RING!

The sound of the house phone ringing awoke you from your rather foreboding dream. What kind of dream it was, you couldn’t immediately recall given that the loud ringing of the phone startled you enough to send you falling to the floor. Uttering a few choice words under your breath, you get to your feet and shuffle out of your bedroom and into the hallway. You pick up the phone with a gruff, “Hello?”

“Good morning is this the Fisher residence?”

“Yeah it is and if this is a telemarketer so help me—”

“Oh, forgive me, this is Mrs. Kirsten, I’m Allison’s homeroom teacher at the Academy for Aspiring Young Ladies. I’m calling about the… incident… at the Science Center.”

“The incident…” You say, feeling that familiar rush of brotherly rage coursing through your veins. Sleep addled though you may be, you distinctly recall the reason why your little sister got to out a day early for spring break. “The gas leak you mean? The one that idiot tour guide assured was perfectly harmless and there wouldn’t be anything to worry about?”

“Ah, yes…” said Mrs. Kirsten at least had the good graces to sound embarrassed. “I apologize for the delay but the people at the Science Center were adamant in wanting to know if the parents of the visiting children have reported any… strange symptoms.”

“Strange as in…?” you ask, glancing over your shoulder and looking down the long hallway to your sister’s room. Did she leave her door open?

“Oh, well, a few parents called about their children having an inexplicably large appetite, some seeming quite starved despite eating well over three times their normal portions at dinner, and so on. Of course most of them weren’t really able to hold in that much food for long but it was quite troubling for their parents…”

“I see…” You mutter, “And has anything been done for those kids then?”

“Oh yes, the Science Center has asked that any children reporting such symptoms be brought in for a quick checkup.”

“Huh, well that’s good at least…” You grumbled, still quite sore that anything had happened at all at a supposedly “safe” school field trip before spring vacation.
“So I gather that Allison is alright? No strange symptoms of any kind?”

You shake your head, trying to clear the last of the cobwebs free, but that damned feeling of dread refuses to budge from the pit of your stomach… But like heck you’d trust your little sister with those crazies at the Science Center. “No, everything’s fine.”

“Oh, thank goodness,” Mrs. Kirsten said with a relieved sigh, “But do feel free to call the school number if you should notice anything. I’m afraid that though the children have the week off for springtime vacation we’re busy as bees over here.”

It hits you then, like a punch in the gut, the dream… But was it just that, a dream?

“Yeah, I’ll do that. Thank you.” You quickly hang up the phone and race for the stairs and take them two at a time, leaping over the final four and sliding into the kitchen where you see—
1351321221.title: Science! Delicious, magical science!

choices: An hour later, with you at work…
A few minutes later, with Allison at home…
13513212211.content:
Allison looked up and smiled delightfully, “Hey big bro!”

You smile and shake your head ruefully at your sister. Once again, she dressed in clothes that she had “mistakenly” thought to be her own. Mistaken insomuch that her attire consisted of a t-shirt several sizes too big for her and sporting his high schools’ name across the chest and a pair of shorts that went well below her knees. Though your mother might believe otherwise, there was no way that Allison wasn’t a tomboy with her insistent need to pilfer his clothes and claim them as her own rather than where anything that she deemed as being “girly”.

“Good morning, Alley. Making yourself breakfast I see.”

Indeed she was though it was the simplest breakfast known to mankind. A bowl and the gallon of milk, freshly bought and still shut tight, sat on the small dining room table adjacent to the kitchen. Allison was standing in the kitchen proper, one bare feet sticking out for balance as she stood on her tiptoes upon the linoleum floor as she struggled to lean up and reach a box of her favorite cereal.

“Here you go, short stuff,” you chuckle, reaching over and grabbing the cereal for her as well as one of your own box. Frankly, you didn’t have the stomach for any of that artificial crap unlike your kid sister and other children her age.

Her cheeks puff out and she sticks her tongue out at you with a loud proclamation, “I’m not short! I’m the tallest girl in my class!”

“Tall for an eight year old maybe but—” Your eyes catch the clock and the time, “Oh Jesus, I’m gonna be late for work!”

You rush out of the kitchen and start to get ready even as Allison shouts after you, “But I thought you had taken the week off to spend with me while mom and dad are gone?!”

“I did, Allie!” You shout back, tossing clothes aside to find your uniform. “But I didn’t expect you to get out a day early!”

“Does that mean I have to go with you to work?!”

You wince at that idea. Not that you didn’t trust your kid sister at your workplace but… well, there was a reason why there was a phrase involving kids and candy stores… Not that you thought your sister would steal but you didn’t trust your co-workers not to give her more than a fair share of “samples” again. Once was bad enough.

“Sorry kiddo but no! Look’s like you’re just going to have the house all to yourself for the day!”

“Is that alright?” You hear her shout around a mouthful of cereal. “Mom and dad won’t get mad?”

Not if they don’t find out… You think to yourself as you race back to the dining room. Allison is sitting at the table, eating through a bowl of cereal like no tomorrow. That trepid feeling returns but you ignore it and ruffle her blonde hair. “I’ll only be at work until early this afternoon at the latest, alright? Lock the door behind me and don’t open it for anyone, alright? If something happens you call me and I’ll be back with bells on.”

“Can I eat in front of the TV?”

You chuckle. That’s your sister, always with the right priorities. “Sure, just try not to eat us out of house and home okay, short stuff?”

You kiss Allison on the forehead and she shoves at you with a disgusted but blushing face as you race to the front door. You pause for a moment and glance back down the hall. For a moment you could have sworn that the milk gallon was over two-thirds empty… Your eye catches the clock and all thoughts of half-empty milk jugs are summarily tossed aside as you race for your car and head off towards work.
13513212211.title: Breakfast is the most important meal...

choices: You make it home to see Allison...
You call the Science Center about Allison.
135132122111.content:
Only an hour into work at the office and you're doing alright. But you think back to the conversation on the phone, the dream, and your little sister. The thought of what occurred at the Science Center and what sort of effect it could have on her. But she seemed fine before you left. Nothing seemed out of the ordinary. But the dream that you had was still coming back. It was still hazy, but you remember something happened involving your sister that felt almost realistic... Almost too realistic...

But soon your thoughts are put on hold as your cellphone rings. You look into it and see it's your sister Allison calling. You try to brush off the dream and everything else as you answer her call.

"Hey Allie, what's up?"

"Mmmm, this is good... Oh hey big bro! Umm, there's something I need to talk to you about."

"Okay, what's wrong?"

"Well, sometime after you left, I was having my breakfast, but I wasn't full. So I had two slices of toast, then two more, then the rest of the bread."

The details she began to unfold already made you feel uncomfortable, but you let her go on.

"So after all of that, I still wasn't full. So I grabbed the carton of orange juice and drank all of that, but it still wasn't enough. I even drank the rest of the milk, which was only about half a gallon, but it wasn't enough either."

"Uh Allie...?"

"Then I ate a couple apples and bananas that were in the fridge. I'm eating the last apple right now, actually..."

"Is that all?"

"Well yeah *munch* I'm almost full. I should be full after this apple. But man, my stomach has been acting strange all day."

"And you ate all of that within an hour since I left?"

"*munch* Yeah, it's weird. I've been really hungry since you left. And-- Whoa. My belly's looking pretty big..."

"What?!"

You compose yourself after you yelled in the office, as a few of your coworkers were looking a you. You make your way into the break room, which was empty at the moment.

"Allie, you can't be serious. There's no way you ate all of that!"

"Well, I did, big bro. Give me a sec and I'll send you a pic."

She hung up on the conversation and within a minute, you received a text message on your phone. You open it and nearly flipped out after looking at the image. Allison's belly was large and globular, almost as if she swallowed a small beach ball. It nearly hung off her waistline but was still holding on to the large shirt she wore, as it went past her navel by a couple inches. You backed out of the image and immediately called her back.

"Allie, this is outrageous! You look like a blimp!"

"I'm sorry big bro, I was just really hungry! I couldn't control myself! But it seems like it's ove-- UUURRGGHHHH!"

"Allie? Alley, what's wrong?"

"My stomach! The pressure is too tight! I feel like I'm gonna..."

Before you could say anything or she could finish her sentence, an almost deafening sound emitted from the receiving end...

*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRPPP!!!!!*

You nearly lost the hearing in your right ear after the sound happened. You grabbed a napkin from the counter and cleaned it just in case.

"Allie, are you okay?"

"I think so... *Urp!* Oh man... That was a loud one..."

"No kidding... I almost went deaf in one ear..."

"Uh oh..."

"Uh oh? What uh oh?"

"Big bro... I need you to come home now... Something happened..."

"What do you mean? What happened?"

"I think... I grew..."

"...What?"

"Big bro, please, just come home!"

"Alright, alright, I'll be there!"

"HURRY!"

You hang up the phone and made your way to the parking lot. You pulled out your keys, started your car, and drove home as fast as you could.

What happens now?

1351321221112.content:
With one hand on the wheel and only sparing quick glances at the mostly empty roads ahead, you quickly dial the Science Center. If anyone knew what was happening to your little sister and how to fix it, it had to be them.

I hope… Your mind flashes back to your dream, already mostly forgotten but for one undeniable image: Allison towering over skyscrapers, weeping not in fear or in anger but with a ravenous hunger. Her stomach, round and tight as a bowling ball matching her ginormous scale, trembled while it loosed another growl as she lifted up a portion of the city streets filled with abandoned cars up towards her open and salivating mouth.

You shook your head to get rid of those thoughts and concentrate on getting through the automated answering system to speak to an actual person. It was slow going and by the time you got through the last of the questions, you were already turning the corner to your block with your house, and Allison, waiting for you down at the end of the long stretch of road.

Before you had the chance to say anything though, you were interrupted by a sound that was all too familiar…

*-UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRPP!!!!!*

You curse and swerve onto the side of the road, dropping the phone onto the passenger seat and clutching your damaged ear. You rub at your ear, wondering if this was the start of a running gag of some kind before you picked up the phone. Bells still rung in your ears from the monstrous belch, which was easily several times louder than even Allison’s had been earlier, but you could hear some voices. From the sound of things, it appeared like the phone at the Science Center had been answered automatically and by speaker too if the slight distortion of the voices were anything to go by.

“Oh God, she’s even bigger than the predictions said she would be!” A woman’s voice, panicked but still somewhat controlled.

“Well she ate more than just the food, remember?!” A man’s voice, well and truly panicked. “You didn’t think she would eat anything else! This is getting out of control here, Caroline! Control your daughter now or I’m going above your head on this one!”

“Karin, please, listen to your mother! I can’t fix this if you don’t listen to me!” The woman was shouting at someone.

“I-I’M SORRY MOMMY…” Your eyes widen at the sound of a young girl’s voice, probably the a year or two younger than Allison, being several times louder than it should be. “BUT I'M—! I’M—!”

Another sound echoes over the phone, nowhere near as loud as the girl, Karin’s, belching had been and it’s more likely your imagination than anything else but you could swear that the ground itself was trembling to the sound of her stomach’s growling.

“I’M STILL HUNGRYYYYYYYYY!”

“Karin, no! No, that’s not food—!” The phone cuts off and your glance at the screen to see that the call had been disconnected.

What is going on…?
1351321221112.title: You call the Science Center about Allison.

13513212211121.content:
Caroline was a single mother of 35 years old. Her life was turning around since her ex husband left her and their daughter two years ago. He split and left them with a gambling debt of 65,000 dollars that she was working on paying back. She got a job at the Wiking Science Laboratory and made decent enough money. They were looking for child applicants to try a new growth formula that paid extremely well. Caroline was hesitant at first but they promised her that the growth would be controlled and she would get to run the test on her daughter. She looked at her little girl and remembered that she was two o three inches behind her height expectancy for a six year old. With all those factors as positives she gave the science center the O.K.

Carolines daughter was a six year old girl named Karina, or Karin for short. She was short for her age and was basically a huge brat. She never listened to any authority figure, especially men due to her hatred of her father. For such a short little girl she would always have a huge appetite, and she had exactly zero table manners.
13513212211121.title: backstory

135132122111211.content:
Caroline and Karin walked into the lab and looked in awe at the equipment. It looked like something out of a science fiction movie with various beakers filled with different color liquids, multiple computers on one wall, and an examination table right in the middle. Caroline knelt down and spoke to Karin. "Honey, you stay here while Mommy goes and talks to the doctor about your vitamins ok". Karin nodded but was mostly distracted by the scent in the air. It smelled like the kitchen of a restaurant and Karin was getting hungry.
Caroline walked over to her colleague Andy and he explained to her the procedure. "You are going to give Karin a shot of Tetra-Hypergrowth" he said as he showed her a syringe filled with a green liquid. He then looked at his chart and did some calculating in his head. "Ok Caroline given Karins body mass and her age you will give her exactly 1/4 cup of this to drink. He held up a beaker filled with a blue liquid. "It's imperative that you give her no more than that exact amount if you want the desired effect of two inches of growth". Caroline nodded and turned to Karin, who at this point was so bored she began picking her nose and placing her boogers randomly on the wall. "KARIN you stop that right now" Caroline said in a stern voice. "OK mommy" Karin said as she skipped over to he mom.

Karin wasn't happy but played along "okay mommy but now I'm hungry too"

Shortly after Karin had surprised them by eating 15 slices of meat lovers and 3 slices of pepperoni.
Her stomach was bulging until she let out a belch. Suddenly Karin felt strange then let out a belch and both adults were shocked to see her growing however the short growth was at first unnoticed by Karin. Andy and Caroline however noticed a slight problem.


Instead of the intended 2 inches Karin was visibly 5 to 7 inches taller yet otherwise now in perfect proportions save her now skinny in fact skinnier than her normal frame and belly.


As the adults took notes and talked Karin realized she was bigger by looking at the table then noticed herself.
She whispered "oh my gosh I-I grew? My clothes are tighter than normal and I can reach the table now! That yummy vitamin juice musta did it! I don't care what mommy says I want more"

With stubborn resolve the child took advantage of the adults distraction and quickly snatched the beaker and chugged the remaining 2 1/4 cups.


Karin soon felt strange and then a pain.
The adults were interrupted by the sound of a smashing beaker.
Caroline rushed over to Karin

"Oh no don't tell me KARIN DIDNT I TELL YOU NO MORE JUICE" Karin was in hysterics.

Caroline's anger changed to worry as she noticed her little girls behavior.


Karin grabbed her stomach hunched over.

"Owwie mommy my tummy hurts" she moaned. Her stomach then growled loudly. "Mommy please make it stop it hurts so much I feel like I'm dying" she pleaded tears in her eyes. Her stomach groaned even louder "owwww it hurts and yet I'm sooo sooo hungry"


Caroline was about to feed her when Andy stopped her and explained the risks of feeding her. To be sure that she wouldn't Andy even handcuffed Caroline to a heavy steel desk.


30 minutes and several moans and groans from Karin later her body realizing it's needs weren't going to get met compensated in an unusual way thanks to the formula. 32 minutes in Andy and Caroline watched as with 1 last almighty growl Karin began to change.


Lacking sustanance to fuel or sustain her growth Karin shrank back to her normal size.
Karin for her part hardly noticed as she was still in pain.
It stopped briefly but soon started again. Fearing the worst the doc made Caroline and Karin tough it out another 35 minutes Karin's stomach growling and hurting all the while.


It was then to their shock that Karin shrank to 8 inches shorter than her normal size.
As time went on she shrank more and more til at doll sized and the brink of death Caroline could take no more. She had 1 of those mythical "strength for loved ones" moments and dragged the desk with her over to the food cart then tossed some over to Karin.


Eventually Karin returned to normal sized, then her extra 5 inches but as Andy feared she'd need to keep eating and growing or shrink away and die unless she could be cured. This must be the risks of OD he reasoned.
