135132122112.title: Allison growing Munchies

choices: Stay in the present with Allison's growing munchies...
Jump to the future with Allison's older brother at work and the aftermath...
1351321221122.content:
“Oof… that was a big breakfast…” Allison leaned back on the chair, one hand rubbing her tummy and the other pushing aside the thoroughly licked clean bowl, knocking over the two empty boxes of cereal she had just guzzled her way through. The young eight-year-old had no idea what had come over her that morning. She woke up fine and dandy and wasn’t all that hungry until she had taken her first spoonful.

Her stomach then proceeded to let her know just how starved she really was and she was honestly surprised that her brother hadn’t heard it in his room upstairs. He hadn’t even noticed that she had finished off her box of cereal and was just starting on his own when he left for work. In the span of fifteen minutes, Allison had eaten two entire boxes of cereal, devoured a whole box of cookies, chugged down a whole gallon of milk, and drank several cups of orange juice.

And yet…

“I don’t feel full…” Allison worriedly looked down at her tummy, rubbing it as it grumbled. The young girl wondered if she was sick and, upon another rumbling growl, winced. She decided that yes she was ill and that she would have to follow her mother’s advice of feeding a cold and stuffing a fever.

Getting up from the table, Allison swooned slightly on her feet as her stomach sloshed with her extra large breakfast churning inside. She moaned at the strange sensation and placed both of her hands on her taut belly. Her stomach looked like she had swallowed a small melon and it certainly felt as heavy as one in her hands.

“Ohh… how come I don't feel full when my belly is so stuffed with food?” Allison groaned, closing her eyes as her hands moved lightly over her taut skin. A slight rumbling began in her belly, causing her body to start to tremble. She moaned again as her belly receded in her grasp, shrinking until it was only a slight swell instead of a large curve.

Yet the pressure, the tightness, hadn’t abated. If anything, it had grown to new levels and Allison felt it rising even higher until was eventually released in a long gassy belch. “UUUUUUURRRRRRRP!”

Her clothes tightened as her body swelled upwards, her borrowed t-shirt climbing up her stomach and her shorts rising above her knees. As she crept past five feet, the string along the waistband of her shorts untied itself, her stomach bulging slightly as the hem of her shirt rose enough to reveal her belly button. Her growth came to a halt as she crested six feet in all, her brothers’ clothes now fitting her like a second skin as she now stood several inches taller.

Her sleeves caved in to her grown arms and the seams along her thighs tore open, her flesh bulging through as the curve of her butt peaked over the waistband. Her underwear, the only article of clothing she was wearing that was her own, surrendered to her swollen hips with a loud snap that caused Allison to gasp softly.

Allison fell back onto her chair, the wood groaning loudly in protest, as she panted in the afterglow of her growth spurt and the gassy belch that she had unleashed throughout it. Her eyes opened in a lazy stare down towards her feet, watching her toes wriggle on the much smaller kitchen tile. She looked slowly about the room, taking in the change of perspective even when sitting down.

“Did I… really grow bigger?” Allison quietly murmured, the idea alone being more than enough to generate a strange but not unfamiliar sensation in her privates that she’s too young to really understand. It’s the same sensation she feels when she daydreams of her big brother and her doing things she’s seen and heard other couples do. Her eyes glazed over slightly as another, more familiar sensation began to make itself known to her.

Grumble…

“I’m hungry again…”
1351321221122.title: She is full for now...

choices: Allison makes it out just in the nick of time...
Allison doesn't make it in time...
13513212211221.content:
A small part of Allison was worried, scared even, of what was happening to her. People don’t just get insanely hungry and devour enough food for their tummies to look like little bowling balls, nor do they grow a whole several inches taller after unleashing a massive belch. If they did, she’d have surely done more belching contests with her big brother because for what little part of Allison was afraid, a far larger part was cheering and leaping up and down with glee.

Allison was the tallest girl in her class, a fact that many a school bully tried to belittle her for to no avail. In point of fact, she had become something of a bully herself though she was never intentionally malicious about it. She just really liked looking down on her peers and rubbing it in their faces by reaching up for things they couldn’t even hope to touch. She adored stepping on and breaking things, a warm rush coursing through her on those few times she managed to get her foot down atop a toy vehicle or mock building.

Most of all though she loved, absolutely loved, playing with little dolls, especially the really small ones that fit in the palm of her hand. Many were the play dates she had with those little dolls, with most of them pretend versions of her friends, her would-be bullies, even the teachers and other adults, but for the one she played with the most, the one that was the smallest she had and was based on the one person she loved the most, her big brother.

Playing pretend with the dolls always left her with a tingly feeling in her privates but never as much as when she pretended it was her brother that she was clutching with one hand. Her cheeks would always flush red and the tingling would get so strong down there that Allison’s other hand had been drawing ever closer and closer to it.

A fierce grumble from her tummy interrupted her daydreaming and Allison swallowed on reflex, her eyes widening in surprise as she felt a small lump travel down her throat to land in her empty stomach. She glanced down at her hands in surprise, wondering just what they had grabbed for her to snack on before her stomach loosed another insistent gurgle.

“If I keep eating, I’ll get bigger and bigger…” She said to herself, looking worriedly around the kitchen before she shivered and grinned delightfully. “I’ll just go outside before my next growth spurt, then I won’t wreck the house!”

Left unsaid was the fact that other houses, particularly those of their neighbors whom Allison rather disliked for their general meanness, were fair game. Especially so considering that virtually no one in the neighborhood was home for spring break.

Allison got up from the chair, which groaned in relief causing her to giggle. She didn’t really feel heavier than she had before but she had certainly gained some weight and was going to gain a whole lot more. She walked passed the table completely ignorant of the fact that both her cereal bowl and several utensils were gone and that her tummy, though still quite small compared to earlier, was starting to bulge just a tiny bit outwards.

The six foot tall eight-year-old stood before the refrigerator with an eager smile and, with a lick of her lips, opened the door as wide as she could. She had to lean down and forward a bit, but that didn’t bother her in the slightest because she knew that this was because she was so much bigger than she had been mere minutes ago. Her smile grew even wider at that thought.

Not even stopping to consider her vast array of choices present before her, Allison knelt down in front of the fridge and started eating everything that lay within. At first, she was careful with how she ate, taking the time to open a packet of cheese and eating it one slice at a time. Her tummy’s impatient rumbling and her earlier daydream together enticed her to speed up and soon the kitchen floor was a small sty of debris with nary a crumb of food left in the fridge or the cabinets.

Small in that while a few thoroughly licked clean cups of yogurt and pudding littered the ground, there were few packets or empty boxes. Only tiny bits and pieces of plastic and cardboard, all bearing bite marks, littered the floor in front of Allison.

She alternated between them, the fridge and the cabinets, accidentally pulling one loose on its hinges with her eagerness to eat what treats lay within. It didn’t even occur to Allison that much of what lay in the cabinets was unprepared foodstuffs like powdered mash potatoes, tomato paste, or uncooked noodles, she ate them and most of their packaging all the same, sometimes all at once to get a semblance of a full meal.

Despite her hunger and her eagerness to grow, Allison did take some time to play with her food. Antics that brought a guffaw from her brother and a disapproving look from their parents on more than one occasion. She opened a jar of pickles with ease, bowing to an imaginary audience before scarfing them down. She stuffed her mouth full with grapes, her cheeks bulging, before she swallowed them down stems and all. Eventually though, Allison had emptied the contents of the kitchen down to a lone bottle of soda.

Allison sat back on the heels of her feet as she chugged down the bottle. Though she was enjoying the taste of the bubbly drink, something she normally wasn’t allowed to have that often, Allison was more focused on the feeling of it pouring into her stomach, feeling her tummy bulge outwards with every gulp.

After guzzling the last drop she tossed it aside and wiped her mouth clean with the back of her hand. She looked down at her belly, which sat like a large bowling ball over her torn and straining shorts. Despite emptying out the fridge and cabinets of their contents and leaving barely any scraps behind in her gluttony, Allison did not feel the tiniest bit full but the familiar pressure was there much more than before.

“Oh…” She cradled her swollen stomach in her hands and hiccupped. “Oh man…”

Her stomach rumbled, a faint trembling growing outwards that made her quiver where she knelt before it slowly started to recede in her hands and the pressure inside it rose to match it immensely, earning a startled groan of pain from Allison. Yet even with a glimmer of tears in her eyes, Allison was smiling broadly with delight because she knew that soon, she was going to unleash a massive burp and following that burp would come an equally large growth spurt.

“And mommy isn’t her to lecture me on not burping in the kitchen,” said Allison. Her eyes widened with sudden realization and she said a word that she heard her brother use once before as she rose up to her full six foot stature. “I’ve got to get outside!”
13513212211221.title: Stay with Allison's growing hunger...

choices: Score, no one's home and there's food a plenty!
Uh-oh, someone's home and it's not the parents...
135132122112211.content:
Allison hopped to her feet and ran as fast as she could out the kitchen and down the hall to the door. She got there in record time, her longer legs covering more distance. Unfortunately for the enlarged eight year old, her heightened perspective did not help her in spotting her shoes that she had kicked haphazardly onto the floor. Her enlarged foot landed on one, squashing it flat beneath her soles and she stumbled shoulder first into the door. Unable to handle the sudden impact of a six-foot tall eight-year-old girl, the door snapped clean off its hinges falling flat onto the ground and letting Allison spill out onto the front yard.

The blonde haired girl rolled onto her back and lay there stunned for a moment, wide eyes blinking up at the sky before she started to smile. A small giggle escaped her before she started laughing outright. “Oh that was so coouuuuuuuuuuUUURRRRRRRP!”

The belch was louder than her last one and sent nearby birds away onto the wind fast as their little wings could carry them. Allison blushed slightly in embarrassment but there was no hiding the near rapturous smile on her face as she began to grow.

Her borrowed shorts were the first to succumb to her increasing girth, her swelling thighs causing them to rip along the sides with the rest being buried beneath the swelling hills of her ballooning butt. Her brother’s t-shirt was next to go though it did not go without a fight. The sleeves easily ripped free from her shoulders but the rest was refusing to budge and Allison was soon finding it hard to breath with how tight the collar was around her neck, never mind how tightly the shirt squeezed around her chest. A deep gasp for air was all it took to have the shirt exploding off her in a tatter of cloth, leaving Allison completely nude.

All too soon, her growth spurt came to an end, leaving Allison several feet taller than she had been before breakfast. From the soles of her feet to the top of her blonde head, Allison was now all of ten feet and a few sparse inches tall.

The amazonian eight-year old lay there, basking in the afterglow of her growth spurt, smiling almost drunkenly as she closed her eyes with a soft sigh. One hand tentatively making motions towards her crotch while the other found itself busy brushing aside linger pieces of clothing. Her nudity didn’t bother her in the slightest because she knew that she was too big for regular clothes.

“Oh…” She cooed, her fingers just barely touching upon her special place when her stomach rumbled loud enough that her whole body trembled, startling her out of her euphoric reverie.

“Whoa, I’m starved…” She sat up and pushed herself up to her feet, looking about her yard and the surrounding houses. Allison had eaten everything remotely edible in her house, which meant that it would be up to the neighbors to quench her enlarging appetite.

Actually… Allison thought to herself with a devious smile as her eyes fell upon the house next door, Wendy Barnes’s house should have more than enough food for me…

Wendy was a blonde, thirteen-year-old neighbor of Allison’s that would sometimes babysit her whenever her brother was unable to. Contrary to most of her other neighbors, Allison actually liked Wendy, who was one of the few girls that didn’t lecture her on being a tomboy. However, it was Wendy’s older sister, Vanessa, that Allison truly disliked above all others for three very important reasons.

One, the girl was far taller than Allison and even her brother, though being as old as him that made sense but didn’t endear the older girl to her any. Second, even when her parents said it was okay, Vanessa never let Wendy or Allison play in the pool, many times barring them from the house altogether as she threw another wild, food-filled party. Three, and most important of all, according to Wendy, Vanessa had taken her brother’s v-card.

Allison had no idea what a v-card was but given how much she treasured her own trading cards, it had to be very important, especially when her brother forbade her from asking their parents about it, saying they would through a worse fit than when he bought her a shiny Charizard card.

Allison easily stepped over the fence separating her house from Billy’s and paused. She giggled and proceeded to step back over the fence and over it once more before her eyes fell upon the house in question. Like many other houses in Olympia Heights, it was an opulent work of art and while not the biggest it came pretty close but Allison’s gaze was upon the pool.

It never looked so inviting with a deep blue tiling and a faint hint of steam rising from the surface of the water. Allison laughed to herself as she walked around the pool and realized that she could sit down in the deep end and still easily rest her arms on the pool’s edge. She wondered how far her legs would stretch out across it and how much more she’d need to eat before she was big enough for her feet to rest on the other end of the pool.

Her stomach grumbled again and she grimaced, the water of the pool quivering to the trembling growl of her hunger.

“I’ll take a dip later,” she said to herself as she walked around the pool and towards the door. She started to lean down to pull the door straight off its hinges, as she was sure she could do, when another far more delightful idea came to mind. It was a movie that Wendy had shown her once and really, when else would she get the chance to reenact such a scene? Besides, it wasn’t like anyone was home to try and call the army or something on her, right?

Allison grinned as she stood up to her full height and raised her foot up perpendicular to the door. “I. Am. HUNGRY!”

SMASH!
135132122112211.title: Allison makes it out just in the nick of time...

choices: Allison makes her way to the kitchen and continues eating
The police arrive – Vanessa managed to call 911
A classmate of Allie's arrives. And starts tearing the roof off.
1351321221122112.content:
The door swung wide, cracking against its hinges with the force of Allison’s kick. She grinned, noting that the door frame barely came up to her chest. She got down on her hands and knees and crawled inside the house.

Where she was greeted with loud shouts. Allison’s dramatic entry had surprised two people sitting on the couch facing the door. The unexpected welcome gave Allison a start, and she yelped as her head connected with the ceiling. Rubbing her head, she carefully got to her feet, hunching over. Even then, she could feel her shoulders and bare back scraping against the ceiling. Allison started wondering if she was going to get so big so wouldn’t be able to fit in anyone’s house—maybe even grow bigger than a house. She got a thrill at the thought and shivered. However, a loud rumble from her tummy—and a frightened gasp it apparently elicited from one of the people on the couch— silenced those thoughts and turned her attention back to the matter at hand.

Allison turned toward the two teenagers still sitting on the couch, staring at her wide-eyed, and looking like they were afraid to make any sudden movements. Allison recognized the girl as Vanessa Barnes, Wendy’s 18 year old sister. She was clutching a boy that she didn’t recognize, who had an arm wrapped protectively around Vanessa. Neither one of the teenagers was wearing a shirt.

Allison stepped into the living room, her back still pressed against the ceiling, and the teenagers huddled deeper into the couch and each other’s arms. Several questions went through Allie’s mind. She wondered what the two had been doing home this time of day. She had expected the house to be empty. Should she find another house?

That last thought was banished by another loud rumble from her belly. She grimaced. “I’m really hungry,” she said, clutching her stomach. “So I’m just-“ Allison stopped, noticing what was on the coffee table. “Is that pizza?” she asked, her face lighting up.

A half dozen pizza boxes were piled on the living room table. More boxes were on end tables and chairs. In fact, the living room was strewn with food containers—chip bags, salsa jars, cookies boxes, cans. Even at her age, Allison knew what the aftermath of a party looked like, though she thought it was weird that there was no cake or banners or deflated balloons or anything like from her 8th birthday party.

Without waiting for an answer, Allison scooped up the top box on the table, fumbling the small box a little in her big hands. She ripped the lid off and was greeted with half a supreme pizza. She normally hated supreme because it had olives, but today she didn’t hesitate and started shoveling slices into her mouth. In seconds, the 6 slices of the extra-large pizza were gone. A few more seconds, and Allison had torn up and scarfed down the grease-soaked pizza box. Allison moved to the next box, which had a couple of slices of meat lover’s left, which were similarly inhaled, along with the box. The third box only contained some nibbled-on crusts and an unopened cup of garlic dip. Allison popped the crusts in her mouth, then wrestled with the dipping sauce cup for a moment, trying to peel the lid off. When her fingers proved too big for the operation, she simply popped the entire cup in her mouth, bit down to taste the garlicky goodness, then swallowed, chasing it with pieces of the of pizza box. The rest of the boxes Allison didn’t even bother to open; she just rolled up the boxes and stuffed them into her salivating mouth like huge cardboard burritos.

Vanessa and her friend has been quiet and wide-eyed during this entire spectacle, but something about seeing the huge girl indiscriminately devour food and packaging finally prompted a reaction from Vanessa. “Oh my god, A-A-Allison? What’s going on? What happened to you?”

The boy on the couch turned to her. “Wait, you know this…uh…kid?”

“Yeah,” Vanessa said. “She’s the brat from next door. My little sister babysits her sometimes. But she didn’t use to be 10 fucking feet tall!”

Allison, having polished off the pizza, was now alternating between pouring chips into her mouth and taking bites of greasy paper plates. She paused when she heard Vanessa. “I’m not a brat!” she said indignantly. “And you shouldn’t say bad words like that!”

Vanessa stood up, fists clenched. She still hadn’t bothered to put a shirt on, and her boobs bounced and jiggled as she gesticulated angrily. “You barged into my house and started stuffing your face on my food! And my stuff! I just saw you eat a god damn throw pillow! You’re a fucking huge brat!”

Allison crossed the living room in a step and frowned down at Vanessa. The teenager shrank back from the angry glare the giant girl was giving her, belatedly covering her chest. While Allison tried to keep an angry look on her face, inwardly she was grinning ear to ear. The formerly big bully, who had previously seemed so tall, now only reached a little past her belly button!

“I’m hungry!” Allison said. “And you better be nice to me and stop calling me names ‘cause I’m bigger than you!” Allison shoved the smaller girl in the shoulder, sending her spinning back against the couch. “And I’m gonna grow a LOT bigger! I’m gonna become a real giant! Maybe you’ll be nicer when I’m bigger than your house and you’re, like, the size of my toe!”

Vanessa paled. “Y-you’re still growing?”

Allison beamed. “Yep! I’m a growing girl!” Her stomach growled again. Allison grimaced and rubbed it, and Vanessa noticed that it was somewhat bloated from Allison’s binge. “And a growing girl’s gotta eat!”

Allison went back to gorging on the leftovers from the party—devouring chips and the bags they came in, slurping down salsa, and drinking whatever was left in cans. She didn’t even notice that most of the cans were beer. Or that both Vanessa and her boyfriend were frantically talking into their cell phones.

Finally, Allison had eaten all the food in the living room, along with most of the packaging, and even a couple of couch cushions that had gotten salsa spilled on them. Her stomach, now round and taut, sloshed as she awkwardly shuffled around, looking for something she may have missed.

“I’m still hungry!” Allie cried.
1351321221122112.title: Uh-oh, someone's home...

choices: Before her head can go through the ceiling, her growth stops
Her head punches through the ceiling, but then her growth stops
Her head goes through the ceiling, then her shoulders, then her chest...
13513212211221121.content:
Allison’s attention turned to the hallway that she knew led to the kitchen. Licking her lips, she started lumbering down the hall, her height and her stomach’s girth making the movements awkward.

“Uhhh…” Vanessa’s boyfriend began.

“I said I’m still hungry!” Allison snapped without stopping.

She made it to the kitchen and sat down in front of the fridge. Getting increasingly excited at the thought of growing even bigger, Allison threw open the refrigerator and began indiscriminately eating everything inside.

Vanessa and her boyfriend watched in horror from the kitchen entrance at the giant girl’s almost incomprehensible display of gluttony. A jar of jalapeños was ripped open and emptied into her mouth. Styrofoam leftover containers were devoured whole without any regard as to what they held. A jar of mayonnaise was thoroughly licked clean. An entire gallon of milk was emptied in seconds. Several pint containers of ice cream were eaten whole in just a few bites. And a carton of eggs was slurped up, carton and all.

Before too long, though, the fridge and freezer had been emptied. Allison sat back, rubbing her swollen gut. “Mmmmm,” she moaned contentedly. “That was good.” Her stomach gurgled insistently. “But not enough. I’m still hungry!”

Allison started rummaging in the cabinets and pantry, misjudging her new strength in her haste and ripping several of the doors off. She didn’t even have to move much for her long arms to reach the cabinets in the small kitchen.

The pantry contents suffered the same fate as the food in the refrigerator. Chips, cereal, and snacks were quickly devoured. Allison’s increased strength easily popped tin cans open, and short work was made of the contents. It barely registered to Allison that she was eating things that barely counted as food: an entire bag of flour, or a box of baking soda, or an entire bunch of green, unripe bananas, peels and all. All she knew was that she was starving, and that if she ate enough, she would grow more.

Finally, Allison threw aside the last glass bottle, which had held some brown liquid and that had burned as she had guzzled it.

“More! I’m still hungry!” she bellowed.

“There is no more, Allison!” Vanessa shot back from the kitchen entrance. Her boyfriend placed a hand on her shoulder. “Uhh, Vanessa, maybe you should…“ He trailed off as Vanessa shook him off.

“You’ve eaten everything there is to eat in the house, you giant freak!” Vanessa continued. “And I’ve called the cops! I don’t know what they do about monster seven year olds, but at least you won’t be my problem anymore!”

Allison turned toward Vanessa and the older girl flinched at the young giant’s expression. “I told you to stop calling me names!” she roared, banging on the floor with an oversize fist. “I’m not a freak! I like being big! I can’t wait to eat more and get bigger! I’m gonna grow so big, you’re just gonna be a bug to me, and if you’re not nice, I’ll squash you!” Allison started pushing herself to her feet, struggling a bit with the awkward weight of her bulging belly. “And I’m EIGHT! Not SE-Uhhhhh!” She dropped back to a sitting position, cradling her swollen stomach. “Ohhhhhhh…” Allison moaned, wincing at the painful pressure in her midsection. She glanced down. Even accounting for her own increased size, her tummy was bigger than it had ever been—bigger even than after she had eaten everything in her own house for breakfast. It looked like she had swallowed a pumpkin—like, a state fair winning pumpkin!

“Ohhhh,” Allison moaned, her eyes watering. “Oh man, maybe I overdid it…” She rubbed her taunt belly, trying to relieve the discomfort.

Allison’s pain seemed to stiffen Vanessa’s spine. “Over-ate, huh? I’m not surprised you fat- WHAT?” Vanessa flinched as a loud rumble came from Allison’s stomach, and her bloated gut shook and trembled. Then, right before the two teenagers’ wide eyes, Allison’ bulging belly started to recede, shrinking back into her normal trim midriff right under the girl’s hands. Allison groaned in pain, feeling the pressure rising seemingly a hundred-fold. But even with the pain, Allison grinned at Vanessa, knowing what was coming. “I’m gonna grow sooooo big,” she whispered. Louder she said, “You might wanna cover your eaaaAAAAAAAUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP!”

Vanessa and her boyfriend slapped their hands over ears, a little late. Allison’s belch was her loudest yet, and literally rattled the windows in their frames. Then, as the two teenagers watched in shock and horror, the 10-foot girl began to grow even bigger.

Allison belch turned into a deep giggle as her head quickly rose higher and higher above the two teenagers. She could feel her bare butt and thighs scraping across the tile floor as they swelled larger and larger. It kinda tickled.

Allison took up a lot of space in her crossed legged position, and took up more with every passing second. One knee grew into a lower cabinet door, and easily tore through the thin wood, but Allison barely noticed, because at that moment her head knocked against the kitchen ceiling.

“Ow!” Allison cried. She hunched down and rubbed her head, grimacing. She started wondering how big this spurt was going to make her.

13513212211222.content:
You were wrapping at work and were on your way to your supervisor’s office to let her know you were leaving. As you walked past the breakroom, you noticed a small crowd gathered around the TV. Curious, you stepped into the breakroom.

“Hey, what’s going on?”

Your coworker Sarah didn’t take her eyes off the TV. “Something’s going on over in Olympian Heights.” She glanced at you. “Isn’t that the subdivision you live in?”

“Yeah. What’s going on?”

Sarah hesitated. “Uh, all they’ve said so far is that a, and I quote, ‘large child’ is attacking the neighborhood.”

“A ‘large child’ is attacking? What does that mean? A fat kid found his dad’s gun?” You were growing nervous. “My sister is at home. I should probably call her.”

Brian looked up from his phone. “Uh, there are some rumors on Twitter that it’s a kid, uh…” he hesitated, then gave a disbelieving chuckle. “A kid the size of a house.”

You paused, halfway through dialing. “What?”

“That’s what popping up on Twitter. There’s no footage, though.” Brian said, as you finished dialing.

“So it’s some stupid prank,” Sarah said, rolling her eyes.

"No one's answering," you said, lowering your phone. “I should probably get over there.”

“I’m not sure about that,” Rob said, pointing to the TV. “Listen.”

You turned to pay attention to the news report and the woman sitting in the local newsroom. “-ordered an evacuation of the surrounding area and police are in the process of closing roads to inbound traffic. Our ‘Five in the Sky’ chopper is now over the neighborhood.” The woman looked uncomfortable. “Some of the images coming out of the subdivision are disturbing and may be inappropriate for some viewers. Craig, what do you see?”

The screen switched to an aerial view. You recognized your neighborhood, but it looked like a tornado had blown through. Several houses were missing roofs. Your next door neighbors’ house was missing several walls as well, actually looking like there had been some sort of explosion inside the front rooms of the house. The camera zoomed in on the damage, and you could see that your house was mostly fine, except the front door was laying in the front yard, surrounded by what looked like pieces of the patio doorframe.

“Allie, where are you…?” you muttered.

“Shauna, it almost looks like a hurricane has struck the houses down here in Olympian Heights,” Craig was saying. “One house you can see has almost been completely destroyed.” A graphic highlighted the house next door. “Reports suggest that is the house that the, uh, giant emerged from.”

The breakroom broke out in excited chatter. “It is a giant?” Sarah said.

Craig continued. “-houses have had their roofs torn off. The giant is currently a few houses down and appears to be systematically tearing the roofs off and removing items from each house.”

The chopper cam panned around, and then there he was. The breakroom, you included, gasped.

The giant was sitting on his knees with his bare back to the chopper, shoveling stuff out of the house. The news switched to a split screen between the aerial footage and the newsroom.

“Craig, can you estimate the g-giant’s size,” Shauna asked, voice trembling slightly.

“Hard to say, Shauna. You can see he’s taller than, um, all the one-story homes surrounding him, and he’s still kneeling down. Probably more than 50 feet tall.

Shauna’s eyes widened. She silently mounted “Fifty Feet.” Out loud she said, “Craig, some eyewitnesses have reported the giant is a child. Can you confirm this?”

“The scale is throwing any point of reference off, but hold on, Shauna, we’ll try to come around to his fro…hang on, he’s doing something.” Craig tried to keep his voice steady. “He’s getting up!”

The giant slowly got to his feet. The helicopter was keeping a respectful distance, away from and above the giant’s head. The giant turned around.

“It’s a girl!” Craig exclaimed.

You gasped. Your phone slid out of your slack grip and shattered on the tile. The giant was a girl, alright. She was several stories tall, and didn’t have on a stitch of clothing, so it was pretty obvious. You couldn’t blame the anchors for using male pronouns. Between the flat chest and the short haircut and just the sheer impossibility of the situation, it had been easy to assume the town was under attack by a giant boy.

But it was Allison. Your "little" sister, whom you had last seen struggling to reach the top shelf of the pantry, was now more than twice the size of your house.

By now, Allison was strolling across the street to the McKays’ house. You noticed that her stomach was huge and round and totally out of proportion to her frame. She had even gone from an innie to an outie. Evidently, though, she was still hungry. She dropped to her knees in front of the house and casually ripped the roof off. She reached in where you knew the kitchen was and proceeded to shovel the contents of the room, presumably food, into her mouth.

“She’s…eating the contents of the house,” Craig said, dumbstruck.

“Craig, can you gauge her age?” Shauna asked.

Craig hesitated. “Well, her size makes it difficult to, uh, pinpoint, since the scale’s so…skewed. But she’s, uh, obviously… a young girl.” Craig was obviously uncomfortable being asked to describe a naked elementary schooler on TV. “Uh, my pilot doesn’t think she’s any older than 10. Maybe 8 or 9.”

For her part, Allison kept shoveling the kitchen’s contents into her mouth. She wasn’t being picky; you saw some furniture get swept up and tossed into her mouth. What if she wasn’t paying attention? What if a person got swept up between her huge fingers?

Sarah had evidently been thinking along similar lines. “She’s just…eating. Oh, god, what if she eats a person?”

Fortunately, it never got to that point. Allie apparently exhausted the kitchen and sat back on her calves. Then, she grabbed some shrubs from the front of the house and started devouring the McKays’ landscaping.

Finally, Allie appeared to be sated. She got back to her feet, and seemed to notice the helicopter for the first time, gazing directly at the camera and waving while wearing a wide smile. She walked to under where it was hovering in a few steps, and reached up toward it.

Craig said something to the pilot. The view of Allison shifted a bit as the helicopter bobbed around. “Don't worry, we can stay out of her reach.”

Just then Allie’s eyes went wide and she dropped her arms from the chopper to cradle her bulging gut. As you watched, her stomach shrank under her hands, deflating back into Allie’s normal lean midriff. Then, her face screwed up into a look of discomfort, she opened her mouth, and “BUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP!”

Allison released a thunderous belch. You definitely heard it through the TV speakers, and you were pretty sure you could hear it in the distance. Shauna flinched and ripped her earpiece out.

With a rapturous look on her young face, Allie once again reached toward the chopper. Again, the view bobbed and weaved as the chopper stayed beyond her reach.

Except, a moment later, the helicopter appeared to be descending toward Allison’s grasping fingers. Quickly.

“What are they doing?” Brian asked.

“Craig…?” Shauna began.

“She’s growing! Holy shit!” Craig cried as Allison swelled to take up more and more of the camera frame. “Pull up! Pull up!”

The view became chaotic for a moment as the helicopter jerked and swerved. It dipped to one side but then jerked back up, twisting around before refocusing on Allison, now from a considerable distance.

“W-w-we’re all right,” Craig stammered. “She just…just grew. Right up to the chopper! She actually got some fingers on the landing skid, but we broke away.” He was panting. “Shauna, it’s…it’s incredible. This 8 year old girl can just pluck helicopters out of the sky!”

The 8 year old girl in question was staring at the chopper with a pout, evidently disappointed that her new toy had escaped. Then she took a look at the neighborhood around and below her and her smile returned.

By now the houses only came up to Allie's knees. Still grinning like a maniac, she placed a bare foot on a car parked in a driveway. A moment later, the sedan crumpled like a soda can. Allison giggled, then bent down to pick up the wreck. She brought the flattened car up to face and studied it for a moment. Then her eyelids drooped and she bit her bottom lip as a shudder ran through her body. Her free hand made a few tentative motions between her legs.

“Oh, shit,” Sarah said. “She’s enjoying this. Like really enjoying this.”

You looked at her, shocked. “She’s eight.”

“Same age I was when I discovered that my electric toothbrush didn’t just brush teeth. Some girls are precocious.” Sarah laughed nervously. “And what’s more precocious than a 65 foot growth spurt?”

Meanwhile, Allison had come back to her senses. She refocused on the crushed car in her hand, then, after an exaggerated pitcher’s windup, threw it as hard as she could. The mass of crumpled metal flew a few blocks before impacting in a clump of trees in a cloud of dust and smoke.

Allison stood there with her hands on her hips, looking at the cloud of dust. You knew her well enough to know she was dissatisfied with her effort. Then she turned her attention back to the tiny cars and houses and helicopters around her, as if considering what to do next…

13513212211222231.content:
“I-I-gotta get home!” you stammered, fleeing the breakroom before any of your coworkers could say anything. You ran to your car, and seconds later were peeling out of the parking lot.

As you drove, you considered still calling the Science Center. You fumbled around in your jacket for a moment before remembering that you had broken your phone on the breakroom tile. “Shit!”

You turned onto the main road through town leading to your subdivision. You completely ignored the speed limit, figuring that all the cops were more worried about Girlzilla than traffic violations. You sped through a left turn on red and there Allison was, her naked 7-story body visible for blocks and towering over everything in the immediate area.

As you sped closer, Allison bent down. When she straightened back up, she was grasping a tree. As you watched, she put the upper boughs in her mouth and stripped all the leaves off. After chewing and swallowing the leaves and upper branches, she started biting off and devouring large pieces of the trunk. To you, each piece she bit off was half the size of a telephone pole, but to Allie they were bite size. In less than a minute, the tree had disappeared into Allison’s stomach, which by now was bulging considerably once again.

The lanes leading away from Olympian Heights were gridlocked with cars, and the sidewalks and medians were crowded with both the fleeing and the gawking, but your path was mostly clear. You made the last turn toward your house and were greeted by a police roadblock.

You halted in front of the roadblock and a police officer came up to your driver-side window. “Sir, you need to turn around,” she said. “This area is being evacuated.”

“I need to get through! My, uh…” You hesitated. You weren’t sure if you wanted to broadcast that it was your sister currently eating the town. “My little sister is in there! I need to get to her!”

The cop looked sympathetic, but she held firm. “We have officers going through the intact homes, and clearing the surrounding area as they can. Don’t worry, they’ll find your sister, if they haven’t already, but you need to go. Evacuees are heading to the high school.” She hesitated, then added gently, “If you give me her description and name, I can look into finding your sister.”

You sighed. It looked like you didn’t have a choice. “Her name is Allison. She’s eight. She has blonde hair, cut short, and brown eyes.”

The cop was writing this down in a notepad. “OK, you know her height?”

You grimaced as you inhaled sharply. “Well, this morning she was 4’6”, but now she’s, uh, probably around 70 feet.

The cop gave you a puzzled look for a second, then her eyes went wide. “What.”

Before she could say anything else, a tremor shook the road. The cop looked up and past your car and her eyes somehow went even wider.

“Get out of the car!” She yelled, ripping open your door. She grabbed your arm. The tremors were getting stronger. “Get outta here! Move!”

You allowed yourself to be pulled from the car, and before you could say or do anything else, the cop had grabbed your arm and was pulling you down the street.

You took shelter in an alley with some other officers, and finally got a chance to turn and see what you were fleeing from, though you had a pretty good idea.

Sure enough, when you turned you saw Allison, walking toward the street you had just vacated with thunderous footfalls, and casually munching on another tree. Your stomach dropped. She had grown again! Allison had to be more than 100 feet tall by this point! You started to move forward, to say something to her, but the cop stopped you.

“Let me go!” you pulled at the cop’s grip. “I told you, that’s my sister!” You pulled your shoulder from the cop’s grip. “Maybe I can get her under some measure of control.”

The cop raised an eyebrow, but all she said was, “That may be, but you’ll have to plan your approach. Carefully. She doesn’t exactly pay a lot of attention to what’s underfoot.” She pointed. “Look.”

You looked and watched Allison step over a strip mall into its parking lot right off the street. She didn’t quite lift her right foot high enough and her toes clipped the rear wall and roof of the building. Allison didn’t even notice as her minor act of unconscious clumsiness caused part of the rear wall and roof to collapse, and she proceeded into the parking lot, cars disappearing under her bare feet as she did.

You realized the cop wasn’t quite right; Allison wasn’t being careful about what she stepped on, true, but she was also trying to step on things. This was fun to her. You watched as she marched right down a line of parked cars, giggling as they all crumpled underfoot.

Allison was massive! From this perspective, next to and under her, you got an appreciation for her size that you missed across the television. Allison’s billboard-sized face towered more than 10 stories above you, and her short blond hair was tossed by a breeze that didn’t exist at your elevation. Most of the surrounding single story buildings barely came halfway up her calves, and her feet were the size of the cars that she was currently pressing into craters. Heck, most of the sedans she was stepping on were shorter than her ankles.

Allison stopped momentarily, picking out a lamppost that had gotten stuck between her toes, then continued into the street. You suddenly realized what was directly in Allison’s path. “Oh, nonononono. Please, don’t do-“ CRUNCH! Your little lime green coupe, your pride and joy, caught Allison’s heel in the middle of the passenger compartment. It didn’t stand a chance.

For whatever reason, stepping on your car gave Allison pause. She shifted her bare foot off the flattened car and looked down. “Ooooh, what a pretty color,” she said. You wondered if she recognized your car.

But no. You paled as Allison licked her lips and reached down and picked up your ruined car. She straightened back up and held it in front of her face for a moment, your car fitting comfortable in her hand.

“I’ve never eaten a car,” Allison mused. As if responding to her hesitation, her stomach, once again bizarrely trim and skinny, released a growl that rattled windows. “This one does looks pretty tasty, and I’m sooooo hungry.” Allison started ripping off chunks of the car with her teeth and began devouring it, barely seeming to chew. It didn’t take long for the car to be finished off, and Allison was licking her fingers as gasoline, oil, and fluids dribbled from the corners of her mouth.

This was getting insane. You had to do what you came here to do. Taking the cops by surprise, you bolted out of the alley, waving your arms. “Allison! Allie! It’s me! It’s your brother!”
13513212211222231.title: Home to control your giant sister

choices: You reach the ice cream factory
135132122112222312.content:
“Allison! Allison!” You waved your arms over your head.

You must have been too small for Allison to hear. She completely ignored you, instead gazing around with hands on hips, likely pondering where to go next.

Desperate, you ran right up to Allison’s foot. As you did, you gained a new appreciation for her size. Her foot alone was twice as long as you were tall, and just her toes were almost as tall as your knees. You almost lost your nerve. Your “little” sister could literally step on you and she probably wouldn’t even notice!

Steeling yourself, you started pounding on the top of Allison’s big toe, right in the middle of her hubcap-sized nail. Her toenail felt like armor plating under your fists. Allison’s toes twitched, knocking you aside, but you didn’t get any more reaction than that.

Still ignoring you, Allison turned in place, surveying the area. You had to dart away to keep from being flattened as a 14-foot long foot slammed down right where you had been. Even then, the resulting tremor and buckling concrete threw you off your feet. You had to get Allison’s attention now.

Grimacing at the thought of what you had to do and the consequences if Allison reacted without thinking, you scrambled on top of her foot and began jumping up and down, frantically yelling Allison’s name.

Allison jerked her foot, sending you tumbling to the pavement. As you got back up, groaning, you heard Allison.

“Sorry, little guy, but you surprised me.” You looked up to see your titanic sister descending into a squat. Her eyes widened in recognition as she saw you better. “Big bro!” Allison boomed. As you considered the absurdity of your 10-story sister calling you “big” bro, Allison grinned at you before her face twisted into a look of dismay. “Oh no! I didn’t almost step on you, did I?”

“I-it’s OK,” you said, catching your breath. “I’m just…Y-you…” You paused, calming yourself. “Allison, what happened to you?!”

Her grin returned. “I had a growth spurt, silly! Isn’t it awesome?!” Her stomach rumbled. “Hold on.” Allison reached over and grabbed a police motorcycle that had been part of the roadblock. Without any hesitation, she shoved it into her mouth and started chewing.

“So I had a big breakfast after you left for work. Like, really big. I’ve never eaten that much before,” Allison said through a mouthful of metal and rubber. “And then I grew! Taller than you! It was so cool! And it felt really good!”

You had to step back to avoid the avalanche of metal and rubber from Allison’s mouth as she chewed and talked. Finally you had enough. “Allison, don’t talk with your mouth full,” you said, feeling faintly absurd scolding the giantess.

It worked, though. Allison looked embarrassed and closed her mouth. A moment later she swallowed the motorcycle and launched back into her story.

“So, anyway, I got hungry again. Hungrier than I’ve ever been in my life! I ate everything in the refrigerator. I’m sorry, I know that was supposed to be our groceries for the week, but I was so hungry!” She looked embarrassed, as if more worried about your grocery bill than the homes and vehicles she had devoured. “That was OK for a little while, but then I grew again! So tall my head hit the ceiling!” The 100-foot tall girl sounded inordinately proud of first hitting 8 feet. “But I got hungry again, so then I ate everything in the pantry, along with the garage fridge and freezer.”

You cringed, the garage fridge and freezer were mostly booze and frozen meat. “Let me guess: then you grew again.”

Allison looked a little sheepish. “Yep. I was so big I couldn’t stand up inside, and all my clothes had torn off. I was still really hungry, but there wasn’t any more food in the house. I didn’t have any clothes that fit me so I could go out and get more food, so I was gonna wait for you to get home.” You scoffed. Allison had obviously gotten over public nudity pretty quick.

“But I couldn’t wait, bro! I was so hungry! I think I broke the front door squeezing out, and then I went to the Smiths’ house next door. They weren’t home, and their door was locked, but, uh, butIbrokeitdown.” Allison said the last part quickly, as if worried how you’d react to her breaking and entering. “Anyway, they had a lot of food in their kitchen.” You weren’t surprised. The Smiths had 5 boys, all between 10 and 17. “And I ate it all, even some of the boxes. That filled me up for a while, but then I had the biggest, fastest growth spurt yet! I grew right through the roof! That was really cool, but it kinda stung a little.” Allison rubbed her head at the memory.

“After I grew, I was hungry again, so I went to the Roths’ house to see if they had any food. I was too big to fit inside, but I was able to make a hole in the wall in the kitchen that I could get through. They had a lot of food, too.” You nodded. The Roths were another big family.

“OK, I think I get the picture,” you said, cutting Allison off before she could go on about her cycle of binges and growth spurts. “But, Allison, something’s wrong! This isn’t natural! You’re freaking 100 feet tall!”

Allison beamed. “I know! Now I’m not just the tallest girl in my class, I’m the tallest girl in the whole world! Being a giant is so cool! Everything’s like a toy!” To emphasize her point, she grabbed a cop car from the road block and pushed it back and forth a few times, then gave it a hard shove and let go. The car careened into a tree, crumpling the front end and sending out a thin plume of smoke. Allison giggled.

You grimaced. You supposed viewing the smaller world as playthings was an improvement over viewing it as food, but it was still far from ideal. Especially when Allison enjoyed her predicament.

You started again. “What I meant, Allison, is what if this is bad for you? What if being a giant hurts you? We should go back to the lab from the other day. You’re my sister. I don’t want you to get hurt.”

Allison continued smiling. “I feel fine. I feel really good, actually!”

“But…uh, your clothes. You’re walking around outside naked!”

Allison glanced down at her body. “If you have any clothes that fit me, I’ll wear them, but…” she giggled.

You were about to say something else when Allison’s stomach let loose a loud growl.

“Man, the one annoying thing about being a giant is I’m really hungry all the time!” Allison reached for the tree that the ruined cop car was smashed against. Without any apparent effort, she uprooted it, and started ripping off leaves and branches with her teeth.

“That’s another thing, Allie,” you pleaded. “This appetite isn’t natural!”

“Whaddya mean? I’m a growing girl. It takes a lot of food to get this big!”

“The science center did something to you, Allie! Please come with me! Maybe they can fix this!” You were practically begging at this point.

Allison finished off her tree and frowned. “No! I told you, I like being huge! And a growing girl needs to eat!”

“You’re eating cars and buildings! What if you hurt someone?”

You saw a flicker a doubt cross Allison’s face. “I-I don’t want to hurt anyone. I’m just really hungry.” She picked up her “toy” police car and started eating it.

You attempted a compromise. Maybe you could still get Allison to minimize the destruction she was causing. “At least come with me outside of town. There’s warehouses on the outskirts, and farms beyond that. You’ll have food, and you won’t hurt anyone.”

Allison pondered that for a second. “I want to go by the ice cream factory!” she declared.

You blinked. “What?” Then you remembered. A previous field trip had been to the ice cream plant on the edge of town. It was on the opposite side of town from the science center, though. You had wanted to try to lure her toward the lab, even if under the pretext of guiding her to guilt-free food. It looked like that wasn’t going to be in the cards, though. At least this would still get Allie away from the population centers.

“OK,” you sighed. “We can go by the ice cream factory."

Allison’s face lit up. “Yaaay! What are we waiting for?!” You yelped as she scooped you up. You got a disorienting sense of vertigo as your younger sister gripped you and stood to her full height. Then, humming happily, she placed you on her shoulder and started strolling toward the ice cream plant, each footfall echoing up to your position like thunder.
135132122112222312.title: You get Allison’s attention

choices: Allison’s catches herself in time and doesn’t eat the girl
1351321221122223122.content:
Allison briskly strolled across the city, humming happily as she ignored police roadblocks, media vans and choppers, and phone-wielding gawkers. You tried to nestle yourself between her shoulder and collarbone, but your position was precarious and it wouldn’t have taken much to send you falling 10 stories to Allison’s feet far below.

As Allison stepped across the elevated freeway, you heard her stomach growl. “Bro, I’m not sure I can make it to the ice cream factory,” Allison whined. “I’m soooo hungry!”

You groaned. Seriously? “It’s not far now, Allie,” you said out loud. “Just hold off until we get there.”

Allison’s stomach growled louder, as if in response. “I don’t know…” she said. Then, “Look! The PriceCo!” You had to press yourself against Allison’s neck and grip some of her hair to steady yourself as she jumped in excitement. “I love the samplers! They have all sorts of good food!”

“Oh, crap,” you muttered. PriceCo was the local warehouse wholesale club. The “samplers” were the folks that passed out samples of food to shoppers. It was always a treat for Allison when your mom brought her to the store.

Allison started making a beeline to the large store, stepping on cars and kicking apart buildings as she moved. You groaned in dismay as you saw a two-story strip mall disintegrate against Allison’s shins. The giant girl didn’t seem to notice, ensnared by the prospect of relieving her hunger.

Fortunately, Allison approached PriceCo from the rear. Otherwise, you didn’t doubt she would have killed hundreds in the parking lot under her feet in her unthinking dash to the store. The parking lot of the store was by now filled with panicked shoppers trying to get away from the young giantess.

Allison plucked you off her shoulder and set you down. “Just a quick snack,” she said, “then ice cream!”

You nearly lost your balance at the tremor when Allison dropped to her knees. Then, with a casual strength that was frankly terrifying, she began ripping the roof off the store. Once she had made a big enough hole, she began scooping up everything within her reach and shoveling it into her mouth, looking like a toddler with a piece of cake. With every fistful, Allison’s belly swelled bigger.

Allison wasn’t limiting herself to food. Shelving, appliances, cleaning supplies, light fixtures, pieces of the roof, freezers and their contents… Anything she could grab disappeared into her mouth. From your perspective, you could see Allison’s stomach once more grow larger and rounder, until it looked like she had swallowed, proportionally, a beach ball.

You waved your arms and yelled, trying to get Allison’s attention. “ALLIE! You gotta stop! There’re still people in there!”

Allison turned to look at you. Food, debris, and liquids smeared the lower half of her face, and tears were in the eyes. You weren’t sure if they from fear, pain, or just ravenous hunger.

“BUT I’M STILL HUNGRY!” she cried, then turned back to continue to shovel the building’s contents (and by this point, the building itself) into her mouth.

Then, to your horror, you saw what you had been dreading all day. Clenched in one of Allison’s fists, along with several dairy cases and their contents, was a young woman. She was screaming, and desperately scrabbling at the huge fingers which gripped her. You started screaming yourself, waving your arms in the air desperately. “ALLISON NO!”
1351321221122223122.title: Snacking on the way

choices: Allison has her biggest growth spurt yet.
That belch didn’t come from Allison…
13513212211222231221.content:
Allison ignored you, and either didn’t hear the tiny girl in her hand or ignored her too. You turned away before Allison’s hand reached her mouth and the young woman’s screams were silenced.

You were shaking. Allison, your younger sister. The friendliest person you knew, just ate a person. Images from your dream returned in a rush.

Allison, hundreds of feet tall and eating stadiums full of people.

Allison, thousands of feet tall and swallowing entire buildings whole.

Allison, bigger than a mountain, huge beyond comprehension. She was lying on her belly, her body stretching for miles across the countryside, and shoveling forests, farms, and entire cities into her salivating mouth.

“We’re doomed…” you muttered. Allison was just going to keep eating and growing. You couldn’t control her. Who knew what the science center was up to? The military might try something, but…did you want the army attacking your little, er, younger sister, even if she was a monster..?

You were interrupted from your reverie by what at this point was no longer an unexpected sound.

“BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!”{/ i}

You sighed and turned around, dreading how big this binge was going to make Allison.

1351321221122223122112.title: Hold up

135132122112222312212.content:
When you turned around, you were confused to see that Allison was not stretching higher and higher into the sky. Instead, Allison was looking around, wearing her own puzzled expression while a length of extension cord trailed from the corner of her mouth. Then her face lit up. You followed her gaze.

“Oh no,” you breathed.

“Omigosh! Julie?!” Allison exclaimed.

Approaching from across the parking lot was Julie Alvarez, one of Allison’s best friends from school. She was naked, at least as big as Allison, and growing bigger as you watched. “Allison!” the olive-skinned girl waved. “Isn’t this awesome?!” Julie grinned at her friend, her long dark brown hair, flowing down to the small of her back, was waving in the breeze.

Allison hefted herself to her feet, struggling a bit to balance with her distended gut, then bounded toward her friend. The two girls hugged in the PriceCo parking lot, ignoring the panicked crowds and traffic jam at their feet. Julie had to hunch down a little bit to hug her smaller friend; she was a full head taller than Allison, and she was still growing. You could see Allison’s head slide slowly down her friend’s chest, and as you came around the side of the store, you could see Julie’s expanding feet pushing aside abandoned cars.

“I thought I was the only giant!” Allison said.

“Nope!” Julie said.

Great, you thought. How many monster kids are there?

13513212211222231221221.title: Allison’s and Julie’s whole class is growing!

choices: Courtney- or someone else- finds Allison and Julie
13513212211222231221222.content:
“Not just us? Really?!” Allison sounded excited. “Who else?”

“Courtney!” Julie said. “I’m surprised you haven’t seen her. She’s huge!”

“Bigger than you?” By now Julie’s growth spurt had halted, and the top of Allison’s head barely reached Julie’s chest.

“Oh, yeah,” Julie said. “A lot bigger.” If your sister was 100 feet tall, Julie had to be at least 150! Just how freakin’ huge was Courtney?

You thought about Allison’s third grade class, trying to remember a Courtney. You couldn’t bring any Courtney to mind. You thought about the participants on the Science Center field trip. “Courtney, Courtney…”

Then it came for you. There had been a Courtney in the write-up on the permission slip. She was a seventh grader at Allison’s school and was in some mentoring program that paired the older kids with younger students. Courtney had been a “junior chaperone” or something as part of that. Hopefully, the height Courtney had on Allison and Julie was just proportionate to being 4 years older, and she wasn’t 10,000 feet tall or something.

“You should come say hi!” Julie said. “Courtney’s cool! Remember all those funny stories she was telling on the bus to the science lab?”

“Yeah, where is she?” Allison asked. You seemed to have been forgotten.

“Downtown!” Julie said. “Let’s go!” The giant girl started walking off in the direction of downtown.

Still ignoring you, Allison bent down to pick up a couple of tractor trailers from the PriceCo loading docks, and, idling munching on them, set off after her friend.

Allison hadn’t even reached the edge of the parking lot before she let loose a massive belch, bigger and louder than any she’d produced up to this point.

Julie turned back around, grinning. “I was wondering when you were going to do that.” She poked Allison in the stomach, now rapidly deflating into her normal trim waistline. “You looked like you were pregnant! With, like, triplets!”

“Have you been really hungry, too?” Allison asked as she started to grow, as if their appetites, their size, and standing naked in a store parking lot was the most normal thing in the world.

“Oh yeah! I eat a ton, then I grow. I’m full for a while, but then I get even hungrier. It’s kinda annoying, but really cool, too. Growing into a giant is awesome!”

“What have you been eating?” Allison asked. By now she was almost eye-level with Julie.

“First I ate all the food in my house.” Julie said. “My mom got really scared, but I was just soooo hungry! She called 911 when I outgrew all the clothes I was wearing, but I think they thought she was joking or something, because they didn’t come until I went through the roof. After I outgrew my house, I ate all the pieces of it! It was pretty tasty!” Julie giggled, seemingly unperturbed that she had literally eaten herself and her family out of house and home. “Since then, I’ve been eating cars, everything in a grocery store, pieces of a building. That kind of thing.”

Julie looked up at Allison, who by now was more than head taller than her friend. “But I guess I should have gone to PriceCo,” she said as Allie rose higher and higher above her.

Allison giggled as she watched her friend, so much taller than her a second ago, shrink before her. Finally, when the top of Julie’s head was no higher than Allison’s chest, your sister stopped growing. You figured she had pretty much doubled in size, which would put her in the neighborhood of 200 feet tall!

“Don’t worry Julie!” Allison said. “We were heading for the ice cream factory before I needed a snack. We can go still go there after we say hi to Courtney!”

Julie cocked her head. “’We?’”

“My brother…and…me…” Allison trailed of. “Omigosh! I forgot all about my brother!” She started inspecting the ground below. “We didn’t step on him did we?!”

You jogged into view, waving your arms. “Allie, I’m OK!”

Allison beamed at you as she caught sight of you. “Oh, thank goodness!” She scooped you up and stood up. You had to fight an urge to puke as you felt like you were in a shaking elevator uncontrollably shooting up. Allison held you in the palm of her hand against her chest. “Bro, you remember my friend Julie? She’s a giant too! And Julie, you remember my big brother?”

Julie smirked at you, her billboard-sized face roughly level with where Allison held you. “Doesn’t look like a big brother to me.”

You scooted back until you were bumping against Allie’s chest. You didn’t like the look Julie was giving you.

“Don’t tease him, Julie! He’s cool,” Allison scolded. “He let me go to the ice cream factory!”

Julie glared at you, her brown eyes cold in her tanned face. She leaned her head back to address her friend. “Uh, I don’t think he’s letting you do anything, Allie. I mean look at him there, his head is smaller than your nipple!”

Allison gasped, then giggled as she stole a glance down at you pressed against her chest. You shuddered. The comparison was accurate, but it wasn’t something you wanted to dwell on.

Julie went on. “And your foot is bigger than his whole body! We’re giants now! We don’t have to do anything we don’t want to! We don’t have to listen to anything the grown-ups say! I know just what I would do if my big- I mean... my older sister was here from college and tried to boss me around like she used to…” Every car in the lot jumped as Julie stomped a foot down hard on a car. She took a moment to grind the metal under her sole, grinning.

“But my brother is cool!” Allison protested. “The ice cream was his idea!”

Not really, you thought. But sure, let’s go with that.

”Can he come with us to meet Courtney?”

Julie looked unsure. “I don’t know…Even if he is cool, he’s so… tiny. He’ll just slow us down.”

“I’ll carry him!”

“OK, fine! But he’s your responsibility!” Julie sounded just like a parent talking to a kid who begged for a puppy. You choked a little at the thought. That’s what you were to Allison now. A pet.

Shit… Well, I guess it beats being a toy. Or a snack. You thought of the car under Julie’s foot and the talk of her sister. Or not mattering at all.

“C’mon, let’s go!” Julie said, resuming her walk across the parking lot.

Allison shifted you back to your shoulder. You had a lot more room now after her growth spurt, but you were still pretty nervous. “I’m coming!”

Having a family that not only owned the largest sweets shop in town but living directly above it had quite a few perks. For twins Zachary and Willow, or Zack and Will as they preferred, it meant that it wasn’t so much a question of what they could sneak away as a “sample” but how much before their parents, or their older sister Tiffany, took notice. Like their sister, both eight year olds sported a lightly tanned complexion they got from their mother but also took after her with their hair being a dark mocha to their elder sister’s, and father’s, red locks.

Another clear difference between them and their twelve-year old sibling was that for all the candy and treats the twins ate, it never seemed to go anywhere on their bodies whereas Tiffany had the poor luck of sporting a slight bit of pudgy middle from years of her own “samples” of food. Not that Tiffany has had any samples in recent months though that was about to change in ways far more drastic than she, or anyone, could realize…

---


Zack sat the table with a bowl of cereal in front of him while his twin sat opposite him nibbling on a piece of toast. It was a bright Saturday morning and rather than hearing the hustle and bustle of their parents busying themselves downstairs to prepare for the day ahead, the shop below was quiet and still. It was the annual chocolatier’s convention in the next state over and both their parents were in attendance, leaving their older sister in charge for the long weekend while they were away, meaning they’d have to be extra sneaky in securing their usual stash of candies and sweets from below.

“Hey, should we go grab a few candies while big sis is still sleeping?” Zack whispered.

Will shook her head, long brown locks waving to and fro, “I dunno, normally she’s up before us. She might wake up any—”

A low rumble rattled Zack’s bowl and Will’s plate on the wooden table and both twins looked around in startled surprise. As quickly as it had come, the rumbling ceased but was soon followed by a loud and low moan coming from their big sister’s room. The twins exchanged concerned looks before getting up and carefully making their way to Tiffany’s room, Will still carrying a piece of buttered toast in hand.

The twins tiptoed their way from the kitchen/dining room and down the hall to the room next to the stairs that led to the store below where the tantalizing smell of candies and sweets forever drifted upwards. For once, Tiffany’s door wasn’t shut tight against the smell and after a quick shove from his sister Zack hesitantly pushed the door open and saw that Tiffany…
1351321222.title: A Monstrous Appetite

choices: Willow comes back with a single large bag of jawbreakers…

13513212221.content:
Their big sister was lying on her bed, the sheets and blankets kicked haphazardly to the floor. She was still dressed in her pajamas, which consisted of small, pink shorts and a short but baggy white tank top that exposed her slightly plump stomach. Though sweat glistened on her brow and her breathing was ragged, their older sister was still asleep. She loosed another, quieter moan and curled into a tight ball, fingers clenching tightly on her sweat-soaked pillow.

Will and Zack exchanged quick looks, and an even quicker game of rock-paper-scissors, before Will moved closer to their slumbering older sister. “Tiffany? Are you—?”

The room trembled slightly to another massive rumbling and standing together in their sister’s room, both twins could see the cause of the terrible noise: Tiffany’s stomach.
Tiffany moaned again, louder than before, and rolled onto her back, hands going to her stomach. She murmured softly, lips quivering, “So… hungry…”

Zack stared in open-mouth astonishment at his big sister’s stomach, totally in disbelief that such a sound could originate from someone’s stomach, when he noticed his twin. Particularly the devious smirk on her face as she looked between Tiffany’s stomach and the piece of toast in her hand.

“Will, no.”

She turned to her brother and giggled, “Will, yes.” She held the toast just above Tiffany’s face. Their older sister’s nose twitched before her mouth opened wide and she suddenly leaned up and took ahold of the toast in one big bite. She loosed another moaned, this one sounding more pleased than pained, as she hastily chewed and swallowed the toast down, tongue slinking out and licking up the small stains of butter on her lips.

“More…” she murmured. Her hands rubbed against her stomach. “So hungry…”

“Did you see that?” Willow whispered loudly, hands against her mouth as she fought the urge to cackle. “It’s just like the last time!”

Zack couldn’t help but nod. Once, follow a stern dressing down from their parents for an attempt at sampling some candies, the twins had sought to draw their suspicions elsewhere and so took a large portion of their stash to a sleeping Tiffany, feeding her candy after candy which she gobbled up gladly in her sleep. But that time their sister was just hungry from another one of her silly diet plans and while her stomach had grumbled and rumbled, it was nowhere near as loud as it was now.

“Sis, I think we should wake her up…”

“Are you kidding? This is too good an opportunity to pass up!” Without another word, Willow quickly ran out of the room and down the stairs to the shop below, leaving Zack behind with their sleeping older sister. Her stomach rumbled again, not as loudly as before, and she moaned again. Zack turned away from Tiffany, not noticing how her legs stretched the tiniest bit closer…

Daphne smiled as she lay back on the grass of the playground. Recess was almost over, and she was enjoying watching the clouds drift by. Her golden blond hair framed her head, and her pink t-shirt and jean shorts held in the warmth of the sun. She was trying to decide if the cloud she was watching was a dolphin or a wave when she felt it. A gentle warmth was building in her tummy, like she'd swallowed a hot marshmallow. The warmth quickly spread over her entire body, and she gave a quiet moan at the feeling. A moment later she felt a pressure against her waist; her shorts were digging into her skin. "But they fit this morning," she pondered.

Looking at her shorts she gasped when she saw them slowly riding up her legs, the skin beneath ever so slowly sliding out. "I'm...growing?!" She whispered. Hannah had always had fantasies of becoming a giant, but she'd never thought it would actually happen. Yet she was watching her stomach start to show between shirt and shorts. Her shoes were becoming tight enough to hurt her feet, and it took all her strength to pull them off. By now she had gained nearly a foot in height. Closing her eyes, she focused on her growth. 13513222222222211.content:
Maya had always been a compulsive eater. She would constantly eat whenever she got the chance; having three or more servings for dinner, snacking between meals, ordering large meal sizes, having more toppings, etc. As a result, she weighs 247 pounds, which is pretty hefty for an 9 year old in obesity way, but still mobile despite of it. The reason for her weight was because of the cartoons she would watch. On occasion, she would see episodes of characters gaining weight and getting fat. The one she loved was the episode of Garfield, where she dreams of eating everything in sight and growing into a fat giant. Maya always wanted to be like that, eating like crazy and becoming huge. Little did she know that her dream would come true...

It was late in the evening when she was in need of a midnight snack. She grabbed a box of graham crackers, a bag of marshmallows, and a few king size chocolate bars. She was making a couple dozen smores, stuffing them all into the microwave at once. After a couple of seconds, she began scarfing them all down, taking only a few seconds to enjoy the melted taste of chocolate and marshmallows. After finishing the last smores, her stomach growled slightly. She wasn't entirely full. So, she grabbed a container of mint chocolate chip ice cream and began scarfing the container whole, spoonful after spoonful. To top it all off, she grabbed the chocolate syrup and whipped cream and sucked up all that each contained.

After a few minutes, both the containers were dried up and licked clean. And she was finally full, as her belly was way over past her waistline. But she still heard a growling sound coming from her stomach. It wasn't a hunger pain, but it still felt strange to her. She shrugged it off and went to bed, thinking about food.

The following morning, she was awakened to the smell of pancakes. As she walked into the kitchen, she saw a towering pile of hotcakes, near close to the ceiling. She saw no one around and thought it was all for her. She grabbed each flapjack and ate it like it was a piece of pizza. And she kept on eating, no knife and fork. And as she was finishing them off, her mother walked in with a jug of orange juice and a funnel. She was curious as to what her mother was doing with them, but when she said open up, Maya smiled and obliged. Sitting on a chair, she began chugging down the juice. Her stomach was sloshing around with the mix of chewed-up pancakes and cold orange juice. It was so large that her pajama top was bursting at the seams and buttons, until it finally ripped to pieces, causing her fat belly to overlap her lap. Was she worried? No, she was still hungry. Her mother stood up and put her hands on her hips. "You've got to stop eating so much, Maya," she said, "You're gonna grow and grow into a big fatty." And when she said that, Maya grew a couple of inches higher and her stomach grew along with her. She was already close to her mother's height, nearly eye level with her. But she loved the feeling of her fat stomach and large stature, and didn't care about what was going on. But then she had another spurt of growth, going past her mother's height by 11 inches and her stomach becoming fatter and globular.

So what now?
