1351322222222222212.content:
Joe woke up somewhat late in the morning, sunlight streaming in through his window. Joe remembered his parents were going to be gone for a week for their anniversary vacation, and he was tasked with watching over his two little sisters in the meantime. Walking down to the kitchen, he saw the first of his sisters, 7 year old Sophia, eating cereal. He grabbed a bowl and began pouring himself some when Sophia came up to him and wrapped him up in a hug. "Good morning Joe," she said.

"Good morning to you too," Joe said as he bent over to return her hug. He held the hug for a few seconds before releasing her so he could go back to his cereal. Sophia went back to her seat too, and Joe could have sworn that her pajamas were a little bit higher on her legs than they had been when he first saw her. He shook the thought away, deciding that it was just her outgrowing some old clothes.

Settling down to eat his cereal, Joe heard the tv was on, and presumed that that was where his 9 year old sister, Hailey, was. In between bites, he called out a greeting to her from over his shoulder, to which she responded in kind. With the morning salutations finished, he went back to his breakfast.

After finishing, Joe got up to put away his bowl, when he was approached by one of his sisters with a request for him.
1351322222222222212.title: Two Little Sisters

choices: Hailey presses up against Joe, trying to grow even more
Sophia sees them and gets jealous of Hailey's growth
13513222222222222122.content:
"Hey Joe, can you come watch tv with me?" Joe heard Hailey ask him as he was putting his bowl in the dishwasher. He had no plans for the day, and since he was supposed to be keeping an eye on his sisters, he figured it'd be a good chance to hang out with his sister for a while.

A minute later he was on the couch with Hailey, watching some cartoon that was a bit too childish for his tastes, but she liked it, so he didn't complain. After a little while of watching the show, Hailey scooted over on the couch and leaned against Joe. This wasn't an uncommon occurrence when they watched tv together, and both of them enjoyed sharing this little moment with each other. Joe put his arm around her shoulder, giving her a light squeeze as he did so.

Joe was spacing out instead of paying attention to the show, but he was brought back to reality when he felt his arm moving. He glanced down at Hailey to see if she was getting up, but she was in the same position as before. Figuring she must have just been shifting to get more comfortable, he returned to his thoughts. The feeling returned, but once again, Joe couldn't see any evidence that she was moving.

The third time he felt his arm move, he couldn't ignore it. "Why are you moving around so much?" he asked Hailey.

"What do you mean?" she replied, looking confused.

"You've been shifting around a bunch since I sat down. I'm just wondering what's up."

"But I haven't been moving." Just after she said that, Joe felt his arm move just like it had before.

"Don't lie to me," Joe told her. "I can feel you moving right now."

"I'm not!" Hailey repeated, but she sounded less certain than before. Instead of continuing to deny that she was moving, she held herself as still as possible and tried to focus on any changes. It didn't take long before she, too, felt something moving, but she thought it was Joe that was moving, not her. "I feel you moving, not me," she told him.

Joe shook his head. "No it's definitely you moving." He was now watching her intently, a little too keen to catch her in the act. When he felt the movement again, he knew he had her. But to his surprise, he found she was telling the truth. Still, the feeling remained. As he searched her, trying to find the source of the movement he felt, he felt the sensation that Hailey was pressing into him. Not only that, but she felt heavier than normal, and not in an amount that could be easily explained away by her growing at a normal pace. He stood up to get off the suddenly uncomfortable couch, and Hailey followed suit, wondering where he was going.

It was then that Joe saw why it felt like Hailey had been moving around so much. She had grown to 5 feet tall, even with Joe's chin. Both were shocked, just staring at each other. "Uh, it looks like you grew," Joe finally said, lamely.
13513222222222222122.title: TV With Hailey

135132222222222221221.content:
Hailey took a little while to snap out of her stupor. She knew that she was taller. She knew that it had only happened when she was watching tv with Joe. Most of all, she knew that she wanted to grow even taller. Without saying a word, she stepped forward and threw her arms around Joe, hoping that just touching him would be enough to make her grow again. Joe was still shocked, and absentmindedly returned the hug.

As Hailey expected, the feeling of Joe moving returned, but this time she knew it was her growing. Slowly, she began to rise, and she squeezed Joe harder, as if that would make her grow any faster. To her surprise, it was actually working. She closed her eyes and focused on the feeling of growth. She envisioned herself growing taller and taller, maybe even enough to make Joe have to look up to her the way she looked up to him in the morning.
135132222222222221221.title: Hailey Grows Up

She stops when her head is touching the ceiling
1351322222222222212211.content:
Hailey kept growing until she was looking eye to eye with Joe, at which point Joe untangled himself from his not-so-little sister's grasp. Taking a step back, he couldn't believe what he saw. His own sister, who minutes before was only up to the top of his stomach, was now eye level with him, without the need to stand on a chair. Hailey looked extremely pleased at the changes, but her clothes did not. Her shirt had been lifted to the point that it now rested well above her belly button, her sleeves only reached to her elbows, and her pants were almost up to her knees. The state of her clothes did nothing to dampen her spirits, however.

"That felt great, Joe, can we do it again?" she asked, with a massive grin on her face. Unlike last time, Joe was prepared for her to try to take advantage of whatever it was between them that caused her to continuously grow.

"No way," Joe shook his head. "I don't wanna mess around with whatever's going on with you. I mean, look at you. You've grown over a foot and a half in a few minutes. You should also go find some clothes that fit, don't those feel uncomfortable?"

Hailey's smile faded a little at that. She really wanted to get taller, and she was disappointed that Joe didn't share her enthusiasm. Nevertheless, she wasn't willing to force the issue if Joe told her not to. "Ok, I'll go find something. Can I borrow some of yours, since mine won't fit anymore?" she asked. After hearing her brother's grunt of assent, she left to go search through his clothes for something to wear.

After she left, Joe sat down on the couch with a sigh. What was it about today in particular that made Hailey start growing whenever she touched him? They had watched tv and hugged each other in pretty much the exact same way many times before, and never in any of those instances had it caused her to change. At least, not in any noticeable way.

Upstairs, Hailey passed by her younger, and now much smaller, sister on her way to Joe's room. "Hey Sophia," she said, acting as casual as she could. She started giggling when Sophia stopped walking and could only stare at her in response, mouth wide open.

They stood like that for a few seconds, Hailey looking farther down than usual at her little sister, until Sophia's mind restarted. "What happened to you?" she finally blurted out. Sophia thought she'd had a good growth spurt when she found out she was a full two inches taller than her last measurement, but now she felt inadequate in comparison to her big sister's improvement.

As Hailey recounted her morning of watching tv with Joe before growing to his height, Sophia decided that she was going to try the same thing, but she was going to grow even taller than Hailey was. If Hailey was telling the truth, all that Sophia had to do was latch on to Joe, and as long as she didn't let go of him, she would continue to grow. Unlike her silly sister, Sophia was determined not to let Joe discourage her from getting taller, even if he asked really nicely.

The two sisters parted ways, and Sophia went down the stairs to find Joe. He was right where Hailey left him, on the couch in the living room. Sophia decided that if her plan was going to be a success, she would need to use a sneak attack hug. Quietly, she creeped up behind Joe, before lunging at him and wrapping her arms around his waist.

Sophia heard Joe say "What the?" when she did. Almost immediately, Sophia could feel herself growing against his back, and she tightened her grip as she prepared to outgrow Hailey.

It was an average day in the science lab for a teen named Chris , he is planning to unveil his new growth device that should grow bigger food and fruits, putting the end to world hunger.

was wearing a pink miniskirt, pink panties, a white shirt , blue socks but no shoes.




"What is it? Can't you see that I'm in the progress of making history?" He asked glaring at her, although he does truly love his little sister like anyone would, she was a pain in the neck to deal with,


"With what that dumb machine?" Amy asked pointing to the thing.



"Why yes, this thing if it actually works should grow that bowl full of fruit and when I present it to my professor I'll get into college for sure." He said proudly.



Amy jumped up in excitement at seeing such a thing happening, "Oh can we try it now?" SHe asked, Chris looked at her before shrugging, "I guess, I had to test it anyway." Chris looked at it intensely to see any changes, not noticing his little sister moving closer to the beam as her curiosity got the better of her,



"This is sooo neat." She whispered as she put her hand out to touch it.




Chris was preoccupied taking notes and slowly increasing the power.





Amy's hand blocks the beams path and in moments the greenish yellow glow surrounds her entire body clothes and all. She felt a tingling sensation as the beams energy circulated through her. A minute or so later Chris noticed Amy and panicked!



"AMY STAY AWAY FROM THE BEAM"


He quickly turned off the machine as he ran over to check on his sister, concern clear on his face, "Amy are you alright?" He asked worried for his sisters health,



Amy looked at him as she said, "I'm alright big brother, I don't feel hurt." She said giving a nervous smile.

"I'm sorry it just looked neat I didn't mean any harm" she said giving a sad pout and her signature puppy dog eyes.

135132222222222222222113.content:
As Amy watched her brother work she heard the doorbell ring. "Ashley's here!" She shouted, racing down the stairs and opening the front door. "Hey Ashley!'

"Hey Amy." Ashley was a year old girl who went to school with Ashley. She had red hair, green eyes and wore a light blue dress and sandals. "How's it going?"

"Great, except my brother won't stop wasting time with his stupid ray gun. Says he can use it to grow food."

"Hey," Ashley said as the two girls went into Amy's room, "you look taller." It was true, where before the two girls had been equal height, now Ashley only came up to her friend's chin. "Did you grow?"

Amy looked closer at her friend. "Hey, you're right. It must have been the ray run! I put my hand in the beam and it must have made me grow!"

"Can it make me grow too? It'd be sooooo cool to get so big I'd grow right through the roof!"

"Yeah, let's do it!" Amy smiled. "I'll get his attention while you stand in the beam. He might get mad at us though."

"If we grow enough, it won't matter if he's mad," Ashley grinned.

The two girls made their way upstairs, where Amy's brother was frowning as he screwed something into the machine. "Why won't it work!?"

"Maybe you should get a soda big bro. You look mad," Amy said.

"Maybe you're right," he sighed. "It just doesn't make any sense. Now don't touch that while I' gone, or I'm telling Mom!"

"Ok," Amy said, crossing her fingers behind her back. As soon as her brother was down the stairs, Amy shoved Ashley in front of the machine and hit the button her brother had pressed before. The beam hit Ashley and her whole body glowed. Amy moved and held her hand, drawing the glow over her own body. They stood in the warm beam until they heard her brother coming back upstairs. Quickly shutting it off, the two girls stood beside the fruit. "Hey bro, I think the apple's a bit bigger."

"What?! Both of you out, I need to take readings and samples!"

The two girls skipped out of the room, giggling until they reached Amy's room.

"Do you feel anything?" Amy asked as she shut the door.

"Yeah, like I'm standing in the sun. It's warm, and tingly," Ashley said, and slowly her body began to grow. Her dress crept up her legs, going from her calves to mid thigh. The shoulder straps drew taught and started to fray. Her sandals cut into her feet, causing Ashley to kick them off. In less than a minute the 5 year old girl had gone from 2'10" to 3'6". Her socks started to split from her growing legs. "This is so cool! Are you gonna grow more too?"

Her socks were nearing their limit as they began to slide down her calves. Her panties were getting tight around her waist and pressing tight against her skin.

Ashley jumped in joy. "We're growing together, this is sooo great!" She cheered. Her own socks were around her ankles now and her feet were making quick work of the rest. The straps on her dress finally gave up, her dress only hanging on by virtue of her growing midsection.

The girls hit five feet, and then quickly six. Amy's shirt was in tatters, and her skirt gave with a snap. At the same time Ashley's dress ripped enough that the remains finally fell to the floor, leaving both girls in just their underwear. "One more thing to go, Amy giggled.

135132222222222222222311.content:
Kate Winston was 20 years old with red hair and blue eyes. She stood at 5’5”, which gave her an advantage over her sibling in activities like basketball. Currently, she was sitting on a bench of her own, wiping sweat from her face, when her younger sister approached her.

“Hey, Sis.” Katlyn greeted, before getting a better look at her. “Hey, did you get taller?”

The now 4’11.5” tall 10 year old gave a small giggle. “Why yes. Want to know how?”

“Sure.” The redhead replied.

“All you got to do is have a burping contest with me, then you’ll know.” Amy added with a smirk, earning a puzzled look from Katherine.

“Why?” Kat asked.

“Because I want payback for all the times you beat me!” Amy exclaimed.

Kate mused over this for a bit. It seemed weird that Amy would withhold information unless she participated in a belching contest of all things. Even weirder was how the blonde prepubescent had sprouted 5 inches in only a couple of minutes. On the other hand, Kate did enjoy flaunting her dominance over her little sis, and this sounded like another good way to do it.

“Alright, Ames, you’re on!” Kate agreed.

“Cool!” Amy yelled, before giving a water bottle to Kate, who proceeded to chug a third of it in a few seconds.

“*BBUUUURRRPPP!*” A piercing burp immediately blasted out of Kate’s mouth, rippling her cherry red lips.

Amy sniffed the air and noticed the lack of any kind of smell. “Hmph. It might’ve been loud, but she won’t win if they don’t reek.” She thought.

The blonde countered with a belch of her own, one that was quieter than Kate’s, but possessed a superior odor of cereal and orange juice. Her height once again increased as the eructation ripped past her lips, this time blooming 2 ½ inches higher. Kate didn’t see this happen because she was too busy fanning away her baby sister’s putrid belch.

“Haha! That one stunk!” The ginger commented. “But let’s see you top this.” Kate downed the second third of her drink and waited a moment for her stomach to work its magic, culminating in another expulsion of air emitting out of her oral orifice that carried the scent of scrambled eggs and ketchup.

“*Hack* *cough*” Now it was Amy’s turn to be repulsed by the filthy fog fuming from her sister’s mouth, which made Kate chuckle. Amy gave her a small glare before guzzling down the next third of her H2O. The adolescent felt the familiar bubbling in her tummy and smiled. “*GGGGOOOOOAAAARRRRRPPPP!*” The trapped gas was released in the form of an immense eructation that exceeded her and Kate’s previous attempts in terms of loudness, length, and smell and with that belch came another growth spurt, this time having Amy match Kate’s height.

This time, Kate did take notice of it and her eyes widened at the sight. “Ames, did you just grow?!”

Amy grinned, relishing in her older sibling’s surprise, before answering in the appropriate manner. “*YYYYEESSS!*” And now she eclipsed Kate by 2 inches.

It was an odd feeling for Kate, looking up at her ‘little’ sister. “How did this happen?”

“I don’t know. After you creamed me in basketball, I drank some water and belched, then I grew five inches.” The blonde explained. “The bigger the burp, the more I grow.”

“Well, we should tell someone about this.”

“Fine, but first I want to win our contest.” Amy smirked.

Kate thought about this for a moment, wondering if Amy had skewed priorities. The Winston siblings had just learned that a child had the ability to enhance her height by burping of all things and all Ames appeared to care about was winning this game. Then, she thought about how much the abnormally tall girl lost to her in everything they competed in. With such a desire to avenge all that failure, it made sense why Amy was so adamant about achieving victory for once.

“Okay, Amy, let’s finish this.” Kate replied, matching her smirk. “Just because you’re taller than me now, doesn’t mean that I’ve lost.”

“Kept thinking that, Tiny.” Amy giggled.

13522.content:
You're name is Dustin, you're fifteen, and a counselor at Camp Bonzai for 10-12 year old boys.

The summer had gone smoothly so far. Yeah, it kinda sucked to have to work with a bunch of kids, but it was worth it to be able to save up for a car for when you turned 16 in the fall, and besides, you kind of liked the way the kids in your bunk looked up to you, calling you "Big D" and stuff like that. There were four boys that you were directly responsible for: Ash, a 12 year old with dark black hair, who was the most athletic of the group; Link, who was 11 and had bright red hair and freckly skin, and who was extremely hyperactive; Cole, also 11, brown-hair with glasses and slightly on the chunky side; and Ken, the youngest at 10, but was also probably the smartest, and the one boy in your group with whom you could actually hold an intelligent conversation with.

It was an unusually cool summer, and the boys had not yet wanted to go swimming until now because of that. So you had played baseball and football with them, did some hiking, and climbed the rock wall, but now the weather had gotten warmer, and it was finally nice enough to go to the river and take a dip.

The boys were yelling with joy as they ran to the dock in their swimsuits, with you trying to keep up behind them. Link was the first one to get their, and did a huge cannonball into the water, splashing everyone. The rest of the boys laughed, and then jumped in, horsing around, splashing each other, and having a good time. You decided to stay on the docks for a while, keeping an eye on the kids.

Unbeknownst to you or the four boys, up the river a chemical plant had opened over the last year, and was leaking weird chemicals into it. The chemicals had so far been harmless to the environment, but there was just the right concentration in the water to cause some interesting effects specifically to prepubescent males. Effects that would definitely cause some challenges for you this summer.

135222.content:
The boys finished up their swim, and you walked them back to the cabin, where they showered and got dressed for dinner. That night at the mess hall, you chatted casually with the other counselors, and realized that your group was the only one who had gone swimming that day, the other boys at the camp still feeling like it was too cold for it.

As you looked over to the table where your group was, you noticed that each of the kids was eating their food ravenously, even Ken, who was a notoriously finicky eater. In just a few minutes, they had downed all of the food on their plate, and each of them went back for seconds. "I guess they worked up an appetite swimming," you said as you pointed this out to one of the other counselors.

Later that night, it was time for the boys to go to bed, but you decided to stay awake, reading a book outside on the porch. You were so engrossed in the story, that when you heard the creak of the door to the cabin opening up, you jumped in fright. You spun around, relieved to see that it was only Ash, standing their in his boxers and undershirt.

"Ash, what are you doing up so late?" you ask.

"I couldn't get to sleep," he replied. "My skin's all itchy."

"Here, let me take a look," you said. You examined his skin, looking for any signs of bug bites or poison ivy, but you didn't see anything. Something was a little off though, but you couldn't put your finger on it.

"Well, everything looks normal," you said, "maybe there's something around here that you're allergic to. How bad is the itching?"

"It's not like a normal itch," he replied. "It's all buzzing and tingling, like when your foot falls asleep and you're waking it back up and all the blood is rushing back to it, but all over."

"Hmm," you think about what would be the best thing to do. "Maybe I should go wake up the camp nurse and have her take a look at you."

While you were thinking, you noticed something was happening to Ash. He seemed to be...growing, right in front of your eyes. At first, you thought it was the night light playing tricks, so you wiped your eyes, but something was definitely happening to him. Earlier that day, he was about a foot shorter than you at four foot eleven. Now, he seemed to be just a couple inches shorter!

Ash had noticed the change too. "Whoa!" he said, excited, "I think I'm growing!" He looked down at his stomach, now exposed due to his ever-tightening undershirt which could not contain the growing boy and was beginning to split apart. His boxers also looked like they were about to burst. "This is cool!" Ash said.

You took a couple of steps back, partly to get a better look at the situation, partly in surprise. Ash was still growing in front of your eyes, and now he looked like he was taller than you.

"This...this can't be real!"

Ash laughed, and then went back into the cabin. "Hey, guys, check this out!" he said, turning on the lights. "I'm huge!"

You rushed in after him, and saw that the other three boys were sitting up in bed, admiring Ash, who was now taller than the average adult male, but still with the proportions of a 12-year-old boy.

"Awesome!" Link said, jumping out of bed to more closely examine his friend.

Shaking your head, you didn't know what to say. You turned around, heading back out to the porch of the cabin, trying to figure out what to do next.

"How did it happen?" you heard Ken ask from inside.

"I dunno," Ash replied. "I just started feeling this tingling, itching all over a little while ago, and the next thing I noticed, I was stretching up and getting bigger and bigger."

"Did you say a tingling feeling?" one of the boys asked.

"Yeah," Ash answered, "Why?"

"Because I'm feeling it too!!"

Hearing this, and realizing what it meant, you opened the door back, only to see that the boy who said that was:

Your jaw dropped as you looked in to see not one, but two boys who were over six feet tall. Link had already almost caught up with his older friend. He was only wearing a pair of white briefs, but they were not leaving much to the imagination and were about to burst.

"Cool!," Cole said, standing next to his two friends, only coming up to their chests. "You guys are bigger than Dustin now!"

"Yeah," Link replied, "And I'm not done yet!"

You could see Link expanding in front of your eyes. At this point, you decided to just make the best of it, and see where everything was going. Besides, you figured this had to be a dream, as it was too crazy to be real.

RIIIPPPPP. "There goes my underwear!" Link exclaimed, now completely naked, and loving it. He had passed Ash in height and was continuing to stretch upwards in front of your eyes. But it was Ken, who was previously the smallest, who really got the biggest benefit. Within fifteen seconds, he had already passed six feet tall, and his growth seemed to be speeding up. He was wearing a pajama T-shirt and shorts, and they seemed to be stretching continuously, revealing Ken's midriff as he continued to grow, until they finally ripped apart as he passed seven feet.

"Sweet!" Link said. "We're all becoming giants!" His head was now at the ceiling, but his growth wasn't stopping.

You couldn't believe your eyes, and you turned and ran out of the cabin, determined to find some adult to help with the situation. As you turn around, you saw the four boys leaving the cabin, each between six and eight feet tall, each only having the tattered remains of clothing left on their bodies. They quickly jumped off the porch. "Are you sure we should let the others know?" Cole asked Ken, who was the tallest now and seemed to be leading the group.

"Of course," Ken said. "If the same thing that happened with us happens to everyone, we can take over this camp! Maybe even more!"

"Awesome!" said Link, who was so excited he was basically jumping alongside the other boys.

"Let's split up," Ken planned. "I'll take these two cabins, Ash, you take those two, Cole take these, and Link, take the one at the far end," he said, pointing. "Make sure you don't wake any of the counselors up, only the other campers."

"Got it," the other three boys said in unison.

"And if you see Dustin, make sure that he's detained," Ken continued. "We don't want him to sound the alarm and ruin our plans."

Hearing this, you hid in the shadows, making sure that none of the boys could hear you. You wanted to run to the other cabins and wake up the other counselors, but couldn't risk being overpowered by one of the boys, each of whom were bigger and, you assumed, stronger than you.

You decided to run around the backside of the cabins, but you didn't know that the ground there was still extremely slick from the rain earlier that evening. You slipped and fell, hitting your head against the concrete, causing you to black out for a few minutes.

When you came too, you heard a commotion coming from down on the river. You shuddered; you knew what that meant, and you didn't like it. You went from cabin to cabin, trying to wake up everyone. It took you a while to wake up everyone, and most didn't believe you, but after enough convincing, you got them to come down to the river to take a look. By the time you got there, you were horrified to see...

13523.title: Boys  event growth

Noah begins to grow in spurts
135231.content:
"Wake up, sleepyhead! It's Saturday!"

You were jolted awake by a THUD and a huge weight pressing you into your bed. It was a feeling you knew all too well.

"Noah, get off of me!" you shouted out, still groggy from sleep.

Your younger brother rolled off the bed onto the floor. You sat up and rubbed your eyes, then looked up at your brother, who had to crouch down in your room so that his head wouldn't bump into the ceiling. He was wearing his only pair of pajamas, which were a brown long sleeve shirt and blue pants, and these were again becoming too small for him, revealing his stomach and starting to split at the seams ... again, just like every other piece of clothing your brother wore. It was just something you guessed this generation was going to have to live with.

It was a little over two years after the day that the Earth had fallen into the path of the invisible space radiation band which had traveled through the solar system for a very short period. You remember that the scientists had made such a big deal about it in the press in the lead-up to the day it happened, but it came and passed, and nothing happened... for a week. The next week, reports began surfacing around the world that the radiation was having an unusual effect on young boys between the ages of 5 and 12. It had somehow mutated one of the chromosomes that controlled their pituitary gland, and was causing unexpected accelerated growth. In short, across the world, boys were beginning to grow abnormally large. Your brother had just turned nine years old, and before the event, was a slightly above-average 4' 3" and a skinny 65 lbs. Within a week, he had grown three inches, and in a month, he had grown a foot, at 5' 3" and 110 lbs. On his tenth birthday, he was 8' 6", and still skinny, but outweighing you by nearly three times at 460 lbs.

While around the world, scientists tried to theorize as to what caused this sudden growth, and why it was limited just to younger boys, the rest of the world adapted to deal with giant, sometimes unruly and hyper, and always unpredictable, pre-adolescent males. Houses and schools had to be retrofitted with extra-high ceilings, beds, desks, tables and chairs, sports fields and rules had to be changed to accommodate the larger and stronger boys, and the police went through special training on how to deal with an uncooperative, possibly dangerous giant boy without causing an incident. Around the world, different countries dealt with the issue in different ways, some using the boys for civil and military service, some separating the boys into their own communities, and some pretending that nothing had ever happened. It was definitely a new era for the human race.

As you thought about all that had led up to today, you realized that today was your brother's birthday. He was really excited, because you promised you would go with him on a trip to wherever he wanted to go. Even though he was now more than twice your height, you knew that he really looked up to you and wanted you to like him. He was a good kid, you thought, even at 12 feet tall.

You stretched and yawned, finally standing up out of bed. "C'mon," Noah said, "Let's go to my room!" In a flash, he darted out of your room, his shaggy brown hair swaying back and forth as he walked in a hunched-over fashion.

You put on a sleeveless white shirt and threw on some shorts and walked over to Noah's bedroom. You always felt uncomfortable in there, since the ceilings were nearly twenty feet above you (your parents wanted to plan for the future), but it was the only room in the house that Noah really felt comfortable in. Noah had stripped down to his boxers, and was rooting through his closet, throwing shirts, shorts, and pants into a huge heap on the floor. "What should I wear today?"

"Well," you said, "have you decided yet what you want to do?"

Noah stopped, turned around towards you, and thought for a second. "Hmmm... how about we go hiking in the woods! There's a great spot I want to show you."

"Hiking, eh?" you said. It wasn't a bad idea, as the weather was very comfortable that day, and you liked exploring nature. "Well, if we're going hiking, you should wear something that isn't too hot, and that you don't mind getting dirty in."

"Nothing fits me anymore," Noah said. "Look at this." He put on a football jersey, which you remember having fit loosely the last time you saw him wear it. Now, Noah had to struggle to put it on, and when he did, it looked like a half-shirt, only covering halfway down to his stomach. He quickly peeled it off.

"What about just wearing one of those super-elasticy undershirts Mom got you last month?" you said. "Those should be okay."

Noah nodded, and went over to his dresser, pulling out a black sleeveless shirt. He put it on, and it was able to stretch to cover his whole torso, though it did fit rather snug. "Better than nothing," he said. He threw on a pair of red nylon shorts that had an elastic waistband; these, too, were beginning to get a little tight, but were serviceable.

"Alright," you said. "Finish getting ready; I'll be downstairs."

"Okay," Noah said. "Gimme five minutes." He smiled. "I'm so excited about today!"

You grinned and nodded, then headed downstairs. While waiting, you turned on the TV, and a news story was on. It was an international report about a village in India that had been reporting an even higher rate of growth than the rest of the world. The tallest boy there, a twelve year old with short black hair and a muscled definition, was measured at twenty-two feet tall, and still growing fast. In fact, he had grown at least two feet in the past twenty-four hours since the TV crew had been there. He was growing so fast, they couldn't make clothes that fit him, and he had to tie several bedsheets together and wear them like a thong.

Finally, you heard the loud pounding of Noah's feet as he came downstairs. "I'm ready!" he called out, cheerfully. Turning around, you noticed that something seemed different...Noah's clothes seemed a bit tighter than a few minutes ago when you saw him in his room. Must be an optical illusion, you thought, and left the house with Noah, heading for the woods a few miles away.
135231.title: Boys will be Big Boys

They get to the spot and relax, planning the rest of their day
1352312.content:
It was tough keeping up with Noah. He was as excitable as any boy his age and he really wanted to start hiking. His long legs propelled him forward at a much faster rate than yours and he was quickly getting ahead of you. "Hey! Slow it down Noah! I can't keep up!"

Noah looked behind him and stopped walking for a few seconds, letting you catch up. "Sorry big bro, but I keep forgetting you can't keep up with me!"

He suddenly grinned and said, "Hey, let me carry you! Then we can get there a lot faster!"

Before you could protest he scooped you up in his arms and began running towards the woods. It was an odd experience. Your brother was only eleven but he was more than twice your height, his strong arms holding you tightly against his torso. You looked up and saw his face concentrating fully forward, his eyes gleaming with excitement about the coming day. You couldn't help but smile. This was really embarrassing, being carried around like a toy, but at least Noah wasn't a bully like some of the kids had turned out to be. A kid at your school, a quiet, mild mannered bookworm, had been tormented by his younger brother for years. He was constantly pushed around, teased, and sometimes even put up in high places where he couldn't get down by his former "little" brother. His parents had admonished the boy but, like most boys his age, he had only pretended to learn his lesson and was right back up to his old tricks by the next day. There was really nothing the boy (his name was...Josh you think) could do to stop his younger brother. He had to adapt and learn to accept what his role was now. He could only hope his younger brother would listen to him one day and stop treating tormenting him like a game.

Your thoughts were suddenly broken as Noah stopped running, dropping you a little harder than he meant to, as he reached the forest. He gasped and said, "Sorry! I didn't mean to drop you! Are you okay?"

You smile up at him and said, "Yeah! No problem! That drop was nothing! Remember when I fell out of the tree in our backyard?"

Noah giggled and said, "Yeah, Mom was all worried until she knew you were fine. Then she really let you have it!"

"Yeah..." you replied in a distracted voice. Something was definitely different about Noah. He was breathing heavily, sweat standing out on his face from having run the few miles to the woods, and his shirt seemed to be riding high, showing off his belly button. Did the shirt ride up or something? No...it wasn't bunched or anything just...too small. But that couldn't be...they had fit just fine before...and his shorts...the elastic looked like it was really starting to cut into his waist line, the material hugging his slender hips tightly...and they were even shorter than before...they only came halfway down his thighs...

Noah tilted his head and said, "What's up? Are you okay?"

You snapped out of it and shook your head. "Yeah! I'm fine! Sorry, just thinking about something..."

Noah laughed and said, "Well lets concentrate on the hiking for now! Come on! I want to show you that great spot!"

You smiled and said, "Alright! Then lead the way! But don't get too far ahead okay?"

Noah nodded and started walking, slowly, his big sandal clad feet easily crushing bigger sticks that you could only step over. You stole glances at your brother every few steps. There was definitely something different about him. His clothes, which had clearly fit him snugly this morning, were now too small on him. Noah hadn't really noticed yet, getting used to his clothes being ill fitting, but you could tell the difference. What the heck was going on? Why would he suddenly be growing so much? The news report flashed in your mind. Twenty two feet and growing...was something like that happening to Noah? At one point you would have scoffed and said, "Impossible!" but that was before all this radiation business had started. Now...anything was possible.

"Darn it! This stupid shirt!" your brother's voice cuts through your thoughts once again. You look up at him and your eyes go wide in shock.

Noah was growing! Right before your eyes, his body was stretching upward. He still hadn't even noticed! His shirt, which had covered half his stomach, was now barely covering his chest, the sides starting to split open, the sleeves ripping as his arms expanded, filling them up and growing beyond them. His shorts were now bunching up around his waist, his hips pulling them tight, his butt clearly visible against the tight material. Your eyes traveled down his lean but firm legs to his big feet, slowly inching across the ground, the strap audibly snapping as the foot overwhelmed the sandal, the rubber material disappearing under his foot. The growth seemed to slow at this point and stop, but your once 12 foot brother was now at least 20 feet tall. He had grown EIGHT FEET! In a few SECONDS! This was faster than any recorded growth! What was going on here? Noah tugged fruitlessly on his shirt and said, "Hey big bro...why did I suddenly start growing?"

"I...have no idea!" You said in surprise.

Noah looked over his body, turning his hands in front of his face and said, "You know, besides losing my clothes, this is pretty cool! I can see a lot further now! And you're really small compared to me!'

He walked up close to you and you stepped back involuntarily. He stopped and smiled. "It's okay. I'm still Noah just...bigger!"

You felt calm hearing that and seeing his familiar smile. He stands right next to you, measuring himself against you, his big feet making the ground vibrate. He must weight a lot LOT more now. You look up as he stands next to you. You're about level with his knee cap, a little taller than that. Wow...you sure felt small all of a sudden. Noah scratched his head and said, "It'll take forever for us to get there now. I don't want to walk so slowly. I'm just going to carry you."

He began to reach down but you protested. "Hey, hey! I thought we were hiking! I want to actually walk!"

Noah shook his head and said, "Nope! It'll take too long big bro. Just let me carry you. It'll be easier."

His big hand kept coming down toward you. You pushed it out of the way. "I said no! I want to walk!"

Noah rolled his eyes and put his hands on his hips. "Sorry big bro but this is the best way to do things! Now come on! It's my birthday and I want to carry you!"

You sighed and said, "Fine...but only because it's your birthday!" What a joke! Noah could have easily grabbed and carried you no matter what day it was. But this saved at least some of your pride as a big brother.

Noah smiled and said, "Okay! Thanks big bro!"

He reached down and scooped you up, holding you against his body. He held you like a stuffed animal, his arms holding you under your arms, your feet resting on his waist band, his warm belly pressing against your calves. Your head was around his chin and you could feel his breath puffing against the back of your neck. "Heh...you're really light now!"

You laughed a little and said, "Yeah...guess I am..."

He began to walk, heading towards this great spot he had been talking about.
1352312.title: Just a Little Growth Spurt...for Now

13523121.content:
As Noah made his way through the forest, you looked behind him and saw that the path he had left through the woods, marked by smashed shrubs and dead logs that he had just kicked aside. You knew that he was usually pretty careful about watching his step, but guessed that it was getting harder and harder as he got bigger and bigger. You were just glad that you being held up above it all so that you didn't have to worry about dodging his feet, which could now easily send you flying.

"So where is this great spot you've been raving about?" you asked.

"Wait 'till you see it!" Noah said, his face beaming with excitement. "We're almost there!"

The path Noah was taking seemed to be on a somewhat steep incline, though to him, you figured it was just like going up a ramp. As he continued to go uphill, though, you could see that he was having to work a bit more, and your head against his now-bare chest could feel his heartbeat getting faster. It was a very unusual feeling; it kinda made you feel like when you took a field trip to the zoo when you were younger and got a chance to touch an elephant -- of course, Noah had much smoother skin!

Your thoughts were interrupted by Noah suddenly coming to a stop. You looked around, not seeing anything special. This didn't seem like the place Noah wanted to bring you to.

"What's wrong?" you ask.

"Nothing," Noah said, and then you heard a final RIIPPP. Looking down, you saw the tattered remains of Noah's clothing fall to the ground - his shirt, his shorts, his boxers - everything. He was now completely naked. What was more, the ground now seemed much further away then it was when Noah first picked you up. Looking up at his face, you noticed it too seemed higher above than before. You realized that, once again, Noah had grown substantially in a very short period of time.

"Huh," Noah said, shrugging, "I guess that's the end of those clothes." He didn't seemed bothered by being naked, and, what's more, he didn't seem to notice his new height. He shifted you around in his arms, trying to be careful with you but not realizing his own strength. You ended up pinned between his arm and body, carried underneath his armpit as Noah continued his trek.

"Um, Noah?" you said, trying to be as nonchalant as possible. "This isn't very comfortable here."

"Oh, sorry," he said, lifting you up by your armpits so that you could see him face to face. His face was definitely much larger now, his deep brown eyes the size of beach balls now. You couldn't have been much bigger than a GI Joe to him now. "It's just that you're so small now, and I don't quite know where to put you. It's not like I have any pockets anymore," he said with a devilish smile.

"How about I ride up on your shoulder," you suggest. "That way, I can see what you see!"

"Good Idea!" he exclaimed, and lifted you up until you were sitting on his shoulder, next to his head. "Just hold on tight up there!"

You did as you were instructed, and grabbed onto his skin, being close enough to his head to grab on to his hair if you needed to. Without the awkwardness of having to carry you now, Noah was able to move much faster. Of course, it helped that his legs were much longer now, allowing him to cover more distance at once.

Riding from up high, you were impressed with the view that Noah was able to enjoy now. He was now taller than some of the trees in the forest, and could probably uproot many of them.The ground seemed so far away, yet Noah's massive feet had little trouble maneuvering it. You were a little jealous of your younger brother (not that you hadn't ever been before).

Finally, Noah reached the top of the hill, and he came to a stop. "We're here!" he exclaimed. He picked you up and set you back down on the ground. You noticed that now you only came about halfway up Noah's shin. You guessed he was somewhere between thirty and forty feet tall.

You looked around, and saw what looked like more forest. "So what's so special about this place?" you ask.

"Look!" Noah said, pointing. You saw that he was pointing to the entrance of what appeared to be some sort of cave, about twenty feet away. The two of you made your way closer to it, you letting Noah venture ahead so as to avoid getting stepped on. As you got to the entrance, you looked inwards and saw that the cave seemed to stretch on a ways, not being able to see the back of it.

"Whoa, this is pretty cool," you say as you gaze on.

"Yeah," Noah said, smiling. Then, he looked down at the cavern, and started to frown. "Oh, darn. This entrance is a lot smaller than before."

"Well, I think it's more like you're a lot bigger than before," you say, smirking. Noah was right, though. The entrance to the cave was plenty big enough for you, maybe stretching twelve feet high, but there was no way that Noah, at his current height, was going to be able to fit through it.

"Oh, well," Noah said, sighing. "I guess we'll have to find something else to do."

"Maybe, maybe not," you say. "I mean, we did come all this way out here. It would be a shame to not do some exploring."

"But what can we do?" Noah asked. "I don't think I'll be able to fit through there."

You thought for a moment. Should you stay at the cave, or should you head back to town?
