Kyle sloshes you around his mouth tasting you, "MMMMMM." "Bye big Bro." that is all he said when he tilted his head back and swallowed. Since you were a fighter it took like 3 gulps to get you down. You are being squeezed down a tight tube you can hear Kyle laughing as you fall into the bottom of his stomach. When you land the bullies are gone and you know exactly what happened.

You begin punching and kicking the walls violently causing Kyle to giggle. "It feels like a massage, keep going." Kyle can feel his big brother thrashing violently in his tummy and it felt so good he put his hand on his belly and he could feel his brother's struggles. Kyle was so turned on by the inner struggle he started to play with himself.

You can here Kyle moaning you could believe Kyle was getting off on your struggles. You decide to kick even harder which send Kyle over the edge. Kyle buckles on the street he could feel every punch and kick his brother made and it was amazing and finally Kyle Moaned and climaxed almost crushing you. "Thanks big bro that felt so good."

Kyle laid back with hand on his belly as he felt his brother's last feeble struggles then silence and then stomach began to gurggle and he realized he was full the cure to the hunger is people and went tell his other giant friends. You are nothing but slosh in your brother's tummy.
13523221221122121.title: Kyle eats you

135232212211222.content:
Kyle opened his mouth and licked his lips, staring hungrily at the three boys. Seeing this act they all started shaking in absolute terror. You, too, standing down by your little brother's feet, felt a thrill of horror pass through your body. He was really going to do it! You wanted to shout out and tell him to stop, that this wasn't the right thing to do, but the look of pure hunger on the once small boy's face stopped you. It was very possible, if you made a fuss, he might just decide to pop you in after them. It was a dreadful thought. You knew your brother was a kind and gentle soul, who would never hurt anyone...but the tides had turned drastically. He had power now...something he had never had before. He was above all authority in your little town. You closed your eyes and looked away. It would be over quickly...then you could just forget about it as best you could and keep looking for more food for Kyle.

Kyle opened his mouth wide and leaned his head back, dangling the boys over the moist cave, their screams filling his ears. He paused, holding them suspended over their doom. His stomach made a gurgling sound and he suddenly belched thunderously, the air knocking the boys about, small globs of saliva clinging to them. Kyle laughed and dropped them on top of a nearby house. "There! Now I'd better not hear you've been bullying little kids again or I really WILL eat you!"

The boys clung to each other and cried, promising that they'd never EVER do anything to hurt anyone again. Kyle laughed and smiled down at you. You were weak with relief. He didn't do it...he hadn't changed after all! You smiled back and gave his toe a hug, which made Kyle giggle. His giggling face soon twisted into one of hunger again and he winced, rubbing his flat tummy. "Big bro..."

"I know, I know Kyle. I know just where you can find some more food!" You jumped up on top of his foot and pointed towards downtown. "There's about three condemned buildings in town. Two of them are only about six stories tall, but one is at least ten or twelve stories tall! That should be pretty filling for you!"

Kyle licked his lips again and said, "Sounds delicious! Let's go!"

Without another word Kyle headed for downtown, each of his steps shaking the Earth slightly. His footsteps before hadn't created such noise, so you had to assume Kyle had grown a little bit more. You remembered that he seemed to inch up during the day, so while he wouldn't have any night spurts during the day, he would still slowly be growing. You shook your head. How long was this going to last? Things could get really dicey, really fast. He slapped your face a little. Now was not the time to be worrying about the future. You had a far bigger problem in the present to deal with.

Riding on Kyle's foot was almost like an amusement park ride. You had to hand on to the folds of his skin, and every few seconds the foot would rise up, your stomach dropping as it did so, the foot moving forward at a good speed before slowing down and falling, hitting the ground. You held still for a few seconds before the whole process repeated itself. Soon, Kyle had made it to the downtown area. It was far busier here than it was back in your neighborhood, but not quite "bustling big city" busy. Cars were moving speedily down the main street, heading to work, while others were just passing through. People littered the side walks, some out on a morning jog, others shopping, while still others were biking. Everything was perfectly normal...until Kyle showed up. The shock lasted no longer than it had in your neighborhood before everyone was panicking, running away from Kyle's huge feet. In his hunger he wasn't paying as close attention as he should have been, and ended up smashing a few parked cars under his feet. Whenever he did that, he scooped up the wreckage, eating the pieces, noticing other empty cars and eating them too. After noticing that some cars were empty and some were parked in big lots, he lost interest in the condemned buildings and started eating more cars. Car dealerships were soon cleared out, one by one. Vehicles were quickly becoming Kyle's new favorite snack. Whenever he came upon a parking lot, he would sit down, placing you on his knee, and pick up car after car, one in each hand, shoving them into his mouth and devouring them. He was still slowly making his way to the condemned buildings which made you think he was still very hungry, despite the amount of cars he'd been eating. Kyle suddenly belched and rubbed his tummy.

"Are you full now Kyle?" you shouted up at him.

Kyle tilted his head in thought, staring down at you. Finally, he said
135232212211222.title: Tricks and Breakfast

choices: An explosion coming from the area where the laboratory was
1352322122112221.content:
"Yup!" Kyle said as rubbed his tummy, "I'm full."

"Really?" you ask. "You've said that before, and it doesn't ever seem to be true."

Kyle shrugged, "I dunno, I do feel a little better than the previous times, but who knows?" Kyle stretched his arms up into the sky, and then put his hands on his hips. "Well, what should we do now, big bro?"

You got a kick that after all that had happened, Kyle was still calling you 'Big Bro'. He was the size of a building, he could squish you like a bug (or eat you whole!), but he still thought of you as a role model. You silently prayed that wouldn't change, no matter what happened in the coming days.

"Well," you say, "now that you're full, we should probably try to find out what's going on with you, why you're growing and eating so much."

Kyle brought his hand to his chin in thought, then nodded. "Yeah, that sounds good."

"Now let's think," you say, "this all started yesterday afternoon. Was there something that happened to you yesterday that was unusual?"

Kyle thought for a moment. "No, yesterday was pretty normal. I went to school, came home, started eating, and couldn't stop."

"What about before that?" you ask.

"Before that?" Kyle racked his brain, then snapped his fingers. "I know! The field trip to the lab! Remember me telling you about that tingly room!"

Of course! Kyle had said that he went into a room with a big machine, and felt all weird in there. You knew that the laboratory was responsible and safe, but there was always the chance of an accident or mistake. That must have something to do with it. But...

"Wait, Kyle," you said. "Didn't you say the whole class felt tingly?"

Kyle's wide smile dropped slightly. "Yeah, they did."

"Then why haven't we seen any other kids your size this morning?"

"Hmm..." Kyle reasoned. "I guess that's a good point."

Of course, that didn't necessarily mean that something hadn't happened at the lab, but it caused your hypothesis to be brought into doubt. While you were thinking, you felt the ground start to rumble. You looked up at Kyle, figuring his stomach had gotten hungry again, but by the look on his face, you realized the rumbling sound wasn't coming from him. The two of you looked around, trying to see what had caused the rumbling.

Finally, from the west, you saw what was going on, and this made everything make a lot more sense. It was...
1352322122112221.title: Ful... for now...

choices: The rumblings return...for all four boys!
The boys play with each other and with you!
13523221221122211.content:
Your mouth dropped open as you saw another three boys running towards you. You knew there were twelve boys in Kyle's class. The classes were much smaller, thanks to it being a private school, and you figured some of the students must have been sick the day of the field trip, but there should still have been more boys than just this. Now wasn't the time to be worrying about why only three more were heading towards you. The big problem was...there were three giant boys heading towards you! Kyle smiled and waved, recognizing the boys. "Brett! John! Larry!"

Those three names clicked in your mind. You definitely knew those boys. Brett was the jock and defacto leader of the group. He loved to play sports and had shortish dirty blond hair. He was quite handsome for his age and people always joked saying the girls would be all over him. You had seen a distinct lack of interest in his eyes while he looked at girls, but his eyes always lit up around your brother. You had a feeling you knew what that meant but weren't sure of how Kyle felt. He was a good kid though, confident, and a little cocky, with a sure attitude. He was an only child and his parents always seemed to be out of town on business or otherwise. He had mostly been raised by nannies. Despite this, he was a cheerful kid and he hung out with your brother a lot.

John was a bit more of mystery. He was quiet and seemed to just go with whatever Brett wanted to do, not making a fuss. He had long, shaggy brown hair and was usually found reading or writing. He had muttered a few times that he wanted to be a novelist when he grew up. You had read some of his stories and they were quite good for his age. If he kept it up he'd have quite a good career ahead of him. He talked with you a little when the rest of his friends were playing sport games like kickball or baseball. Luckily that's not the only thing they did and so he spent as much time with his friends as anyone. He was skinny as a rail, almost never feeling hungry. He was often targeted for bullying, though Larry always did what he could to protect him.

Larry was a boy who loved control. He was the one you were worried most about. He was a big boy for his age, tall, muscular, and totally confident. If anyone got in his way, he pushed them down and kicked them over, moving past them. He loved using his size against people, but only people who deserved it. Smaller kids who looked up to him and his friends, who were all smaller than him and always complimented him on his size and strength, he kept a close eye on and protected. Normally this would be a great quality but he had an abusive older brother and, as such, believed that all older brothers were the same. Therefore...he didn't like you. With his cocky, controlling attitude and his dislike of you...you didn't know how safe you'd be.

Larry and Brett waved and yelled back, running up to Kyle, the ground shaking like crazy, knocking you against your brother's foot. You held on and waited as they ran up to him, three more pairs of feet surrounding you. You gazed up in awe at all these monstrous kids, their slim, athletic, tight, toned, and skinny bodies very close to each other, talking about their experiences. This was nuts. Now you had FOUR eight year olds to look after and with the amount of food that Kyle required...oh my.

Suddenly, you felt yourself get lifted into the air. "Yeah, see? I have my big bro right here!"

You felt a slight sense of fear as you were suddenly held up to three huge faces, staring directly at you. John looked embarrassed, probably because he was naked. While Brett grinned and said, "Whoah, look how little he is! I remember when he was like...twice as big as me!"

Larry cracked his knuckles and said, "My older brother was lucky he was out of town this week. I would have taught him a lesson." You gulped and didn't say anything.

Kyle held you protectively close and said, "Back off Larry! You can't be mean to my big bro! I'm not going to let you!"

Larry ruffled Kyle's hair and said, "Relax squirt I'm not going to hurt him or anything. We could just play with him for a bit."

Kyle smiled at that thought while you noticed Larry's grin was less than wholesome. You didn't know exactly what he meant by "play" but it didn't look good. Brett shoved Larry playfully and said, "Settle down big guy."

Larry stuck his tongue out at Brett who just laughed.
13523221221122211.title: Meeting with Friends

choices: Kyle tackles Larry, coming to your rescue
Larry puts you in his mouth! (but doesn't swallow)
135232212211222111.content:
As the boys talked about the different ways they could play with little people like you, you began to grow uneasy. You weren't sure you wanted Kyle getting any ideas; you probably needed to try to get him away from these other boys before he got influenced too much by them.

Before you could say anything, however, the ground suddenly started to shake again. This time, it felt like an earthquake, and it knocked you on your ass. Each of the boys clinched their stomachs, and their faces grimaced in pain.

"Ohh, man" Brett said, licking his lips. "I could really go for some food right now!"

"Me too!" Larry responded, his eyes filled with anxiety. "This whole hunger thing has been driving me crazy over the last day!"

"What have you been eating?" Kyle asked.

"Anything I could find, man," Larry said. "I finished off all the food in my house, but that wasn't nearly enough, so I started to eat silverware, plates, cans -- anything I could get my hands on. This morning, when I woke up, I had outgrown the house and it was in pieces around me, so I ate the pieces then and there."

"Same here!" the other three boys said in unison.

"Wow," John said, "that's weird that we all acquired the same taste for seemingly inedible objects."

"Lately, though," Larry continued, "I've been eating anything I could find. Street signs, bushes, trees, you name it, I probably tried it at least once."

"Yeah," Brett said, "I still haven't found anything to control this hunger." His stomach rumbled again, and this time, you could see his lean belly actually vibrate. He looked uneasy, the same way Kyle had looked earlier.

"What can we do?" John asked. "There's not enough food to feed us for very long."

While listening to the boys discuss their problem, you had an idea. Still being held in Kyle's hand, you started waving your arms, trying to get their attention. "Hey, guys! Over here!"

The boys looked your way, and Larry sneered, "What do you want, pipsqueak?"

You ignored his attitude, and continued, "There's a shopping district half a mile from here. There's, like, four grocery stores next to each other, and clothing stores, appliance stores, you name it. Plus, there should be plenty of cars in the parking lots there. Whatever you're in the mood for, you should be able to find it there."

"Good idea, big bro," Kyle said, beaming. "You see, I told you he's smart."

Larry rolled his eyes and snorted. "Fine, whatever. Lead the way to this magical shopping district."

Kyle sat you down on his shoulder, and you pointed in the direction of the shopping district. "It's just a few blocks thataway. Shouldn't take too long for you guys to get there!"

"Let's go!" Brett shouted. The boys started to run, the sudden motion nearly causing you to go flying. You grabbed ahold of Kyle's earlobe, and steadied yourself back on his shoulder. All four boys running at once, their car-sized feet pounding the ground, caused a little destruction to the neighborhood around them. The asphalt in the streets began to crack, and a couple of buildings, already on shaky foundations, began to crumble to dust. Within a minute, the boys made it to their destination.

The shopping center was bustling, The parking lots were all full of cars, and many people were walking along the sidewalks holding bags full of merchandise. When the group of giants showed up, though, it sent the population into a panic. People dropped their bags right on the sidewalk, running away, screaming. Many tried to get into their cars and drive, but the large amount of people suddenly getting on the street caused traffic to back up. As the boys walked along the street, they each licked their lips at all the tasty treats this area had in store for them.

"I call this grocery store!" Kyle called out. He ran over to the store, a medium-sized, family-owned place, and ripped off the roof. Inside, shoppers pushing around their carts full of food gazed up at the massive hungry face looking down on them and started to freak out. Kyle scooped up a group of carts with his hand, making sure that he didn't grab any of the people, and trying to get the ones that were fullest with food. He popped the carts into his mouth, eating it all together, metal, rubber, plastic packaging, and of course the food itself. His hunger still not quenched, he started to grab the shelves and pour them into his mouth, devouring it as fast as he could. You were amazed that, even for his massive size, he seemed to be packing away an exponentially increasing amount of food.

The other three boys had each found a store of choice and were busy gobbling the buildings, cars, and contents. You hoped that they would get full as quickly as possible, so that you could take them to someone who might know what the hell was going on and possibly fix this mess. But, of course, they would only get hungry again anyways. You figured that watching your brother eat might be your primary activity for the rest of your life, however long that was gonna be.

As you contemplated this, neither you nor Kyle noticed Larry sneaking up behind the two of you. It was hard to imagine a humongous boy like him could sneak anywhere, but with the commotion occurring all around, he was able to snatch you up without Kyle noticing. You suddenly rose high into the air, and he held you above his head, smiling at you like the little bug that you were to him, trying to break free from his tight grip.

"Well, well," Larry said to you, "what have we here! It seems like some formerly 'big brother' is still trying to run the show."

"No!" you cried out. "It's not like that! I'm just trying to help Kyle as much as I can!"

Larry shook his head, chuckling. "Too bad, little squirt. I don't think he needs your help anymore. I think it's time someone learns their lesson on who rules this place now."

You were frozen in horror as Larry brought you closer to his face, opening up his mouth. For the second time that day, you felt the warm humidity of an eight-year-old's massive cavern of a mouth, smelled the stale odor of the food he had eaten that day, and saw your life flash before your eyes. You let out a cry for help, when suddenly...

1352322122112221112.content:
Unlike Kyle, Larry didn't seem to understand compassion for those smaller than himself. Or maybe it was just his natural bias against older brothers. Either way, you were carried inexorably toward that mouth, a simple flick of the eight year old's hand fingers tossing you onto his tongue. Without a second thought, the teeth clicked closed around you, throwing you into a humid darkness. You could hear Larry chuckling around you, hit tongue tossing you around, throwing you into his teeth, being crushed underneath the pink muscle, your clothes getting soaked in saliva. An enormous sucking sensation constricted your body as you realized that Larry was sucking on you like a hard candy! He made a "Mmmm" sound and said, "For a rotten older brother you taste pretty good pipsqueak!"

He laughed again and you tumbled, head over heels, towards the back of his throat. You panicked and scrambled away, your hands searching desperately for anything to hang on to but the slippery tongue gave no purchase. You felt yourself sliding back. Was this it? Was this adventure going to end with you in the belly of a boy? You could hear his belly rumbling and groaning. You wouldn't keep him satisfied, not at all, but every morsel counted at this stage. You closed your eyes and waited for the inevitable...

...which never came. Your tiny body was coughed up, flying out of the throat and out of Larry's mouth onto his hand. You were shaking, covered in saliva, and glad to be alive. You gazed up at Larry who was smirking down at you. Looking around you saw Kyle was eating the grocery store itself, Brett was running around and picking up cars, while John was quietly eating a clothing store. Larry pushed you with his finger, getting your attention again, and said, "Okay, now you listen, and you listen good. You are NOT in charge anymore! You USED to be in charge, because you were bigger than us and could push us around."

"But I never--!" you attempted to explain yourself, but were cut off by Larry's harsh. "Shut up!"

You instantly quieted down and stared up at Larry's serious face. "Now, I could have eaten you right now and you wouldn't have been able to stop me! If you want to hang around here, with me and my friends, that's fine. But I'd better not hear you ordering us around in ANY way! You'd better start thinking of yourself as a pet because if you try to order us around again I will REALLY eat you! Got it?"

You nodded, gulping. He smirked and said, "Good. Now get out of here. I'm hungry and you're looking more and more delicious with every passing second!"

He roughly set you down in the parking lot and headed over to the nearest store, sat down, and began to eat. You shook as you hugged your knees, eyes wide. You were wet, the smell of Larry's breath and the moist feeling of being inside his mouth still fresh in your mind. That had been close...too close! It finally hit home just how vulnerable you were around these hungry boys. All it took was one of these hunger episodes while you weren't around anything to put in your brother's mouth and he might just eat you without realizing it. And if he didn't...one of those other boys might! You didn't trust Larry in the slightest. You had always thought it was kind of cute that he had such a dislike of you. You knew it was something he'd outgrow when he realized that not all older brothers were the same, but now, that bias could easily be the death of you. It was incredibly clear that you needed to find help. NOW!

You got up and started marching over to Kyle. You'd tell him he needed to head to the laboratory and get checked out to find out what was causing this. You were just about to reach Kyle when a huge foot suddenly landed in front of you. You bumped into and fell on your butt. You looked up and saw Larry grinning at you. "Sorry twerp. I was just passing through."

You didn't say anything and he just chuckled and went to go scoop up some cars, taking them back to the building he was eating. He had done that on purpose. He probably had seen your purposeful stride towards your little brother and had reminded you of your place...if you tried to control the situation, in any way, he'd eat you. You knew that Kyle wouldn't believe something like that of his friend and if there's no way he could keep an eye on you at all times. Sooner or later...Larry would get you. You gulped. There was no chance now...you couldn't suggest anything to your brother without it being interpreted as an order and you couldn't leave your brother alone with these kids. There's no telling what kind of mischief they'd get up to. You walked up to Kyle's foot and rubbed it. He looked down and smiled at you. "Hey big bro! What's up?"

You smiled and said, "Hey Kyle! How are you feeling?"

Kyle patted his stomach and said, "Still really hungry. I don't know if this is going to be enough."

You gulped and said, "W-well I'm sure you'll find something to eat..."

Kyle nodded and kept stuffing bits of the building into his mouth. "Do you know any place we could go big bro?"

You shook your head and said, "Nope, this was my last idea. I guess you guys will just have to look for something yourself."

Kyle tilted his head and thought about that. "Yeah...well Brett usually has good ideas. I'll just ask him."

He finished off the building and you quickly jumped onto his foot as he walked over to Brett. Each boy had had a building to themselves, along with all the cars in the parking lot. Brett wiped his mouth as he saw Kyle approaching and said, "What's up?"

"Still hungry. We pretty much cleaned this place out. Where should we go now?" Kyle asked, his stomach already rumbling again.

Brett thought about it and said, "Well...there's a lot of buildings and stuff all over town so I guess we'll just eat whatever we find."

"But--!" you blurted out before covering your mouth. Brett looked down at you with a raised eyebrow. "What was that? You say something?"

You shook your head. "No! Sorry, just a cough!"

Brett shrugged and turned back to Kyle. Dammit! This wasn't good! These kids were officially off the chain now. You had lost any semblance of control of the situation and were officially along for the ride.
1352322122112221112.title: Put in Your Place

13523221221122211121.content:
The four boys walked side-by-side, heading out of the shopping district, having left a trail of destruction behind them. What hadn't been picked clean to satisfy their never-ending appetites was left behind in ruins. You were amazed to see that no one on the ground appeared to be injured, though you hadn't a clue if anyone was swallowed whole during the feeding frenzy.

You looked back forward and saw that the boys were heading back downtown, towards the taller buildings. You knew that this meant not only more destruction, but possibly loss of life. You tried to rack your brain for something you could do to stop their forward march, but you couldn't think of anything that wouldn't result in you getting taught a lesson by Larry again.

Brett had assumed the role of leader, and seemed to be guiding the group as they went along. "If you see something that looks tasty, just grab it," he instructed. The boys did as he said, and started grabbing anything they could see, including just taking chunks out of the buildings. In an overwhelming fit of hunger, John grabbed a corner of the fourth through sixth floors of a ten story office building, bringing it to his mouth and biting in. The employees inside just started at him dumbfounded as the wall that used to be there suddenly vanished, and they could see a hungry boy looking in at them.

This continued like this until you got downtown. At this point, the boys were outsized by the skyscrapers, and they decided to just focus on eating more cars. "Hey, look what I found!" Larry called out, and the other three boys came over to see his discovery. It was a parking garage full of all sorts of different treats for them. Starting with the roof, they worked their way down, eating hundreds of cars.

Finally, about halfway through devouring the contents of the garage, the boys slowed down, then stopped. Kyle let out a large BURRPP, then sheepishly grinned at his friends. "Excuse me," he said. "Wow, that was a great meal. I'm full now!"

"So am I," John said.

"I guess that did the trick," Brett said. The boys began to look around for something to do, when Kyle started to yawn. The yawn was contagious, and the other boys soon joined in. They looked sleepy, as if the constant devouring had taken its toll on them.

"I think I need a nap," Kyle said. The other boys nodded. Uh oh, you thought. You knew what had happened with Kyle and, you assumed, the other boys when they slept last night. A nap might not be quite as severe, but it was still going to make things even worse for you and the rest of the normal-sized people in your city. Before you could even attempt to speak, though, the boys had all walked over to a large park in the middle of the city, and lay down on their backs in the grass.

"Are you sure this is a good idea, Kyle?" you whispered to your brother, trying to avoid being detected by Larry.

"Why not?" Kyle turned over and looked at you on the ground.

Why not, indeed, you thought. Kyle was already monstrous compared to you, and if he grew while napping, things would only get worse. Even lying down on his side, as he was doing now, you had to stretch to reach his right nipple, the one closest to the ground. It would take five of you to be as tall as his chest was across. You couldn't imagine how things would be like if the boys were all bigger.

"I dunno," you said, looking around and seeing that the other three boys, including Larry, had already fallen asleep. You decide to risk offering a suggestion to Kyle. "I just think it might be a good idea to head over to the research laboratory and find out what's causing this growth. If we let it go unchecked for too long, something bad might happen to you all."

Kyle nodded, contemplating your suggestion. You hoped that he was still taking your opinion seriously, but you couldn't be sure. Finally, he opened his mouth and gave his reply.
13523221221122211121.title: Lunch, then Naptime

choices: As soon as you are clear, a surprise attack is launched against Kyle.

Kyle nods. "Okay big bro let's go."

You smile happily, glad that things are finally going your way.

Kyle quietly leaves the park so as not to wake the sleeping giants then walks normally once out of range.

The whole time you bounce up and down with his every step still amazed at how gigantic your little brother is and think (Damn I'll never be the same after this.) You pat his shoulder feeling the muscle slightly twitch.

Kyle giggles. "What are ya doing?"

You flush. "Oh um just testing it out."

He looks questioningly. "Hmm alright big bro." He looks forward. "Oh we're here."

You hop up. "Okay just let me down so I can go ask." You say this as a few scientists already begin to come out from the slight shaking coming towards them.

"Okay." Kyle says as he lets you on his hand then lowers you to the ground.


Next up is?
135232212211222111211.title: Kyle agrees to go right now, leaving the other ...

choices: A voice asking what he was doing here.
Nothing. He heads back to the boys.
135232212211222111212.content:
He opened his mouth to reply but instead let out a mouth stretching yawn. When he was done his eyes were half closed and he didn't really seem to be thinking clearly anymore. He laid down and said, "Sorry big bro but I'm way too tired. I'll think about later..."

Without any further thought or words he closed his eyes and was soon fast asleep. You sighed unhappily and watched him for a few seconds. It wouldn't do any good to wake him up and if he made too much of a ruckus he might disturb the other boys which was certainly not an option. If Larry caught wind of you doing anything to seem controlling...well, you already went through the scenarios in your head. Not a pretty picture. They couldn't, however, fault you for going off on your own to investigate the laboratory. You weren't technically doing anything to interfere in the situation of the boys...not directly anyway. This was your best chance to do so. It would be best to go now and then come back before they woke up. If you could accomplish that, then you should be safe.

With this plan of action in mind, you quickly ran away from the slightly snoring boys, the sounds of their stomachs churning up their lunch clearly audible in the air. The laboratory was, unfortunately, about twenty minutes away on foot. By the time you reached the tall structure you were sweating and out of breath. You took a quick breather then walked up to the door. It was a revolving glass door which you quickly walked through. Inside was a bright, clean, white receptionist area, the floors made of tile so clean each one was almost like an individual mirror, your reflection keeping in step with you. Strangely, for such a big building, the reception area was empty, not a sound to be heard. In fact, not a single soul was in sight. How odd...

You ran up to the receptionist's desk, your breathing and steps sounding almost offensively loud against the tiles. There was a tiny bell on the desk which you promptly began hitting. The shrill ring sounded throughout the area, echoing off the walls, but no one came. There was no shouted, "Hold on! I'll be right there". There was nothing at all. Was this place always like this? So dead and empty? Was it possible that they had seen the giant boys, realized that they could be held responsible, and then vacated the premises? It was of course utterly ridiculous to think that everyone who worked here could so quickly and easily disappear. You looked around and saw an elevator. You ran over to it and pressed the button a bunch of times, but there was nothing happening. Getting frustrated, you ran for the door that led to the stairs and pulled on the handle. It was locked. You ran behind the receptionist's desk this time and searched for a note, a sign, a key, anything that could help you find out what was going on. This supposedly squeaky clean laboratory was starting to look more and more suspicious as time went on. You looked at your watch. You had already spent ten minutes in here, with no results. Taking in the twenty minutes it took to get here along with the twenty it would take to get back, you'd be gone for almost a full hour. Would that be how long the boys would stay asleep? Or would they have woken up by then? You decided not to risk it.

Just as you were running towards the door, a noise made you stop. What was it?
135232212211222111212.title: Investigating

choices: No, the only way to defeat this now is by killing them!
1352322122112221112121.content:
"W-what are you doing here?"

The voice was shaky, to say the least. You turned around, seeing a figure emerge from the shadows. The man was young, in his twenties maybe, and kinda handsome, in a nerdy sort of way. He had blonde hair that currently looked very unkempt, wore glasses, and was wearing a white lab coat, underneath of which was a pair of jeans and a black t-shirt. The man looked extremely disheveled, like he hadn't slept in a week.

"Uh," you said as you thought of the best way to put it. How do you say something like, 'My kid brother is now a giant devouring the entire city with his friends' without it sounding ridiculous? You think for a moment, then finally say, "Well, my younger brother was here on a field trip the other day, and--"

The other man rushes up to you, seemingly in the blink of an eye, and grabs your shirt. He puts his face right up in yours, making you feel extremely uncomfortable. "Did you feed him anytime in the next twenty-four hours after that?"

What a stupid question, you thought. "Uh, yeah, of course. And he just kinda kept eating and eating, and now, well--"

"Oh, why did you do that?!?!?" The man turned around, covering his face with his hands. "You fed the disease that's inside him, and now it wants more!"

"Power inside him?" you ask. "What are you talking about?"

"Look, I'll try to explain it to you as quick as I can," the man said, walking back and forth in front of you. "That school group that came in a couple days ago, well, there were some wires crossed, and the tour guide accidentally took them into a room that was being used as part of an active experiment. We didn't realize it had happened until afterwards, and luckily we were able to contact all the affected kids and get them back here for quarantine -- except for four."

"Wait -- so everyone's safe except for four kids?" you said aloud.

"Yes, we've made perfectly sure that every kid we've tested has been cleansed of all trace of the disease." Well, that was a relief, you thought. At least you knew there weren't any more giant kids to deal with besides your brother and his friends. The man continued, "But we weren't able to contact four of the boys, and we're afraid something might happen with them."

Something might happen your ass, you thought. "W-what exactly are you afraid of?"

"Well, the experiment we were running had to do with mass changes of DNA during development. The machine that was in that room was sending out waves of radiation energy designed to manipulate DNA in the Y chromosome of developing males. In adults, the machine had no effect, as their DNA is already to rigid, but the DNA of a young pre-pubescent boy is just flexible enough that it could be affected by this process. Specifically, the experiment we were running that time was to create a link between the pituitary gland and the stomach, causing anything that was eaten to rapidly fuel the pituitary gland, leading to growth, which would in turn fuel the need for more food. It was a vicious cycle that worked quite well on the mice we had tested it on."

Wow, you thought, so feeding Kyle did in fact cause him to grow, which then made him hungrier. You began to doubt your decision to go buy all that food at the grocery store last night. "Yeah, that kinda makes sense, considering what's happened to my brother and his friends."

The man then quickly turned back to you. "You said you fed them, didn't you? How much? How big have they grown? Are they six feet tall? Seven? Ten?"

You chuckled slightly as you shook your head, "Maybe you'd better turn on the news."

The man stared at you in horror, then turned around and quickly ran over to a TV in the corner of the lobby, flipping it on. Right away he saw, breaking new footage of the four boys stomping around town and eating everything they see. The man covered his mouth, gasping in horror. "My god!" he cried out. "What have we done? WHAT HAVE WE DONE?!"

"That's why I came here," you said to him as you walked up behind him. "I need to find some way to reverse this, or at the very least stop this."

The man shook his head. "I don't think there's anything that can be done. If the growing and eating cycle hadn't had started yet, we would be able to starve them for a day or so and it would go away on its own. But now that it's been so active--"

"Wait a minute," you say as you try to contemplate what the man is telling you. "Are you saying there's nothing that we can do?"

The man looks at you with a look of sadness and fear in his eyes, then, finally, he looks up at you and answers...
1352322122112221112121.title: An Explanation

The boys wake up and ignore you, too hungry to listen.
13523221221122211121212.content:
"No, I'm not saying there's nothing we can do at all..." he glanced at you sideways before reaching behind the reception desk and pulling something out. It was a huge shotgun, powerful and dangerous looking. "We're going to have to kill them."

....What?

He ran over to the door, about to exit, a box of ammo rattling in his hand. You ran over to him and grabbed him by the arm, dragging him back over to the desk. He was so distressed and undersized that you were able to easily haul him away from the door. He yelped and shouted, "What are you doing? This is the only option we have now! We've both made mistakes and I'm going to correct them!"

"Are you insane? Are you going to kill a bunch of eight year olds for getting caught up in some kind of freak experiment that wasn't even their fault?" you said incredulously. "I'm not going to let you do that, especially to my younger brother!"

"You fool! They are not to be considered human anymore! If they keep eating, and they will, they will only continue growing larger and larger until the world will be unable to sustain them! And who knows how much mutation their DNA could go through before this is done! They are all highly unstable! The only chance we have now is to take them down before they grow any larger!"

You grabbed the gun and tried to jerk it out of his hands. "No! I'm not going to let you do it!"

The man struggled back. "Stop it! I don't want to hurt you too!"

You had had enough. You pulled back on the gun, turned it and rammed the butt against the man's nose. With a sickening crunch the nose shattered, the man yelling and stumbling back, letting go of the gun. Blood streamed from the man's nose as he whimpered and covered it. "D-damn you! I'm going to get this fixed and when I do I'm going to get even bigger guns and take those monsters down!"

He stumbled over to the elevator and slammed a hidden button over the other buttons and the elevator door instantly slid open. He stumbled inside and glared at you. "I'll be back...and I'll have you arrested after all this is done!"

The doors slid shut again and you were left alone in the unnatural quiet of this strange building. Your heart was pounding slightly at this whole ordeal. You couldn't let this happen. There was no cure to this thing except for killing the kids. That wasn't even an option. Before this whole thing got started you told yourself you were going to do whatever you could to help your little brother no matter what. Now you had to protect your little brother at any cost. But how? Against this maniac and his weaponry they were powerless. Unless...what if the boys were bigger? It was a crazy, almost suicidal notion, but it could work. What if the boys were big enough to fight off any threat, be it gun, tank, or even missile? They were going to grow either way. The only other option was death. You'd rather your little brother be a massive giant than dead. You steeled your will and ran out of the building. This was your last hope. You needed to get them to eat. Eat and eat and eat even past their limits. You needed to stimulate their growth so that nothing could hurt them. If that failed, then they had to escape to a different town. The challenge would be convincing them of that either way. You were sure all three boys would easily listen to you. Larry though...he was a constant thorn in your side.

It took about twenty minutes to reach the thankfully still sleeping boys. Wow...they had grown quite a bit. More than a short nap should have! The growth was starting to accelerate. At this rate they wouldn't have to grow much more to be able to protect themselves. You ran up to Kyle and started trying to get his attention. This was getting more and more difficult.
13523221221122211121212.title: Running Out of Time

choices: The boys start to eat again, but it now affects them differently
The boys are hungrier than ever, and devour the entire city!
135232212211222111212121.content:
As you ran up to Kyle, he started to stir. You quickly had to jump out of the way to avoid his right foot as it began to move. It really struck you how insignificant you were as you got closer to the boys; at this point, Kyle's toenail on his smallest toe was wider across than you were tall. You, and the rest of humanity, were basically bugs to these mammoth boys now. Maybe you didn't have to worry so much about protecting them, you thought. At this point, very little on earth could harm them.

As you climbed onto Kyle's foot, he sat up, wiping the sleep from his eyes. He moved his foot, to him a slight movement but to you a huge jolt, and you grabbed on to the skin around his toenail to stay balanced. You looked up at your little brother's face rising high in the sky above your surroundings. It really was a majestic, if terrifying, sight, when you thought about it. He stretched his arms high into the air, and then rubbed his bare chest with his hand, still waking up.

Waving your arms, you jumped up and down, trying to get him to look down. It had no effect, he looked around, seeing the other boys were also waking up. You thought of how you could get his attention now, as you were pretty sure he couldn't hear you from down here. Remembering how ticklish Kyle was on his feet, you decided to try to rub his toe as fast as you could, hoping that, as sensitive as his feet were, he would notice.

After a few seconds, Kyle's toe began to flinch, and he looked down. He reached down towards his foot and curled his index finger and thumb, then let it fly towards you. He was trying to flick you away! He must have thought you were a bug! You stopped rubbing and tried to take cover, but his massive finger made contact with you. Luckily, your reflexes were top notch, and you clung to his finger nail, flying through the air with it.

Kyle noticed that the speck was now on his hand, and he brought it up to his face. After looking at you for a few seconds, he furrowed his brow, and said, "Big Bro? Is that you?" His voice was booming, like the sound of five incredibly loud rock concerts, and the vibrations alone nearly knocked you over.

You vigorously nod and shout out, "Yes! Kyle, can you hear me?"

"Barely," he said. He brought his hand up to his ear. "Here, speak now."

You lean in close to the cavern in front of you and shout out, "Kyle, listen carefully. I just came back from the lab you visited the other day, and now I know why you guys are growing! There was an experiment you were accidentally taken to, and now it's causing you to grow every time you eat!"

Kyle chuckled. "Well, duh, big bro. I think we had figured that out already."

You shake your head in slight annoyance and continue. "The scientist there says there's no way to stop it now, and they're going to try to kill you! But I won't let them!"

Kyle smirked, chuckling again. "Kill us? At this point, I think anything they do to us will just be a scratch."

"Maybe," you said, "but just to be safe, I think you all should try to grow a little more. The bigger you are, the harder it will be for them to take you down."

Kyle's eyes lit up at this idea, and he stood up, turning to face the other boys, all of whom now were awake and stretching. "Hey, guys, listen up! My big bro says that some guys are gonna try to kill us, so we need to keep growing bigger!"

Larry sneered as he stood up. The tallest of the four boys, he was bigger than any skyscraper in the city. You were nervous that a boy with his attitude towards you had so much power, and you shied away, trying to stay hidden from his sight.

"I'd like to see them try!" he said. "Anyone tries to hurt us, I'll squash them to smithereens!"

"But," John said, "What if they use nukes on us or something? I don't know if we'd be able to stand up to that."

"Let's do it!" Brett said, putting his arms around Kyle and John. "Let's grow so much that they'll never be able to take us down!"

The boys all nodded approvingly, and Kyle brought his hand up to his face, which was now beaming with pride. "Thanks for the heads up, Big Bro," he said.

He brought his hand up to the top of his head, and you jumped off, grabbing a strand of hair which was now thick as a rope to you. You positioned yourself to where you were at the apex of his head, and looked down. It was amazing being up so high, like on top of a moving building that was alive! You grabbed ahold as the boys began to get going.
135232212211222111212121.title: The boys wake up and you explain the situation,...

1352322122112221112121211.title: How did it affect the hungry boys now?

choices: You can't sleep. You decide to explore Kyle's body.
1352322122112221112121212.content:
The boys, this time even without the ferocious hunger pains to drive them, began to devour the city once again. As they had slept, mass evacuation had begun, causing most of the city to be properly evacuated, though some people noticed that the boys were eating cars and had abandoned them, deciding it was better to make a slow, but safe retreat. Even so, with the boys being so huge, unable to see inside the buildings as they ate huge chunks out of them, many people would inevitably be eaten. You knew this to be true but pushed the thought out of your mind. Your biggest priority was helping to keep Kyle safe and to make sure he'd be safe he had to be huge. He was already mind bogglingly enormous and after eating again and sleeping through the night, which wasn't far off either, he would no doubt be sufficiently huge enough to be safe. The rate of growth was increasing...the boys were eating more and more with every hunger attack...and every night the growth was at its fastest and most intense...you shudder a little. It was almost incomprehensible. There was nothing to do but sit back and watch as your brother transformed into a human of unparalleled size and power. Heck, with mere humans bugs at his toes (you laughed a little as you realized you wouldn't even be a bug to him tomorrow but something even more insignificant) you shouldn't even be using the term "human" to describe him. But none of that mattered anymore. No matter what he became, Kyle was still Kyle, your darling little brother, and you would do whatever it took to keep him safe and happy. Still...a new age was approaching.

A thunderous rumbling sound rang throughout the area as you thought this, a nice touch to your somewhat ominous thoughts, but you knew it wasn't thunder. The hunger was back and, judging by the looks on the other boy's faces and the vibrations you could feel running through Kyle's body, it was even more intense then before. The boys all moaned and groaned, holding their aching bellies before tearing into the city with new vigor.

Larry instantly moved to the traffic blockade, where those who had foolishly attempted to evacuate in their vehicles were now being picked up by the handful and tossed into Larry's huge maw. He chewed them up like so much popcorn, swallowing metal, leather, and human flesh alike, although he tasted none of it. He grabbed a few more handfuls before getting fed up and dropping to his stomach, laying on his belly. The rumblings from within caused the ground to quake, knocking people to the ground as they ran. Sticking out his tongue, Larry ran it over the cars and ground, his saliva allowing the morsels to stick to it, the tongue retracting back inside his mouth to easily devour the cars. Larry crawled along the ground, licking up all the cars that were in his sight, the occasional fleeing person getting caught to the slimy pink muscle along with the vehicles.

As Larry ate the cars (and when they had run out he started slurping up the roads like spaghetti), Brett was focusing on the suburbs. Four houses here had already been eaten down to the very foundations (the four boys' houses of course) but there was still a smorgasbord to be had among the one and two story houses packed together like sardines on the outskirts of the city. Each house was about the size of an average hand fruit and was easily gone in two or three big bites. Brett sat down within easy reach of most of the houses and started grabbing, both hands grabbing. Whenever one had was empty, he started eating from the other hand while the empty hand grabbed another house. He was constantly moving, constantly eating. When he couldn't reach anymore houses from where he was sitting, he got up and moved to a new spot, eating all the houses there as well.

Back in the city, John was eating all the business fronts. Department stores, grocery stores, appliance stores, car dealerships, abandoned buildings, all disappeared into his hungry gut. He had figured that eating these places would be the most satisfying, considering that they were stuffed full of things to sell. It was like eating a candy that had a chocolate and caramel center. Sweet candy shell, plus a gooey center. It was just in this case, the gooey center was actually thousands of pieces of merchandise. John was very meticulous on how he ate, not like the other boys who just stuffed their faces like animals. He preferred to eat things at a slower pace, catching the "crumbs" and licking them up when he was done with the main course. His mother had been strict when teaching him manners.

Lastly, Kyle was left with the skyscrapers. None of the once impressive structures were very intimidating anymore, with Kyle equaling, surpassing, and just falling short of most of them. He tore into them with vigor, steadying the buildings with his hands as he ate the top floors, the bottom ones usually crumbling into rubble before he could get to them. When that happened, he merely ate up the debris and wreckage, licking the dust off his fingers as he did so. This was his method as he moved through the crowded downtown streets, crushing random vehicles under his gigantic feet. He barely even noticed.

You watched all this as it continued for the better part of an hour, a horrified look on your face. It was gone...all of it, gone! There wasn't a single brick that remained of the once proud city. Your hometown was now digesting inside of your brother's and his friends' bellies. They all sat in a group, rubbing their stomachs and sighing happily. The hunger had been assuaged again. But..now they were eating entire cities! Your city wasn't a huge sprawling metropolis like New York or anything but still! You knew things were getting serious but this...well, you'd better get used to it.

The boys all started yawning at this moment and you felt your hear beat a little faster. The sun was setting and night was falling. You knew what was going to happen next. Kyle fished you out of his hair and brought you in front of his face. "I'm sleepy big bro...is it bedtime?"

He brought you over to his ear and you shouted, "Yup! Time for bed!"

Kyle nodded and picked you back up and laid down, resting on his back. He looked around and dropped you on his chest before putting his arms behind his head and falling asleep. The other boys did the same, too tired to do much but lay down and fall asleep. You curled up on your brother's massive chest, closing your eyes. The snores of the massive boys filled the air, your body rising and falling with every one of Kyle's breaths. It was a strange sleeping arrangement to say the least.
1352322122112221112121212.title: Once a City, now a Snack

choices: They were still the same size as last night-- they hadn't grown
They had gotten up earlier and had moved on to start devouring the next cities
13523221221122211121212121.content:
The next morning you woke up, yawned, and stretched. As you did so, you looked around. You didn't see anything recognizable around you, just a massive stretch of pink, fleshy ground. Just over the horizon, you saw what looked like a small mountain, rising out of the ground towards the sky. Looking behind you, you could see what looked like an identical mountain about the same distance in the other direction. It took you just a moment to figure out what was going on: you were sitting on Kyle's chest, in between his now-mountainous nipples. Your brother had grown again, even more incredibly huge than you had even thought possible. Before, his height was measured in hundreds of feet. Now it would need to be measured in miles.

You quickly realized that there would be no way Kyle would be able to see you or hear you at this size; it would be like trying to communicate with a virus or bacterium. At this point, you and the rest of humanity would just be along for the ride.

Kyle woke up a few minutes after you did. He quickly sat up, smacked his lips, and began scratching his chest. His fingers passed by you, just the force of them moving sending you flying. You quickly dug your fingers into the ground - or rather, Kyle's skin - hanging on for dear life.

Kyle looked around him. His legs were tangled up with Brett's; he figured that they had "grown together" during the night, so to speak. The movement of Kyle's legs caused Brett to stir, and he soon woke up as well.

"Ugh... Good morning, Kyle," Brett said as he sat up slowly, noticing his friend next to him. He looked down at the ground, which seemed incredibly flat, moreso than before. "Where are we?" Brett asked.

"I don't know," Kyle responded. Then, he noticed that, between his legs, the remains of the city were smoldering. It was incredible; the entire city, which only yesterday had taken the four of them several hours to devour, now entirely fit between his thighs. He could make out the remains of some of the larger buildings, no bigger than his pinky toenail. "I think we're in the same place as before," he said, "just a lot bigger."

"Wow," Brett said as he leaned over above Kyle's lap, examining the city ruins. Kyle couldn't help but feel a little awkward as he did; he was sitting here naked, and another boy, albeit one of his best friends, had his head hovering near his private area. He didn't know quite what to make of it, and he felt a strange new feeling.

It went away as soon as it came, however, as Brett stood up, reaching out to help Kyle up. The two of them glanced at their surrounding area and realized something was amiss. "Hey," Kyle said, "Where's my Big Bro."

"He's probably too tiny for us to see," Brett answered, "but I think we've got another problem. Where's John and Larry?"

"I don't know," Kyle said. "Weren't they right next to us?" He pointed to where the other two boys had lay down the night before. "Where could they have gone to?"

It only took a few seconds until they had their answer.

1352322122112221112121212111.content:
You hear an incredible rumbling, louder than anything you imagine. Kyle and Brett rub their rounded stomachs and look at each other and then for food. You're glad to have found refuge in your brothers bellybutton, glad that his belly has become rounder.

"What do we eat?" Questioned Kyle.

"I don't know," Kyle said, "but we gotta find something fast, this hunger hurts so badly."

-RUMBLE-

They begin searching for something to eat. Happening upon small clusters of trees, they are quickly plucked by the handful from the ground and devoured, squirrels, birds, and other animals are devoured as well.

"This isn't enough," complains Brett.

"Look!," shouts Kyle excitedly, "is that a city?"

"Yeah!, maybe they can give us some food."

Kyle walks over to the city and notices it's barely bigger than his foot, like his hometown. "I don't think they have enough food for us," he says. He reaches down and scoops up half the city. Faint screams can be heard.

"W-what are you doing Kyle?! Those are people!'' exclaims Brett.

"Eating, it's not like they are big enough to do anything, and I'm pretty sure we ate some people before." Kyle said as he placed the half of city in his mouth and swallowed. From your position in his navel you could hear the screams cut off and some quiet rumbling from in your brother.

"Yeah..bbut," Brett begins.

"Hey dude," says Kyle'with a full mouth, "I'm starving. I'll eat if you don't want to."

He reaches down and picks up the other half of the city. You see it as he brings it past his stomach, streets and buildings filled with people. You feel nauseas, this is partly your fault. Before it goes in his mouth, a few people fall from the city, landing on the top of his stomach, jutting out slightly from his ravenous binging.

"Bon apetite," Kyle giggles as he places the remains of the city, giving a quick chew before swallowing. Brett stares in disbelief, slightly regretting his missed chance. Kyle gives a large sigh.

"BRRRAP," Kyle belches loudly. His hands go down to his belly, knocking off the few stragglers, he can barely sees. He gives his stomach a rub and a pat, causing the thin layer of fat to vibrate a little.

"That hit the spot."

"Kyle, what happened?!" Brett asked worriedly.

"Huh?" Kyle noticed he was about a head taller than Brett.

"You snooze you lose!" Kyle laughs which quickly turns into a yawn. He opens his mouth wide and stretches his arms impossibly high, arching his back in a full body stretch. A jet plane, unnoticed to Kyle, flies into his mouth and is swallowed, the passengers screaming.

"I'm going to take a nap, " Kyle tells Brett. He curls up and falls asleep, crushing some trees and road under his body.

"Kyle what are doing" Brett asked? Kyle took the city out of his mouth. " I'm eating this city" he grinned. " Don;t you feel bad about all the people in it'
"nope I'm bigger the big eat the small it's the circle of life"

13523221221122211121212121112.content:
Brett retraces his steps, looking for John and Larry. He finally spots them, and notices something weird. He is the same height as them.

"Did they catch up?" He wonders.

He looks around and realizes much of the world is looking bigger. He and they must be shrinking.

"John. Larry. Wake up!" shouts Brett.

"Yeah, huh?" John and Larry question, rubbing their sleepy eyes.

"You guys!" he shouted excitedly. "When Kyle and I woke up, we were both at least 5 times bigger than you--"

"You don't look bigger." scoffed Larry, who in the same scale was taller than Brett.

"Yeah I think we all started shrinking. Anyway, we went off to find some food. And then Kyle just ripped up an entire city and ate it, people and all!"

"So?" questioned Larry, "We all ate people yesterday." He mindlessly rubbed his stomach.

"He was big enough to eat an entire city??" exclaimed John.

"Yes, John. But I shrunk, and I think you and Larry have shrunk too--"

"Ah man," said Larry.

"So, it's possible that Kyle is shrinking too, although he grew some more today" continued Brett. "Larry, Kyle just ripped up the entire city, he barely gave any thought to the people."

They all heard the ground rumble. It was Kyle walking toward them. He had indeed shrunk down some too, not being as large as Brett remembered.

"Hey shrimps" Kyle said jokinly, noting that his friends came up to about his belly button.

"Hey Kyle," they all said.

"This isn't fair, why do you get to be the biggest?!" whined Larry.

"Where's your brother?" asked John.

Kyle ignored Larry. "I'm not sure," Kyle said worriedly ..."I hope he's okay."

I realized that they had shrunk and could probably see me now.

KYLE!! KYLE!" I screamed, from his belly button.

Kyle looked down at his rounded gut. "Brother?! Is that you?? Climb out on to my hand." He placed his hand down on his belly near me. I crawled out.

He brought me up to his face. "Hey big--Hey Bro"

I was a little bigger than a pea to him. But that was okay, he seemed to be shrinking and he could hear me. I guessed that put him at about 700 feet tall and his friends at about 350.

"Hey Kyle, glad to see you smaller," I chuckled. "Do you know you guy shrunk?"

Just then, a car pulled up near John's feet.
13523221221122211121212121112.title: Brett goes back to John and Larry

135232212211222111212121211121.content:
Out stepped the man from the lab.

"Kyle, put me down, please."

He set me down.

I walked over to the man.

"Last night as they slept, I injected them all with an antidote. The two smaller one's were injected fast, the bigger two had more time to grow as i made my way to them. But they all should return to normal and--"

"Why is my brother still twice the size?!" I asked.

"Well if he ate anything, it would negate the antidote, since he would grow and then there would be a smaller ratio of antidote to body mass."

"So what does this mean, can you give him more? And what about Brett, he ate some too?"

"Well from what appears, Brett did not eat as much as Kyle, so his body wasn't negated in the same way. It's possible that he might be a little taller in the end, but he should fit into society perfectl--"

"And what about Kyle?" I asked, beginning to lose my patients.

"Well it would be too dangerous to give him more antidote, and besides, the laboratory was destroyed, all the formulae and equations, the machines required to synthesize the materials are gone. So he is going to remain pretty large."

"WHAT?!" I screamed, angry at his calm tone.

"I'm sorry, there's nothing we can do"

I was so frustrated. "Okay, we will see I guess...Also, don't mention to them that eating will negate the effects. They, especially that Larry, will try to stay big." I warned.

He nodded.


*Some time passes*

Kyle had picked me up again and I listened as he and his friends talked. Brett Larry and John were all about 40 feet now, thankfully. Kyle, however, had seemed to stop shrinking at 400 feet.

It had been hard to convince them all not to eat, but it seemed like their never ending hunger had ended.
135232212211222111212121211121.title: Antidote

1352322122112221112121212111211.content:
Brett, Larry, and John had all returned to their regular heights. Well, Brett was now an inch taller than Larry, but it could pass for normal. I had called their parents, who were all luckily commuters that had all been away from our city. They came and picked them up with clothes and drove off.

Kyle was still 400 feet. His face looked a little sad.

"Big bro, all my friends are normal now, it's not fun being a freak alone." he sniffled.

It's okay Kyle," I tried to comfort him, "You're not a freak," I patted his hand. I was sitting in his palm which was about 4 times long as I was tall.

I asked Kyle to set me down.

"Is this it?" I asked the scientist.

"It appears your brother will stay this way, unless we take some very big risks, risks I doubt you'll take, since you pretty much told him to kill hundreds of people..."

I was dismayed. Then we both heard a rumble.

"Big Brother. I'm hungry." said Kyle rubbing his stomach. His stomach was still rounded, with a thin layer of fat, probably from all o his gorging. Before either of us could say anything,Kyle picked up the scientists car, threw it in his mouth, chewed it. We heard the glass and plastic crunch and shatter, the metal bend and the tires pop. Kyle didn't seem to notice any of it as he swallowed it with a slurp. He let out a small belch.

I could tell that wasn't very much at his size, but he looked content.

"My CAR?!!! MY CAR!!" I was happy to see the scientist lose his cool. I guess he was spooked and started to run away.
"WAIT!" I yelled after him. "WE STILL NEED YOUR HELP--"

"YOU AND THE FREAK ARE ON YOUR OWN" he screamed back as he ran.

I worriedly looked up at Kyle, knowing how much he hated being a "freak". I was surprised to see him smirking.

"That man was annoying big bro, I'm glad he's gone...but Big Bro, I'm still really hungry, can we get something to eat."

You had no idea what to do. The problem had been reduced substantially, but, this could go bad again.
1352322122112221112121212111211.title: A "small" Problem

13523221221122211121212121112111.content:
"Well, I dunno Kyle," you said tentatively, knowing he would need to eat sometime. "I guess we can."

You directed him to a new, since nothing was left of yours. You directed him to the dump. He walked carefully, but many civilians on the ground had to be careful and make drastic moves to avoid getting hurt.

"Kyle, be careful!" you shrieked a few times, sitting on his shoulder.

You made it the wreck yard without hurting anyone. Kyle's stomach rumbled one more time before he began eating. He ate. And ate. And ate. Cars, vans, trucks, construction equipment, some old metal storage containers all made their way into his stomach. He even ate the management building. Everything was systematically thrown into his mouth chewed quickly, accompanied by the sound of grinding flailing metal, shattering glass, and crumbling plastic, and then swallowed.

Kyle sat up and gave a long, loud belch. Windows shattered and people screamed.

"Ugh big bro, I think I ate too much, but I feel better"

You noticed that he put away about 100 cars, less than what he ate before at this size, and that his belly looked like he had eaten that much. Believing this to be a sign that his food was not being instantly converted into growth energy, you sighed with relief.

Your brother yawned. " Let's go find some place to sleep," he said. I'm always tired after a big meal." He stated patting his largely disintended belly, sticking out farther that you were tall. The pats gave off a loud slapping sound that echoed inside of him and through the nearby neighbor hoods.

He got up and started walking. Being 400 feet tall, he was about head taller than most of the buildings in the current city. He was more careful with his walking now, but wasn't really aware of the size of his belly. A few times it brushed against, or pressed into the sides of some buildings and shattered many windows and disrupted a few offices and apartments.

Kyle came upon a baseball field, that ended in a huge field. He yawned again, laid down, curled up, and fell asleep.

You pulled out your phone to call your parents.

His stomach digesting the cars and buildings he had eaten earlier. There was a small rumble as he burped in his sleep. Eyes closing as sleep slowly took over. Was he dead checking and finding a pulse. So what was the scientist planning. If the needle had contained a shrinking serum he would have shrunk, but he passed out. That meant he was trying to make sure Kyle didn't wake up. Going to the car you saw some files in the back. Quickly flipping through them you discovered that they were going to drug then kill Kyle. Finding another needle and file, you read through it as well. It said that they planned on killing the giant boy, but even if failing to inject the boy with the serum, he would still die unless given the antidote for the previous injection. Then that would cancel out the suppressed growth. dragging the scientist into the car. You climbed back up on Kyle and fell asleep.
