"Good, now concentrate on your hand and imagine an orb of fire appearing in it." "An orb of fire?", Nick responded inquisitively. "Yes, an orb of fire." Shrugging, Nick closed his eyes and concentrated. He imagined an orb of fire appearing in his hand, concentrating on the image until he felt a little click in his head. Puzzled he opened his eyes just in time for the magic to start. A tiny orb of fire, barely big enough to see, appeared in his hand before expanding to the size of a baseball relative to him. "Woah, that's awesome!", Nick exclaimed, marveling at the swirling ball of fire. "Good job Nick. I have given you the power of fire, you can now create almost anything fire related, balls of fire, beams of fire, and you can even heat up your body", explained the voice,"I also give you control of your growth, you may now grow miles tall, or back down to your original height. For now I leave your growth as it was earlier." "Wow, thanks Byzarred! I just have one thing to ask before you go", said Nick. "What might that be child?", replied the voice. "I'm going to destroy this town a little more, but I don't want to destroy it completely. Can you allow that pleeeaaaasssee?" As if thinking, the voice was silent for a moment before replying,"That will work, I will leave you to it", and the voice's presence left. "Thank's Byzarred!", Nick yelled to the sky. Looking back down to the ground, Nick put on a sinister smile and scanned the city at his feet. Continuing to grow, Nick said under his breath,"Time for some destruction!"
1352322222222222122.title: MUCH taller than before.

13523222222222221221.content:
indent}The people of the city watched in horror and fascination as the boy waltzed through the city, a cloud of dust following him wherever he went. From this view, he was a couple miles away and had already seemed to have gone past them. While still terrifying to the people on the streets below, there was little sense of urgency to leave, as he seemed to be concentrating on the tallest buildings in the city. Then, he stopped. For a couple agonizing minutes, he seemed to be talking to someone although nothing was present besides his skyscraper sized body. Then people saw it. A ball of fire some 30 feet in diameter appeared in his hand. Finishing his mysterious talk, he turned and looked at the tallest building in the city. Standing at a little over 700 feet tall, it was almost the exact same height as the boy, a fact that seemed to annoy him greatly. Scrunching his face in annoyance his voice suddenly boomed,"YOU NEED TO BE CUT DOWN TO SIZE!" Tossing the ball of fire into the air for a moment, he caught it and the drew his arm backwards in preparation for the worlds biggest baseball pitch. His arm whipped forward with mind-boggling force as his entire body leaned forward onto his left leg. His fit body kept its balance as his right leg swung up into the air, kicking debris high into the air as it lifted off the ground. The ball of fire hurtled towards the skyscraper, breaking the sound barrier and shattering windows 2 or 3 blocks away from its path. Impacting the skyscraper, it exploded in a blinding flash, completely destroying the top half and shattering windows across the city from the noise. The bottom half of the building that hadn't been destroyed still wasn't perfect. The top floors had ballooned outwards like a used firecracker, giving it an almost comical appearance. What the people on the streets couldn't see from their perspective was that the building had actually been completely gutted, with not a single floor left inside the building. Suddenly realizing that they were no longer safe at a distance, all out panic broke out across the city as sections that had once believed themselves to be safe realized that was no longer the case.

         "WOW, that was cool!", Nick exclaimed. He watched in fascination as pieces of steel the size of small homes rained down on the city, crashing into buildings like aerial bombs. Clapping his hands together to get off the dust, he stepped out of the pile rubble and back onto the street. "Looks like I destroyed the pitchers mound", he giggled, noticing the steel and concrete he'd mangled under his feet. "I wonder what it looks like up close?", he wondered out loud,"I guess I'll just have to find out!" Stepping forwards, he began to walk towards the ruins of the building. A great thooming noise echoed throughout the city as he got on the move again, his steps sending tremors throughout the city. Walking onto a wider street, he was relieved and disappointed that he'd no longer have to force his way past the buildings. Hitting 800 feet tall, his tread simultaneously grew to nearly a 125 feet long and he took great pleasure in planting it on top of cars, news stands and anything else out in the open. The road made a pleasurable crunch under every step and he even added a bit of a stomp to each footfall. Yes it was taking a bit longer to get to the skyscraper, but why did he care? Noticing a row of apartments blocking his path, he snorted as he realized the 25 story structures barely came up to his knees. "I'm not taking any detours so you guys better be ready", he laughed. Not bothering to break his stride, Nick simply plowed his right shin through the first building, taking out the adjacent building with his left.

         Stepping onto the street behind the buildings, Nick noticed something different as his feet landed, a wet meaty feeling that accompanied the crunch of the asphalt. Puzzled he lifted his foot up and giggled at what he saw. Covering his foot were dozens upon dozens of red splotches, the clear remains of a crowd of people that hadn't moved out of the way. Setting his foot down with another wet crunch, a fresh chorus of screams erupted from the ground below and he looked down to find the ground in complete chaos. People darted left and right, knocking each other over in a vain attempt to escape their impending doom. Giggling, he remarked,"I said I was coming through can't you guys hear me?". Shrugging, he looked around to get a sense of where he was. His face could only scrunch in annoyance as he realized the direction of the buildings had changed. Now instead of running east and west to give him a clear shot, the buildings had started running north and south, forming easy to destroy but annoying barriers. "I don't have time for this, I'm try to leave this stupid city!", he bellowed, "I'll just have to clear my own path!"

         Planting his left foot with a 'CRUNCH!" on the rubble from the buildings he'd just knocked over, he put himself in a braced stance. Then, he grabbed his right wrist, extending his arms out in front of him with his right palm open. Finally, he closed his eyes and breathed in deeply. Rubble around him seemed to levitate off the ground, and the air around him seemed to be charged with pure energy. In his mind, he imagined it just like he'd seen in the superhero movies. A giant beam of fire and energy erupting from his hand that smashed into the ground in a great explosion, all the while melting anything in its path. Opening his eyes just in time, he got to see his first beam of fire. An electrical roar filled the air and a blinding light illuminated anything underneath the blue tinted beam of fire. Smashing into the ground just in front of the skyscraper, it immediately vaporized the buildings it touched, creating a great explosion wherever it ended. Sweeping it back towards himself, Nick vaporized row after row of buildings, leaving a trench 100 feet wide as the explosion at the end of the beam created an even wider swath of destruction. Just as the beam touched the building directly in front of him, Nick turned off the beam and marveled at his handy work. The heat generated from the beam had melted the ground itself, leaving the inside of the trench with glowing cracks of earth as heat waves filled the air around it. Any parts of the buildings that had touched the beam had been cleanly sliced off, leaving a glowing stump of superstructure. Hesitantly he lifted his foot and held his toes just a few inches off the floor of the trench, scared that the magma like surface would burn him. Instead of feeling the searing heat that was clearly wafting its way out of the trench he felt a pleasant warmth and he gingerly set his foot down. Realizing that the heat wouldn't harm him, he stepped forward completely, sauntering down his newly formed highway.

         After a long and playful journey, he arrived at the ruins of the skyscraper, ready to make a true show of his new powers. Studying the twisted remains, he marveled at the hollow shell, a true testament to his new powers. Now touching a little over 900 feet tall, he lifted his 150 foot long tread high into the air, making his thigh parallel to the ground. Then a great rumbling began to shake the city. It was like an earthquake was shaking the city as people fell over, car alarms rang out, and some of the weaker buildings collapsed into heaps of rubble. All eyes in the city were on Nick as the city let out a collective gasp of astonishment. Still holding his foot above the ground, Nick was growing at a ludicrous rate hitting 1200 feet in a matter of seconds, the 350 foot tall ruins of the building now below his knees. But he didn't stop there, he hit 1400 feet, 1600 feet, and even 1800 feet tall before stopping at a mind boggling 2000 feet tall. Nick smiled at the puny ruins of the building, now only half way up his shins. Then the bottom of his foot began to heat up, REALLY heat up. Anyone who'd been standing beneath him, would've have noticed the air distorting around his foot as the temperature of his tread rose until it could set trees alight from a hundred feet away. Then with a deafening roar as he brought his football field sized foot down on the building, its metal skeleton bending like wax as it put up no resistance to his stomp. Landing with a booming thud, his foot crushed the steel into the ground, going deeper and deeper until the tops of his toes were level with the ground. A scalding wind, accompanied his stomp, rushing its way through the city, singing the lawn around the base of the building. But rather than lift his foot up, Nick simply held it there, watching as the trees in the building's garden burst into flames. The earth and steel began to melt into a soup as Nick's foot continued to generate heat, Nick waiting until he could see a glowing ring of magma outlining his foot before stopping the heat. As the magma began to cool and the red ring began to disappear, Nick finally lifted his foot up pleased with his work. A perfect footprint had been melted into the earth, the steel skeleton having mixed into the earth as it melted. Heat waves hot enough to scald a person from 50 feet away rose from the footprint, proving just how hot the earth had gotten.

(Sorry for so many "Continue..." options, I didn't realize I'd run out of room.
13523222222222221221.title: Continue...

choices: Eastern Seaboard and its dense cities.
West Coast and its cool ocean waves.
135232222222222212211.content:
Stepping back from the footprint, Nick turned South and after letting his foot cool down a bit, stomped his way out of the city. Unlike earlier, Nick actually took a little bit of "care" as he walked out, trying his best to avoid knocking over some of the more intact buildings and even tiptoeing through some of the more residential districts. While is football field sized feet and 2000 foot tall form caused some damage of course, it was relatively mild by comparison to earlier. Reaching the city limits, Nick finally let out a sigh of relief as he planted his feet rather carelessly on a wheat field. But, Nick still had one last thing to do before he left. Taking in a deep breath Nick once again began to grow, the earth quaking beneath him like jello. Nick soared into the skies not wanting to stop until the clouds were far beneath him, his height starting to be measured in miles as he grew. By the time he stopped, he was 10 miles tall, the clouds starting just above his ankles. Pointing his finger at the ground, he made a much more "precise" beam of fire, and began to drag it slowly in a circle, creating a deep canyon that encompassed the entire city. Any roads that led out of Nick's hometown suddenly found themselves severed by a blue beam of fire 400 feet in diameter. When he was done, a trench 500 feet deep surrounded the entire city plus a few fields and suburbs in a giant ring, still glowing red from the heat.

         "Attention people of my home town and probably people of the world.", he boomed, "Anyone inside this ring is safe from further destruction at my hands. If you should happen to live outside this ring, well...", he let out a giggle, "good luck getting in, that trench is probably pretty deep to you little people. If you live outside of here, this is coming for you". Wanting to make a point to the world he spotted a tiny farming town and moved his foot over it, hovering it just a few hundred feet over the town. The town was barely two miles long, and perhaps a mile wide including its furthest extremities, with a no more than 1,500 people living in it. Unfortunately for the town, it was just the right size for his mile and a half long foot. Wiggling his toes, he created a breeze that wafted gently through the streets. All eyes in town and millions more around the world watched through news broadcasts covering his rampage from miles away, his 10 mile form allowing him to be easily seen. Then without warning, he stomped his foot down onto the town, instantaneously covering the town center and all but a couple houses on the edges. Unbeknownst to Nick however, the shock wave from his stomp flattened the town immediately, knocking over houses as much as half a mile away. Nick had a point to make however, and he moved his foot around until the area that had once been a town was nothing more than brown dirt. Planting his foot into the ground to make one final point, he pressed into it with all his weight to create a deep footprint and even deeper cracks in the earth. Giving a two-fingered salute/wave to his home town he yelled out a cheerful,"Later!" and shrunk down to a much more "reasonable" two miles tall. From there he headed towards the...
135232222222222212211.title: Continue...

choices: Move on, there'll be better meals shortly...
1352322222222222122111.content:
The farmer leaned on the truck fender, quietly enjoying his ham sandwich. It was around noontime in Indiana, and a nice breeze was making its way though the lush corn fields. The window to an older truck was down and the radio was piping out a nice country song. Suddenly, the music stopped and was replaced by an blaring alarm, startling the farmer and causing him to drop his ham sandwich. Annoyed by the alarm, he reached in through the window and attempted to tune to another channel, finding to his surprise that all his radio channels were filled with the blaring tone. "Weird, I've never seen them fill all the channels at once.", he remarked. A mechanical voice droned on about a tornado warning in a number of counties and encouraged everyone in them to seek shelter. Looking at the sky, the farmer's annoyance grew as he saw that the sky was dotted with white puffy clouds that still let the sun shine. "You guys, don't know what you're talking about", he muttered and he hopped into the truck, turning off the radio as he started the engine. Making his way carefully out of the cornfield, he turned onto an auxiliary road and began to meander South at a slow pace. As he drove, he couldn't help but notice a periodic shuddering making its way through the truck, shaking his mirrors and causing his steering to drift a little bit. "Darn thing, looks like I'm gonna have to take it in soon", he muttered. Hoping to subside the vibrations, he slowed down only to find the them getting worse. "What in the devil is up with this thing?", he yelled. Pulling over, he turned off the engine and made a disturbing discovery, the shuddering wasn't coming from the truck.

         Looking out the right window, he gasped in shock. Two legs, each a mile long were slowly making their way towards him. Thanks to the thick clouds he was unable to see the rest of the figure as they blocked everything above the figures thighs. Restarting the engine, the farmer turned around and began barreling down the road, desperately racing north towards the farm house. The gravel road seemed to be shaking the teeth out of the farmers head as he bounced down the road, but the fact that he could still feel the vibrations from the figures massive footfalls drove him onward. Suddenly a deafening voice carried its way across the plains, forcing the farmer to cover his ears to avoid damaging his already poor hearing. "GAH! Stupid clouds, I need to see where I'm going!", boomed the voice. Looking out the driver's window, the farmer's jaw dropped as a cruise ship sized hand cut through the clouds. The clouds dissipated and the farmer looked up to see the face and body of a 10 year old boy wearing nothing but a pair of blue underwear. "Could've at least put on some clothes...", he grumbled. Arriving at the farmhouse, the farmer slid to a stop before leaping out of the truck and dashing inside. The vibrations from the boys footfalls were already shaking the plates off the shelves despite being more than 50 miles away as the farmer raced to collect any valuables he could find. Rushing outside with his arms full of pictures, plates, and various other valuables, he sprinted towards the entrance to his tornado shelter. Flinging open the door, he deposited his armful onto a table and ran back into the house grabbing a couple more pictures before racing back to the shelter. The corn fields around him were swaying violently as the air disturbed by the boys footfalls cut through them. The boy was traveling a little under a mile with each step and as a result was almost on top of him! As he dashed back to the shelter of the boys meaty soles landed with a shrieking roar at an intersection a couple miles away, his next step WOULD land on him! Stumbling from the powerful blast on wind, the farmer staggered into the shelter and shut the door, planting a sturdy timber across it. Rushing away from the door, the farmer quickly descended the flight of stairs and cowered in a corner furthest from the door. Then, he heard it. An unearthly roar filled the air and made its way through the concrete wall of the shelter. Suddenly a tremendous "BOOM", resounded outside as the shelter imploded and fell in on itself.

         Opening his eyes, the farmer realized that he was not in fact dead and was staring at the open sky, a beam having fallen in front of him at the last moment. Climbing out of the rubble, he observed the carnage for himself. The boys foot hadn't landed on top of the farmhouse as he'd feared but had instead landed squarely in the field on the opposite side of the road. The aerial shockwave had flattened the farmhouse while a shockwave traveling through the ground had cracked and buckled the ground, destroying the foundation. Any other buildings and vehicles had suffered the same fate, creating a moon like landscape with little evidence of anyone ever living there. The farmer could only stare in shock at the boy's titanic soles slowly as they slowly moved away from the farmer, headed eastward towards the ocean.

...

         Nick hummed a happy tune as he stomped his way across Indiana, looking down once in a while to marvel at the destruction his steps were causing. Judging from the sun, he guessed that it was around 1:00 in the afternoon. Along the way, he'd stopped plenty of times in order to toy with small towns, chase small cars with his toes, or in general mess around. In reality, he could've been at the ocean by now. Suddenly he felt it, a great rumbling in his stomach, the shook the ground for miles around. "Whoops, looks like its time for lunch", he remarked. Stopping for a moment he surveyed his surroundings, using his superhuman eyesight to scan the ground for miles around him. Then he spotted it, the outlines of skyscrapers in the distance, along with a conveniently placed freeway to direct him towards the city. Nick, licked his chops in hunger and stared a little bit at the city. Thinking for a moment he decided to....
1352322222222222122111.title: Eastern Seaboard and its dense cities.

choices: In front of a big stadium!
In the middle of an airport!
13523222222222221221111.content:
Two miles up from feet, Nick could still hear and feel his footfalls on the soft earth.
A steady series of booms echoing across the flat landscape of Indiana.
Fields of corn and wheat were instantly wiped out as Nick's massive feet slammed into the earth, clearing acres of crops at a time.
Distracted by a helicopter crashing into his belly, Nick almost walked right past the freeway, only realizing he was on top of it when he felt a "CRUNCH!" under his sensitive soles.

Looking down in bewilderment he giggled as he realized that his 1/4 mile long tread had landed on the freeway, and that he was looking at the path to his lunch. Suddenly his stomach let out another earth shaking rumble as it visibly vibrated.

Planting a hand on his stomach he let out a sigh of relief, realizing that he would've been ravenously hungry had he continued to walk towards the ocean.
Putting on a grin, he cupped his hands and yelled at the city,"Hope you guys are ready! You've got a big order to fill!" Turning to once again face east towards the city, he lifted his foot a little higher than normal and brought it down with extra force. Despite being over 40 miles away, the force of his stomp still shook cars and rattled windows in downtown Indianapolis. Wanting to make it known that he was on his way, Nick continued with this pattern as he followed the freeway, his stomping wiping away great swaths of forest at his feet.

         "THUD!", the windows rattled and coffee cups slid around precariously on their desks. Another "THUD!" and another and another. The entire building was frantically trying to gather papers, hard drives, and any other storage devices as they tried to evacuate.
If you'd looked out the window of the Chase building in downtown Indianapolis, you would have seen an impossibly large boy making his way towards the city. It was ironic that because the boy was so far away that you could see him entirely.

As he made his way closer, his head and chest began to move out of view as they rose up past the top of the windows field of view. Making things worse for the city, clouds had begun to roll in further shrouding the boy in a thick haze.
But suddenly, a great flash of light erupted from the clouds, but it wasn't lightning. A glowing beam of light swept through the clouds vaporizing them from the slightest touch, as an electrical roar filled the air around the city.
When the cloud cover had been completely cleared from the city, it was revealed to the horror of the city that the beam had originated from the boys palm. It was apparent to the city that this boy had godly powers. What puzzled the city the most was why they hadn't received a warning.

No news broadcasts, no radio warnings, nothing. In fact, around the same time that the boy had appeared on the horizon, the internet had stopped working and anything outside of local news broadcasts had stopped playing on the television.
Oh well, with a two mile tall boy about to waltz through the city, few people had any interest in detective work. "Good! I want clear skies when I eat my lunch!", the boy said cheerfully as he saw the results of his cloud clearing operation. To those who hadn't already heard, his intentions had just been made very apparent.

         As Nick approached the suburbs on the outskirts of Indianapolis, he realized that he might actually be too big. He remembered reading in a geography book that the tallest building in Indianapolis was about 800 feet tall.
At two miles tall, even that would be just a crumb to him.
"If I want to get any food out of this city, I might need to be smaller...", he thought. "I think double the size of that stupid building sounds good." As if on queue, he felt a bit dizzy as his body began to descend from the clouds, features on the ground becoming more and more pronounced as he shrunk down to a height of about 1600 feet. Thinking out loud accidentally he smiled and said,"There, that looks a bit better!" Scanning the skyline for a tall spire, he spotted the a building standing above all the rest. Figuring that it must be the building he was thinking of, he turned away from the freeway and began to cut his own path through Indianapolis.

         "FEE FI FO FUM! I SMELL THE BLOOD OF THE LITTLE ONES!", Nick boomed with a giggle. An intersection packed with cars and fleeing people, crushed under one step. An entire row of apartment buildings, just a small annoyance to wade through.

A foolish police officer trying to shoot him, deliberately crushed under his big toe.
Block after block was wiped out as Nick's 1600 foot tall form moved through the city like a tornado, his massive feet finding new and entertaining things to crush.

Unlike what he would have normally done however, Nick didn't spend too much time messing around, after all lunch was waiting. Making his way into the dense downtown, Nick finally stepped over a wall of buildings and into the circular plaza that marked the center of Indianapolis.
Carefully stepping around the pointy spire in the center of the plaza, Nick planted his enormous behind just in front of the monument and crossed his legs into a sitting position. With him now sitting in front of his target building, Nick reached forward and tore off the top 5 floors.

Holding the chunk in his hand, Nick held it up to his mouth and nibbled at one of the corners.
Finding no taste, Nick shrugged and took a huge bite out of the chunk. It was unreal.
The crunch of the concrete combined with the almost chewy steel mixed together with the people inside to create an amazing taste.
Cramming the rest of the chunk into his mouth, Nick tore into the building with new gusto.
Both hands ripped chunk after chunk out of the building as he crammed them into his mouth as fast as he could.
Within just a couple minutes, the once 800 foot tall tower had been eaten down to the foundation, but Nick was still hungry.

Standing up and scanning the plaza, Nick found another appetizing skyscraper (about 500 feet tall) on the opposite corner of the plaza. Plopping down onto his knees in front of it, Nick once again tore into his lunch, ripping apart the new building.
After this second building Nick found himself satisfied in the hunger department and stood up ready for some new fun.
Knowing that all the people in his vicinity had already fled, Nick squatted down on his thighs, tensing them in preparation.
Then with a deafening "WHOOSH!" he leapt into the air, not necessarily caring where he landed or what direction he was going.

Where did he land?
13523222222222221221111.title: Turn the city into lunch!

choices: Grow to a massive height and just fling a asteroid sized fireball at the city...
Try a new power he's been thinking about for a while...
135232222222222212211111.content:
With a deafening "BOOM!" Nick landed in the middle of a parking lot, sending cars somersaulting through the air has he crashed down. Crushing the cars like tiny ants, Nick suddenly asked himself in his head, "Where am I?" Turning around he found himself looking at the top of an enormous stadium. The roof to the stadium was closed and a sly grin appeared on his face as he realized what all the cars in the parking lot meant, it was full. Plunging his hands through the gap in the roof, Nick peeled off the roof doors like it was a can of sardines. Sticking his head in through the hole, Nick found himself staring at the shocked faces of the fans inside the stadium. A deafening silence filled the air, as the tiny people in the stands stared in shock. Annoyed by this, Nick yelled out a, "BOO!" causing a chorus of screams to erupt from the stands. Almost immediately the people began to try and make their way to the exits, causing a panic as people desperately tried to make their through the relatively narrow stairways. Realizing he'd soon loose his audience, Nick stood up and shot a beam of fire from his pointer finger tracing the outside of the stadium. Anyone unfortunate to be outside were instantaneously vaporized as the beam swept along the perimeter, creating a moat 50 feet wide and 50 feet deep around the outside of the stadium, stopping any would-be escapees. Ripping off the rest of the roof like a sheet of paper, Nick's hand reached into the stand and grabbed up a handful of screaming people. Holding the handful high above his head, Nick opened his mouth and stuck out his tongue, dropping people onto his tongue like snowflakes. Retracting his tongue, Nick chewed on the tender morsels, finding that while they weren't as filling, the tiny people tasted even better by themselves. "Its a pity I'm pretty full now", he chuckled, "I'll have to remember this for next time. Unceremoniously dumping the rest of the people into his open mouth, Nick chewed down the rest of his snack, wiping a little driblet of blood from the corner of his mouth when he was done.

         Now ready to deal with the rest of the stadium, he lifted his foot into the air and dangled it high above bleachers. Then, the entire stadium began to rumble. Giving the crowd below an unflinching grin, Nick began to grow, his foot expanding right above their heads. Thanks to the careful placement of his other foot on the opposite side of the road from the stadium, the expanding stomper never touched the brick structure. Higher and higher he stretched, his foot quickly growing to the size of the stadium itself, blocking out the sun, but he still wasn't finished. When he did stop, Nick had grown back to a full 2 miles tall, his 1/4 mile long tread bigger than the stadium and its parking lot combined! Just like he'd done back in his home town, he heated up his foot until it was hot enough to melt steel. Giving a cheerful wave to the stadium below he yelled out a little,"Bye-Bye!" and slammed it down on the stadium with a 'CRASH!', a scalding wind blasting its way through the city. Nick momentarily felt the wet crunch of people under his foot before it all seemed to disappear, burning away as the ground underneath his foot turned to magma. Smoke poured out from the sides of his foot as a glowing red ring of magma and steel outlined his tread, the air distorting as heat poured of his foot.

         With a wet sucking noise, Nick lifted his foot up revealing a quarter mile long footprint, the earth filled with cracks still glowing red with heat. Setting it down on the block next to the stadium, a great hiss erupted from the ground as anything organic vaporized under the heat of his foot and the earth beneath began to liquefy. Lifting and heating up his other foot as well, Nick grinned as he slowly lowered it onto the block just in front of the stadium, letting his heel make contact with the ground first and pivoting it downward. Now confident that his feet had heated up enough, Nick turned East and began to walk slowly across the city, planting his feet right behind one another like he was balancing on a beam. Entire city blocks vanished under his massive treads, the molten earth quickly cooling into a black rock, leaving perfect footprints in his wake. When he hit one of the freeways that encircled the downtown area, he turned north, making sure to walk directly on top of it and the many cars trying to use it as an escape route. Using the freeways and the river as a guide, Nick walked in a circle around the edge of downtown, leaving a ring of hardened footprints around the entire area. Having completed this first ring, Nick continued to walk in a circle around the area, walking on the inside of the last ring tightening each circle of foot prints.

         After 15 minutes or so, only the plaza Nick had eaten his lunch from and a few blocks around it was left, a barren landscape of black rock surrounding it. In the plaza, a great crowd of people had gathered as they had tried to escape Nick's devastating footfalls. Crushing one last patch of city he'd missed earlier, Nick turned off the heat at his stompers and cautiously planted each of his feet on either side of the area, straddling the entire area. Finding that his feet were about half the length of the area (meaning it was about a half-mile by a half-mile), Nick put on a mock face of disappointment and addressed the crowd, "I'm gonna give everyone to the count of five to get away from the edges!", blowing out ear drums for miles around. Unable to keep on a serious face, little snorts of laughter escaped his mouth as a great wave of people made their way towards the open plaza, hoping that they could escape Nick's destruction. Counting down to five, Nick planted the front of his foot onto a barren area just north of the so-called "safe zone". Not letting his heel down, Nick dragged the front of his massive foot across the left edge of the "safe zone", flattening several skyscrapers and a courthouse as he cut the area down to size. Using only his feet, Nick "shaved" off the edges of the safe zone until only the plaza was left. With the area now only a quarter mile by a quarter mile, Nick could finally begin to finish up with Indianapolis. With a deafening "CRACK!", Nick plopped down onto the brittle layer of rock covering the earth behind him, tickling him a little as it crunched beneath his enormous behind. Extending out his legs, Nick lay his feet on their sides and slowly inched forward, placing one on either side of the plaza. Even on their sides, his feet towered high above the buildings, casting an ominous shadow on the tightly packed crowd below. Then, Nick slowly but surely began to push his feet together. The few buildings left in the plaza offered no resistance as his massive soles bulldozed their way through. People dashed to and fro in a desperate attempt to escape the 500 foot all wall of doom closing in on them, only to find their way blocked by the falling rubble of the buildings around them. Pushing through the last of the buildings, Nick's feet made contact with the crowd, his sensitive skin picking up the people bumping into his soles as they closed in. Finally, with one last crunch, Nick felt the crowd squish between his feet, the rubble of the buildings his feet had bulldozed pushing up between his two massive soles.

         Rubbing his feet back and forth, Nick giggled as the rubble between his feet immediately pulverized to dust. Pulling apart his feet Nick found his feet covered in a talcum powder-like dust, with the dust towards the edges of his feet colored red from all the people he'd just crushed. "Yuck!", he yelled sticking his tongue out, "I can't keep walking around with on my feet!". Standing up to his full 2-mile height, Nick unceremoniously used the area he'd just cleared like a welcome mat, wiping his quarter mile long treads on the patch of dirt where the plaza had once been. Unbeknownst to him however, his feet came into contact with the brittle rock of one of his footprints, sending chunks of rock the size of small ships hurtling into the neighborhoods that had escaped his wrath so far. Once again examining his feet and finding they were mostly clean of blood, Nick set them down satisfied with his work. Scanning the city, Nick realized that while he'd cleared out the densest part of the city, there were still miles of suburbs around him that had escaped destruction. "I am supposed to destroy everything, but it'll take a long time if I just try to crush everything", he muttered under his breath. Thinking for a moment Nick decided to...

1352322222222222211.content:
You're lounging on the couch, watching TV, when you hear the door leading from the garage slam shut, and the sound of footsteps running your way.

"Guess what I just got?!" It was your ten year old brother Thomas, holding a shopping bag in his hands.

"What is it, squirt?" you ask, a little annoyed. After all, he's interrupting one of your favorite shows.

Pulling a package out of the bag, Thomas holds it up to you, beaming. "It's the brand new line of underwear, Macrex! It's specially designed for growing boys like myself. And, it's my first pair of boxers!"

"That's... great." You roll your eyes. "Can I get back to my show now?"

Still excited, he runs out of the room towards the stairs. "I'm gonna go try them on now!" He vanishes, leaving you in peace and quiet, if only for a moment.

A few minutes later, though, he runs back into the room. "There! Notice anything different about me?"

You look at him up and down. "Not really." As far as you can tell, he looks exactly the same as before.

Shrugging, Thomas nevertheless poses like a superhero with his hands on his hips. "Well, they feel great! I'm soooo glad Mom got them for me."

You turn your eyes back to the television, trying your best to ignore him. However, a minute later, when you glance back at him, you notice something unusual...
1352322222222222211.title: Boxers or briefs? Yes please!

13523222222222222111.content:
Thomas watching you, grinning, as you do a mild double-take. His t-shirt seemed a bit tighter and had come untucked from his shorts, which seemed to be sitting a little closer on his body as well. As your eyes return to his face you notice it's a little flushed and he seems to be breathing a bit heavier.

"Uh, Tom...you okay?" You asked a little uneasily, not quite sure what else to say.

The younger boy laughs and nods.

"I've never felt better. Actually..." He pauses, closing his eyes and heaving a huge sigh as his body visibly shudders a few inches higher, leaving a portion of his mid-riff visible and his shorts straining against his waist. "...I feel REALLY good!"

You scramble to your feet, the TV forgotten, at this obvious display of growth. Thomas had to be at least half a foot taller now and as you walk over you see he now comes up to your neck, whereas he only reached your lower chest before. Thomas grins again as he looks up at you and this close you can see him ever so slowly rising higher.

"What...what's going on?" You ask with some concern. "Don't tell me this is what the boxers do?!"

Thomas winks, sweat now beading on his bare skin, before his whole expression relaxes, his eyes closing halfway, and his mouth drops open with a quiet moan as his arms fall limp at his sides from his earlier pose.

"Oh, it tingles!" He gasps out as he gently swells another few inches higher, his top whispering a near-silent protest as it adjusts to his swelling frame, becoming skin-tight, while his shorts get filled to capacity, now halfway up his thicker thighs.

The button on his shorts creaks ominously as it struggles to hold back his widening waist and as you look down you don't miss the growing bulge starting to form under his fly. As you slowly back away, Thomas nearly as tall as you now, the young boy giggles giddily.

"I'm getting so big!"

13523222222222222222211.content:
You recently became 17, but that means you have to wait another year to be considered an adult. Getting into adult movies, and possibly even moving out. I mean, it was kind of like living on your own since your parents are away working in another country. Aside from taking care of your younger brother Kyle. Being four years younger than you, he was 13 and full of energy. He was currently the only downside of moving out, you wouldn’t get to play with him as often.

On your way home from the grocery store, which was just a walk away, you bumped into a stranger causing you to drop everything. Thankfully nothing broke. When you looked up to give a piece of your mind, there was no one around.
“Did I just fall?” Among your groceries, you found what seemed to be a toy gun. Thinking Kyle would like it, you picked it up.

After arriving home, you saw Kyle asleep. Must have gotten bored, you thought. Kyle tends to fall sleep sometimes when he’s board. Doesn’t help in class. After putting away the groceries, you looked over the instructions that came with the gun. You pressed the button like they said, and Kyle’s name briefly appeared. Not that you noticed.
“Aim at target and press button to change? What is that suppose to mean?” You did just that. A small light emitted from the gun to help pinpoint the target. You aimed it at a toy, the TV, yourself. Nothing happened.
“Maybe it’s suppose to work with glow in the dark objects?” You then aimed at Kyle. Who began to grow. You immediately stopped and ran over to him. Some of Kyle’s skin showed below his shirt, show he did indeed grow. Looking at the gun again, pressed the other button, and shot Kyle. Nothing seemed to happen at first glance, but looking Kyle over, it appeared that he was back to normal.
“At least it doesn’t seem like I can shrink him past normal size.” You had a worried look. You then shot the gun at the same objects as before, including yourself, with the other button. And nothing happened. “Can it only work on Kyle?” You wondered. “With this, Kyle could probably pass as a guy my age.” You joked. But then you thought about it more.

“Hey Kyle? Wake up, I’ve got something to show you!” Kyle woke up, ecstatic that his older brother was home.
“Hey Bro! Did you get a new game?” He asked. You shook your head.
“Take a look at this.” You presented the gun.
“Thanks, but I got a few just like it,” Kyle said with slight disappointment.
“Stand up.” Kyle stood up as his brother said. “Now hold still.” You shot Kyle with the gun and he started to grow. Kyle slowly outgrew his clothes until you stopped firing. Normally, Kyle only comes up to about your abs. Upon walking over, he was about your height now. Kyle was surprised.
“Now people will think your my age, and don’t worry, I can shrink you back if we need too!” You said with a grin.
“This is so cool!” Kyle said. “But now my clothes don’t fit.”
“We’ll find something in my room since we’re going out!” Kyle shouted in joy. You put on a white t shirt and an open black shirt, and gave Kyle a black t shirt and black open shirt. Kyle stood in front of the mirror amazed that his older brother’s clothes fit his perfectly. “You coming?” You asked. The two of you headed to the car. You also got some of your dad’s bigger clothes since you figured Kyle could pass as a young uncle if you grew him more later.
“Where we going bro?” Kyle asked.
13523222222222222222211.title: Growing the Younger Brother

13532.content:
There was a knock on the door. "Morning Mrs. Pepper," the woman at the desk looked up at the doorway. "Oh, hi Chloe. Good morning to you too and please just call me Sandra, even the kids do. Come in," The teenage girl in the doorway walked into the classroom.

The walls of the room were covered with drawings, made by the kids. This was Chloe's first day of internship at Redleaf Elementary. Ages of the students were five up to thirteen years. Chloe had to take care of the third grade, the 7 & 8 year olds. She had been looking forward to this, internship was much better than spending your days at boring classes like French.

"Are you ready to fight in the war?," the 16 year old stared at Sandra. "Excuse me?," Chloe frowned. "Sorry, teacher's joke. Are you ready to meet the kids?," the woman smiled. "Oh yes, I've been looking forward to this," the teenager said excited. "Well that's a good thing, they'll be here within half an hour so be prepared," the woman looked down and started to sign some papers.

"What are those for? If you don't mind me asking," the girl read the papers labeled 'Toys4um' there were a couple of boxes next to the desk labeled the same. "Nothing special, some toy manufacturer is giving out free toys for all schoolgoing kids. Seems to me it's just a promotion campaign to tempt parents to buy toys for their kids," Mrs Pepper grabbed the papers and got up.

"A-are you leaving?," Chloe said surprised. "Yes, I'm sorry. I've got an appointment that can't wait, but don't worry you'll be fine. You can do anything you like with the kids, just try to keep them within the school primesis," Sandra put on her coat and walked to the door. "And don't forget to give the free toys to the kids," the woman left the room, signed papers in her hand.

Chloe was pretty nervous when parents began to drop off their kids, but as she started to talk with them and their kids she started to relax. After an hour she was alone with her class and introductions could begin.

"Hello class, I'm Chloe and I will be helping your teacher for a few weeks," Chloe said writing her name on the blackboard. "Ms. Chloe? Where is Mrs. Sandra?," one of the students asked. The teen turned around and saw it was a cute oriental girl, she seemed pretty small compared to the rest of the kids. "Mrs. Sandra had to go somewhere, but I'll be taking care of you guys. What's your name?," Chloe smiled.

"Lin-Lin Ms. Chloe," the little girl answered. "Okay, Lin-Lin. Now I all want you to write down your names on a piece of paper and put it on your desk," the intern said. "I don't want to write down my name, it's stupid!," a boy said. "His name is Brad Ms. Chloe!," the redhead girl with braids sitting next to him said. "Stupid!," the boy pulled one of the girl's braids. "Brad stop it!," the teenager grabbed the boys arm and pulled him towards a corner.

"You stay in this corner and think about what you've done!," the girl said to him in anger. "If I was bigger than you, you would be scared!," Brad yelled. "Quiet! You can join us again when you use nice words mister!," Chloe turned around and continued with her class.

Brad was angry, no one ever listened to him. Especially those stupid girls, if he was bigger he would teach those girls a lesson. From the corner of his eye he saw a box standing next to the teacher's desk. He wasn't very good at reading, but he could make out the word 'TOY'. He smiled, and began to sneak over to the box.

When he opened it he saw it was filled with toy guns. "Cool!," he thought. Suddenly he heard Lin-Lin's voice. "Ms. Chloe Brad isn't in the corner!," the girl yelled. Chloe turned around and saw the boy looking in the box. "Brad! You're in a lot of trouble!," the intern said angry.

Brad quickly grabbed a gun and wanted to put it in his pocket, but then it went off!

Everyone looked amazed as a strong beam shot through the classroom and hit...
13532.title: A size changing gun in class

choices: The other kids grabbed the guns from the floor
135321.content:
Chloe was confused, what had just happened? She put Brad in the corner of the room and he obviously didn't listen to her and now he fired some gun. She thought to be lucky to have avoided the beam, but when she turned around she saw it hit Lin-Lin.

Everyone got silent and looked at the girl. It was only a small class, five girls and four boys. Even Brad was quiet and looking at Lin-Lin. Chloe was the first to react, she walked over to the girl who was sitting in the middle of the room.

"Lin-Lin? Are you alright?," the teenager asked worried. "I-I think I am Ms.Chloe," the little girl said. "Alright, we'll go and see the nurse," the intern turned her head towards Brad. The boy looked down in shame and had put the gun down on the teacher's desk. "Brad look what you've done!," the boy didn't react and just walked back to the corner.

"Ms.Chloe! Something is wrong with Lin-Lin!," a girl with a ponytail pointed behind the teen. When Chloe turned around she couldn't see right away what was wrong. Lin-Lin was still sitting on the floor, her clothes sure looked on the girl, but besides that she looked like the average kid in the room. But, then she noticed, Lin-Lin had been a small girl, but now she was the size of a normal kid her age.

"I feel weird," the oriental girl said. She groaned and both the kids and Chloe watched in awe as she began to expand. First her clothes tightened, then her shoulders teared through her shirt and her belly-button began to show. Even Brad had left his corner to see what was going o.

Lin-Lin put a hand to her forehead and got up from the floor. She was at least a head taller than her classmates and still growing. In a few seconds she was Chloe's height, but it didn't stop there. Her clothes were ripping from all sides, but Lin-Lin didn't seem to mind. Every growth-spurt send a pleasing feeling through her body.

The growing girl shambled over to the teacher's desk and sat down. Chloe was thinking about saying something, but like the kids she just couldn't take her eyes off the growing girl. "I think I know why I feel so good," Lin-Lin grabbed the gun from the desk and put the barrel against her belly. She was already half-naked and probably around 7ft tall, but wouldn't be for long.

She pulled the trigger and moaned as the energy from the gun coursed through her veins. This time the growth accelerated and her remaining clothes seemed to explode off her growing frame. During the process the teacher's desk could no longer bare the weight of the expanding girl and gave in. The box with guns next to the desk fell over spreading guns all over the floor in front of Lin-Lin.

When the girl was done growing she had become a small 14ft giantess!

Lin-Lin looked around the room and down at the small people in front of her. She had been so entranced by her growth she hadn't noticed how big she had really gotten. It felt good to be the biggest for once. Normally she had to look up to her classmates now she was looking down on them.

"Y-you're so big!," Chloe stammered, looking up at the giant oriental girl. The teen couldn't believe the small girl she had met barely half an hour ago was now bigger than a small bus. "I think I am Ms.Chloe," Lin-Lin giggled, causing some plaster to fall from the ceiling.

Jonathan is a teenager with two parents and a younger brother. He's 5'10 at 16 years old, in his second last year of high school. His parents work full-time shifts in the city so they usually didn't get home until late in the evening. It isn't all bad though. His parents always bring take-out home for dinner or he would cook something, since he had a talent for cooking. There is only one thing that annoys him, which is his younger brother Levi. Being 5'4 at 12 years old, he never seems to have enough to do. He would always beg Jonathan to play a game with him but he would always lose to Jonathan's superior intellect. However one day. Jonathan would do something he would soon regret.

"Hey Jonathan! Let's play Mario Party!" Levi asked. (For those that don't know, Mario Party is a video board game where the player collects coins acorss the board and in mini-games to buy stars. The player with the most stars wins.)

"No way!" you replied. "Those games are nothing but luck-fests!"

"You're just mad because you know you can't beat me you Chicken!" Levi started clucking like a chicken. He knew how to press your buttons easily and unlock the inner competitor inside of you.

"Fine but just one board game. I have to make dinner soon."

"Yes!" he shouted as he ran to set up the game console.

An hour later, the game was one turn away from ending. You were in the lead as expected with your brother taking the final turn. His character rolled the dice and landed on a chance time space. Your lip started to quiver. Chance time games could change he whole game around. and since this was the last turn, there was no time to make up for a bad turnout. He character shot the pinballs and the result had you give him all your stars. In that one stroke of bad luck, all your hard work went to your Brother and he ended up winning the game. You threw down your controller and stood up. "What a load of bull!" you yelled. Levi stood up too but something seemed off.

"Aww! Your just mad because you lost!"

"Rematch!" you yelled. You started the game over and played again. Another hour later and you were in the lead. It was the final turn again with your brother again taking the final turn. This time, he was far away from any Chance space so he wouldn't pull a victory out of his butt like last time. This time however, he challenged you to a duel mini-game with most of your and his stars as the bet. The duel mini-game? A luck based game where the player had to pick a rope and hope it leads to the goal. As before. your brother won the game and therefore, the whole board again. You threw down your controller again. "Alright! Let's play a real game now!"

"Sorry shrimp but you have to start making me dinner." Levi said arrogantly.

You stood up quickly. "Excuse me punk? What did you just-" you suddenly cut yourself as Levi stood. You suddenly realised what was off from before. He was looking at you eye to eye! You two had become the same height somehow! However now, your mouth just dropped as his face started to inch higher, until becoming a whole head taller than you. He clothes were stretching out, with his shorts becoming short shorts and his t-shirt starting to look like a vest. His socks now looked like ankle socks that were two sizes too small.

"Sorry but looks like you're not in charge of me anymore 'little' bro!" he said with more arrogance in his voice. He then proceeded to kick you out of the room. "Better make my dinner soon or else!" he yelled at you.

You walked into the kitchen and started wondering what had happened.

135332222222222222212112.content:
You were by far the oldest child in your family, at 18, and the only boy in it as well. You had six younger sisters: Rachel, the oldest girl at 11. Next up was Jordan, who was 10. In the middle were Brooke and Claire, twin 8 year olds. After them came Mary, who was 7. Finally, your youngest sister was Emma, the 6 year old "baby" of the family.

Despite the age difference and your sisters easily outnumbering you, you all got along really well. You loved them with all your heart, even though they caused you some problems with their antics every once in a while, and they loved you right back. Though they all loved each other, they also tended to get in each others' hair, then come to you to resolve their disagreements.

Like now.

"Miiiiii-chaaaaaael!" you heard one of the younger two screaming as she came running up to you. As the owner of the voice came into view, you saw it was Mary, tears streaming down her face. You sighed, preparing yourself to act as mediator between her and whatever the cause of the problem was.

"Michael!" she repeated. "Brooke and Claire won't let me have a turn playing Xbox with them! It's not fair!" She stomped her foot as she said the last part. Although you didn't show it, you were relieved that this was all that was bothering her. If nothing else, it would be pretty simple to work this problem out.

You waited until Mary had calmed down some. "Alright, what exactly happened between you and the twins?" you asked her.

"Well, they were playing on the Xbox for a while and I was watching, but when I asked if I could play, they told me I was too little!" She sniffed. "It's not fair! I'm not even that much littler than them, but they're being such, such. . . meanies!" After saying the final word, she burst into tears again, and you tried to console her with a hug.

"Just take it easy for now," you told her while you hugged it out. "We'll go up there and sort everything out. But first, just take some deep breaths." You could hear her breathing beginning to steady not long after saying that.

You and Mary had been hugging for close to a minute before you heard her gasp."What's wrong?" you asked her, hoping that you weren't going to need to start all the way from the beginning.

"Um," she began, "my clothes feel tight." Neither of you had let go of each other, so you couldn't get a good look at her to see what she was talking about. You let go of her, tapped her shoulder, signaling for her to let go. When she did you stepped back and saw why she thought her clothes felt tight.

Mary had grown, and quite a bit at that! Compared to earlier, her clothes looked like they belonged on a child a few years younger than her. Her shirt stopped just above her belly button, and her shorts were now only a quarter of the way down her thighs. All told, it looked like she had gained about 6 inches.

Mary was shocked at first, but quickly got over it when she realized that this made her taller than the twins. "Michael look! Isn't this great? Now they can't tell me I'm too little to play on the Xbox, 'cause then they'd be too little too!" she bounced a little as she talked. There was no evidence that she had ever been crying, her usual bubbly personality returning in the blink of an eye. In her joy, she moved in for another tight hug, almost squeezing the life out of you. Unbeknownst to you or her, that force of the hug caused her to shoot up another 3 inches.

"I'm gonna go show the twins who's 'too little' now," she announced. "See ya Michael!" With that, she turned to go back upstairs and find the twins, humming a happy tune as she walked.

Michael took some time to process what had just happened. Then, he decided to. . .
135332222222222222212112.title: The Many Sisters Of Michael

choices: "Can we go tell everyone else about this?"
"Can we keep this a secret from everyone?"
1353322222222222222121122.content:
You considered following Mary to make sure the situation with her and the twins didn't get too out of hand, but the worst case scenario in your mind was that Mary would bother them so much that they would run to you, which would essentially be a redo of earlier with the roles reversed. Instead, you wanted to see what the other three were doing.

Searching around the ground floor of the house, there was no sign of any of your sisters, so you expanded your search to the second floor. Passing by the game room, it didn't sound like Mary and the twins were having any sort of dispute, which relieved you. With one less thing to worry about, you kept going down the hall to Rachel's room. The door was open, and when you walked in you saw Rachel and Emma sitting on the floor, working on a jigsaw puzzle. Rachel looked up and smile when she saw you come in. "Hey, Michael," she said before going back to the puzzle. Emma perked up when Rachel said your name.

"Michael, look! We're building a big puzzle!" she exclaimed, pointing proudly at the mostly finished puzzle between her and Rachel.

"Yeah, and it looks like you're doing a great job too," Emma flashed a big smile when you said that. "How many pieces is it?"

"It's got 250, and we only have to put in 30 more," she answered. "The best part is I did most of it without Rachel's help!"

"That's awesome," you said before turning to Rachel. "How've you been?"

"I've been good," she replied. "Mostly just watching Emma do this puzzle."

"Have you seen Jordan anywhere recently?"

Rachel shrugged. "I think she's taking a nap. Last I saw her she was in her room, and she's been real quiet ever since. Did you get the thing with Mary sorted out?"

"Yeah, I got the twins to give her a turn, so that's all good." You refrained from mentioning the part where she grew pretty much instantly, since you still barely believed it yourself. With nothing else to talk about, you took a seat on the edge of Rachel's bed and distracted yourself with checking your phone. Emma continued working on the puzzle while Rachel watched. You heard Emma get stumped at some point, but Rachel was there to point her in the right direction. From the sound of things, that was the last piece of help she needed. The rest of the puzzle pieces were put into place, and Emma jumped up when she finished.

"Look, Michael I did it!" Sure enough, everything was right, though you didn't have any reason to doubt her. You gave her a high five to congratulate he. "But I couldn't have done it without the help of the best big sister ever!" she said, obviously referring to Rachel.

"Who, me?" Rachel asked, pretending not to know who Emma was talking about. Emma nodded. "Aw, come over here," she said, and the two hugged. When they let go, Rachel looked a little confused. "I feel funny," she announced.

This got your attention. Mary only seemed to grow after hugging you. Was this going to be more of the same? "Funny how?" you asked.

"I don't know how to describe it. I was completely normal a minute ago, but when I was hugging Emma, I just felt . . . funny," she shrugged. "It's hard to explain."

Emma jumped up. "Yeah! I felt a little funny too. It was tingly, like touching a tv screen, but everywhere."

This just raised further questions to you. Did everyone in your family suddenly have a weird reaction to hugging? What if the "funny, tingly" feeling that Rachel and Emma described was the same thing that Mary felt when she grew. Were hugs the cause? You scratched your head. The quickest way to get to the bottom of this mystery was to test it, and you had two subjects right in front of you.

An experiment formed in your head. "Ok, you two. Can you hug each other again and tell me if the funny feeling comes back? I wanna see if we can figure out what this is."

Your two sisters looked at each other and nodded. Without saying anything, they embraced again. From the looks on their faces, you could tell that they were feeling tingly on the inside. "I definitely feel it again," Rachel announced without letting go. Emma mhmed in agreement.

"Notice anything else?"

"No, just the funny feeling," she informed you. Although she didn't notice anything else, now you did. Both of them were growing taller, just like Mary had earlier! From your spot on the bed, you could actually see them inching higher and higher while they hugged. The reason they must not've noticed was because they were growing at the same rate, so proportionally their heights were the same as they had always been.

"Stop hugging now," you told them, and they did. Just like Mary, their clothes now looked way too small for them. "Notice anything different now?" you asked.

They looked at you quizzically, then each other, before realizing what you meant. "Your clothes–" they both started, then looked at their own after interrupting each other. "My clothes!" they exclaimed.

"Did our clothes shrink?" Emma asked.

Rachel shook her head. "No, I think we grew. Look." She walked up to you to compare heights. Normally she was more than a head shorter than you, but now the top of her head came up to your nose level. If Emma grew the same amount, that would make her as tall as Rachel used to be.

The changes your two sisters had undergone, combined with Mary's, all but confirmed the your theory. Your sisters grew taller when getting hugged. Just to be completely sure, you had to do one more test. You began hugging Rachel, paying extra attention to anything that felt like what she and Emma had described to you. But you didn't feel any tingling, or anything that felt "funny" at all. Everything seemed completely the same to you, but you couldn't say that for Rachel. She was still growing as if it was her and Emma hugging. You let go when Rachel was your height, and for the first time in your life, you were standing at eye level with one of your sisters. Rachel bust out a huge smile at the fact. "This is so cool, thanks for the boost, Michael," she said.

Meanwhile, Emma was feeling left out. "Michael, I wanna grow up too. Can you make me big like you and Rachel? Please?" she pleaded. You thought about it, and decided that there was no point in denying her. If she really wanted to, she could just hug Rachel until she was taller than you, and Rachel would grow even bigger than that. If it was just you hugging Emma, you could have a little control over how big she got.

1353322222222222222222222221222211.content:
Alan was an average sized kid of 10. Lately, he's felt insecure, since some of his friends have been taller than him, even the neighborhood bully, who was taller than all of them. Everyday when he would come home from school, the bully would make him feel insignificant; tripping him, pressing his foot in his face, sitting on him, calling him small names like 'Alan the Ant'. He just wished there was a way to get back at him...

One day, after another grueling day of school and bullying, Alan was in desperate need of a drink. He noticed a green bottle on the counter, thinking it was a soda. He immediately took a quick drink, until he realized a strange and awful taste to it. He inspected the bottle to see the label; "Garden Jumbo Gro". He immediately put it down and went straight for the faucet, to drown out the taste in his mouth. Suddenly, he felt a strange feeling in his stomach, then his entire body. He was quivering like crazy. Then suddenly, he was grew. His stature was getting taller and taller, his body was becoming larger in bulk, as if he was getting fat. He grew and grew until he stopped, as his head nearly hit the ceiling, at the height of 8 feet.

Alan looked at his surroundings at his new height. He felt like he was getting cramped in his own house. But he felt a strange feeling, as he liked it. He didn't just like it, he loved it. He knew that his knew height would help him deal with the bully. And speak of the devil, there he was, walking down the street in his neighborhood. Now was the time to get back at him, as he took the bottle of formula with him. But how would he get out of the house?

“Is that the best thing you could do is beg? I’ve haven’t even started the fun yet, shorty! And you’ll gonna get what you deserve!” Alan smirked before making a laugh at Evan’s expense.

He turned his head away from Evan, before he wasted no time but to drop his fat ass to the ground. All that Evan could is scream and letting out the worst possible, as Alan had finally sat right on top of Evan, covering the entire body underneath that eight feet tall stature of a ten year old obese boy.

His body grew larger and larger; his bulk increasing with his height. He was crouching down as he continued to grow, until his head started to go through the ceiling. He could see that he broke a hole between the kitchen roof and his bedroom floor, but wasn't even finished. But eventually he grew out of it, as it was now stuck on his waist, almost like a wrestler's belt, reaching the height of 25 feet. He looked down to see the bully looking up at him and his new size. The bully was scared witless. What is Alan gonna do now?

135332222222222222222222222122221121.content:
Smiling at the sight of his tormentor looking so helpless, Alan wasted no opportunity, reaching down and easily picking him up with one hand. Balling the other into a fist, he repeatedly pounded the tiny bully's head, just enough to rough him up a bit and show him who was boss now. Once satisfied, he unceremoniously dropped the bully back down on the lawn, his massive, round body looming over him triumphantly. With that, Alan walked-- or rather, stomped-- off, pulling out the bottle that had given him such power and gazing happily at it, before setting it down on the ground and continuing on his way.

Quickly forgetting about the bully, the no-longer-little boy took a moment to examine his new form-- easily 25 feet tall, he had also grown quite fat, with great rolls of flab visibly pouring over the house that was still stuck around his waist, as well as sizable moobs and couple of new chins. More curiously, though, his body had taken on an oddly roly-poly kind of shape-- quite wide from his round, jiggling butt and broad hips up to his belly, while tapering upward from there, almost like a giant pear. Arms and legs alike had grown thick and bloated, yet looking rather small compared to the rest of him. Alan hardly cared what happened to his figure at this point, though; he was bigger, stronger, and better than ever, and no one would ever bully him again! Reaching down, he easily tore the remains of his house off of himself, letting his round belly flop out to its full size, jiggling all over. He could also see now that every last thread of clothing had torn off of him as a result of his growth, though once again, the giant boy hardly cared.

As he walked off to go enjoy his new size, the bully began to come to, dizzy from his beating. However, he spied the bottle of Jumbo-Gro sitting upright on the street where Alan had left it. Limping over, he picked it up and examined the label, taking a few moments before his addled mind could put two and two together, realising just what his former punching bag had done to gain such a powerful edge over him. He smiled devilishly as he pulled off the cap...

---

(A/N: Let me just say that I am a huge fan of the original short and have been waiting for an opportunity to write an interactive storyline that re-enacts it with humans forever now! As such, I'm hoping to make as good of an homage to it as possible here, up to and including that lovely shape the cat and mouse achieved in the original after a few good growths~)
135332222222222222222222222122221121.title: Beat him up

choices: Alan goes off to find more older kids who wronged him.
A huge shadow is cast over the pool...the bully from before is now bigger!
1353322222222222222222222221222211211.content:
Confident that his foe had been vanquished, Alan waddled off to tour the neighbourhood at his new size, quickly beginning to take a shine to his altered form after achieving victory over the tiny bully. In spite of being bigger than any house on the block, destruction was not on his agenda; no, for now, he was content to strut his stuff around town, quickly making himself the centre of attention among the tiny "normals". Unafraid to show off every inch of his massive, nude body, he stomped up and down the street, letting his vast, ovoid mass of flab bounce and jiggle like mad, occasionally lifting up his heavy belly and letting it smash down onto an unoccupied car for fun.

"Look out, people!" he yelled, his voice booming through the town, "'Little' Alan is no more-- I'm in charge from now on!" No one was about to question the huge boy's declaration, and most folks simply scrambled for their homes or cars, hoping to get out of his way as quickly as possible. "Hmph...that's right," he said smugly, patting his big, round belly for emphasis. With his dominance firmly established, though, Alan now found himself unsure as to what to do next. Sitting his massive, bare ass down on the sidewalk (creating some large cracks along it in the process), he puzzled over his next course of action.

"Hm, what next...? I'm huge, I'm somehow super-strong in spite of being a big blubbery bowling pin, that dumb bully's been dealt with, and no one, not even the grown-ups can stop me..." Suddenly, an idea came to him! "Hey, I know! I'll go show those high school girls from across town who's boss!" Some weeks prior, Alan had been dared by some schoolmates of his to go spy on the local high school's female swim team while they were changing in the locker room after practise, with predictable results. Now, though, with his new size and power, the young boy felt more than confident enough to go find the haughty girls and give them a piece of his mind. Hefting himself up off the fractured pavement, he proceeded toward the public pool, struggling a bit to move his massive bulk along on his tiny, bloated legs.

---

Meanwhile, the swim team had just finished a few laps at the pool when they spotted something strange on the horizon. It looked at first like a hill, though it became obvious that it was not once they realised it was actually moving toward them...within a few seconds, it had come fully into view, and the teenage swimmers realised that it was, in fact, a boy! Albeit a freakishly huge one, bigger than a house and incredibly fat, with a distinctly bell-shaped, bottom-heavy build.

"Hey...doesn't that look sorta like that dumb kid who was peeking at us in the locker room a couple of weeks ago?"

"Let me answer that for you," boomed Alan, cutting in before any of the other girls could speak. "Yes, I am! And I'm about to make you regret pushing this 'kid' around!" He let out a deep belly laugh, his flab jiggling as he did, before reaching down to pluck the swimmers out of the pool. Strangely, while quite surprised, they seemed oddly unafraid of their giant captor...it seemed that they still saw him as the bratty boy they'd dealt with before, in spite of his drastic physical changes.

"Okay, so you're now a giant, fat blob, and you're going to get 'revenge' on us for being totally justified in stopping you from perving on us," said the team captain, sounding quite unimpressed. "Wonderful, wonderful...so, what do you plan to do?"

Alan paused for a moment, not sure how to react to people who didn't immediately bow down to his power. "Uh...well...maybe I could, like...squish you or something!" The threat somehow ended up sounding quite lame, even though he could more than back it up. Not wanting to give them a chance to shoot back with another catty remark, he promptly made good on his words and shoved the tiny girls deep into his flab, putting about half of them between his belly rolls and the others under his moobs. Since he'd put them in head-first, they couldn't do much besides struggle and make muffled noises, Alan figured he had effectively won the argument.

Once again content, he decided to try squeezing his immense, pear-shaped bulk into the pool, and just barely succeeded in doing so, though his monumental rear alone displaced most of the water. The feeling of the scantly-clad older girls squirming about in his flab was quite pleasant, and soon enough Alan could feel his equally-giant cock begin to stir deep under his belly fat, partially pushing his belly up and off of it in the process. "Aah...it's good to be big," he said happily, leaning back in the far-too-small pool and basking in the sensation...

13533222222222222222222222212222112112.content:
Alan laid back in the pool like it was a just barely too small bathtub, his feet and lower leg sticking out of the deep end and resting on the concrete around the pool, his head doing much the same at the shallow end and his arms sticking out the sides of the shallow end. Whether you were at the deep end seeing the rising and stiffening erection pushing up against his fat, bottom heavy torso, or the shallow end seeing the closed eyed wide smiling expression of contentment on his face the message was clear: Alan couldn't be happier. The somewhat tickling sensation of the high-school girls struggling to escape the fat folds he had trapped them in certainly helped, but nothing could beat the feeling of being so big, and knowing he was bigger then anyone else.

*boom*

Alan briefly thought about how much better it would feel to bee even bigger, even thinking about going to get the Garden Jumbo Gro he had left back at his house across town so he could get bigger, but he was just to comfortable and relaxed to do it now.

*boom*

if only he had thought to bring the stuff with him when he came to the high-school, then he could grow bigger and not have to worry about walking all the way back across town to get it. of course he would still have to get out of the pool even then since he barely fit as it was, so it would still be better to wait a little bit even then.

"Well, well, well if it isn't little Alan the ant..."

Alan knew that voice and taunt all too well, he'd been hearing them pretty much daily for the last few months, though he could hardly understand why that jerk of a bully Evan thought this was a good idea; Alan had soundly trounced him, not to mention ant was hardly a good way to describe Alan's giant form. Alan opened his eyes preparing to get out of the pool and lay another beating on Evan, but when his vision was almost entirely blocked by the underside of a large round belly like his own ... but maybe even bigger ... a sinking feeling of fear came over him, only kept from full terror by the fact he couldn't see the face of the belly's owner. Scrambling to get out of the pool opposite the intruder, the frantic movement dislodging the high school girls who as soon as they were on the ground bolted from the scene. Once he was standing up and facing the new giant his fears were confirmed; standing on the other side of the pools was Evan in a similar state to Alan himself, but notably bigger.

"but.. but.. how?" Alan sputtered out

"I'll admit you did a number on me, but when I saw this," Even pulled out a familiar green bottle. "I put two and two together and decided it was time for a little payback." Evan gave the bottle a quick kiss before gently tossing it over his shoulder, then proceed to stomp over to Alan punching his fist into his other open hand with each step.

Alan stood cowering in fear as Evan came closer, and it became more apparent just how much bigger than Alan he was now. Evan stopped when the two giants were belly to belly making it clear he was about twice Alan's 25 foot height. Evan thrust his belly into Alan, knocking Alan back and to the ground before letting out a loud laugh.

"Wow you're so tiny you really are like an ant now, almost makes me feel bad for beating you up. "Evan punched his fist into his open hand again then smiled. "Actually you know what, i'm feeling nice, so i'm gonna give you to the count of ten to start running. 1!"

Alan sat there on the ground looking at Evan not quite sure what was happening.

"2!"

Alan's confusion quickly disappeared as he scrambled to stand back up.

"3!"

Alan wasn't quite fully upright, but he was upright enough to start making a run for it.

"4!"

Alan had managed to put some distance between Him and Evan and wasn't planning to stop any time soon.

"5,6,7,8,9,10." Even briefly smiled to himself before giving chase to relatively small Alan.

Alan ran as fast as his stubby legs could carry him through the streets. He was already starting to feel a little tired, but Evan wasn't too far behind so he wasn't going to be able to stop any time soon. Alan realized if he was going to get out of this unbeaten he would need to find a hiding spot, though the one and two story building that surrounded him were all too short to hide Alan's 25 foot tall bulk. There were some three and four story building that Alan might be able to hide behind, but they were pretty uncommon and since Evan was about 50 feet tall he could probably see over them anyways. Starting to fear he would just need to take the coming beating he suddenly noticed the tall towers and sky scrapers of down town weren't too far away and quickly turned to make his way towards them.

Once Alan had gotten a few blocks into down town he turned down a random street, then again and again and again. after a dozen or so turns Alan started going straight again glancing over his shoulder every few seconds. Once he was convinced he had lost Evan he came to a stop, hunching over with his hands on his knees and trying to catch his breath. Alan started trying to figure out a plan, though the only thing he could come cup with was hiding form Evan until he got bored and gave up. Of course this plan had mixed results in past dealings with Evan, and with Evan begin out for revenge and maybe even on a bit of a power trip form his new size the plan's chances of working seemed even worse.
