Evan had tossed it aside when they met at the pool, meaning it was somewhere out there and if Alan could get to it he could make himself big enough that Evan would be running from him. Alan smiled as he decided on his plan, sure he wasn't really sure where the Jumbo Gro was, but his chances of finding it didn't seem any worse than waiting for Evan to get bored and he would get to grow even bigger meaning it was the better plan.

"Where is that tiny ant?" Alan recognized the voice and his heart sank as he looked up and down the street just in time to see its massive owner step out from a side street and lock eyes with him. "There you are Alan. Bet you though you were pretty smart hiding from me using these big buildings, but it didn't work out too well did it?"

As Evan started to move towards Alan, Alan lost no time in turning the other way and running. The massive new girl had a slightly nervous smile on her face, one of her hands up next to it with it's fingers wiggling in a sort of wave. Alan picked himself up off the ground, his mouth hanging open the whole time causing the giant girl to giggle for a split second before covering her mouth with both hands.

Alan started to look puzzled at the girl wondering why she seemed to be trying to stay quite. He only became more confused as she took her hands off her mouth and started to pantomime something: first she pointed in the direction Alan had come form before turning, then pointed at herself, finally brought her hands next to her face, fingers curled, and gave a big toothy sneer. More importantly though her mention of a weird green soda bottle reminded Alan what he was doing before running into Beth. "So you drank the Jumbo Gro to, Do you remember where you last left it?"

Beth cocked her head to the side staring at Alan for a second before it hit her what he was talking about. "Oh yeah, the label on the soda said Jumbo Gro didn't it." she started to walk back down the side street stopping next to a building a bit shorter, only nine or ten stories, than it's neighbors. "When i heard you and that bully nearby i set it on this roof while i tried to think of a plan to scare that bully."

Right after turning down the side street Alan had to stop to avoid running into a building. taking a few steps back and glancing around, Alan realized he had hit a dead end. As he was about to turn around and start running again he heard a familiar voice behind him.

"End of the line Alan, time for some payback."

Before he could react, Alan was suddenly face down in the street, then he had the wind knocked out of him as the bigger bully sat on him and grabbed his leg pulling it into some sort of leg lock. As pain shot through Alan's body he shut his eyes grimacing in pain. After a few moments of this that felt like an eternity the pain subsided, Alan opened his eyes and suddenly noticed something sitting on the fire escape of one of the buildings: a familiar green bottle. Alan started confused at the bottle, trying to remember if it had been there when he entered the ally.

"Come on you tiny ant, say uncle." Even suddenly resumed the leg lock, reminding Alan he didn't have much time to think about how, only that the Jumbo Gro was there and he needed it.

Reaching an arm out towards the bottle he struggled and stretched to try and reach the bottle as the pain from the leg lock coursed through his body. Eventually he just barely managed to grasp it and quickly yanked the bottle back towards him and started drinking. As Alan started growing the pain of the leg lock subsided, eventually seeming to all but disappear once Alan stopped growing. given the position he was in it was hard for Alan to gauge how big he was so he twisted slightly to look over his shoulder at Evan. Propping his head up with one arm Alan watched Evan struggle with his leg for a moment before releasing the leg lock.

"Huh, must be winded form chasing after you, you ... tiny ant." Evan sucked in a deep breath before continuing. "But I've still got energy enough to beat you up, so say uncle already."

As Evan went to lift the leg back into position for the leg lock, he suddenly realized he was having a really hard time moving it. actually looking at the leg for the first time since starting this he suddenly realized it seemed bigger than it had been at the start. Evan though about this revelation for a second before deciding to look over his shoulder. He saw the now much larger Alan looking back at him over his own shoulder. Even looked forward again and blinked a few times hoping he was just seeing things, but when he looked back over his shoulder Alan was still there and still bigger. Evan started to slowly climb off of Alan's back and start backing away slowly.

"Stopping so soon Evan?" Alan smirked as he still lay with his head propped up in his hand.

"yeah, I mean say uncle is such a stupid baby game, so i was thinking we could try something else."

Alan sat up, delighted to see that even sitting down he seemed to be a few feet taller than Evan. "While it felt like you were pretty close to wining, but if you want to play something else i'm willing to try it, what did you have in mind.?"

"Oh well you know I was just thinking we could... you know we could play some ... ummmm... my mom is ...um ..." Evan's expression went blank as his increasingly shaky train of thought came to a sudden stop.

After a few seconds of Evan and Alan starting at each other, Alan stood up and Evan's brain seemed to start back up as his face turned to an expression of fear and he started frantically running from Alan. Alan stretched for trying to gauge his height based on the building around him. He was 100 feet tall and loving it. glancing down at the bottle of Jumbo Gro in his hands, he looked for a high rooftop he was certain Evan couldn't climb up to and set it down, making sure to remember where it was so he could find it when he inevitably wanted to get bigger once he had dealt with Evan. With the Jumbo Gro safely set aside Alan started to chase after Evan.

1353322222222222222222222221222211212.content:
Eager to put Alan back in his place, the bully (let's call him "Evan", for convenience's sake) quickly uncorked the bottle of growth formula and began chugging down as much as he could. Unlike the other boy, he actually quite enjoyed the taste, taking one last big gulp before letting out a satisfied belch. "BBBBUUURRPPP!!!! Heh, let's see that dumb nerd Alan try and beat THIS!" As soon as he finished saying as much, his body began to quiver and shake violently, just as Alan's had at first, before suddenly shooting up in size and bulk. His t-shirt, shorts, sneakers, and even underwear were demolished in short order as he expanded upward and outward, quickly matching and exceeding Alan's height while taking on a similar pear shape. Evan's new body easily put his enemy's to shame, though-- topping out at 50 feet, exactly twice Alan's height, he ended up nearly more belly than boy, with a vast gut that stretched up tall while flaring out incredibly wide at the bottom. His wide, flabby face and 6 chins were difficult to spot from the front, blocked off partly by a pair of wide, round moobs that sat atop his mountain of a belly, each nipple looking thick and hard from the chilly air around him and the sensation of growth. His diminished arms and legs were tiny compared to his enormous midsection, and each one seemed almost too bloated to move, though he still had little trouble in that area.

Evan wobbled a bit on his blubbery feet, taking a moment to adjust to his new bulk, while every inch of flab on his body jiggled like mad from the movement. "Phew...now THIS is big!" He laughed deeply while slamming one flabby fist into the other. "Time to put that tiny punk in his place!" With that, he tossed the bottle aside and slowly waddled down the street, stomping on cars along the way, making use of his superior height to spot Alan standing around in a lot on the other side of the neighbourhood before slowly turning to pursue him. In a few seconds' time, he found himself looming over his prey, who spotted the long, wide shadow cast over him and turned around, letting out a scared yelp when he saw how big his enemy had become.

"It's payback time!" he yelled, thrusting his enormous belly forward and slamming it into Alan, who was swiftly knocked off his feet and sent him careening through the nearest house. Evan didn't let up after that, pinning Alan beneath his immense body to keep him from escaping. As he squashed the smaller boy into his fat, the bottle from before rolled down the street, still intact after being thrown away. It was soon found by...
1353322222222222222222222221222211212.title: The competition begins!

13533222222222222222222222212222112121.content:
Casey, a young girl of 8, was curious as to what the commotion was outside. She noticed a massive pile of destruction that was once Alan's house. But as she rushed over to investigate the wreckage, she tripped over a bottle that was on the ground. She picked it up and shook it slightly, as it still had plently of liquid inside. She sniffed inside the bottle, noticing a strange aroma from inside. She took a few gulps, but stopped immediately, as she nearly had a spittake from the terrible taste of the liquid. But before she could toss the bottle away, she felt her body quiver and shake. Then suddenly, her body began to grow, becoming taller and wider, forming into a large pear shape. Soon, her body began to bloat and grow higher and fatter, her body becoming so massive. Her belly and bottom were growing so large and wide, her arms becoming large and flabby, her legs thickening, her chin forming a large double chin as if she was a frog. Her clothes barely contained her gigantic figure, but were still holding on as best as possible, as she continued to grow wider and taller.

She continued to billow higher and wider, going on 40 feet, 50 feet, 60 feet, then suddenly slowed down and reached 75 feet. She had a frightened look on her face as she looked at her new surroundings. But as she felt her new body, she felt amazing. She felt powerful. Then she noticed the bottle was still in her hands. She inspected it closer and noticed the label said "Garden Jumbo Gro". She never thought a product for plants would make people grow so large. But before she would inspect the bottle further, she noticed a fight going on between a slightly large Alan and an enormous Evan, with Evan punching and belly-flopping Alan. She thought of a plan to stop Evan...
13533222222222222222222222212222112121.title: Colossal Casey

135332222222222222222222222122221121211.content:
Worried for her neighbour's safety, Casey sprang into action, taking a step forward and moving her massive, top-heavy bulk in Evan's direction. She had difficulty keeping her balance, as her incredibly thick, stubby legs were poorly suited to carrying the weight of her flabby, pear-shaped body. Still, though, she managed to close the distance between herself and the bully in no time flat, tilting her head down and making her multiple chins quite visible. Tapping the smaller boy on the shoulder to get his attention, she began to speak, her voice now sounding much deeper as a result of her size.

"Leave Alan alone, unless you wanna answer to THIS!" The titanic "little" girl slapped her ginormous belly to punctuate her point, causing powerful jiggles that resonated through her egg-shaped form. Terrified to see the once tiny neighbourhood girl having grown into a huge, blubbery beast, Evan quickly turned tail and ran, nearly tripping over the parked cars in the road as he made his escape.

Satisfied, Casey smiled and reached down to Alan, easily lifting him up to her flabby yet underdeveloped chest and cuddling the boy between her wide, flat pseudo-breasts. "There-- now he won't bother you anymore!" she said in a cheerful tone, though its cuteness was tempered a bit by her booming voice. Setting Alan back down at her feet, she handed the bottle of Jumbo-Gro back to him and waddled off down the street, swinging her enormous hips with each crashing step. Unable to form words after what happened, Alan simply stared silently at Casey's fat rear as she walked away, before glancing back at the bottle in his hand...

1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.content:
Alan was in a state of shock as he watched the massive “little” girl that had just saved him rumble down the street. With every step she took, windows would shatter and parked cars would bounce up in the air.

Alan watched as Casey giggled and waved down to a form on the street. “Hey ‘big’ sis, I promise I won’t mess with your clothes anymore.”

The tiny older sister watched as Casey wobbled away, laughing to herself. Alan came upon the normal sized girl and she turned to him with surprise. She hadn’t noticed the second giant showing up because he was so much smaller than her little sister.

“Casey is your sister?” Alan asked, straining to push aside his own bulk to get a clear look down.

“Yeah, shes my little sister. I’m Rose. What happened to her?!?”

Alan took a second to think out his answer before saying, “Well, your little sister is a hero. I’m going to try to catch her to give her the thanks she deserves. It’s crazy, it’s all because of this little bottle.”

And with that, Alan set the bottle of Jumbo-Gro down next to Rose and attempted to run to catch up to his massive savior.

Rose could only stare at their huge bodies and then the bottle as small grin formed on her face.

choices: meanwhile Alan catches up to Casey down town
What happened to Evan, after all he seems like the type to hold a grudge...
1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.content:
Rose watched briefly as the giant boy chased after here ridiculously huge little sister, the steps in his light jog shaking the ground enough to bump anything that wasn't nailed down into the air a foot or so. She smiled to herself; if her suspicion was right Casey had a slight crush on that boy, and it would, no doubt, be adorable when he caught up to her. However there were more pressing concerns: Rose was supposed to be the taller sister.

It wasn't just that Rose was older, Rose was a bit tall for her age which along with begin the older sibling at 10 years old made for a fairly noticeable height advantage over her little sister. Rose quite liked this fact and would often playfully tease Casey about her comparative shortness. Sure she knew she might not be the tallest forever; after tall their mom was a few inches shorter than their aunt despite being the older of the two, but for Casey to become a massive giant while they were still kids, not to mention get in her teasing as well, Rose wouldn't stand for that if she had anything to say about it. Glancing down at the bottle the boy had left she started smiling, because she did have a say in it.

"So according to..." Rose paused in the midst of picking the bottle up trying to remember the boys name. "It was something with an an A, Alex, Adam... it doesn't matter important thing is he said this is the stuff that made him and my sister giants."

Casey looked the bottle over, somewhat surprised by what she saw. Rather than being some non see through bottle covered in warning labels that gave away the secret government lab something like this had to come from, instead it was a mostly see through green bottle with a white label that had Garden Jumbo Gro printed on it in large letters with a before and after picture of a yellow flower below it: the before sunflower being practically wilted while the after looking more like a giant tree with a flower on it.

"fertilizer...?" Rose looked at the bottle confused, then glanced in the direction Casey had been headed; while the boy couldn't bee seen, likely due to the various one and two story houses and business that were now between them, Casey's upper body was still quite visible as she made her way to the sky scraper filled city center. Rose glanced back down at the bottle swearing that, for a brief moment, the before and after picture of the flower had been replaced with pictures of her as she was now and as giant big enough to dwarf her sister.

"Well here goes." Rose took a quick swig from the bottle and the waited for the growth to start. After a few moments of nothing happening she sighed. Figuring her sister and the boy's growth had been caused by something else and they had passed this off on here as a joke she was about to head in the direction the came form hoping to find the real cause when she started to shake and quiver like crazy for a moment and then expanded up and out for a brief moment. after a short pause she expanded again, and again. After a few moments the growth stopped and once Rose's shock wore off she took a look around trying to get a sense how big she was.

"looks like I'm good bit bigger than that boy now, but still have a ways 'til i catch up to my sister." looking at the bottle still in her hand and lifting up to her face she smiled. "Of course i can;t simply catch up, I'm the bigger sister after all." She took another, this time much larger swig form the bottle. and then waited for the growth. This time the familiar shaking and quivering came much quicker and Rose grinned as she started to expand up and out again.
1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.title: Rose decides she wants to be the big sister again.

choices: As Alan passes Casey she snatches the bottle and starts chugging.
Alan gets another taste of the Jumbo Gro
1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.content:
Alan was finally close to catching up the Casey as he entered the city center, though he was starting to get a little winded from the long jog he had been on to do so.

"Casey... CASEY!" Alan started yelling trying to get her attention.

Casey turned around after hearing her name and upon seeing Alan she ran over and lifted him up into a big hug before setting him back down. "Alan, what are you doing here?"

"I just wanted to thank you thank you for scaring off Evan."

Casey started to blush slightly "You don;t need to thank me, i'm sure anyone my size would have done the same thing..." there was a brief pause as Casey looked down at Alan. "Oh hey, since you're here, did you want to play with me??

"Sure" Alan nodded, "What were you playing?"

"Oh, i hadn't actually decided, i just figured since everything was closer to my size it would be safer to play here in downtown rather than our neighborhood." Casey paused a moment before coming up with an idea. "My Aunt lives around here and always talks about this biog park nearby, i bet that would would be fun at our size."

Alan nodded in agreement and the so Casey started to lead the way to try and find the park. However, before too long Alan started to fall behind thanks to Casey greater height giving her a much longer stride.

"Casey, wait up."

Casey turned around and realized Alan had fallen behind and started walking towards him. "looks like we might have some problems with me being so much bigger... Oh i know what don't you drink some of the Jumbo Gro so you're really big like me."

Alan started to search himself for the green bottle when he remembered what he had done with it. "I don't have it anymore, I left it with you older sister before I started chasing after you." Alan suddenly noticed Casey's expression when he said this, which well hard to read was not very happy. "Should I not have done that?"

Casey shook her head. "Oh no, that's not a bad thing, big sis isn't a bully like Evan or anything bad like that. I was just thinking that we should find My big sis before we start playing." Casey lifted Alan up to her chest, holding him like an over sized doll. "Let's get going."

Alan wasn't quite sure how to feel about being carried around like this; it was better than tiring himself out trying to keep up with Casey, but at the same time he already felt small next to her enormous size and being carried like this made it that much worse. Before he could come to a decision however, he suddenly found himself on the ground. Looking up to ask Casey why she had dropped him he saw here looking down a side street, turning his attention the same direction he got his answer: Rose.
At 25 feet tall Alan was definitely big, though not much compared against Casey's 75 foot tall body, but even that seemed small compared to Rose. At 200 feet tall Rose stood, resting her elbow on one of the few building to rise about waist level, a cocky grin on her face as she looked at her younger sister.

"So where were you and boyfriend heading off to little sis?"

Casey started to blush and frantically start denying Alan was her Boyfriend. While she was doing this Alan suddenly remembered they had actually been looking for Rose and after pulling himself off the ground walked over to her.

"Actually we were looking for you, do you still have the green bottle I left with you?"

Rose stopped giggling at her sisters flustered behaviors after a moment and looked down at Alan. "Green Bottle.. Oh." She leaned down and handed the bottle of Jumbo Gro to Alan. "You mean this stuff right, I suppose I don't have as much use for it anymore if you want to use it." She stood back up most of the way, planting a hand on top of Casey's head and mussing up her hair. "After all I'm the big sister again, right Casey."

Alan was about to start drinking the JumboGro, when re realized standing between the two enormous sisters on this side street was already feeling a little cramped and made his way towards the street Casey had been walking down while carrying him to get a little more room.

1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.content:
The bottle of Jumbo Gro changed hands back and forth between the sisters as they continued to grow bigger and bigger.

“I told you, he’s not my boyfriend!” Casey snatched the bottle from her larger sister. Drinking some of the contents before Rose snatched it back.

“Well you seem awfully friendly and protective of him if you ask me.” Rose watched Casey rise up to 2600 feet and then started chugging from the bottle of Jumbo Gro setting off her own growth.

“I just like being nice to people,” Casey snagged the bottle from Rose just as she reached Casey’s own height, watching as she kept growing. Just as Rose’s growth ended at a staggering 3800 feet Casey started drinking from the Jumbo Gro.

Rose snatched the Jumbo Gro from Casey mid swallow, watching as a moment later her little sister started growing again. “If you like being nice so much, you should let me stay the bigger sister.” Rose brought the bottle to her lips and started drinking.

Casey snatched the bottle back , not yet done growing before taking a swig. “I think you’ve been the bigger sister for long enough, not to mention you’ve been kind of mean about it.”

Both sisters were about 5000 feet tall at this point and both were still growing. Rose reached to try and snag the bottle once more, but this time Casey was expecting it and held onto the bottle. The two sisters started having a tug of war over the bottle as they continued to grow.

“Let go Casey, i’m Older and should be the bigger sister.” While both sisters were still growing, Rose’s growth was starting to slow down leaving Casey with a larger lead as the time passed.

“Ok” Casey let go, causing Rose to fall backwards, losing her grip on the bottle causing it go flying off.

Rose stood back up, her growth having come to a stop leaving her at 5200 feet in height. “Why did you do that, now we’ve lost the Jumbo Gro.”

“Well you asked nicely.” Casey’s own growth came to a stop, leaving her the bigger of the two at 5500 feet tall. “Though, while i would like to have a bigger lead, i think this is a good way to leave things.”

It hadn't taken Alan long to realize that sticking around while Casey and Rose fought over the Jumbo Gro wasn't a good idea. Sure that idea that Casey might 'like like' him was kind of exciting, but Casey was a little preoccupied fighting with her sister. Casey had also been nearly fifty time Alan's size when he made his escape, and Alan had no doubt she was still growing with how things were going between Rose and her.

The thought of Casey getting bigger and bigger filled Alan with an excitement that left his nether regions tingling. Wanting to see how big Casey was you stop figuring you had been running long enough to be out of danger. Just as Alan turned around to look something hit him in the face and he stumbled back, falling to the ground in the process. rubbing his forehead Alan glanced around trying to figure out what hit him only to find a familiar green bottle not too far in front of him. Alan stood up, walking over and grabbing the bottle, somewhat confused.

Looking towards Casey and Rose he was immediately shocked and excited at just how huge they were, happy to see Casey as the taller of two, but the didn't seem to be doing any more growing. In fact while the sisters were visibly arguing still, they no longer seemed to be snatching the bottle of Jumbo Gro back and forth. Alan glanced at the green bottle that had hit him, realizing that, while he wasn't sure how or why Casey and Rose no longer had it, this was the Jumbo Gro.

As exciting as Casey growing bigger had been, the realization that he could grow bigger was even more exciting. He wasn't entirely against the idea of sharing this with Casey, but first he need to fix the problem of just how comparatively tiny he was. Glancing back at the sisters, seeing Rose starting to walk away and frantically looking about, Alan tried to figure how big they were; while the building and distance made it hard to really tell, Alan figured they were likely in the ball park of a Mile tall. If Alan was even remotely close on that guess he had a lot of catching up to do. Alan pinched his nose closed, remembering the less the pleasant taste of the Jumbo Gro, before bring the bottle to his lips, tilting his head back and gulping down its contents for as long as he could before taking the bottle out of his mouth and gasping for air. Just as Alan caught his breath he felt a familiar quivering feeling before shooting upwards at a surprising speed, his body adding dozens of feet of height with each passing minute, all the while he thought a showing up Casey and Rose.

Even was trying without much success to hide behind one of the bigger houses in the neighborhood, curled up in a ball and leaned up against the house in question he was really only hidden from a small number of viewpoints. Evan had been hiding here since Casey had scared him off. After the shock of a kid that was somehow bigger than him threatening him wore off he realized the Colossal little girl was Casey, one of those overly nice kids who probably wouldn't hurt a fly, and while he briefly though about conf her and calling her bluff, though her much larger size made for a stronger argument to why that might not be a good idea. However, it seemed long enough time had passed that Evan was confident that she hadn't given chase after her threats. Trying to sneakily look out from his hiding place, Evan confirmed the coast was clear and stood up to his full 50 foot height, noticing that Casey seemed to be heading towards down town, and Alan seemed to be trying to chase after her.

Evan wasn't quite happy no longer begin the biggest kid around, but since Casey and Alan were headed towards downtown no one was around to stop him pushing around the comparatively tiny normal people in their neighborhood. However as Evan thought of what to do he noticed a growing figure a few blocks away that looked kind of like a slightly older version of Casey. her growth came to a stop at about the same height as Evan, maybe a few feet taller. Evan figured that with their mostly equal heights he could probably take on this new giant and figured he should before she decided to try and ruin his fun to. Walking towards the girl he heard her saying something about not yet catching up to her sister before bringing a familiar green bottle up to her face. She said something at this point but Evan was more Concerned about the bottle of Jumbo Gro, and how he needed to get his hands on it and get back at Casey.

Evan went into a full run towards the girl at this point hoping surprise and speed might let him get the bottle despite the height disadvantage he was about to have.

As Rose's second growth spurt slowed to a stop she was 100 feet tall, she briefly looked at the bottle trying to decided if she wanted more of a height advantage over Casey or not. Rose frantically glanced around not sure what had happened, but suddenly realized she no longer had the bottle of Jumbo Gro. Noticing a boy about half her height lying in a heap off to her side, a shallow crater next to him showing just how rough a landing it had been figuring this was the flesh colored blur form a moment ago, and likely the one with the Jumbo Gro she quickly went over to reclaim said bottle. Once she was standing next to the boy she realized two things: 1) he was unconscious, and 2) he didn't have the Jumbo Gro in his hands. Looking around to see where he might have dropped it she gasped once it was located; sticking out of the boy's mouth was the familiar green bottle, and it was no doubt freely pouring its contents into it's new home.

Rose snatched the bottle out of his mouth with a pop, and then was shocked when she noticed the bottle seemed just as full as when Alan had left it with her. She started at this confused for a moment until she realized the unconscious boy was shaking and quivering not unlike she had before growing. Rose realized she was likely about to lose her title as the biggest, and had this sinking feeling the new champion was going to take the lead by a wide margin. As the boy started to bloat up and out in spurts, Rose started to run, Bottle of Jumbo Gro in hand, figuring the farther she was form this unconscious growing giant the safer she was.

1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.content:
Alan trundled after Casey as fast as his fat little legs could carry him. The giant girl lumbered unhurriedly down the middle of the street, but the more than 50 foot height advantage she had still meant Alan had to exert himself in an attempt to match her stride—even if her stride was more of a waddle.

“Casey!” Alan called. Casey must not have heard him over the thunder of her own footsteps, because she didn’t slow down at all. Moreover, car alarms were by now sounding across the entire block, set off by the tremors of the giants’ movements.

Ahead of him, Casey felt a crunch under her foot. She jerked in surprise, and Alan could see her huge bare backside, nearly as big as he was, shake with the sudden movement. Casey had been unaware that a small car had been hidden under the expanse of her body. She stopped and bent over, struggling to shift her bulk out of the way so she could see the ground below her and try to survey the damage.

“Oh, no! I’m sorry!” Casey cried out in her deep voice. “I didn’t see anything! I didn’t hurt anyone, did I?” She was straining to push aside her hulking gut to get a clear look toward her feet, but she was just too massive. She didn’t regret her new body—the strength and power were way too awesome—but it seemed like she was never going to see her toes again. Casey started taking a couple of steps backward, until she backed into something heavy. Something that let out a muffled “Ooof!”

If the bottom-heavy girl's center of gravity wasn’t as low as it was, Casey probably would have toppled over backward, doing who knew how much damage, since the unexpected obstacle struck her below her thighs. Casey started at the unexpected contact, and took a quick step forward. Every bit of flab on her body jiggled furiously at the sudden movement, and she felt the car crunch underfoot again. Then a tremor shook the neighborhood.

Casey turned around to see what had caused the commotion. Alan lay dazed in the street, a network of cracks and up-heaved pavement surrounding his rotund bulk, and still with jiggles rippling across his body.

“Oh! Alan!” Casey exclaimed, reaching down and helping the boy up. She set Alan on his feet and then had to take a step back so she could see the smaller boy’s face over the expanse of her belly and chest. She smiled down at Alan as he wobbled a bit on his feet, still slightly dazed from the collision.

“Uh, hi, Casey,” Alan said, looking up at his savior. He suddenly felt very awkward. Casey was huge! More fleshy mountain than girl. She was grinning down at him, her head proportionately small atop her swell of chins, which themselves jiggled atop her wide, bottom-heavy body. Her wide, bottom-heavy, and naked body, Alan was reminded, blushing.

“What’s up?” Casey asked, seemingly not noticing Alan’s embarrassment.

“I, uh, never got to thank you for saving me from Evan,” Alan said. “I think you saved my life!”

Casey laughed. “He was just a bully! And bullies are always afraid of someone bigger than them!” She slapped her expansive belly for emphasis, and her entire pear-shaped body shook and jiggled.

Alan blushed furiously. “Yeah, maybe…but I was wondering if I there was some way I could pay you back. I owe you.”

Casey stopped laughing. “Pay me back…” she mused. She brought a finger to her chins, thinking. Was there anything she needed help with? She had trouble imagining needing help with anything ever again. And Alan was so small… not even reaching her waist—or at least where she thought her waist should be. She grinned down at him, his nervous looking face peeking past her own vast bulk. Alan was the size of a house, but he was like a little baby to her!

But then… Casey vaguely wondered about using her new body to pay back her own bullies. Maybe Alan could help with that? Maybe flush them out from where she couldn’t reach?

1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.content:
Casey grinned down at the boy standing in her vast shadow. “Well, I think first you have to be a little bigger,” she said. “Why don’t you drink more of the stuff? Then you can be as big as me!” She punctuated her statement by slapping her belly again.

Alan just stood there, an unreadable expression on his face. “Well, c’mon,” Casey said. “What are you waiting for?”

“I-I left the bottle back at your house, I think,” Alan said. “With your sister.” He looked plaintively up at Casey. “Is that bad?”

Casey frowned. “N-No,” she said. “But I was kinda hoping I could be the big sister for once.” She glanced up and scanned the area for any sign of a giant Rose. “I think we’re OK, but you’d better go back and get the bottle and drink it before Rose.”

Casey started turning around, slow and awkward with her extra-wide bottom end. “Once you’re big, come find me downtown. I bet I’m hard to miss,” she said cheerfully, and started to waddle away.

Alan stood there in the street for a long while watching Casey lumber away on her bloated legs, tiny and non-proportionate to her giant, egg-shaped frame, but carrying her along at a good clip nonetheless. The ground shook, cars bounced, and windows shattered with her every step. Then he nodded and turned around to waddle back toward Casey’s house. He sighed. He should be happy. Evan couldn’t bother him with Casey looking over his shoulder, and he was a giant. A real giant! He looked at the houses he was walking past. He could see over the roofs! But, he thought, glancing back at Casey, he was short compared to his friend, and the “little” girl undoubtedly out-weighed him by several tons.

Alan had been outclassed twice now, first by Evan and now by Casey. His friend wanted him to grow to her size. But, he thought, why stop there? A mischievous grin formed on his face. Wouldn’t Casey be surprised if she was the short one compared to him! Yeah! He was going to stomp back and get the Jumbo-Gro back from Rose, then he was going to outgrow everyone!

Alan started trundling quicker toward Casey and Rose’s house, ignoring the people watching the house-sized boy stomp down the streetway he had come. As he approached, he could see that…

“So that’s why all three of you have gotten so gigantically huge because of this? I wonder!” Rose was beginning to look curious, which she already had an idea for it to use the bottle in all.

1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.content:
Alan stood in front of Casey and Rose’s house, surveying the empty yard and sidewalk. There was no sign of either Rose or the bottle of Jumbo-Gro he had stupidly set down. But on the plus side, there was also no sign that Rose had drank the stuff herself.

“Rooooooose,” Alan called, eyes on the house. “Can you come out? I wanna talk.” There was no signs of life from the two-story house. Alan grinned mischievously. “I’ll just come knock.”

Alan strode into the yard, but not before heaving up his lower bulk and letting it smash down on an unoccupied car parked in front of the house. That was pretty fun, so he then swung his heavy belly into a tree in the middle of the yard. The trunk split with a loud CRACK and the tree fell aside. Alan smiled. This was great! The strength! The power! And soon he would be even bigger!

Then he saw it, a flutter of the curtains in the second-floor room to the right of the front door. He strode over, stopping outside the room. He leaned down to peer inside, but the curtains had been firmly drawn again.

Alan tapped on the window on gently as he could. “C’mon, Rose, I just want the bottle I gave you.” There wasn’t any sort of response, so he tapped again, harder this time. A crack appeared in the window. “C’mon, don’t make me come in there.” This time, Alan got a response.
1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.title: Nothing. No sign of Rose or of anything unusual

1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.content:
Alan was about to tap on the window again, even harder, when the curtain drew back and Rose appeared in the window. She stared nervously at the boy who was currently the size of her house, then slid open the window.

“W-w-what do you want?” Rose asked tentatively.

“Didn’t you hear me?” Alan said, irritated. “That bottle. I need to get bigger!”

“Don’t you think you’re big enough? You’re, like, the size of my house!”

“And I’m not even half the size of your sister! Just give me the bottle!”

“Ummmmm…” Rose was backing away from the window now.

Alan had had enough. He reached his hand through the window, easily tearing through the screen, and wrapped his fingers around the smaller girl. He was trying to maneuver his hand to pull Rose out of the room when he felt his grip shifting. His fingers were being forced apart.

“No way…” Alan said. There was no way Rose was strong enough to pry his fingers apart! He was one of the three strongest people alive! He readjusted and tightened his grip, which got a groan from Rose. Before he could pull her free of the house, though, he lost his grip again.

“What are you doing?” Alan said irritated. He extracted his hand from the room and leaned down to peer into the window.

“Awwww, Rose. No!”

Inside her room, Rose was gripping the bottle of Jumbo-Gro in her hand, a small stream of green liquid dribbling from the corner of her mouth and a defiant expression on her face. Already, she looked like she had gained almost a hundred pounds or so around her middle, and her tight shirt was creeping up her expanding midsection, exposing her belly button. At the same time, Rose’s thickening waist had popped the button on her jeans and was forcing the zipper down, exposing straining blue panties.

Rose continued to visibly grow and bloat right before Alan’s wide eyes. So far, Rose’s growth was much greater horizontally than vertically, though her frame had gained a noticeable bit of height to accommodate her increased bulk. As Alan watched, Rose’s flabby upper arms tore through the sleeves of her t-shirt, and the seams on the sides of her jeans ripped and popped as her hips, butt, and thighs thickened beyond their capacity.

Rose rapidly acquired the bottom-heavy, blubbery bowling-pin figure typical of drinking Jumbo-Gro. Her ruined t-shirt hugged her upper chest, but a huge rip down the front exposed a stretched and tattered training bra which was losing the struggle against a flabby, ballooning chest bigger than anything it was meant for. Rose’s shredded jeans and straining underwear were still clinging to her, but they were largely hidden under the flab of her belly. Rose’s head, forearms, and lower legs hadn’t grown much at all, and her defiant glare looked absurd on her proportionately tiny face perched atop her pear-shaped bulk, which in turn looked ludicrous supported by her little legs. She had gained maybe a couple of feet of height, putting her around 7 feet tall, but was still far smaller than even Alan, the smallest of the Jumbo-Gro giants. Alan smirked. He didn’t know why Rose hadn’t become a giant like him, Casey, and Evan, but he didn’t care. He was mostly thinking about how he could still get the bottle.

He was about to reach back into the room when Rose’s eyes widened and her body began to shake, sending ripples through her flabby form. Suddenly, she started rapidly growing taller in addition to wider. Her tattered clothes exploded off of her expanding body as her head connected with her bedroom ceiling. Rose yelped and hunched down to give herself some space, but was only reminded that her body was still growing out as well as up, as her wide hips knocked aside a bookshelf and her expansive rear end put a sizeable dent in her wall. And even hunched, Rose’s head and upper back were quickly pressed against the ceiling again. She placed her hands against the ceiling and started pushing, and the ceiling started giving way.

However, before Rose could stand up into the newly exposed attic, both she and Alan became aware of the groaning in her bedroom floor. Alan started backing away from the house, and Rose had just enough time to shoot a frightened look through the window at him before the floor gave way under her enormous weight.

Rose gave out a short, basso cry, and the house shook. Dust blew out of her open window, and the windows of the floor beneath her bedroom blew out, with more dust and debris pouring out of them.

Alan took another couple of shuffling steps back from the house, not even noticing that his butt knocked over a basketball hoop he had backed into. The house continued to groan and shake and cracks appeared in the walls, and three people—probably Rose’s and Casey’s parents and a sibling—fled the house—but there was no sign of Rose.

His earlier irritation with Rose replaced by concern, Alan stepped toward the house. “Uh, Rose? Are you OK?”

There was no reply, but the house continued to shake and rumble. Alan took another step forward. He was about to call out again when the section of roof above Rose’s bedroom exploded outward and Rose’s head emerged out of the hole. She blinked, looking surprised, then grinned at Alan, perfectly eye-level with him.

“Yeah, I’m OK,” she said, her voice greatly deepened. As she spoke, she continued to grow, and her shoulders rose out of the hole.

“In fact, I’m better than OK!” By now her chest had risen above the roof, which was starting to bulge outward in a large area centered on her exposed upper body.

“I’m doing GREAT!” Rose boomed as most of her home’s remaining roof heaved up with a loud CRACK and then sloughed off her bloated belly, butt, and hips as her lower body continued to grow up and (especially) out. A moment later, the walls of the abused house collapsed outward as Rose’s ever-expanding body pushed through them.

By now Rose was at least as tall as her sister, and was still expanding. Alan had to back up into the street to see Rose’s face over her bulk, which heaved aside more of the ruined structure of her house as she continued to grow.

Finally, Rose stopped growing. She was at least twice as tall as Casey, and her mountain of a body filled up the entire property—and then some—where her family’s home had once stood.

Rose took a couple of steps back, crushing a fence, a shed, and a couple a trees, and bent over so she could see Alan past her expansive lower body. Alan was so tiny! Rose could hardly believe the boy had once towered over her. Now he probably didn’t even reach her knees!

“I can see why you wanted more of that drink,” the 150-plus foot girl boomed down at the little boy, standing nervously in her vast shadow. “This is really cool!” Rose straightened back up, and Alan was lost from view under her bulk. “I’m so big and powerful!” She beat her bare chest like a pear-shaped King Kong, and her flabby body jiggled. “I’m gonna go see my little sister,” Rose said. “You’re welcome to whatever’s left in the bottle” She kicked at the rubble of her family’s home with one foot. “If you can find it.” She chuckled and strode forward.

Alan had to hurriedly step back as Rose stepped into the street—the girl was so massive that her bulk extended past the sidewalks and over the surrounding lawns by a fair margin. In his haste, Alan was tripped by a pickup that had been parked in the driveway behind him. Though he might be dwarfed by Rose, the rotund 25 foot boy still outweighed the truck by several tons. It didn’t stand a chance, and was instantly crushed into a metal pancake under Alan’s huge rear end.

Rose hadn’t seemed to notice any of that, and turned to trundle down the street toward downtown. Each one of her steps sent out a tremor and buckled the pavement, and her extra-wide body knocked aside trees and streetlamps as she passed.

“So long, shorty!” Rose waved over her shoulder without bothering to turn around. Alan could only sit there, on the scrap metal that had been the truck, eyes wide.

1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.content:
"Ohh, you want to come in," asked Rose from inside, "I can just come out nice and easy for you."

Alan was a little confused until he heard a little slurp and a pretty loud BELCH come from inside. Alan's heart sank and he grew increasingly concerned. And while he wasn't able to see anything, he could hear another particular sound. A faint creak was forming slightly, like something stretching. Another creaking nose occurred, like some sort of material enduring a lot of pressure and weight. Then a loud BUMP was heard followed by a faint "ouch" from inside.

"Rose, you didn't," cried Alan as he tried to peer inside.

"I most certainly did," she replied with a faint chuckle.

From the outside, Alan could see the roof of the second floor begin to quake and shudder, as a small figure began to appear from within the house. It was Rose, with her head breaking through the roof, leaving a hole that could show part of her figure. But the front window of her room was beginning to show another part of her; her now protruding belly was expanding and breaking the window entirely. As she continued her growth spurts, her body broke off more of the facade of her room, fully exposing her new physique in front of Alan. Her shirt was nearly in tatters, only covering her now enlarged chest, while her belly was fully exposed in all of its enormity. Her arms were slightly thicker but were hardly anything to compare to her body. Her legs were hardly any bigger than the rest of her but were thick enough to support her weight as they dangled off the edge of her newly-ruined room. Her butt was almost as large as her belly, as it practically broke her closet, drawers, bed, and bedroom door upon impact. Her face was a bit dumbfounded by her new body, as it looked slightly chubbier with chubby cheeks and a double chin forming. All while holding the bottle of Jumbo-Gro in her hand.

Rose was looking pretty big, but not as big as Alan. But is that the case or could she be even bigger?
1353322222222222222222222221222211212111.title: Something's Amiss At Rose's House...

choices: Go find Evan and get revenge for the latest beat down
Go after Casey to show here up as the new biggest kid in town.
1353322222222222222222222221222211212112.content:
As Alan watched Casey waddling down the street, the very large bottom portion of her pear shaped form swaying as she did, Alan's mind was racing. What started as a normal day had quickly changed when he got home and mistook a bottle of plant grow formula for soda; suddenly he was a giant and getting revenge on the bully that had been tormenting him for months. He'd only had a little bit to enjoy being a giant, not to saw he stopped being one at twenty five feet tall, but when Evan was suddenly twice that height looking for payback and Casey showed up tripling Alan's height and thankfully saving him from Evan, Alan somehow felt shorter than when the day started. If only he had someway to grow again.

Alan sighed plopping his large rear on the ground "But that'll never happen." Alan lifted the bottle up to his face. "Since Casey had this on her i bet she drank a bunch of it to get so huge, and i bet that's how Even got so big to, so there can't be any left by now."

Alan was about to toss the bottle aside when he realized something, there was a sloshing sound as he moved it around. Bring the bottle up close to his eye he looked at it and realized he was very wrong. Somehow the massive growth of Casey, Evan, and even himself to a point had used hardly any of the stuff, the miraculous bottle of Jumbo-Gro was over half full still. Alan's face erupted into a hug grin as he got back to his feet and chugged a mouthful or two of the stuff before having to stop due to the nasty taste, but quickly went back, managing another mouthful before having to stop.

Alan contemplated a third go, after all he was wanted to be the biggest again, but his scrunched up face and stuck out tongue showed just how bad this stuff tasted. However, before Alan could decided if he wanted to take a third go at the bottle a familiar feeling welled up in his gut followed by strong quivering and shaking. Suddenly Alan ballooned up and out seeming to double his height in an instant, a moment later it happened again this time leaving him at height where he would be staring Casey in the eyes if she were still around. Again and again he bloated up and out in bursts until finally it seemed to stop, leaving him at a truly massive and rotund 200 feet tall. Alan smiled ear to ear realizing how massive he was and was about to set the bottle aside, but then remembered what happened last time he did that and decided to keep the bottle with him for the moment as he contemplated what to do next.

Alan had two minds to come up with the situation, wether would he follow Casey to show his newly sized stature, or meet obese giant bully to have a even colossal showdown? He chose the latter and that smirk says something with that regard.

“I can’t wait to see Even’s face when I see him with this new size of mine again.” Alan smirked and slaps his fat belly wobbling heavily as it happens.

So he wasted no time and starts waddling across the city to where Even was being tossed into by Casey beforehand. It could be anywhere within these distance depends how strong this obese giant little girl had thrown him into so, so Alan would be rather shocked if it goes much further than he had thought.

Eventually, it wouldn’t take long until he spotted Even sitting up on the park he had been tossed, whilst a bully had to come to terms in shock by the turn of events, especially when he saw another obese giant boy coming over with that confident looking smile to his face, and Even is not a very happy chappy to say the least.

“Oh great! I’ve been tossed all over the streets by that fat little girl, and now this?” Even was rather annoyed when he stood up and see’s Alan, who seems to be in match as far as size comparisons go.

“That was so funny! But I think I have some unfinished to do, and say like fight someone your own size?” Alan talks back more confidently than he was at that time.

“You know what? Fine!” Even made himself feeling heated before he would announce this combat as if he’s ready for a colossal showdown. “You and me, we’re fighting at ________, right now!”

Casey had finally reached down town, walking down the streets she realized she wasn’t quite sure what to do now. After rescuing Alan from Evan she realized how big she actually was and figured that the bigger buildings here would make a better play area for her. However, now that she was here she realized just how big many of these buildings were; sure the smaller buildings of her neighborhood were perhaps too small for her giant 75 foot size, but these skyscrapers were perhaps too big. She breifly rembered her aunt who lived in the city taking her to a big park, she decided this was a good idea and started trying to find her way to the park. She was in for a bit of a surprise though as she turned a corner and saw a very large boy standing in an intersection looking about somewhat confused.

Casey was shocked at first until she realzed she knew the boy. “Alan?”

The boy suddenly looked over at her and smiled jogging over to her “Casey,” Alan smiled down at her “I was looking for you.”

“Really?” Casey looked up at Alan’s smiling face.

“Yeah, i was wanting to show you i had a growth spurt.”

“I can tell, your a lot bigger than me even.”

“Yep, and it’s all thanks to this” Alan took out the bottle of Jumbo Gro, showing it to Casey.

Casey stared at the bottle for a moment, then at Alan. Thinking back to how the buildings here seemed a bit too big for her despite the ones in thier neighborhood being too small, she figured if she were Alan’s size, mate even a bit bigger she might be better able to enjoy the big buildings better.

“Hey Casey i have an idea.” Alan said.

“Uh huh.” Casey muttered still looking at the bottle.

“I bet it would be real fun to play hide and seek here begin so big.”

Casey looked away from the bottle and back at Alan’s smiling face. “That does sound fun.”

Alan set the bottle of Jumbo Gro down on top of a building. “You hide first ok.” Alan then leaned on another building crossing his arms and burying his face in them before counting.

Casey briefly looked at the bottle of Jumbo Gro.

1353322222222222222222222221222212221.content:
It was an average day in the science lab for a teen named Dalton, he is planning to unveil his new growth device that should grow bigger food and fruits, putting the end to world hunger.

Today was the day he was putting the final calibrations to fully prepare it to show to his professors, "Dalton when you're gonna be done already?" He groaned in annoyance at the sound of his 10 year old brother Jake, Jake was a rather small 4'5 for his age, his matted black hair, pale white skin, and brown eyes, and was wearing sneakers, a plain white T-Shirt and baggy cargo pants.

"What is it? Can't you see that I'm in the progress of making history?" He asked glaring at him, although he does truly love his little brother like anyone would, he was a pain in the neck to deal with, "With what that dumb machine?" Jake asked pointing to the thing.

"Why yes, this thing if it actually works should grow that bowl full of fruit and when I present it to my professor I'll get into college for sure." He said proudly.

Jake jumped up in excitement at seeing such a thing happening, "Oh can we try it now?" He asked, Dalton looked at him before shrugging, "I guess, I had to test it anyway." He said as he prepared the device by pressing a couple a button as a low hum emitted from the machine as it warmed up, it then fired a greenish yellow beam at the fruit.

Dalton looked at it intensely to see any changes, not noticing his little brother moving closer to the beam as his curiosity got the better of him, "This is cool." He whispered as he put his hand out to touch it.

Dalton saw what he was gonna do as he yelled, "Jake don't touch it!" But it was too late as his hand touched the beam as the boy yelped in pain from the initial hit.

He quickly turned off the machine as he ran over to check on his brother, concern clear on his face, "Jake are you alright?" He asked worried for his brother health, Jake looked at him as he said, "I'm alright big brother, I don't feel hurt." He said giving a nervous smile.

Dalton sighed in relief as he checked what went wrong with the machine, ignorant of what was happening to his brother.

Jake felt a warmth come over him as he felt his penis slowly harden, his breath coming short as he groaned and grew a few inches, his pants getting slightly tighter with a thin showing of skin on his pale stomach, after that he stopped growing for now.

In this scenario, a group of kids are at a Halloween party. There, a young woman is hosting a magic show. But her magic isn't just smoke and mirrors, it's real magic. So after the magician takes a break, one of the kids decides to use the wand on someone or on themselves.

1353322222222222222222222221222212222222.content:
"Lifa Lafon! The book is now gone!"

The group of children cheered as the magician, Alexandra Amazia, had made a textbook disappear from the palm of her hand using her magic wand, an old fashioned black stick with glitter on the base and neon lights on each end. Her tricks were amazing everyone at Brandon's birthday party. The young boy who had just turned 8 that day was enjoying his birthday as he and his friends were enjoying the magic show.

The only person who wasn't impressed with the show was Brandon's older brother Jason, who turned 10 about three months ago. And while he was always nice to his younger brother, he felt like the show was too childish and impossible. He almost wanted to upstage the so-called magician at the party, but didn't want to ruin his brother's birthday.

"Thank you children," said Alexandra while taking a bow, "I'm glad you enjoyed my tricks so far. I'm gonna take a 20 minute break, then we'll move onto my famous magic box trick!"

The children cheered as Alexandra took one last bow and placed her magic wand on a nearby table, as she walked outside the house. Brandon and her friends went into the other room to look over some of the presents he had already opened, leaving Jason the only one left in the room.

He walks over to the snack table and munches on a couple of chips, while looking at the wand Alexandra left behind. He slowly walked over and picked up the wand, looking over it intently.

"What a crappy looking wand," He said in disgust, "They really think this is supposed to be magic? Yeah right!"

He flung the wand around jokingly, pretending to be like Alexandra.

"Lifa Lafash. How about $100 cash," he said, aiming the wand at a nearby table.

Suddenly, a hundred dollar bill appeared out of thin air and landed on the table, shocking Jason. He looked over to grab the dollar and picked it up carefully. It was a real hundred dollar bill!

"This is real," he exclaimed quietly, "It's too good to be true!"

Then he had an idea... Something he always wanted to do... He placed the wand above his head and waved it around.

"Lifa Lavix. Make me five foot six!"

He tapped the wand on his head and began to shake and shudder. His body slowly grew taller, with his clothes growing with him slightly. He was growing from his old height of four foot ten and began to see things from a better perspective. The growth gave him a great feeling as he enjoyed every moment of it until it slowed down and he reached his new height.

"That was awesome," he said, looking at his new larger frame. He then took a look at the magic wand and decided...

13533222222222222222222222222221.content:
"Thanks for taking us camping tonight," your twelve year old brother, Logan, said, a smile beaming across his face. It was the first time your younger brother had ever been camping, and he had been planning it out and in general been really excited about it all week. You had agreed to take one of his friends along, and of course it ended up being his best friend, Xander, who was also the same age as Logan. Being four years older than your brother and in high school, it usually bugged you to hang out with him, but he was behaving himself today, and was really helpful picking a campsite out and setting up the tent.

"Yeah, thanks a lot," Xander piped in. Xander was slightly taller than your brother with a fairer complexion, but Logan made up for it by being stronger and faster. The two had been friends since elementary school, and while you had thought that Logan would eventually move on to other friends as he grew older, his friendship seemed to only grow stronger.

"All right, guys," you said as you zipped up the flap of the tent, "It's time to go to sleep. We need to be rested so we can wake up early and go swimming in the lake tomorrow!"

"Yeah!" Logan said. "That sounds great!"

You turned away as you prepare your sleeping bag, and when you turned back, you saw in the shadows that Xander had pulled out a small flask from his backpack. It seemed to be red, almost blood-like in consistency. He popped the cork from the top and brought it up to his lips and took a sip, drinking half of the flask. He then handed it to your brother, who likewise drank down the rest of the bottle.

"W-what is that?" you asked, slightly concerned.

"Nothing," Xander said, giving Logan what you are sure is a knowing look. "Just some fruit drink."

You looked at Logan, who nodded in affirmation. Shrugging, you turned back and crawled into your sleeping bag and zipped your self up. "Good night, boys," you said.

"Good night," they responded, as you drifted off into sleep.

A few hours later, you were awoken by the sound of howling. It sounded like a wolf - no, make that two wolves. They seemed to be very close to the tent. You hadn't seen much wildlife during this trip, but you know that two wolves could be bad news.

"Hey, guys, wake up. Do you hear that?" You turned towards the other end of the tent where Logan and Xander were sleeping, but didn't get an answer. "Guys?" You sat up and squinted your eyes. To your shock, you realized that the two sleeping bags where the boys were supposed to be sleeping were completely empty. At this point, you were on high alert. You grabbed a knife from your backpack and unzipped the tent flap, stepping outside into the cool fall evening.

You heard the howling again, and you knew it was coming from not too far from your way, seeming to be from your left. You turned that way and carefully and quietly walked towards the noise, trembling as you did so. As you stepped through the forest, you came to a clearing on a cliffside, and saw where the sound was coming from, and you couldn't believe your eyes.

Two creatures - what looked like wolves - were standing at the cliffside, howling at the full moon. As you got closer, you realized that these creatures were standing on their hind legs. They seemed to have a similar skeletal structure to humans, but were covered with fur - one with bright white fur, like an arctic wolf, and one with dark grey fur. The creatures were also much bigger than they should be, approximately eight feet tall, you estimated. As you got closer, you realized that the wolf-creatures were wearing clothing, and what's more, the clothing seemed to match what your brother and his friend were wearing earlier that evening...

Stunned, you held your breath, trying to make sense of this all.
13533222222222222222222222222221.title: Go for werewolf growth!

135332222222222222222222222222211.content:
You turned around and ran off, as quickly but also as quietly as possible. These wolves, or wolf-men, or whatever they were, had to be dangerous, and you didn't want to risk trying to confront them. It truly frightened you that they were wearing your brother's and his friend's clothing, but there wasn't anything you could do about it now. Arriving at the tent, you quickly jumped inside and zipped up the flap tight, crawling into your sleeping bag. As your head hit the pillow and you closed your eyes, you prayed that this was all a dream.

Sleep fell on you quickly, exhausted as you were, and the next thing you knew, sunlight had started to leak in around the seals and through the translucent plastic windows of the tent. Sitting up, you looked at the two smaller sleeping bags next to you, breathing a sigh of relief. Both boys were lying on top of their bags instead of in them, out like a light, their chests rising and falling rhythmically as they slept. You smiled, glad that everyone was safe, figuring that last night had been just a bad, and definitely very weird, dream.

As you watched the boys twitch in their slumber, though, you noticed one thing that concerned you slightly. The boys' clothes, which they had still been wearing when they had gone to bed, appeared to be stretched out somewhat. Their shirts and shorts hung loose on their small frames, and you noticed slight rips around the armpits and hips. Your thoughts immediately went to the eight-foot-tall wolves. It WAS all just a dream... wasn't it?

The sound of Logan softly yawning interrupted your thoughts, as your brother sat up and stretched his arms up into the air. He smacked his lips and turned to look at you. "Oh! Good morning, Seth!"

"Hey, li'l bro," you smiled cautiously, chuckling at his bed-head hair that practically was sticking straight up. "How was your night? Sleep well?"

"Oh, it went by pretty fast, I guess," Logan answered, a curious tone in his voice. "I pretty much fell straight asleep, almost as soon as I hit the sack and closed my eyes."

"Mhmmmmm," you murmured. "And, uh...what happened to your clothes?"

Logan glanced down at his baggy, ripped clothes, a guilty, panicked look appearing in his eyes. "My clothes? Uhhhh.... Well..." He brought his head back up nervously, trying to avoid eye contact with you as he did so. "We, uh--"

"We were wrestling last night!" You hadn't even noticed yet that Xander had woken up, but he now sat directly next to Logan, his freckly face beaming. "Yeah, we both woke up during the night, feeling a little restless, so we stepped right outside the tent and wrestled a bit. I guess we each pulled a bit too hard at each other's shirts and stuff, stretching them out."

"Exactly!" your brother confirmed, nodding furiously.

"I see. You guys probably shouldn't have done that. This area can get pretty dangerous, especially at night." Something about their sudden eagerness made you question their sincerity, but you couldn't quite place your finger on it, needing to find out more. "Did you see anything unusual? Any wildlife or something like that?"

Logan gulped, and you could swear you saw Xander elbow him in the side. "Nope!" he finally exclaimed. "It was just the two of us out there!"

You stared back and forth between the two boys questioningly. They seemed to be trying a little too hard to make you believe them, and Xander was definitely leading your brother by the hand, telling him what to say. It definitely seemed like odd behavior, but you let it slide.

The rest of the morning passed by uneventfully. You used a hotplate you had brought along to whip up some oatmeal, which the boys lapped up, seemingly more ravenous than you had ever remembered seeing them. T
Your brother, in particular, was a notoriously picky eater, usually hating plain oatmeal, but both he and Xander ate their entire bowls' worth without any complaints, even asking for seconds.

An hour later, as you started packing the tent and other supplies into your car, you noticed the boys' energy seemed to be sagging, and by the time they climbed into the back seat and you had put the car into motion, they were conked out once again, Logan's head leaning on Xander's shoulder, his leg twitching in his sleep. You chuckled, amused at the cuteness of the scene, but in the back of your mind you were worried that they had hidden something from you, something that might end up being important.

You made it home safely, dropping Xander off at his house first, then going home. Logan had regained his energy after his nap during the drive, and he put almost all the camping supplies away himself, making sure that they were stacked neat and tidy. You whistled in approval, impressed and a little shocked at Logan's suddenly helpful nature.

"Wow," you said as your brother wiped the sweat from his brow, "what's gotten into you today, Logan?"

"Ummmmm," he said, a sheepish grin slowly spreading on his face, "nothing really. I just... I'm just super grateful for you taking me and my best friend camping, when I know you probably had other things you could do with your friends." He walked up to you and wrapped his arms around your torso, and you returned the hug warmly. "Thank you, big bro. I had a great time!" He looked up at you and smiled, his face glowing.

"Don't mention it," you said, giving him a gentle and loving pat on the back.

The next month went by in a blur. Your teachers at school seemed to be assigning more and more homework and pages to study in every class. It almost felt like they each had forgotten that you had five other teachers who were all doing the same thing, and who all expected you to give their class the highest priority.

Through this hectic time, your brother had gone from being a slightly-annoying little kid to being extremely helpful and supportive of you. He couldn't help out much with your schoolwork, of course, but he did take on a few of your chores, mowing the lawn by himself and cleaning the bathroom you two shared, without you even having to ask. You didn't quite know what to think, but you swore to yourself that you'd make it up to him whenever you got the chance.

That chance came almost exactly a month later. Another full moon was due, and you finally had a three-day weekend from school. Your brother begged you to take him and Xander somewhere fun again, so you made sure the three of you had all finished your homework before you headed out, not wanting anything to be hanging over your head. Finally ready, the three of you packed into the car and headed off to go...
135332222222222222222222222222211.title: Morning Again

"What did you do?!" Zorak cried out in shock as he noticed the vitals that were displaying on the monitor next to the unconscious 12-year-old boy that they had beamed from his bed a few hours ago to experiment on in their small ship. Though on the short side, the skinny boy with pale skin and shaggy red hair was in good health, and represented the best test subject he had worked with yet. Until now.

"What do you mean, what did I do?" Qualax adjusted his glasses with a tentacle, unsure of what his supervisor was getting upset about. "I injected the Earth-child with the serum, just like you asked me to!"

Zorak picked up the bottle that Qualax had used, shaking it in his face. "No no no! This is the highly concentrated version of the formula! It's hundreds of times stronger than what we're authorized to use on a species of his physiology!"

Qualax's face dropped, realizing what he had done. "But-- that means…. Quick! We've got to find the antidote!"

Shaking his head, Zorak slid over to the ship controls. "The antidote only works with the regular strength formulas. No, we've got to abandon the mission and get the hell out of here, before it's too late!"

"But--"

"DO IT!"

With a sigh, Qualax pressed a combination of buttons on his console, and the boy began to dematerialize from their ship, reappearing back in his bedroom hundreds of miles below. The small ship he was on then turned away from the blue and green planet, zooming off into the galaxy, back towards where it came from.

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Lloyd Talusky threw up his arms in frustration as the machine made a loud grinding sound. "Darn it all!" He threw his safety goggles to the ground, just as sparks started to fly from the barrel of the gun, causing him to jump back in momentary fright. "This piece of junk will never work!" He shook his head and began to flick the switches, turning it off.

"What's wrong, dad?" Zack, his son, walked in through the attic door. Zack was eleven years old, and was skinny with short red hair, pale skin, and thick-rimmed glasses, just like his father.

"Oh!" Lloyd was startled at his son's sudden entrance, but then regained his composure. "It's nothing, son. I just had a momentary setback, that's all. Though I'm not sure if it's even worth trying anymore. Maybe making a size-changing machine is impossible."

"That's okay, dad," Zack said, smiling and placing his arm on his father's elbow. "I know you'll get it working eventually. You're a great inventor!"

"Yeah..." Lloyd hesitated, unsure of himself. But looking down at his son's green eyes, magnified by his glasses, full of hope and faith, made him feel slightly more confident. "Yeah! You're right, son! I'll get back to work right after lunch!"

He smiled and mussed Zack's hair, giving him a quick high-five as he left the attic. Zack started to come after him, but then he heard the machine start whirring behind him.

"Huh?" he said, turning around to face it. He saw that the lights and display monitor had all flickered back on, and the laser gun was slowly moving, turning gradually in his direction. "Uh, Dad?" he called out, down the stairs. "I think you may have left--"

He was cut short by a sudden blast coming from the laser, and he fell backwards onto the floor. The shock had knocked the wind out of him, and he was dazed and momentarily unclear of what had happened or where he was. He began to sit up as his dad rushed back in, a panicked look on his face.

"Zack!" Lloyd exclaimed, seemingly worried to death. He kneeled down and helped his son up, checking his pulse and forehead. "Are you all right? What happened?"

"Uhhh…" Zack shook his head quickly, trying to snap out of the daze. "I think I'm okay, dad." They both rose to their feet, as Zack looked around the room. Everything appeared to be just as it was before, only with a few loose papers having been knocked to the floor. "I don't know what happened. Something knocked me over."

"Was it--?" Lloyd turned towards the machine, quickly jumping to the display, which had turned itself off before he had come back into the room. He tried hitting several keys and buttons, but nothing seemed to respond. "Damn," he muttered. "It must have blown a circuit. That'll take me over an hour to replace." He shook his head and sighed. "Oh well, what's one more setback?" He half-grinned and walked back over to his son, placing his arm around the shoulder. "Now let's head downstairs. Your mom made tuna fish sandwiches!"

"Yuck!" Zack stuck his tongue out in disgust, smiling but only half-joking, as they left the attic, closing the door shut behind them.
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: What a Blast!

choices: Lloyd tries to get the machine working again so he can shrink Zack down.
Zack decides to go outside and enjoy his new height.
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Now, Zack," his mother started as she sat the plate down in front of him, "you're not going to leave the table until every last bite of this sandwich is finished, understand young man?"

"Ugh," Zack moaned. Picking up the sandwich, he sniffed at it a little, shaking his head. "Do I have to?" A sudden grumbling of his stomach betrayed his disgust.

His mother just smiled softly and turned back to the kitchen. "Every last bite."

"C'mon, son," Lloyd tried to cheer Zack up as he sat down next to him with his plate in front of him. "Tuna is brain food! It'll make you grow up to be smart, like your old man!"

Zack rolled his eyes and smiled. "Sure it will. Is that--" He stopped suddenly, beginning to feel funny.

"What's the matter?" Lloyd asked, looking at his son with concern. "Your face is looking flush all of a sudden."

"I… I don't know." Zack mumbled. He was quickly feeling extremely light-headed, and he could feel a thin layer of sweat forming on his face. Even more noticeable, though, was a pressure building inside of him, spreading through his entire body. It felt like his bones were trying to jump out of his skin.

And then it happened. Zack began to inhale deeply, and as he did so, he began to grow. It was a deep breath, lasting about five seconds, with his body expanding outward during it at a rather frighteningly speedy rate. He rapidly went from just under 4 foot 10 to 5 foot 2, then 5 foot 7, his chest pressing against his button-up shirt, causing it to stretch and nearly pop open. His shorts were now much too tight, and he could feel the fabric beginning to give way. Luckily, he was walking around the house barefoot, or else his toes might have popped through the ends of his shoes.

Finally, he stopped breathing, and with it his growing ceased as well. Standing up, three buttons on his shirt popped off, flying across the room, while at the same time his shorts began to rip down the sides.

"Holy mackerel, Zack!" his father cried out as he jumped to his feet. It soon became clear that Zack was now looking down slightly at his own father -- he was over six feet tall!

"Wow!" was all Zack could say, looking down at his tight clothes, a little dizzy and disoriented with how far away from the floor he now was. Looking back up, he stared at his dad for a good ten seconds, before finally stammering "D-do you think--"

"The size-changing machine! Of course!" Lloyd exclaimed. "It blasted you before we left the attic. That must be it!" His eyes lit up as he realized what this meant. "So-- so it works! I invented something that works!"

A smile formed on Zack's lips as well. "I told you that you'd get it working someday."

Meet Rick Johnson, a family man with a wife and two kids, but also an oddball inventor when it comes his occupation. He works at the Laboratory that is so secret, nobody is able to access to its premises. However he had his stuff being stored in the attic, and today it was a demonstration for the science festival, and Rick has been invited to bring one of his machines to demonstrate.

What he’s bringing is the size ray, which had been activated before, whilst it was an accident on some people to shrink down to size. Luckily his job was safe without being caught by bosses, and determined to never use this again, unless if it’s something for demonstration. He was carrying the size ray to the car, when he spotted a paperboy coming in by bike and was greeted by once this kid was now approaching his house.
