1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
If only the scientists had caught it sooner, they may have been able to do something... Maybe.

No one was quite sure how it started. The only things that the affected had in common were that they were all males either eleven or twelve years old. They seemed to be randomly spread out throughout the world, and didn't have anything else discernible in common, so the popular hypothesis was that some sort of event had affected the Y chromosomes of the affected while they were developing in their mother's womb. It only seemed to have around a one in two million chance of affecting a boy within this age range, but spread out over the entire population of the planet, that still meant around thirty boys were affected (the official estimate put it at 34). Some environmentalist groups blamed fallout from nuclear power plants, other more conspiracy-minded people claimed it to be the work of an alien race observing our planet, but one thing was for certain: for everyone but those affected, it was bad news.

In retrospect, there were warning signs for years beforehand. The affected boys did have significantly larger than normal appetites, and all were among the tallest boys in their age groups, but until the Reckoning Days, none had become unusual enough to be studied in-depth by anyone who would have been able to detect it. And since all the boys seemed to start experiencing their most noticeable changes within a few days of each other, by the time anyone thought about trying to do a study, it was too late.

What are these changes I'm talking about, you ask? Well, I'm surprised you haven't heard of it yet. I suppose I should start on the first Reckoning Day, with subject A, an eleven year old boy from Seoul, South Korea named Kwan. Kwan was a good-natured kid, competitive and athletic, and a pretty good baseball player. He started the day at five foot one inch tall, already very tall for an eleven year old, but by the time he got to school that morning, he had grown nearly a foot taller, his school uniform becoming untucked and his toes poking through his shoes. Though a little embarrassed that everyone was taking notice, Kwan still tried to go about his normal day, but before his first class was even halfway over, he was eight feet tall and his clothes had been ripped to shreds, leaving him almost naked. He was sent to the nurses office, and the nurse called both an ambulance and the police, but they turned out to be little help; when they arrived he was over twelve feet tall, completely nude, and his growth seemed to be picking up speed. At first, Kwan had been nervous and uncomfortable with the idea of growing, but as he got larger and larger, the sensation of growth felt more and more pleasurable, and the rush of looming over the other students and teachers started getting to his head. He pushed aside the adults trying to control him, bursting down the door and stomping through the school halls, ready to have some fun.

Kwan was only the first one to grow by a few hours. Throughout the next half-day, boys around the world started to become huge. One in Australia, one in Japan, two in both China and India... the news of growing boys started to spread, and people around the planet started to get nervous. By the time the day was over, eighteen boys in all had started to grow, some having only reached around twenty feet or so, while others had already ventured into the triple digits, including a boy from outside of Rio de Janeiro in Brazil who had already passed two hundred feet tall and was starting to cause some major havoc to the buildings downtown.

As I watched the news footage that night, I noticed that, even though the networks did their best to blur it out, it was obvious that each of the boys shown had an endowment much larger than a normal boy their age, and that the larger the boy, the bigger the package. Some even seemed to be starting to use it, though the shots would always be cut right before anything too graphic. It was a disturbing sight, and I wondered just what was going through those boys minds as they did what they did. Thankfully, most of the United States seemed to have been spared, with only one boy having grown just twenty-five feet tall in California, on the other side of the country from where I was.

As I continued to watch, however, I realized that my step-brother Andy perfectly fit the profile of the "affected", as the media had come to call them. He had just turned twelve a few weeks ago, was already only a few inches shorter than me at five foot three inches, despite being almost five years younger. I couldn't imagine him growing as much as any of these boys shown, but I supposed that would be the same thought any of their relatives would have had. Turning off the TV, I went upstairs to check on him, relieved to see that he was still the same height as before, lying down on his bed playing games on his phone.

"Hey," he said, putting the phone down for a minute and smiling up at me. "What's up?"

"Nothing, really," I said, stepping into his room. "I'm just a little rattled by what's happening."

He looked at me with a confused expression for a moment, his eyes then opening wider with comprehension. "Oh, you mean the giants?"

I nodded. "Yeah." I sat down on his bed as he scooted up, leaning against the backboard. "You know, you're around the same age as the boys who've grown. What would you do if it happened to you?"

Thinking for a moment, he shrugged. "I dunno. I never really considered that idea. I guess I'd just play it by ear." He smiled, then started to giggle. "Why, are you afraid of being the little brother for once?"

Returning his smile, I shook my head. "Not exactly. It's just something stuck in my head, I guess. Forget I asked." I stood up and started to leave the room.

"Hey, Ryan?" He called after me, and I turned around in the doorway. "Don't worry, if that kinda thing does happen to me, I'll make sure you're safe."

"Thanks, Andy." I waved goodbye and headed out of my step-brother's room towards my own, feeling a little better but still wondering what tomorrow would bring.

Looking back, I'm sure glad that I talked with Andy about it when I did, because it ended up being more important than I could've dreamed.

The six kids of the block had always played together, and with summer well underway they had nothing but fun time now! They all wore their swimsuits, and Melissa and Valerie carried squirt guns that they used to great affect in stinging the boys' butts. "Can't catch me!" Dillon called as he climbed up a tree in the Derans' yard. The lightest of the kids, he was an expert climber and always got away in games of tag.

"Oh no you don't; I'm gonna get you!" Melissa replied, sending a stream of water up into her friend's face, but with her arms occupied she couldn't go up after him. "One day I'll be big enough I can just grab you no matter how high you climb!" She laughed.

"Dream on," Dillon smirked. "Cool idea though."

Suddenly Melissa dropped her squirt gun and held her stomach.

"Hey, you ok?" Trevor asked as he hurried over.

"Yeah, all of a sudden I just got this big feeling in my stomach," the blond nine year old replied, standing back up and looking surprised as she looked Trevor right in the eyes. She'd been four inches shorter than him up until then. "Hey, did you just get shorter?"

"No, you're getting bigger!" Trevor exclaimed as he watched Melissa rise up another six inches in seconds. Her blue swimsuit was growing tighter around her body, her butt cheeks pressing against the material as her shoulders pushed around the straps. "How are you doing this!?"

"I'm not sure, but I was thinking about reaching Dillon when it happened!" Looking up the tree, she grew even more, now standing almost six feet tall. "I think I can grow just by wanting it!"

"Way cool, I wonder if we can do it too," Ryan said, the seven year old and youngest of the group closing his eyes and quickly starting to grow too. His swim trunks rose up his legs as he clenched his eyes and fists, pouring all his willpower into getting bigger. Four feet passed, then five and six, his head rising until it struck the lowest branches of the tree. 1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"C'mon, Ted, this hypnotism stuff won't work..."

"Trust me, Derek, I can definitely hypnotize anyone with this magic kit."

Ted was a young freshman in high school, trying to go for various stage talents. He's had many failures with talent shows, trying on different acts; ventriloquism, improv, acting, etc. So, he decided to do something old-school.

He found a magic kit at a local antique shop, with a guidebook included, and decided to try it out. He managed to get the hang of various tricks, from card tricks, to rings, and various other tricks. But there was one that would be considered a difficult trick to test... hypnotism. He tried it out on his pet cat, and it seemed to work. He hypnotized the cat into acting like a horse. He eventually snapped it out of the trance without any repercussions. But now it was time to test it on a human, preferably his 9 year old brother, Derek...

"Look Derek," he said, "Just let me test it out on you, and I promise, I won't ask for anything else."

"Alright...," Ted submitted, "But this is the only time I'll help you... And don't do anything humiliating to me..."

"Don't worry, Derek," Ted said, going through the pages of his guidebook, "I'll just try out a physical test of hypnotism."

"Physical," asked Derek, scared of what it meant.

"Just for a moment," Ted said, trying to calm Derek, "Nothing temporary. I'll make sure to reverse it afterwards."

"Well, alright, just get it over with..." Derek said, glumly.

Ted pulled out the watch and brought it to Derek's face, letting it swing back and forth. Derek kept his eye on the watch, as his eyes went into the same motion as the watch swung back and forth.

"You feel very sleepy...," Ted said, in a calm and quiet tone, "Your eyes are getting very heavy... very heavy..."

Derek began to doze off, as his eyes began to droop, until he fell into a deep sleep. Ted pocketed the watch and looked over his guidebook for instructions, then turned to Derek.

"Derek," he began, "You shall shrink to a slightly smaller size, from your height of 5'5" to a short 4'9". Do you understand?"

"Yessss," Derek said, in a monotone voice.

Ted took a quick glimpse into the book and spoke the words out loud...

A mitis magnitudine,
Magna crescat vobis summa,
Crescere, collapse, turris, amplificare,
Crescere ad corde desiderium...
[This was something I had translated into Latin]

Suddenly, Derek's head rose and his eyes shot wide open, showing nothing but the pupils of his eyes, which widened to match the size of their iris. His body began to shake, as Ted began to back away from him, afraid of what would happen. Then, Derek's body stopped shaking. Ted went closer to him to see what happened, until suddenly...

It happened quicker than Ted could even react to. Within seconds, Derek had blown past his original height of 5' 5" and was already nearly six feet tall, with no signs of stopping. His clothes started to let out a loud ripping sound, and looked to be getting tighter and tighter, his t-shirt riding up on his chest and revealing his stomach, while the button on his pants popped off.

Dumbfounded, Ted rapidly flipped through the book, trying to find out some way to stop or reverse this, but he couldn't find anything. As he looked back up at his brother, he was stunned to see that Derek was already over seven feet tall. His toes had punched holes into the front his shoes, and his shirt was now ripping at the seams, bursting at the same time as his pants ripped off once Derek hit eight feet tall. Ted slowly began to back away, trying to decide whether he should run away or try to figure out what the heck he could be doing.

Derek didn't seem to be reacting one way or another to the growth. Ted guessed he was still in the trance, but he had no clue how Derek would react when -- or if -- he ever snapped out of it. Whatever the case, something had to be done fast, because Derek -- now nine feet tall -- was nearing the ceiling. The only article of clothing left on his body was his skin-tight boxers, which were fighting a losing war to stay in place, and his socks, which before had come halfway up his calves, but now were barely covering his ankle, with the heels and toes having torn loose.

Once Derek's head hit the ceiling, however, his growth seemed to stop, rather abruptly, Ted thought. He breathed a sigh of relief, glad that the problem hadn't gotten worse than this. However, he only had a moment's rest, because just then...

"Hello, my name is Jared Cromwell, and I'm your host for America's favorite new show about kids that grow to fantastic heights, 'To Infinity and Beyond'."

The Theme Music plays as a montage starts of various kids growing huge and bursting out of buildings, crushing cars, and other similar actions, culminating in the 'To Infinity and Beyond' logo at the end. Credits start to roll.

"After last week's show about Alexis, the eight-year-old girl who didn't stop growing until her feet could fit on opposite sides of the Mississippi River, you probably think we've gone as far as we can go, that we can't possibly top ourselves."

Archive Footage of St. Louis, where two massive feet stand on either side of the river, with legs stretching up into the clouds. The subtitle reads: "Last Week"

"Well, I'm here to promise you that this week's episode is even more amazing, and will have you on the edge of your seats the whole show. Tonight, we focus on Samuel Richardson. Young Sam is twelve years old, less than a year away from being a teenager, but with all the exuberance and enthusiasm that a kid his age should have."

Sam, a twelve-year-old boy with a fair complexion, medium-length brown hair, and braces on his teeth, walks through the halls of his school wearing a backpack. The subtitle reads: "Samuel Richardson, Age 12"

"Sam has varied interests, into both sports as well as learning, and hopes to be either a professional athlete or a pilot when he grows up. Well, Sam, we'll definitely see you 'grow up' tonight, so to speak, but probably not in the way you were thinking."

Various footage of Sam at bat in a little league game, diving into the pool at a swim meet, and sitting at a desk at school with a book open, studying it intensely.

"Sam is the youngest of three sons. His oldest brother, Adam, is 18 and is a senior in high school, ready to head off to college in the summer. Eric is the middle child at 15, and according to Sam, he's the one with whom he fights the most with. We interviewed Sam before he started to grow, posing as a news team shooting a feature on young athletes.

Sam and his brothers horse around, and Sam and Eric wrestle in the backyard, Eric triumphing and pinning Sam to the grass, standing over him and taunting him. We then cut to the Richardsons' living room, where Sam is sitting on the couch in an interview with Jared.

Jared: "Sam, how would you characterize your relationship with your brothers?"

Sam thinks for a moment, hesitating, and then responds.

Sam: "My older brother Adam is pretty cool. He likes to go out and play catch with me, or toss the football, whenever he has the time. He's just really busy with school and sports and with college coming up. As for Eric… well, we fight a bit. I guess that's what brothers are supposed to do, right? He likes to tell me what to do all the time and whenever we have a disagreement over where to go or what TV show to watch, he claims that being older means that he gets to choose all the time. I try to fight back, but… you know…"

Sam looks slightly embarrassed, blushing and looking down at his feet.

Jared: "Know what, Sam?"

Sam: "He's… he's bigger than me. I can't do a whole lot when I'm nearly a foot shorter than he is. But once I grow some more and we're on more equal footing, then we'll see who's boss."

Cut back to footage of Eric lounging on the couch watching TV, while Sam watches from the kitchen with a look of dissatisfaction. The narration resumes.

"So, as you can see, life in the Richardson household is fairly stable, if a little tense between the siblings, as a firm hierarchy has been established. However, when Sam starts to grow bigger than his brothers, then that balance gets upset, and the results are fascinating. When we return from commercial, we capture it live on camera as Sam first starts to grow. You won't want to miss it."

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Even more choices...

choices: The first time Ethan enters his new middle school
A few months into the school year when he's already a notorious bully
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Ethan was a chubby preteen bully. He'd always loved to eat, and he has been teased about his weight throughout his childhood. In response, Ethan began to bully other children, eager to prove his superiority to them. Soon, the bully stopped being about trying to improve his self-esteem; he began to bully other kids simply because he enjoyed it. Around that time, Ethan also lost any sense of shame about his weight. That led to Ethan eagerly indulging his appetite whenever he could. It didn't take long before he found a way to combine his two passions, and Ethan began focusing his bullying on stealing other kids' food so he could keep making himself fatter and more overpowering.

Ethan's bullying didn't go unchecked, however. Many of his bouts of bullying were cut short by the intervention of adults. As much as Ethan could use his own size and weight to overpower the other children, he was still no match for the adults who were bigger than him. When adults intervened to save his victims, Ethan would sulk for hours, staring daggers at his would-be victim and the adult who saved them. He took pleasure in the times that his stare seemed to frighten them.

When Ethan took risks and bullied other kids with adults nearby, he had begun swallowing other kids food whole - or as close to whole as he could manage. That way, if he was caught, the adults couldn't make him give the kid their food back.

One time, just after he swallowed a little girl's apple whole, and seconds before a teacher pulled Ethan off of her, he whispered to her "Just be glad it's not you in here." He chuckled and patted him belly. A wide grin spread across Ethan's face when he saw how scared that made her. She's so stupid, he thought, she thinks I could actually fit her in my belly.

A few years had passed since then, and the kids at Ethan's elementary school had learned to be afraid of him. Recently, the preteen had reached the very beginning of puberty, and he admired how he seemed to be growing taller as well as fatter. His appetite also increased, if anything, to feed his growing body. He looked forward to testing out all the new things he could stuff into his belly now that he was growing up.

Now, at 12, Ethan was moving on to middle school for the first time. Ethan can't wait to start using his new height to teach all of the new kids at the new school to fear him. So many new victims, so much food to be given as tribute to his round, glorious belly. Little does Ethan know, his growth spurt isn't just the beginning of puberty, and it will take more and more to fuel his ever-growing body...

Where does the story of Ethan, the ravenous, growing bully, begin?
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Food makes him bigger and badder...

choices: He makes use of his new body...
He wants to eat more... The growth was so good...
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Ethan entered the school with a determined look on his face, wearing a denim vest, a black T-shirt with Metallica written on the front, navy jeans that were fading, and a pair of black boots. All accommodating his tall and fat figure, as he looked about 5 foot 3 inches tall and 280 lbs. of walking, talking, bully material.

As he walked down the hallway, he passed by various students who looked at him with a bit of fear, between his menacing glare and his large figure. Some of them knew of his arrival, while others had heard from the grapevine that he would be passing by. Either way, it was bad news for everyone...

Ethan looked around and saw a group of students with a large Tupperware container. He guessed it had snacks inside, but there was only one way to find out. He walked over as two of the students noticed him and backed away slowly, while he grabbed the other student holding the container by his shoulder.

"Well well well, what's going on here," Ethan asked, grinning from ear to ear.

The student looked behind to see Ethan, in all his large glory. He stared at the bully with wide eyes and shaking legs.

"I-I-I-I-I-I brought in some cookies from home," the boy said as he shook with fear in his voice, "I baked them yesterday..."

"Well isn't that lovely," Ethan said with mock excitement in his tone, "Why don't you let me take them off of your hands?"

"Well, I made them for my homeroom," the boy replied uneasily.

Ethan's smile started to fade away, as he began to push the boy into the lockers slowly using his big belly.

"Is that right," said Ethan in a hushed yet sinister tone, "You rather risk your good health than to give me those cookies? You must be a real moron..."

"I-I-I-I-I mean-- Uh, HERE! You can have them! All of them!"

"That's more like it," exclaimed Ethan as he took the whole container, then walked down the hallway laughing.

Ethan opened the container to see that the cookies were a variety; chocolate chip, sugar, snicker-doodles, pizzelles, butter pecan, etc. And they were all his for the taking. Wasting no time, Ethan gobbled down the cookies as he walked down the hall. Students who passed him by were uneasy with his eating style, as he had made a pig of himself, as crumbs flew around him as he ate. But he didn't care. Even if someone was to talk to him about how he ate, he would've knocked them on their butts.

As he was finishing off the container, he was by himself in the hallway, as it looked like everyone was in class already. But he didn't care, he was enjoying his treat. As he munched on the last cookie and swallowed it, he noticed that his belly was peeking out of his shirt slightly, as his navel was halfway visible. He patted his belly with pride, which was felling a little full but still had some room left...

GLOOORRRRRP!

A strange noise was coming from inside his belly, as he felt it quiver slightly. The quivers slowly began to affect his body, It felt like his entire body had goosebumps.

And then it happened...

Slowly but surely, Ethan's body began to grow. His fat frame slowly grew fatter, while his height slowly rose up inch by inch. His clothes were getting slightly snug on him, then eventually got tighter. He moaned slightly, as the feeling was something new yet exciting for him.

And as soon as it came, it faded away...

He noticed that his body looked slightly fatter, with his belly peaking out further and his clothes feeling very tight on him. He then noticed that he was slightly taller than the lockers around him. If he had to guess, he had to be a few inches over 6 feet.

And all he could do was grin like a madman...
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: First Day, First Growth Spurt...

choices: He runs into another student and steals their food
Off to the cafeteria to claim whatever school brekfast is left
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Over the past few months, Ethan has reveled in his growth spurt (upward and outward). As he began to enter puberty and both his body and his desires gradually shifted, he realized that his enjoyment of eating and growing was more than just hunger. Somewhere in his brain, a few wires had crossed between his gluttony and his bullying. In recent months, getting bigger and bullying other people combined into a sort of excitement that he couldn't quite explain. Now that he's seen a sudden growth spurt, that funny feeling of excitement coursed through his veins stronger than ever.

Ethan was smart enough to know this kind of sudden growth wasn't normal, but as he tingled with excitement, he had to know if it was a one-time burst. As a boy with an overactive imagination, he pictured himself eating and growing, eating and growing - becoming more and more powerful, conquering everything around him.

He snapped himself out of this daydream. He was getting way ahead of himself. The next step was obvious: keep indulging his hunger. Whether it caused him to grow or not, he always enjoyed eating for its own sake. All the better if he could combine it with the excitement of overpowering someone else.

The bell for class had already rung, but Ethan didn't care. Attending his surely boring first period class was completely insignificant next to his growing frame. He stomped through the halls - appreciating again how the school hallways seemed just the tiniest bit smaller than they did a few minutes ago - and looked for his next source of food.

Where does Ethan's search lead him?
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: He wants to eat more... The growth was so good...

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Delilah Jefferies was terrified of going into middle school. She was quiet, shy, and had trouble speaking to anyone. She eventually made a couple friends in her elementary school, bonding in no small part over their shared love of cartoons and drawing. But all her friends had ended up at a different school and now she knew no one. It was made all the worse that she had missed the bus and was now late for her first ever middle school class.

Juggling her books, sketchbook, and lunchbox, Delilah ran through the halls. Shy girl that she was, Delilah mostly looked down as she ran. That led to her running straight into another student as she rounded a corner. Everything she was carrying spilled out of her hand an onto the ground. Delilah barely managed to keep her glasses from falling. She pushed them back onto her face and gazed up at the person she ran into. At first, she couldn't see a face; all she could see was a round gut peaking out from under a strained black t-shirt.

"I'm really sorry," Delilah managed to mumble.

Ethan didn't even hear the apology. He leaned over and look down at her. Delilah could now see Ethan's pudgy face, but what she really noticed was his toothy, menacing grin. Delilah scrambled to try and recollect her spilled belongings.

"Well, well, well, what do we have here?" the rotund bully sneered. His eyes immediately locked onto her lunchbox. He snatched it up before she could stop him, and he eagerly pulled it open. Inside was not only Delilah's lunch, but also her breakfast since she was running so late. Two meals for the price of one: not bad at all. Ethan didn't know what kind of person Delilah was, or whether she would wield any kind of influence with the other kids. He decided to play it safe and make this a consuming show of force. Ethan position himself so Delilah could see him make quick work of her meals.

Ethan stared by pouring her entire pouch of cereal into his mouth, then tearing open her carton of milk to chug the whole thing down. He didn't bother chewing: he just let the milk sweep the cereal down his throat. Next, he tore into her breakfast banana, ferociously chomping it to pieces. He moved onto her lunch, all but inhaling her spaghetti and meatballs, guzzling her soda, and making a crunching, smacking mess of her small bag of chips. Finally, to top it all off, Ethan made eye contact with Delilah to make sure she was watching, and he swallowed her apple whole. He had no idea he could swallow something that big, but something about his new, larger body and his intoxicating sense of power told him to do it - all the better if it intimidated Delilah. He felt the apple bulge out his throat. It hurt a bit, but he particularly enjoyed feeling it plop into his spacious belly. Having obliterated two meals in less than a minute, Ethan burped and patted his gut. He smirked maliciously and glared down at Delilah, who was still scraping together her papers and books.

"My name's Ethan," he told her, "And I'm gonna rule this school. You're going to let me do whatever I want and not say a peep to anyone, because once I'm done here, no one will be able to stop me."

As if to drive the point home, his belly groaned and gurgled, both beginning to digest the food he consumed and warning of the growth to come, modest as it may be when he only consumed one student's food, instead of snacks for a whole class.

As Ethan gazes down at Delilah, he notices she is...
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The Bully, a Stolen Lunch, and Delilah's Secret

choices: Thinks she's dumb and laughs at her
Is intrigued and wonders how he might be able to use this information
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As Ethan gazed down at Delilah, he saw that she was blushing, obviously embarrassed. That was unusual. She was scared, sure, and that was normal, but embarrassment was not quite the usual response. Taking the time to examine the rest of the scene, now that food wasn't in the picture, Ethan saw something that might begin to explain it.

As previously mentioned, Delilah used to bond with her friends over drawing and cartoons. What she and her friends drew varied greatly, from Disney characters, to anime, to My Little Pony. But Delilah had a few interests that deviated from what her friends were into, and she was always shy about letting anyone else know about it. Starting at a young age, Delilah was unusually interested in food in cartoons. Silly cartoons interested her above all else because every now and then characters would consume huge amounts of food, with their bellies ballooning outward to ridiculous, impossible proportions. She could trace some of it back to some older cartoons that were outdated reruns even when she was very young. She could remember vague things about animal characters (maybe a wise-cracking rabbit and a duck character?) getting huge bellies and wobbling around as the food sloshed in their gut. Or there was another blur of a memory where some orange cat would laze around and eat huge amounts of food. A few variations on these ideas stuck out in particular. In one of the stories, a cartoon duck wished to be big and became so huge that he stomped around a city - even crouching down to guzzle food out of a fast food place like he was chugging down water. Or there was one about the cat where he ate so much he kept growing bigger and bigger. Soon, he was eating buildings, swimming pools, and - if she remembered correctly - even a TV news camera crew.

She knew it was silly - of course it was - so she could never quite talk to anyone about it. Still, those images made her feel funny. She had always been petite and extremely introverted, so these chubby characters charging through cities and gulping down food was so different from who she was that it was appealing - desirable, even. Her parents pushed her to eat more to reach a more healthy weight, and pushed her to speak up for herself at school, and that pressure was exhausting. Sometimes she wished people would just be okay with her staying quiet and puny. Maybe it would make her feel more alone and powerless, but in a way it would also be a relief to escape the pressure to be someone she wasn't.

One of Delilah's outlet for these feelings were her drawings. She had always liked drawing cartoon characters, whether they were ones that already existed or ones she made up. She shared some of her drawings with her family and friends, but others she kept secret. Those secret drawings were invariably of characters with big bellies. Sometimes they were girls, sometimes they were boys, sometimes normal size, and sometimes giant. She still couldn't quite explain why she liked characters like that, but she knew her friends never drew anything like that, so her secret was a little shameful.

And now the secret had come out in the worst possible way, to the worst possible person. As everything spilled out of her hands, Delilah ignored her books, pencil bag, and lunch, because her sketchbook also dropped and some of the drawings she had hidden between the pages were now scattered on the floor. She tried to pick up the drawings as fast as possible, which made it easy for Ethan to snatch her lunch. She only looked up when she heard him speak to her, and when she heard the strange sounds of him ravenously consuming her breakfast and lunch. Since she was distracted by the sounds of Ethan's glutting, his burp, and the gurgling from his belly, she didn't collect all of her drawings in time.

Ethan caught a glimpse of a few of her drawings and snatched some up before Delilah could grab them all. He was caught off guard by the ones he grabbed: they were of boys with big bellies. The drawings were no works of art - Delilah wasn't bursting with natural talent - but he could still clearly see what the pictures were meant to be.

Ethan flipped through the drawings in his hand, then he looked back at Delilah, who couldn't meet his gaze. Ethan's body began to rumble, and he knew a growth spurt was coming soon (even if it was sure to be smaller than the last one). Surveying the embarrassed girl below him, Ethan...
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Delilah's Secret Comes Out

choices: Searches an unattended classroom for food
Tries to find students to get food from
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Ethan glanced at Delilah over the top of the stolen drawings. All Delilah could see was his eyes and his belly (was his stomach vibrating just now? she asked herself)

Ethan dropped Delilah's drawings and let them drift to the floor. Now when he looked down at her, his expression was thoughtful (if a little condescending) instead of menacing. "You like big bellies, huh?" he asked, though it was more of a statement.

Delilah was still blushing and frightened, but she managed a very slight nod.

"Interesting, interesting," Ethan mused. "Guess that means we-" he began before clutching his roaring middle.

Ethan shook and his stomach rumbled. His pained expression was soon replaced with a euphoric smile as he felt his clothes get tighter. Delilah watched as the t-shirt slid higher, revealing more of Ethan's belly, and his pants rose to expose the top of his boots. The seams of his pants began to strain, exposing both some of the stitching and his flesh underneath. The zipper of Ethan's fly became a little more strained from a more ordinary sort of growth. Delilah jumped to her feet and backed against the wall as he grew. Ethan only gained a few inches, but it was still a change neither he nor Delilah could ignore. By the time he was done growing, his clothes were still in tact, but he knew they wouldn't stay that way for long. Ethan now stood 6' 7", and his stomach stuck out a couple inches further. Ethan felt another wave of excitement flow through him, but he felt a twinge of disappointment as he realized his belly felt more empty now. It seemed that each growth left him needing more food to satisfy him.

Ethan patted his gut with love and pride, while Delilah couldn't take her eyes off of it. "I told you I was going to rule this school and no one can stop me. But, since you like boys with bellies, maybe you don't want to stop me. You've seen what my body can do. Do you want me to have an even bigger belly?" He smiled, rubbing his stomach.

Delilah couldn't even manage a nod this time, but deep down she admitted she was awed by his growth, and she did want to see it happen again. Her desire to get to class was gradually fading.

Ethan didn't really need her to answer; he'd never really cared about what other people wanted, and he had even less reason to start now. What he wanted was all that mattered. He walked slowly forward, inching his belly closer and closer to Delilah. Her short stature combined with Ethan's growth meant that his dome of flesh was level with her chest. He stopped just short of pinning her against the wall, but she felt imprisoned by his mass all the same.

"Here's the deal, pipsqueak. Since you were nice enough to give me your lunch, I'll let you keep giving me food. Your job will be to go out and find me whatever kind of food I ask for, and bring it to me no questions asked," Ethan began. For some reason he couldn't explain, he added, "And you will watch me eat it all, feeding it to me if I ask you to."

Delilah's pulse quickened.

"Or, if you won't bring gifts for my belly, I'll just have to find ways to punish you with this ball of fat instead," he said, not really knowing what he'd do it her if she didn't cooperate. To drive the point home, he reached out and grabbed one of Delilah's hands, making her touch the underside of his bulging stomach. With a mind of its own, his belly gave a bestial growl, as if it was dreaming up its own consequences, should she fail to bring it food.

Delilah had never stopped blushing, but now she began to shake as adrenaline pumped through her veins. Something about that growl, and the idea of Ethan dreaming up ways to "punish" her with his ever-growing belly, filled her with terror. Or was it excitement?

Feeling she had no choice - or maybe because she truly wanted to - Delilah whispered, "Okay."

"Glad you see you place," Ethan said, talking a couple steps back. "Now go out and get me something interesting and different to eat. I'll get food for myself, too, so you'll need to come find me when you're ready to feed me. This big belly of mine is going to need a lot of food before it's full." He chuckled in his old, domineering bully way.

While Ethan waddles off toward the cafeteria, Delilah...
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Ethan offers Delilah a Job

choices: The chemicals that seem the most edible
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Ethan lumbered out of sight and Delilah took a moment to try to focus and slow her quickened pulse. This was her chance to escape, to tell a teacher, to call for help.

And yet, she didn't do any of those. Instead, Delilah started thinking about how to go about feeding the growing girth of Ethan the bully. Delilah wandered off into the halls of the school, peaking into classrooms in search of food. She had a stroke of luck in one of the science classrooms, which wasn't too far away from the cafeteria where Ethan, presumably, was beginning to feed himself.

This particular science classroom was deserted for the moment. Kids had left their backpacks and other supplies in the room and the lights had been shut off. Delilah didn't know where they had gone or when they'd be back, but she thought they might be getting a tour of the school. All the unattended backpacks seemed like a prime opportunity to gather food without needing to assert herself directly. Delilah snuck into the room and began rummaging through the unattended backpacks.

In a few short minutes, Delilah had scooped up nine different lunchboxes, which was about all she could carry. Having peaked inside each one, it seemed she could deliver quite a collection of food to Ethan. It was all the better that some students seemed to have an excessive amount of food packed away for their lunches.

Delilah was headed for the door when she remembered Ethan's instruction: he had commanded her to find "something interesting and different to eat." Since he was such a glutton, she didn't think he would complain about having an abundance of normal food, she didn't want to incur his wrath. He was a bully who grew when he ate, who knew what he could be capable of!

Since she was also nervous about keeping Ethan waiting, Delilah hurriedly looked around the classroom for any food that would be out of the ordinary. She quickly settled on only two options: there was a collection of chemicals (maybe some of those would be good things to drink? she wondered) or the class pet, a large guinea pig named Fuzzy.

Delilah chooses to grab...
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Searches an unattended classroom for food

choices: Give Ethan the apple and growth formula
Try the Apple yourself. Then maybe the formula...
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Delilah noticed a small display with a large beaker of orange liquid and an apple that looked three or five times bigger than a normal apple. The sign of the display reads "Experimental Growth Formula".

She then noticed a small paper that looked like a report. She skimmed through it a little bit until she read a passage that seemed very interesting...

...Although the experiment works with standard plants, it is unsure of whether or not it is effective on living beings. But I would rather not try to use it on people, since it could lead to disastrous results if it fell into the wrong hands.

With this information, she took both the apple, the formula, and all the remaining food that was left in the classroom. After making sure no one was outside the classroom, she made her way to find Ethan.

As she hurried to find him, she looked down at the larger apple and the growth formula. She wondered if this could work on humans as well as it did for the apple. And if so, how effective could it be? How big could a person get? How often would they grow? Will they continuously grow without stopping? And more importantly, what would it be like to grow?

Delilah looked down the hallway then back at the items. Could she really take a huge risk and try out these items or would she be the obedient servant to a giant bully who will continue to eat and grow?
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: End World Hunger (Or Rather a Giant's Hunger...)

choices: He uses it on more food, making them bigger for his liking.
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Delilah's mind was set on one thing; Making Ethan eat and grow. And with these items she found, as well as the food she scavenged, it was just enough to keep him happy.

After making sure no one was around, she dashed down the hall and tried to search for Ethan. After hearing a loud BURP emit from the cafeteria, it was obvious where he was and what he was doing. She made her way inside and nearly screamed at the sight.

Ethan was nearly 7 feet tall and his gut was sticking straight up in the air as he was laying on top of one of the cafeteria tables. Surrounding him were packets and boxes of what looked like snacks, ranging from gummies and cakes. His fat face was smeared with the treats, even drooled slightly. His eyes opened and he saw Delilah by the door of the cafeteria, then struggled to move his large fat frame in a seated position, as the tables creaked from his weight.

"Well well well," Ethan said with delight, "My little servant has returned! And I trust she found something good?"

Without saying a word, she pulled out the plethora of food she had stuffed in her bag, keeping the apple and formula secret inside. She poured them all out on a table next to him, which made his mouth water. He grabbed as much as he could; sandwiches, snack cakes, candy, veggies, fruits, juices, sodas, milk, anything that was edible, everything that he could eat. And eat he did...

As he continued to eat, his belly bulged outward by a few more inches, gurgling from the amount of food he had gorged on. In fact, the way he ate everything, you'd swear he had grunted like a pig...

After munching on the last few chips from a tiny bag, he was finished. Everything she found had gone into his black hole of a belly. And yet he was still hungry...

"Ugh, please tell me you have more food," he said as his belly growled with hunger.

Delilah pulled out the large apple, which seemed to have gotten slightly bigger since she first saw it. She pulled it out and immediately caught Ethan's attention.

"Holy crap," he said in astonishment, "Look at the size of that fruit."

He took the apple from her, which looked slightly bigger to him even at his new height. Without hesitating or even saying a word, he immediately took a big bite out of it. After a few chews, he tasted something different about the apple. It had a mixture of flavors. The standard apple flavor had a mix of orange, cream, mint, even a blueberry hint. It was strange, but after a while he swallowed the portion.

Just as he was about to take another bite, his belly groaned in a strange way. It started out with a high groan, then changed to a loud and low groan, like he had a beast inside his stomach. Then his belly quivered slightly, followed by the rest of his body. Before he could even say anything, his body began to expand upwards and outwards. His belly grew the largest, as it began to look spherical, pushing out of his shirt further, while the rest of his fat body grew thicker. His height grew past 7 feet, going onto 9 feet. And as he grew, he just smiled. And below his belly, Delilah shuddered with a mixture of fear and delight, as she could see his body grow and grow above her.

Soon, his body stopped growing, as he hit his head on the 10 foot ceiling, indicating that he grew a few inches over 10 feet. His belly covered his sight over Delilah, who had been to enthralled to move from her spot. He twisted his fat body over to see her, then looked at her with a wicked grin.

"Enjoy the show, pipsqueak," he asked knowing full well how much she enjoyed it almost as much as she did.

She nodded quickly in response, as she placed her hands on his belly. He groaned in satisfaction as he felt her tiny hands touch his belly.

"That was so good," he mused, "Where did you get that apple from anyway?"

She pulled out the orange formula and handed to him. He picked it up and looked at it from his massive fat hands.

"This was what made that apple so big," he asked her.

Delilah nodded in response. Ethan looked at the bottle and began to think, as he formed a wicked grin on his fat face.
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: One Healthy Apple...?

choices: The bully is searching for Delilah
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Delilah decided to throw caution to the wind.
Her growling tummy also reminded her she was hungry thanks to the bully.


She took a bite of the apple. She was surprised to find it was the juiciest apple she ever tasted and it tasted stronger and more delicious to boot. She noticed a strange aftertaste but ignored it taking a few more bites.


The apple was now half eaten. Little did Delilah realize the extra juice was in part from the apple being infused with the growth formula.
She was so concerned with snacking and the taste she failed to notice herself grow 3 inches taller or the rest of the apple grow from 5x the size of a normal apple to 7x a normal apple.



Delilah soon finished the apple down to the core then for some reason felt compelled to eat it too, it enlarging slightly before Delilah forced it down.


Next Delilah eyed the bottle of formula thoughtfully.

"Maybe a taste can't hurt"

She took the stopper out and sniffed it. It smelled citrus like.
She took a sip.

"Oh wow it tastes like oranges, peaches and pineapple all mixed together"


Delilah waited a few moments.

"Hmm it doesn't seem to be doing anything. Maybe a little more"


This time she took a larger sip.
As she waited her mind wandered to thoughts of her pictures and shows specifically the ones of outgring buildings and such.
Soon her daydream shifted to her still being petite but her being the one giant sized.



The weird feelings began to surface as she grew 3 more inches.
Delilah snapped out of it.

"This stuff doesn't seem to work on people after all but it tastes good and maybe if it works later T-that Dream could really happen"

So with that in mind and cause of her current bully problem Delilah tilted the formula to her mouth and chugged every last drop.


She then ran back to the classroom to look for more. Sure enough a 1/2 filled beaker was in a the desk she had found the 1st presumably the 1 used on the apple and whatever other plants.


Delilah drank it too savoring the same flavors.
Next..
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Try the Apple yourself. Then maybe the formula...

choices: Bring the food back to Ethan and see how much he's grown
Scarf down the food she’s collected. She wants to be bigger and bigger...
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Delilah stole a couple backpacks and dumped out their contents. She needed all the space she could get to cram in the food she stole from all of the kids in this room. She tucked the half-full vial into a small pocket on one of the backpacks, but nervously threw the empty vial into the trash can. She was scared to think what Ethan would do if he found out that she drank an entire vial of growth formula instead of bringing it and the half-full vial for him to consume. She reassured herself that it might not matter at all. It had worked on the apple, but people aren’t apples, and she wasn’t hitting her head on the ceiling or anything, even after drinking an entire vial.

As Delilah moved out into the hall, she thought that maybe the doorframe was just a little bit lower, but she shrugged off the idea. Little did she know that she’d already grown 10 inches and now stood a full five feet tall. It was still nothing compared to Ethan, but the formula’s work wasn’t done. The apple had been rapidly growing – expanding even as she ate it – because the formula was designed to increase the size of plants and food. It destabilized the proteins within food matter and caused the proteins to rapidly self-replicate. So deep in Delilah’s stomach, the remains of the apple had been doused in the formula, significantly destabilizing and expanding the fruit. As it did, Delilah’s body began to absorb the formula, using the apple as a vector. It was this combination of the formula plus the food that was triggering her growth.

Once Delilah was in the hall, she immediately doubled over in pain and grabbed her stomach. She suddenly felt queasy and extremely full, almost like she had eaten something that gave her indigestion, but eaten so much of it that her stomach was bloated to its limit. Her mind was primarily overwhelmed with the pain and discomfort, but there was a buried part of her brain that gave her tingling feelings of excitement as her hands grasped her bloated, expanded stomach. Her belly had pooched out to the point where she nearly had a little pot belly. That excited her subconscious mind as it made her fantasies of characters with big, stuffed bellies just a little more real.

Her stomach roared and churned and gurgled. Delilah even thought she could feel the contents in her belly roiling like a violet sea. She squeezed her eyes shut as she rode out the pain. By the time she opened her eyes, her stomach was back to its usual flat, petite form, but then she noticed something completely unlike her usual, petite form.

She was bigger. Not just a little bit bigger, but a large enough difference that she couldn’t write it off as wishful thinking. Delilah guessed she had gained four feet. As she stood up, her head didn’t quite hit the ceiling, but she seemed to be about nine feet tall. Nine feet! Even Ethan, last time she saw him, was well below that height.

But that was last time she saw him. What if he’d changed? What if he’d eaten so much that he was even bigger than Delilah? That made her mind start to revert to its previous, subservient ways. It made her want to rush back to Ethan, apologize profusely, and show him all the food she had gathered. If that didn’t calm his anger, maybe the other half vial of growth formula would. That was an exciting thought, too: as scary as Ethan was, it would be wonderful to see him and his blubbery ball of a belly balloon to a massive size. Who knew how big he could get if he was already growing when he ate? And imagine all the things a voracious bully might do once he was big enough...

But then again, she was growing, too. What if eating made her bigger? What if Ethan had started growing because of some second-hand exposure to this formula? Maybe she could grow like he could. Delilah imagined herself towering over Ethan. Imagined herself as the one shoveling food into her swelling belly. Imagined herself as the one bursting out of buildings and stomping through the city. Imagined her being the one who was punishing Ethan with her massive size: picking him up and opening her -

She snapped herself out of the fantasies. That was going too far; she didn’t even know if she could grow again. And who knows how big Ethan got while she was gone. If he was his normal size, she had no reason to be scared of him now, right? But what if he was bigger and hungrier? What if he was starting to become unstoppable, just like he had promised?

After freezing in a moment of indecision, Delilah chooses to…
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Delilah realizes she's growing

choices: Goes off to live out some of her gluttonous giant fantasies
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
A couple years ago, she would occasionally, Delilah would draw herself as one of the fat, giant characters. That was very rare. After all, she always pictured the giant, fat characters as confident and domineering: they wouldn’t let anyone stand between them and what they wanted. And that’s just not who she was back then.

Was.

Delilah was crumbling back into her meek, scared self, when that thought ran through her head. That’s not who she was back then. But now the emphasis changed.

Was.

She realized that she was suddenly different. She wasn’t small little Delilah. She wasn’t even a grown up, adult version of herself. She was sure she had to be taller than anyone else had ever been before.

So what did it matter who she was? She was different now, could be different now. She could be whoever she wanted. And if she kept growing, she could do whatever she wanted. She’d have nothing to be afraid of, and she’d be anything but powerless.

Those thoughts were pushed out of her mind by a crippling hunger. Her belly had rapidly broken down the apple and absorbed all of it. Now her larger belly violently demanded more food. Instantly, Delilah was salivating at the thought of all the food she’d gathered up, which now sat in the backpacks she’d dropped to the ground as she grew.

Now she turned to those backpacks and tore them open in a frenzy. Without thinking, she began shoving everything inside into her mouth. At first she chewed the food she put in there, but soon she just began swallowing it. Not only was her body larger, but she also found that she was swallowing bigger and bigger mouthfuls with no trouble at all. The formula was still flowing through her body, and it had made her physiology more flexible as it was exposed to the chemicals that put the apple’s proteins in flux. Her body was expanding to accommodate more food: in her mouth, her throat, and her belly. In less than a minute, she’d devoured the lunches of thirty students. Now her belly distended noticeably in front of her. It still couldn’t match cartoon characters or the things she’d drawn, but it was closer to the cartoons than ordinary belly fat would have been. It didn't look like her entire body had become fatter (yet), but her belly had rounded out to the equivalent of being five months pregnant, if she was a normal-sized adult. But unlike pregnancy, her stomach was lumpy; she could feel the varying textures of all the food, and she could squish it and move it around and she massaged her belly.

It felt wonderful, but as her body began to absorb the food – which joined with the formula in her bloodstream – pain spread through her again as she began to grow. Delilah gritted her teeth as she endured the pain. It still hurt a lot, but now that she knew what was happening, her excitement dulled the pain.

As she grew, her head slammed into their ceiling, disorienting her for a moment. Once this round of growth was finished, Delilah had to bend over and her upper back was hitting the ceiling, which groaned slightly under the pressure. While Delilah couldn’t straighten herself up to check, she guessed she had to be close to 13 feet tall: more than three times her original height! She’d also gained a fair bit of fat now. She figured that made sense, considering how many calories she’d just eaten. She had flabbier arms and legs, a squishier but, and a belly roll that gave her a muffin top. Well, a muffin top for the moment. This last growth had shredded nearly all of her clothes. Her underwear and socks were barely holding on thanks to their elasticity. The old Delilah would have been mortified to be nearly naked in school, but that’s not who she was anymore. The new Delilah felt proud of her giant body, and immediately began imagining all the things she could do with it. She’d imagined and drawn so many fat, giant characters in so many situations. Now she could start living them!

She…

She kept moving quickly to the cafeteria and various students stood in horror or pressed up against the lockers to avoid touching the massive girl.

Delilah passed into the back of the kitchen with some effort and squealed at the sight of massive pots of different foods for several hundred students. Her thighs rubbed together as she pushed through the shocked adults. There were six people and they all stood awe-struck at the sudden appearance of a giant child on her hands and knees crawling into the kitchen. Delilah licked her lips and dug her left hand into one container and her right into another. She didn't care that she was getting food on her bare chest and light pink panties. She was very happy to fill her tummy and was excited that the food was making her feel bigger.

Delilah let out a burp and felt her body tingle from the vibration. She giggled and looked at her now very pudgy body. She lifted a huge pot of warm soup to her mouth and drank it all in several gulps. With each swallow her body filled more and more space. Her feet and legs began to thicken to the point that they were coming out the door she entered. Delilah was taking up most of the kitchen with her huge body. She kept eating joyfully and the workers just stood still not sure what to do. Delilah kept eating till she had run out of food that she could see. Delilah was amazed to see her right arm reach for a young black-haired man and how quickly she pulled his hand into her mouth. She smiled and the man was terrified at how happy the massive face looked. She kept biting down and slowly pulled him in. The taste was very odd but not something Delilah disliked. She ignored the loud screams from the people and kept eatting and growing. Her whole body was swelling and she could feel her whole back against the ceiling as her body filled the kitchen and broke several walls around her.

The more she ate the faster she grew and the larger her body got. Delilah was looking very plump and had thick thighs along with a giant butt. She loved how big her whole body was getting and the warmth of her tummy made her smile. She kept eating people till she was over 300 feet tall.

Without a notice the sky-scrapper legs came down as Delilah fell on her butt. She felt that she had hit most of the central area and could feel her butt on grass along the walls of the building. Sitting with her legs in a V Delilah continued to grab for random people and pop them in her mouth. "So tiny, and tasty." Delilah said having had grown a taste for what she was eating. She was surprised at how easily she could eat them and was cheerfully beginning to eat anything around her. She was over 400 feet tall and everyone for miles could see her happily wrecking things.

Delilah had her mouth opened wide and dove into a small house eating it and anyone inside. She began pulling walls off of buildings and put her mouth up to the hole. Her mouth sucked in and she ate several people and random objects her sucking brought in. Nothing was being able to be done about Delilah and she was having the time of her life. All she wanted to do now was get bigger and eat more. She was already insanely huge but to Delilah she had only begun to grow.

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Two memories flooded back to Delilah and helped her decide.

The first was of the class pet in her elementary school. It had been a ball python. For years she had no idea what it ate, since they would always feed the snake after school, but one day she had stayed to help the teacher and she saw the custodian feed the python. Mice! The python ate mice! Alive, too! She watched in horror and fascination (or was it just fascination?) as the snake swallowed the kicking feet of the mouse. She could swear she saw the mouse's outline moving as it slid down the snake's body. It gave her the chills anytime she thought about that, and she found herself thinking about it often.

The second memory came from more cartoons. First, the memory was sparked by that cartoon starring the fat, orange cat. In the episode where the cat ate and grew huge, there was a part where a newscaster said the cat ate the film crew. They didn't show the cat eat the people, but (much to her private shame) Delilah had drawn what it might have looked like. She based it in part on other cartoons, like the one where a different cat is always trying to catch a mouse. In a few episodes, that cat swallows the mouse in a big, cartoon-y gulp. Then the mouse would land in his belly, and the belly would swell into a round shape. She liked that part.

In her frantic need to find him some sort of unusual food, these two memories came to her in a flash, and she made up her mind. Delilah juggled the many lunch boxes she had stolen, and reached into the guinea pig's cage. She easily grabbed Fuzzy, and she stuck him in one of the lunch boxes so he would be easier to carry.

"If you get hungry," she whispered to Fuzzy, "you can eat some of the food in there."

Delilah worried that she would get in trouble if people noticed that Fuzzy and the lunchboxes were missing, but she was more afraid of what Ethan might do to her if she didn't bring him food at all. And Ethan couldn't deny that Fuzzy would be a "different" sort of food, and Delilah admitted to herself that she, for one, thought Fuzzy would be an "interesting" bit of food for Ethan to try.

So Delilah left the classroom and scampered off to the cafeteria. She wasn't sure Ethan would still be there until she heard a belch echo down the hall. When she entered the spacious cafeteria, her eyes grew wide. There was Ethan, sitting on one of the tables and stuffing with mouth with a handful of breakfast burritos. And he was bigger: she wasn't sure how much bigger, but she guessed he had passed 7 feet tall. Ethan gulped down the burritos and looked over a Delilah.

"Ah, my servant returns!" Ethan stood up and walked over to her. Delilah found herself mesmerized by his gut; it was now more exposed and it jiggled as he got to his feet. "What did you bring to help me keep growing?"

Delilah couldn't speak, but she laid out the stolen lunchboxes. She opened them one by one to show Ethan what was inside. He seemed pleased. Delilah saved the lunchbox with Fuzzy in it for last. Nervously, she opened the velcro flap and held the lunchbox up so the towering Ethan could see inside.

Ethan, who had been salivating at the sight of the rest of the food, saw Fuzzy and...
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Fuzzy's Fate is Sealed

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
For a moment, Ethan was confused by being presented with a guinea pig. He looked at the nervous, bespectacled girl, and for the first time he noticed a hint of excitement in her. In truth, Delilah didn't even realize she was excited by this idea, but Ethan was beginning to share Delilah's excitement. Although he had said it absentmindedly, Ethan now remembered his demand for something "different" and "interesting." This certainly qualified. He was also reminded of how, years ago, he had told one of his victims that she should be glad she wasn't being stuffed in his belly. Of course he didn't mean the threat seriously, but presented with something live that he was pretty sure he could swallow, Ethan realized he actually quite liked the idea. His stomach growled in agreement, and it was loud enough of that Delilah could hear it.

Not even bothering to speak to his dutiful servant, Ethan grabbed Fuzzy and brought it up to his face. He breathed in the smell, which was gamey, but unmistakably alive. Ethan pictured a living thing being imprisoned in his massive belly, struggling to find a way to escape. If he was a less cruel person, he would have some pity on the creature, but instead he was only disappointed that it was a class pet and not a classmate. It struck him that if he was growing as he ate, a classmate might not be out of the question in the near future. That realization was the last push Ethan needed, and he stuffed Fuzzy into his mouth.

The guinea pig was quite a mouthful, but at his now larger size, it wasn't too much bigger than the apple he had swallowed whole. Fuzzy struggled, but as Ethan's saliva coated the rodent, Fuzzy began to slide around Ethan's mouth. He threw his head back and the saliva-slick guinea pig hit the back of his throat and he swallowed. The guinea pig immediately got stuck, and Ethan needed to give a series of forceful swallows. When that couldn't finish the job, he frantically grabbed a soda out of one of the lunch boxes and guzzled it down. The wave of soda washed the guinea pig fully into his stomach. He felt a plop that was far stronger than the apple had been. Ethan froze for a moment, wanting to relish his first time. He was electrified with excitement as he felt Fuzzy begin to wiggle around. His food was fighting back for the first time, and his glorious, growing body was going to dominate this creature to the greatest degree imaginable.

For Delilah, the sight of the wiggling lump in Ethan's throat eclipsed anything she'd seen in cartoons or from the ball python. She shivered as she watched it descend into his bulbous belly. In a daze, she moved forward and put a hand on his stomach - voluntarily this time - without being conscious of the desire to do it. As she felt a bulge shift under her hand, and as she watched the vibrations of Fuzzy's scampering ripple throughout his belly, she snapped back to her senses. This hulking bully had just consumed a creature alive, and Ethan seemed overjoyed about that fact. She had let it happen. More than that, it happened because of her!

As Ethan turned and began eating the rest of the food, covering Fuzzy in a rain of student lunches. Ethan's mind was already swirling with all the things he could do if hid body got even bigger, and he was stuffing himself so he could reach new heights as fast as possible.

In the wake of all of this, Delilah decides to....

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Ethan shoveled all of the food he could into his mouth, swallowing mouthful after mouthful in large chunks. Although it hurt his throat to have it bulge out so much, he was getting more used to the sensation. It was completely worth the pain to feel his belly swell further and further out. By the time he finished all of the student's lunches, which had been more than enough food for 9 individual teens, his belly was back to being a hard, stuffed orb, despite his growth spurts creating more space that needed filling. For the moment, he was once again full.


But the most important, exciting, delicious detail was that something in his belly was moving and struggling. It was, to some degree, aware of its grisly fate trapped inside the belly of an arrogant, voracious bully. Ethan held in his burp for a few more minutes: he didn't want to rob the guinea pig of its air just yet. That would have ended Fuzzy's struggles, and Ethan was still thoroughly enjoying the idea of a creature futilely searching for freedom that would never come. Instead, it would become part of him as he grew to greater and greater proportions. Like his other bullying, he didn't swallow the creature because he needed to: he wasn't doing it to satisfy a legitimate hunger. No, Ethan swallowed it because he was bigger, stronger, and more important than the puny class pet. He needed to put the creature in its place, and he had an insatiable desire to be bigger and consume even more things and creatures.


Ethan sat and felt his new belly, stroking, and poking, and prodding. He was digging for any sign of the creature trapped within, and then relishing in it when he found it. The swelling in his crotch had moved beyond a mere strain on his fly. It was now a full bulge. Fuzzy wasn't really the creature that needed to be put in its place. Sure, anything below him on the food chain rightfully belonged under his control - and in his belly, if he wished it. What really made his manhood swell was the knowledge that he was going to keep getting bigger, and then he would be able to fit larger things down his throat and into his belly. This was only the beginning. So many other creatures and people would be put in their rightful place beneath him, or inside of him.


Meanwhile, Delilah watched the massive boy - not yet quite a giant - revel in his larger girth. Particularly since his pants barely contained his body, she could even see the hardened form in his crotch, even if she had only just begun to have the faintest idea what it was. She knew she should be horrified. She knew she should run from this monster. Every ounce of rational thought told her so. Instead, she felt glued to the spot. But after years of drawings, years of funny feelings, and all the impossibly bizarre and exciting events of today, she knew she was deluding herself.


Delilah loved this. It was terrifying and exhilarating, like leaning over the edge of a cliff. She was fascinated by massive bellies, gluttonous eating, and people growing to massive sizes. Now the very embodiment of those concepts sat before her, and he was clearly enjoying those very ideas himself. Delilah always tried to be such a good girl, tried to please everyone, and tried not to get in anyone's way. It was hard for her to admit that she wanted to willingly go along with something so obscenely at odds with rational, obedient behavior, but she craved it. The dark, shameful part of her mind that enjoyed watching the ball python get fed was on fire with the knowledge that Ethan has swallowed a live creature due to her guidance, and that he clearly loved having swallowed it. She knew that if she didn't stop him - and if she didn't stop herself - he was going to swallow more and she was going to be there when it happened.

Being honest within her own mind was a relief, but the demand for rational behavior was not easy to silence. For now, her acceptance of Ethan's monstrous eating and her own monstrous feeding meant only that she did not leave his side.

As Ethan rose at last, he..

choices: Bring Delilah with him as he went to find more food
Divide and conquer: give Delilah orders while he found food for himself, too
1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Ethan made it only a couple steps before his belly began to grumble violently. Ethan had come to recognize that particular sensation and grinned with pleasure and pride as the next round of growth hit him. His body shot upward and strained against his clothes. This time, his pants stretched past their limit and tore down the seams, sliding off of him in two nearly separated chunks. His shirt and his underwear were more flexible, and stayed on him for the moment, but they were beginning to reach their limits. His shirt now slid up and fully exposed his round and expanding stomach. That bigger belly sagged over his underwear, stopping short of fully hiding the stretched white material.

His most recent growth spurt brought him all the way up to eight and a half feet. He still had about a foot and a half before his head would hit the ceiling, but he now stood taller than all of the school's doors. Perhaps more problematically, his widened body was wider than the doors. He figured he could squeeze himself through them if he had to, but that wouldn't be realistic for much longer, at the rate he was eating and growing. His belly once again felt emptier now that its capacity had expanded, and Ethan was eager to change that. There was no question what food he wanted to fill it with, but he wasn't sure it was possible yet. Still, he had to know. Looking at his forearms, he figured one of them would be comparable to another kid's legs now that his forearms had expanded. He stopped a moment to try. Having the impressive swallowing abilities that he did, he could get his hand into his throat, but not his forearm. While Ethan was disappointed, he knew how to solve that problem.

Just then, he felt someone bump into him. It was, of course, his loyal servant. She was looking shyly at the ground, but clearly had no plans of running away. She had picked up his shredded pants, clearly having been concerned about leaving behind evidence of his growth. He smirked; it was wonderful that one person in this school knew her place. He thought for a minute that she might be the one who deserved the honor of going into his belly first. Who knows, she might even enjoy it. Still, he wasn't sure he wanted to sacrifice such a dutiful worshipper. Either way, his test had just shown him that he didn't need to make the decision yet.

He opened his mouth to speak a new command when he heard the bell ring, signaling the end of first period. In a couple seconds, the halls would be swarming with students. As much as he wanted to subjugate (not to mention ingurgitate) everyone and everything in front of him, he knew it wasn't possible yet. He couldn't let them stop him in his rise to glory. It hurt his pride to do it, but Ethan knew he had to hide.

Ethan had to choose the nearest hiding spot: the boys' bathroom. Without thinking, he snatched up Delilah by her collar and dragged her with him. It was a tight fit through the door, but he forced himself forward with determination. He ducked into the more spacious handicapped stall and curled up on the toilet a little so his feet and head wouldn't show. The only way to reasonably hide Delilah, too, was to hoist her up and pin her against his belly.

When there was so little time for passing period, there was a nearly constant stream of boys coming in and out. Ethan could see them through the crack of the bathroom stall as they washed their hands. He was (somewhat) surprised to realize he was salivating as he watched them. They all seemed so puny, so vulnerable. He longed to burst out of the stall and grab them, overpower them, sit on them, pin them against the wall with his enormous belly, and slurp them down one by one.

Delilah's face was red as she felt herself sink into his squishy middle. Deep in his belly, she could still feel Fuzzy scampering around, now with more room to move. She felt Ethan's throat ripple against the back of her head as he swallowed the excess saliva. And her knees became weak as she felt his stomach growl and rumble while Ethan watched the boys hungrily. They had about an hour before the next class would let out, and Ethan fully intended to be big enough to pick at least a few students from the rushing crowd during the next passing period. "I need you to look scared and lost," Ethan continued. "You're going to pretend you don't know where your next class is. But the important part is that you need to act so scared that you need all four of them to help you. If that doesn't work, I'll have to use force." Ethan grinned, enjoying the idea a little too much. It would be simpler if Delilah drew them away from the kitchen, but Ethan was also eager to bully someone with his new body.

Again, not waiting for Delilah consent, Ethan headed off towards the cafeteria again. Ethan took some pleasure in the need to duck below the doorframes.
