1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Ethan grinned and his belly bubbled with excitement as he watched all four cooks walk away with the crying Delilah. Ethan was impressed by her commitment and acting abilities. She was a valuable servant indeed. Once they were all out of sight, Ethan waddled toward the kitchen and salivated at what he saw. Tray after tray was already laid out in the lunch line, and he saw more food being cooked. There were also shelves and shelves of food for future days.

His stomach roared, as if it was a predator declaring its supremacy over its prey. He lunged forward and began hastily devouring everything in front of him. He didn't know how much time he'd have before the cooks came back, so he had to work fast. He ate with the singular goal of being big enough to swallow his peers by the time the next passing period began.

First, he pulled out a hot tray of chili and chugged it down, not stopping to even catch his breath until the last of the meat and beans disappeared down his throat. Next was the cheese for topping the chili. That was harder to swallow quickly, but scooping with both hands helped it join the chili in his belly in good time. Ethan moved to the meatloaf, which was already cut into slices. Rapidly grabbing a slice in each hand, he swallowed entire slices whole, one at a time, until it was all gone. Over the next five minutes, he cleaned out tray after tray of food in the lunch line. He even ate the healthy stuff he would usually avoid. Ethan always preferred sweet, salty, and meaty things over anything healthy, but he wouldn't pass up more sources of food to help him grow. After those five minutes, there was nothing left in the lunch line, so Ethan turned his attention to the kitchen.

In the kitchen, Ethan found bowls of nearly finished macaroni and cheese, two giant pots of mashed potatoes, a pot of gravy, and three pizzas. Since he was only interested in gluttony, and not flavor, he quickly grabbed all of the macaroni, potatoes, and gravy, and mixed them all together to slurp down. He then rolled up the pizzas and stuffed them down his throat - whole - one by one. His face and chin were covered with grease, chili, and gravy, but that didn't matter to him.

Ethan turned to the shelves and freezers of food, but his stomach had reached its limits. With perfect timing (as if it was cooperating with his mission) Ethan felt his body begin to vibrate and swell. He didn't stop to appreciate or even estimate his new size. He was still focused on eating as much as he could as fast as he could.
From the shelves, Ethan grabbed entire loaves of bread to stuff in his mouth, barely chewing to get them down. He tore into boxes of cereal, drank down can after can of soups and instant meals, and even guzzled down canned vegetables and condiments. As he dug through the pantry, he discovered a family of mice that had nested in the pantry. Using his flabby arms, he trapped them, and swallowed them all. The mice had grown fat on stolen school food, and Ethan could distinctly feel the 8 rodents wiggling about inside him. Unlike with Fuzzy, he didn't take the time to savor the feelings. He could enjoy struggling food later. For now he had to eat and grow.

As Ethan moved to the refrigerators, he felt another wave of growth ripple through his body, further expanding his belly's capacity and rapidly digesting what was already inside. In the fridge he found 24 packages of hotdogs, which he swallowed hotdogs half a dozen at a time. He devoured hamburger patties, chicken nuggets, breakfast sausages, and more. He washed it all down with cartons of milk that he mostly swallowed whole, bursting a few with his teeth to speed up the process. Ethan's furious eating quickly emptied out all of the refrigerators.

The last thing he spotted in fridge was a couple gallons of milk. Looking at them, he got a strange idea. It was a rough estimate, but he figured two gallons side-by-side would be similar to the width of the shoulders of a shrimpy student. Time for the second test. Putting the two together, he stuffed them into his mouth. The plastic didn't taste or feel good, but thanks to his new size he was able to force them to the back of his mouth and into his throat. After several forceful swallows, they slowly moved down Ethan's throat, creating oddly shaped bulges in his chubby neck. He felt them slide into his stomach and land on top of the pile of food that stretched his stomach to the limit. Running his hands over his belly, Ethan could easily feel and see the odd lumps of the gallons of milk.

Finally, all of the eating paid off as he was hit by the last wave of growth the kitchen food was going to give him. He belched as his body was stretched and expanded. Ethan felt his head touch the 10-foot ceiling of the kitchen and he began to laugh. He now had to bend over very slightly to fit in the room. He figured he now stood about 11 feet tall. His shirt tore and he used it to wipe his face before tossing it to the ground. Ethan's maniacal chuckle jiggled his insatiable globe of a stomach. If he could handle the two gallons of milk before his most recent growth, he was now sure he could fit someone down his throat. That realization sent shivers of joy down his spine. His overtaxed underwear struggled to contain the swelling excitement there. A gurgling grumble from his gut seemed to echo his laughter. He stroked his belly salaciously as he began to imagine all the new possibilities.

Until an hour ago, Ethan didn't even know he wanted to swallow someone. Now he realized it had been a fantasy of his for years, ever since he fully embraced his gluttony and his nature as a bully. He had always been bigger than all his puny victims, and their needs were completely insignificant compared to his desires. Even when he didn't want whatever his victims had - food, money, toys - it pleased him simply to take it away from them. His great mass had been a wonderful tool for overpowering and trapping the people he picked on. Now he could take away so much from them, trap them in a supremely dominating way, and satisfy his hunger for both power and food all at the same time.

Ethan couldn't wait until the bell rang and he could finally live out his long buried fantasy.

Ethan...

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Ethan hobbled his enormous frame towards the outside. Although he had a tight squeeze as he tried to escape, he managed to get out without a hitch and without damaging the school. Although he wanted to make a rampage sooner than later, he figured it would be best to have a little fun before making his mark...

As he waddled outside, he could see a small gazebo with three small students hanging around it. He looked down to see Delilah, as she had noticed them too, then looked back up at Ethan, whose mouth was watering as he began to think of how it would be to eat a whole person. And Delilah began to think of the same idea too. Part of it scared her, but mostly it excited her.

"Alright wimp," Ethan whispered as he hunched down to her level, "Here's the plan: I want you to get one of them and have them come to me. Make up some sort of excuse; teacher in need of help, someone in need of the Heimlich maneuver, whatever you can. Just get one of them over here and I'll give you a show you'll never forget..."

Ethan patted his gigantic belly with pride as it began to growl with hunger again. The thought of eating a person built up his appetite again. And all Delilah could do was smile at the idea. Without another word, she dashed off towards the gazebo.

As she was off, Ethan began to rub his belly again, feeling how large and jiggly it was. It was amazing how he was able to eat so much and was even more incredible with what he was able to eat. Between the class guinea pig and some supplies from the cafeteria, all this did was excite him and fuel him to eat and grow more. This also brought in a few feeling of arousal to him...

His thoughts are interrupted when he felt a big smack upside his belly, as one of the kids from the gazebo bumped into his large belly. He looked down to see a small blonde haired kid, slightly dazed from the impact. But before the boy could do anything, Ethan grabbed him by his legs and hoisted him up in the air. The boy looked at his mouth opening up large enough to swallow him. But before he could even scream, Ethan placed him head first into his mouth, then heaved up to slurp him up and swallow him whole. The taste was different, but in a good way...

Delilah looked at this with sheer amazement and tremendous excitement, as she could see the boy's legs squirm from outside Ethan's mouth, then quickly slid inside his mouth. Then she stared at him with saucer eyes as Ethan made a tremendous GULP and saw the boy's figure slide down his fat neck, then could hear a faint splash inside his belly.

She rushed to his belly and could hear faint screams and poundings from inside, as the boy was screaming for help and was trying to get out. Ethan felt the poundings inside his belly, but it only tickled him. But before he could do anything else, the other two boys were walking in to see Ethan's massive size. Ethan looked at them in surprise, then began to smile a large wicked grin.

The two boys were about to run away, but were suddenly caught by Ethan's large fatty hands. To him they looked like action figures, only they were alive and very weak. And he brought the two of them close to his mouth...

The boys flailed their arms and legs as much as they could to escape, but they were too late. Ethan put both of them into his mouth. Their hands were peeking out of his lips, but he just sloshed them around inside his mouth and swallowed the two as hard as he could. Their figures appeared in a larger lump on his fat neck and both dropped down into his gut.

From inside, three boys were pounding and screaming for help, as they were in the belly of a bully. A bully who was more of a beast. And just a few feet away from them lies the skeletal remains of a guinea pig, who hardly survived the beast's gluttonous rampage and frequent digestions.

Ethan couldn't contain his excitement as his ran his hands across his bulging, lumpy, wriggling stomach. He had never been so stuffed in his entire life. His belly was stretched so far that it hurt, and each punch or kick from within gave more small waves of pain. His stomach was so massive that he couldn't reach his arms around it. And yet every moment and every minute sensation was worth every bit of the pain to be able to watch the moving forms of his classmates inside their fleshy prison. He had finally done it. Three of his peers were not being overpowered by his hands, not squished under his butt, not pinned against the wall by his stomach. They were trapped inside him and desperate to escape before his body went on its natural course and began digesting them. It was so delicious. He made sure to keep swallowing air and hold in his burps, so he could savor this wonderful achievement for as long as possible.

Research on bullying has pointed to a variety of reasons kids bully each other. The reasons include a desire to be noticed, a need to be adored or respected, a means to improve their self-esteem, a need to have power over other people, and a need to reinforce a big ego. Add a love of eating and food-fueled growth and you have an unstoppable monster.

All of these drives were satisfied to an obscene degree as Ethan stroked over the struggling, terrified lumps in his belly. He was being adored by his dutiful servant and worshiper, who had helped make this achievement possible. His ego and self-esteem were enlarged by the knowledge of the power he now held over these three lives. The three kids were now exactly where they belonged: at his complete mercy and being used to satisfy his desires. He would break them down to nothing but fuel for his growth and fat for his body. Then, as the last act of domination, he would shit them out, leaving them as a literal embodiment of their status in comparison to him. That's all their lives amounted to, all everyone's lives amounted to compared to him. Just morsels for him to consume, enjoy, digest, and discard.

As much as his stomach hurt, this was the greatest pleasure he had ever experienced. The lascivious satisfaction of his hunger and his lust sent jerking waves of pleasure through his body and his eyes rolled. He moaned. He had recently begun experimenting with masturbation, so he recognized this feeling for what it was. Despite the shivering ecstasy that momentarily took over all of his body's consciousness, his hands never stopped stroking over the fearful shapes wiggling in his gut.

That was the most Delilah had ever said to Ethan. He smirked down at her, poking and prodding his belly. "It was the greatest feeling in the world. Did you enjoy helping me? Did you enjoy watching me do it?"

She nodded silently.

"Speak up. I give you permission to speak. I want to hear you say it."

"Yes, Ethan," she all but whispered. "I loved it."

"Good. Because I'm going to eat more and more." He turned to look at the school and spoke in a somewhat lowered voice. "I'm going to eat them all."

Delilah followed his gaze and shivers tingled down her spine as she imagined it.

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Connor took the bathroom pass and stealthily grabbed his spacious lunchbox on his way out. As he walked the halls and searched for a place he could be alone, he heard commotion from a few rooms he passed. He didn't stop to listen, but it sounded like people were scared or worried about something. It sounded like something went wrong in the lunch room. Talk of food just hastened Connor in his search.

Connor passed the darkened auditorium and found it empty, so he slipped inside. Moving up to the foot of the stage, he arrayed his food in front of him. The large lunchbox was stuffed with enough food to feed two people for a full day. Connor packed his own "lunches" every day because his parents were mostly absent in his life. The only affection they gave him was buying him copious amounts of food, no questions asked. Connor suffered from anxiety, and his only method of coping was to binge. Even before this habit started, he had been a chubby kid. Now he was morbidly obese after a couple years of rapid weight gain.

Connor had just been in math class - his weakest subject - and the teacher had told them about the high-stakes tests they needed to prepare for for the year. That had triggered Connor's anxiety and driven him to sneak away and binge. He wasn't hungry, but he was going to stuff himself beyond reason in an attempt to cope. He had too much food to sit in a chair, so Connor simply sat on the floor to lay out his food. He had packed a thermos full of soup, two PB&J sandwiches, a large bag filled with goldfish crackers, a full package of Oreos, a handful of tatter tots, a tuperware filled with spaghetti and meatballs, a personal pizza, and a 2 liter bottle of soda to wash it all down. Connor's adrenaline began to ease as he started eating.

He was so focused on eating that he didn't see Delilah come in. She saw his immense supply of food (not to mention his cubby body) and she knew they'd found a good place to begin. Looking at all that food made Delilah hungry too, but she didn't want to get on Ethan's bad side.

What happens next?

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Delilah snuck past Connor, making sure to stick to the opposite side of the dim auditorium. She slipped onto the stage and behind the curtains to the back door. As quietly as she could, she unlocked the double doors and slowly opened them. Outside, she saw the tower Ethan in all his globular glory. She made a shushing gesture and waved him to come in. Ethan smiled and followed her direction. He squeezed through the double doors and entered onto the stage. He was still hidden by the curtain, but Ethan was heavy enough that he made a distinct creaking sound as he entered onto the wooden stage. Between that and the light from outside, he figured the time for secrecy was over, and he charged into the auditorium.

His expanded body helped him take quick strides into the auditorium where he stopped at the edge of the stage. The stage was four feet from the ground, and that helped Ethan soar to an apparent height of 20 feet as he towered over Connor.

Connor heard creaking and what sounded like heavy things falling on the stage, coming his direction. He looked up, startled, and beheld the largest person he'd ever seen. The boy was unbelievably huge - impossibly huge! As fat as Connor was, it looked like the boy's belly was so big two of him could fit in there. The giant boy cast a long, round shadow over Connor, but he could barely make out that the giant was wearing no clothes. That made Connor blush. Other than the blood running to his cheeks, he was frozen in place mid bite. For a moment, the only sound in the large auditorium was a gurgling, glorping sound from the belly that loomed over Connor's head.

"So," said a voice from somewhere beyond the belly, "you brought me a selection of food. How thoughtful of you."

With a mighty thump, the giant sat on the edge of the stage.

"How about you bring those gifts up here and give them to me personally?" He paused a moment. "Slave!" he called in the other direction, "help him give his gifts to me."

Connor saw a petite girl with dark hair and glasses move around from the other side of the giant. Without saying anything, she started scooping up Connor's food. Connor, terrified of this giant, started hurriedly doing the same. He walked up the stairs on the side of the stage with the girl in front of him. Connor could smell the collection of food in his hands, and as he took in the smell he heard small gurgles coming from the girl in front of him. It seemed seeing all this food made her hungry, too.

Once he'd mounted the stairs, Connor finally could see the entire form of the giant. He was massive in every way, and even his size aside, there was something scary about the look on the boy's face as he made eye contact with Connor.

"Like what you see?" the giant asked as he played with his belly, lifting it and dropping it a couple times. "My name's Ethan, and this school belongs to me. So everything you have is mine, too. Now it's almost lunch, so I'm hungry. Why don't you come and feed me?"

Ethan lay back and opened his mouth as Connor and Delilah approached. Delilah stood on Ethan's left while Connor stood on his right.

"Delilah, you begin and show this new servant how it's done."

Delilah smiled: partially due to her excitement for Ethan eating and growing more, and partially because this was the first time he had called her by name. She knew just how much Ethan could eat, so she didn't hesitate. Delilah started by unscrewing the lid to the thermos and pours its contents into Ethan's gaping mouth. She watched with glee as he swallowed it open-mouthed; she could see it get sucked down the dark passage of his throat in waves. His throat rippled and his belly shook as he chugged it down. Delilah felt funny as she thought about what the soup was splashing down on top in his belly.

Connor watched with wide-eyed terror as the soup disappeared in an instant. Once Ethan was done, the girl's belly growled again. Ethan turned to her and said, "You have served me well, so I'll give you a tiny scrap of this feast. You may eat some food of your choosing."

Delilah was taken aback by this. For the first time she felt the tiniest hint that Ethan might care about her if he'd give up some of the growth-fueling food. For a moment, she imagined goring on the food herself, like Ethan does, feeling her belly swell out and out and it was packed with food. The thought was gone as fast as it came, and she grabbed one of the sandwiches and reservedly ate it.

"And you," Ethan said to Connor, "you feed me until the food is gone. The last students who helped me learned just how much food it takes to fill my belly." He patted his belly and chuckled. He laughed more than Connor could understand, like someone with an inside joke.

Connor did as he was told and began feeding every bit of his food into Ethan's massive mouth. He started with the ziploc back of goldfish, which he poured straight into Ethan's mouth. Connor was surprised to see Ethan gulp them all down whole, not unlike how he had swallowed the soup.

Ethan burped once they were all gone. "Too bad those were just crackers," Ethan said, half directed at Delilah. "I just love feeling things struggle in my belly." The last comment was clearly directed at Connor. Remembering his immediate thought that Ethan's belly looked big enough to fit two kids Connor's inside it made his shiver.
With both hands Connor started scooping food up and dropping it in Ethan's mouth. Ethan didn't stop to chew anything. He didn't even close his mouth. He just kept swallowing anything they put inside him. Before long Delilah had returned to help.

Watching Ethan guzzle down all this food actually cracked through Connor's terror, and he began to marvel at it. It was an impressive feat. Connor thought he was able to eat a lot, but his skills were nothing compared to Ethan's. Thinking about it made Connor genuinely hungry now, instead of simply bring driven to binge out of anxiety. He wished he had eaten more before Ethan came in, because he dared not try and to keep anything for himself now.

However, Connor's awe had just begun. As they fed Ethan the last of the food, the giant's body began to quiver and his belly roared. That's when Connor got his second unbelievably sight of the day: Ethan's body actually stretched and grew! It wasn't a massive change, but Connor couldn't deny what he just saw. It seemed like the giant was now a foot or so taller. It was silly to think that a moment earlier he had envied Ethan's eating abilities. Well, he still was envious of that, but that feat was nothing compared to the ability to grow bigger!

Ethan moaned blissfully and played with his belly. Connor's awkward feelings increased when he saw Ethan's hardness pressing up into his massive stomach. Delilah, too, felt awkward at seeing the sight, but perhaps (or perhaps not?) in a different way than Connor.

"You both did well, but I'm still hungry. I told you to keep feeding me until all the food was gone. And I'm looking at one more morsel right here. You wanna know the food that fills me up best, Connor?" Ethan looked at him with half-lidded eyes over a mocking smirk, "people."

Ethan laid back again and opened his mouth.

Jenna Asher circulated through her eighth grade English class, keeping the rowdy teens on task for the last few minutes of class. She mid-tone, olive-colored skin and black, wavy hair that framed her round face. She worked hard to maintain an athletic build (and to cope with the stress of being a teacher). Ms. Asher made her way to the front of the room and cleared her throat.

"Alright, we've got two minutes before the bell. Make sure you return your books up front and gather up your stuff to head to lunch."
The students jumped into action, eager to get out of class and go to lunch. The room instantly exploded into chattering conversation, rustling papers, and zipping backpacks. Ms. Asher's classroom was just down the hall from the auditorium, but it didn't touch any of the outside walls. It meant they had no windows, which was always an annoyance for Ms. Asher, but it at least meant it was quiet...except for the students. Over the racket, she swore she could hear some weird thumping up ignored it for the moment.

And then she couldn't ignore it anymore as something rammed into the door of her classroom. The old doorframe creaked and began to buckle. Then the door burst off its hinges, falling to the ground. Soon after, the doorframe tore out of the wall as a massive, naked boy squeezed through the widened opening. The boy hand to bend over even once he entered the classroom. Ms. Asher couldn't believe her eyes; it looked like he was close to 20 feet tall and close to half as wide! Oddly, at the boy's side, was a petite girl with long black hair and glasses. She looked scared, but there was a hint of something wild under the surface.

The home-ec class was small – only eight students and the teacher – but the room was also filled with food. Cabinets and counters had a wide variety of things to eat, but really only Delilah was thinking about that. Ethan looked at the teacher in his arms and the students cowering before him, and he saw all the food he needed to stuff himself to the max. There was only one way in or out of the class, and Ethan was an immovable meaty mass blocking their only hope of escape. It appeared that they weren’t getting away from Ethan anytime soon. They didn’t realize how true that was. They were never going to get away from him; they were going to get much, much closer.

Delilah forced herself into a new, confident attitude and sprung into action. While everyone else was petrified by the drooling glutton, Delilah ran over to the cabinets and began stuffing her face with all of the food she could find. She couldn’t swallow big things like Ethan could (even at his normal size), so her progress was slower, but now that new possibilities were open to her she was as determined as he was. She began by munching on fruits and vegetables stored in the cabinet. Not only could she not swallow like Ethan, she also didn’t have the stomach capacity he did, so by the time she’d eaten five apples, two bananas, one tomato, and two full carrots, her belly was painfully stuffed. Still, she burned with drive to grow as big as she could as fast as she could.

Unlike Ethan, this desire had been building inside of her for years; he had just recently realized he wanted to be giants, where she had daydreamed about it for as long as she could remember. All of that built up desire fueled her determination, and Delilah found ways to pack more into her stretched belly. She found a bowl of creamy mashed potatoes and slurped it down. Then she stuffed a couple handfuls of sugar in her mouth. These smaller, more flexible piece of food squeezed into the gaps between the bug chunks of food in her lumpy (if still petite) stomach. Lastly, she grabbed a gallon of milk and chugged down about a third of it before the pain in her belly was too extreme for her to force anymore inside herself. What was once a lumpy belly was now rounded out: the milk and found its way into every unused milliliter inside her stomach. She fell onto her butt and made little whimpering sounds of pain as she gently rubbed her fiercely protesting middle. It was only then that she became away of the screams, and she realized they’d probably been going on for nearly all of her binge.

As the students around him also began yelling, he figured they could probably hear their teacher scream, too. Or maybe it was her outline that was barely visible through the chins of fat around his neck.

Ethan was unfazed by his growth; it all felt natural now, and he didn't want to be distracted from all the tasty morsels in the room. He intended to move towards his next meal when he saw Delilah begin to grow as well.

Ethan watched with fascination as Delilah’s body grew and strained faster than his ever had. He also took particular pleasure in watching her body fill out with more and more fat. Sure, there was something nice about having her be so skinny; it made her smaller than him in one more way. But Ethan was also coming to realize that he liked the idea of her getting fat like him, too, particularly if she was going to start eating like him.

Still, there was something uncomfortable about her becoming too much like him, and having it happen so quickly. As long as she remained a dutiful servant who knew her place – and so long as she never outgrew him – he could tolerate her growing faster than he did. But it did give him a twinge of jealousy and resentment. She didn’t deserve to grow as much as he did. He was more powerful and important than her. He was the one that will always be on top. I’m the one who’s going to rule this world. Or even eat the world, if I want. And I’ll eat her, too, if I have to Ethan thought in a moment of darkness. Then, he mentally took a step back. Not so much because of his willingness to eat Delilah (ever since he found out he wanted to eat people, he had always been considering gulping her down), but more that for the first time he had thought about eating the entire world. Was that going too far? Was it even possible? Would he keep growing enough that he could really do it? The knowledge that there was reason to think it might be possible, combined with the image of the entire Earth and everyone on it stewing away in his gut made his belly growl and his erection harden. He had thought about eating “everything” before, but now he realized how literally he might have meant it. Everyone else only existed to pleasure him, and that meant primarily feeding him. So didn't the entire world belong is his monumental belly if he so pleased?

Whatever happened later, he would deal with it then. Whether it was possible or not – and whether he would need to eat Delilah or not – the next step was (as always) to enjoy himself. He was going to keep eating and growing, and he could get some kicks out of watching Delilah do the same. He became all the more eager when he realized her growing left her at about the size he was when he swallowed his first student. With his skill, he was able to do three the first time, and all on his own, too. He looked forward to helping shove someone into his slave’s belly. Everyone here – and everywhere – belonged to him. And these pitiful little shits were so worthless to him that he wasn’t even going to bother eating them all himself. Instead, he was going to feed them to his servant for no other reason than for his own pleasure. Plus, her clothes were all but disintegrated, and her expanded body looked that much more like the meaty, adult women he jerked off to. That made him more tolerant of his growing feeder.

Of course he was still going to eat plenty. He had to keep up his growth, and all of these thoughts and the recent digestion of everyone in his belly had made him so very hungry.

Had Ethan been a normal size, the girl would have been about 9 inches tall: still very large, but swallowing people was getting much easier with practice.

“Don’t worry, I’m not gonna eat you,” Ethan said. Then he turned to Delilah, who was sitting and playing with her new fat (and oddity for her). When she saw Ethan turning towards her, she stood up dutifully, but banged her head on the ceiling.

“Delilah! Come here.” He commanded, making sure to reassert his dominance over the now-taller Delilah. “You’ve been so good to me that I got you a treat,” he said, holding up the boy.

“No, no please! Please don’t, please don’t!” the boy was begging.

Delilah came and stood next to Ethan. Their height difference was close to what it was when they first met: her eyes were level with the top of his belly. She looked up at him adoringly and with a hint of disbelief, knowing what was coming next.

Ethan grabbed the boy by his ankles and hoisted him over Delilah.

Delilah’s pulse quickened and she felt adrenaline flood her body. She was shaking with excitement and fright. What if I choke? she fretted. But she was still completely submissive to Ethan. He wanted her to do it, and that was reason enough for her to try. Plus, she had eaten with such vigor because she wanted to reach this moment. She’d been afraid for so long, picked on and ignored by so many people. For once she wanted to be on top. Now before we start what age or class of Girl Scouts are in for a change?

Daisies -
Girl Scout Daisy is the initial level of Girl Scouting. Named for Juliette "Daisy" Gordon Low, GS Daisies are in kindergarten and first grade (around ages 5–7).[3][4] They typically meet in groups of ten girls with two adult leaders who help the girls plan activities to introduce them to Girl Scouts.


Brownies -
Girl Scout Brownies are in second and third grades (around ages 7–9).[3][9] and earn triangular shaped Brownie Leadership Journey Awards and National Proficiency Badges. Their uniform consists of a brown vest or sash which may be worn with a white shirt and khaki bottoms or with an official Girl Scout Brownie uniform.[2] The Girl Scout Membership Star is worn with green membership disks,[5] and they wear the Girl Scout Brownie Membership Pin.


Junior Scouts-
Girl Scout Juniors are in fourth and fifth grades (around ages 9–11).[3][11] The Girl Scout Junior uniform is a green vest or sash which may be worn with a white shirt and khaki bottoms.[2]

The twin feeling of growing and pooping filled her with a bliss she had never known. When she hit fifteen feet crawling she clenched her cheeks and her poop stopped. She wanted to have some fun now!

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
One day as we were finishing up soccer practice, Chazz just kept on bragging and boasting about how he did better than last time and how he just gets better and better and all that crap. The coach would always cheer him on and congratulate his accomplishments, while the rest of us just groaned and just agreed with him just to keep him quiet. I on the other hand was getting tired of his boasting.

As he was jogging up towards me, he seemed slightly different. His soccer uniform looked a little too tight on him, like it was stretching against his skin. In fact, he even looked slightly taller than before. He was kinda short before all the sport activities, at least 5 foot 3. But now he looks around 5 foot 9, an inch or so taller than me. He was even tugging at his uniform, looking slightly uncomfortable. But even that didn't stop his bragging...

"Man, I must've been doing a good workout," he said with high spirits, "I think I've gained some muscle too! I'm like an all-star!"

"Yeah sure," I said nonchalantly, "A real Olympic athlete."

"Hey, yeah!," he exclaimed, "I could go into the Olympics someday! I could win more medals than any other athlete!"

I was so annoyed with his bragging that I just ignored what he had to say. Same Chazz, different bragging. But had I paid more attention to him, I would've noticed that he was growing slightly taller. His uniform had begun to get tighter and tighter on him, eventually showing his abdomen slightly while his sleeves and pants were inching higher and higher.

As we were in the locker rooms getting changed, I noticed something new about Chazz's physique. He was actually showing more muscle. His arms and legs looked less frail and had more detail and his belly began to form a small six pack of abs. He even began to rub his new features with pride.

"Mmmm, I'm like a fitness model," he began to boast, "I could probably whoop anyone in here at arm wrestling with these babies."

I just looked at him unsurely. I didn't really want to say anything to boost his ego. I just got into my regular clothes and walked away.

As I walked out into the hallway, I just couldn't help but think about his new height and physique. It was strange how he had changed so much. I couldn't help but feel jealous...

"Hey Lance!"

My thoughts are interrupted by Sandy, Chazz's girlfriend. She was 12 years old, just one year younger than Chazz. Even though she couldn't deal with Chazz's bragging, she still loved him.

"Oh hey Sandy," I greet as I snapped out of my thoughts.

"Yeah... Listen, have you ever noticed anything... strange about him?"

———————-

Lucy was your average cute 4 year old.
She was blonde with green eyes.
Cute and playful but she’d always been short for her age.

Her 15 year old sister on the other hand was quite tall. Around 7’8” to be exact.

One morning Lucy was quite thirsty.
She broke away from her morning cartoons.
She couldn’t find anyone around tho that could get her a drink.


She headed to the kitchen.
Desperate Lucy spotted a huge jug she thought was one of those extra big family size juice jugs her mom got.
Lucy struggled to drag a chair taller than herself over to the counter.

Next she climbed up.


She struggled with the heavy bottle it was 5x as big as a gallon of milk
About as big as one of those spare gas cans for her mothers car.


She got the cap off.
She went for a sip.
It tasted nasty.
Unfortunately before she could react she accidentally was forced to take a mouthful.
She sat the jug level and stumbled back.


“Eww yucky”

Unfortunately in her disgust she got distracted and slipped backwards.

“Whoa”

Lucy tumbled backwards onto the floor landing on her rear.
“Owwie”

She was about to cry when she felt strange.

Suddenly her body quivered and shook a little uncontrollably.
Her body then instantly swelled larger.
She had gained 5 inches in height in a few seconds.


She would have moved but it happened again
This time gaining 5 more inches and her clothes becoming tight.


Interestingly her body grew in perfect proportions.
No aging, no weight gain or extra features.
She was as skinny as ever but with a larger body frame.



Soon followed another spurt of 5 inches.
Then another.
Her clothes burst apart.


Several short bursts of growth and a few minutes later and it stopped leaving
Lucy nearly as tall as the room while sitting.

Lucy was dazed and confused.
She looked around.

“Hey my butt isn’t sore no more! And everything looks different”

She scratched her head and crinkled her nose as was her odd quirk when she was thinking hard.
Her 15 year old sister made fun of that too.


“What happened”
She continues to look around scratching her head and crinkling her nose.

She looks at herself now au natural.
Then scans the kitchen.

It’s starting to click
“Wait is that the fridge? The counter? The Chair?”

She glances up slightly
“The ceiling?”

She looks at herself again.
She lit up like Christmas morning as the epiphany hit.
“Oh my god I think I know what happened! It finally happened!
I’m big! I’m big! I’m finally not short anymore! I’m finally not little anymore!
I’m finally a big girl! I can reach the cereal now!”


To prove her point she poked the front box on the fridge moving it slightly.
She then moved the Jumbo Jug.
She read the label.

“Garden Jumbo Gro”

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
While the neighborhood was rather deserted, it was not completely empty and there were still a few kids playing about the neighborhood.

One such kid was Jenna, a somewhat short 8 year old girl with long dark hair. She lived in the next house over from Lucy and was playing in her family's backyard this morning. She was in her own little world as she played with her dolls, enjoying the fact she was so much bigger than them when she heard a somewhat familiar voice

"Hey everything out here is still big." As much of a weird phrase as that seemed to be, Jenna was more focused on the voice that said it; it seemed familiar but different somehow. She stopped playing and started trying to sort out that voice and figure out what they meant when it spoke up again a few moments later. "If this drink made me big once, maybe it can make me BIG again."

That caught Jenna's attention and she quickly threw her toys to the ground and rushed the the fence around her back yard. struggling a bit she climbed up it and once she was able to see where the voice came from she was so surprised she ended up losing her balance and falling into the neighbors yard. Lucy, the four year old girl form the next house over was nearly twice as tall as her gigantic older sister and was about to take a drink from a very large jug of something; most likely the drink she had mentioned moments earlier.

Jenna lay in shock in the neighbors yard until she heard Lucy speak up again "Blech I just wish this stuff wasn't so yucky." The brought Jenna back to her senses as she picked herself up and made here way to the fence that divided this neighbors yard from Lucy's. As Jenna was about to start climbing the fence Lucy spoke up once more "Come on! Why ain’t it workin? I wanna be as tall as one of them buildings that mommy works at”.

Jenna had a brief moment of panic at hearing this, she had been banking on that drink being the cause of Lucy's new size and thus letting Jenna get big enough that her Mom couldn't punish her for leaving the back yard. Ultimately though Jenna was already here and breaking the rules so she might as well keep going in case Lucy turned out to just be wrong or impatient. As Jenna climbed this second fence she could her Lucy and it sounded like she might have taken a few more drinks from the jug. When Jenna reached the top of the fence she became very worried; while she easily located the giant jug Lucy had drunk from, Lucy herself didn't seem any bigger despite taking multiple drinks from said jug. Jenna was about to climb down and go back to her own yard hoping her mother never realized what Jenna did, but then Lucy swelled up bigger, and then again.

That was all Jenna needed to see and she quickly climbed into Lucy's yard and made her way to the Jug of drink. By the time Jenna reached the bottle Lucy had stopped growing, her feet having pushed into the yard of the house behind her own and thee top of her head about level with the top of the roof while sitting down. Lucy seemed a little disoriented giving Jenna a few moments to take action. Jenna briefly thought about taking a drink now, but with how long it took Lucy to grow after drinking some and Jenna not knowing if Lucy would mind sharing made the idea of putting some distance between Lucy and herself seem like a good idea. Jenna, after a short struggle lifted the giant jug up and and made her way as quickly as possible to the front of Lucy's house, only half paying attention to Lucy's disappointment at 'only' being as big as a house as well as the following temper tantrum.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----

after a few minutes Lucy calmed down, still sniffling a bit it occurred to her that since she wasn't big enough yet, she just needed to drink more. She went to grab the Jug of Jumbo-Gro, but it wasn't there. She frantically looked around but the jug wasn't anywhere to be seen, she was about to cry but realized that wouldn't help and what she needed to do was find the Jumbo-Gro.

be small again”

beginning to swell larger.


Unlike the previous ones from before it
was similar to her first.
This spurt was one solid spurt.
In moments she swelled to 100 feet tall
yet oblivious to the increase.


“I need that drink if I wanna stay big
and be bigger”



Unfortunately Lucy’s search was in vain
and another tantrum was brewing from
a now 100 Feet tall 4 year old.

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Jenna stopped pouring the Jumbo-Gro into the bucket once it was filled almost to the brim. Holding the oversize jug she looked somewhat disappointingly at the bucket which even as full as it was now seemed like it might only hold 1, maybe 2 big gulps worth of the drink. She would much rather have taken the whole jug with her, but said jug was large enough that until the two big gulps she had taken kicked in and she started growing, she wasn't going to get very far.

Jenna figured she could at least get one more drink from the jug in before she had to take her backup plan and leave. However, just as she had lifted the jug up to her lips and was tilting it back to take one last big gulp, she was surprised by someone shouting and accidentally poured even more than she had planned down her throat before dropping the jug.

"YOU TOOK MY DRINK!" Lucy was crawling on all fours, except for one hand which pointed an accusatory finger at Jenna. Lucy went to stand up so she could grab both Jenna and the Bottle of Jumbo-Gro that was now rolling into the street, but suddenly stopped in the midst of this as another growth spurt hit, bringing her to 100 feet tall.

After a bit of coughing and sputtering Jenna turned around just in time to see Lucy's latest growth spurt. For a moment she stared at her, jealous and a little scared, before realizing this was her chance to run and turning around to grab the bucket. However as she was turning around, Jenna suddenly felt a strange feeling that stopped her in her tracks.

Once Lucy had finished her growth spurt she glanced around realizing she was bigger than before, but still a little upset she wasn't as big as the building her mommy worked in. Lucy quickly grabbed Jenna lifting her up to her face, only to realize she no longer had the Jumbo-Gro.

"Where's my drink!?" Still holding onto Jenna while lowering her out of sight, Lucy Began to look around frantically. a second later though she realized she was having a hard time holding on to the thief who stole her drink. Lifting Jenna up to her Face again so she could adjust her grip, Lucy noticed the thief seemed bigger, and in fact was still growing.

"Stop growing!"Lucy shouted at the thief in her hand, but Jenna got even bigger.

"I'm still bigger than you." Lucy smiled confidently, but the smile slowly disappeared as Jenna kept growing. With the thief getting heavy and Lucy suddenly worried she would be smaller than someone again she dropped Jenna and ran into the street frantically looking for her drink.

As Jenna hit the ground her growth came to a stop. She stood up and and noticed Lucy was stomping through the street looking around at the ground frantically, though it seemed like Lucy wasn't that much bigger anymore. Quickly realizing what that probably meant Jenna looked around excitedly, confirming that she had indeed grown quite a bit. Lucy definitely still had the height advantage, but a 30 feet tall Jenna wasn't exactly tiny. Of course she wasn't about to settle for second biggest, not to mention she was big enough now the jug of Jumbo-Gro would be much easier to carry around as well. Jenna glanced back at Lucy, figuring the younger girl was looking for the drink Jenna figured this was her chance to take the lead.

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Jenna shook her head before excitedly looking around, confirming the strange feeling that had come over for a moment just now had in fact been another growth spurt. She continued to look around trying to figure out how big she was now, and though she never figured out she was now 80 feet tall, she figured she was close enough in height to Lucy that she was no longer scared of said titanic 4 year old. Even better, this was just the beginning; if Jenna was right this growth spurt was probably from the second drink she took meaning she still had at least 2 more growth spurts, and the one from the bucket was bound to be huge with how much was in there. Of course if Lucy found the Jumbo-Gro first it wouldn't make much difference and so Jenna went back to searching for the drink.

before too long Jenna noticed it was getting kind of dark, something that surprised Jenna as it was still pretty early. That's when Jenna noticed the cause of the darkness, in front of her was Lucy who seemed to have had a growth spurt of her own as she was now 200 feet tall.

Jenna gulped as she started slowly backing away from Lucy, who was facing away from Jenna and hadn't noticed her. However not paying attention to what was below her, Jenna ended up tripping and falling down, the noise causing Lucy to turn around and notice Jenna.

"you took my drink give it back!" Lucy said to Jenna

"But i don't have it either"

"Liar, you got bigger!" Lucy began to reach down towards Jenna, who scrambled to her feet and started running. "Hey come back here and give me my drink back!"

Jenna was running as fast as she could, but glancing over her shoulder she saw Lucy was catching up rather quickly. Jenna realized that running in a straight line was going to only lead to the larger girl catching up since she took bigger steps, and so she quickly took a turn, only to run right into something. Taking a look at what she ran into she saw a giant leg that she only came up to the knee of. looking up this leg was unsurprisingly part of an enormous little girl.

"Are you ok?" The 300 foot tall Lisa leaned down to look at the comparatively tiny Jenna."I wasn't trying to hurt you?'

Jenna stopped staring slack jawed at at the giant girl "no, it's ok, i should have looked where i was going, i was too focused on running from..."

As if on cue Lucy came around the corner and spotted Jenna. "Now give me back my..." Lucy hadn't noticed Lisa at first but upon doing so she could only stare in shock.

Jenna quickly ran behind Lisa as Lisa glanced between the two other girls. Putting two and two together Lisa glared at Lucy.

"Were you picking on her? because you shouldn't pick on someone just for being small." Lisa gave Lucy a light push knocking the smaller girl on her butt. "how does it feel when you're the one being picked on?"

Lucy looked at Lisa in shock and started to tear up a little. "I'm supposed to be the biggest!" she cried as she got to her feet and ran off.

Lisa turned to Jenna "It's ok, she won't bother you anymore." glancing in the direction Lucy had run off in Lisa frowned a little. "i just hope i wasn't too mean, after i found that yucky drink and grew i wanted to make sure no one would be bullied for being smaller like i used to be."

The mention of a drink making this little girl so big caught Jenna's attention "You drank something that made you so big, do you still have it?"

Lucy smiled at Jenna. "Yep, it wasn't tasty, but after it made me grow i decided to drink some more to get even bigger..."

Lisa pulled the bottle of Jumbo Gro out, which was now large enough to look natural in the enormous little girls hand, showing it to Jenna. "... did you want to grow to, 'cause i have it here with me."

Jenna stared at the bottle for a moment, before looking Lisa in the face. "Really, what if i grow bigger than you?"

Lisa scrunched up her face for a moment thinking before making up her mind. "I'm still big even if you're bigger, so as long as you promise to be nice it's ok"

Jenna looked between the bottle and Lisa's smiling face. Jenna had really been focused on growing and being the biggest and hadn't really thought about what to do then. Thinking it over, she really didn't have anything mean in mind; well maybe getting back at Lucy but that wasn't too mean, and if she grew big enough its not like this titanic four year old could stop her.

"Ok, i promise to be nice."

Lisa smiled and she bent down to hand Jenna the bottle. "yeah, i was actually hoping to find someone close to my size to play with."

Jenna took the, too her, large bottle and struggled a bit to lift it up and start drinking.

1353322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Jenna lifted the bucket full of Jumbo-Gro up; she would have the whole jug to take with her, but it had already been quite a challenge to get from Lucy's backyard to the front. Heading back towards her house as quickly as she could without splashing too much of the Jumbo-Gro out of the bucket, Jenna started planning ahead. She had no doubt in her mind that once the first drink had taken effect and she started growing she was going to be big enough to take the whole jug with her easily, however it seems likely that Lucy would find the bottle herself by then. Of course, that's why she had the bucket: in case she needed more of the drink in order to outgrow the already titanic 4 year old.

When Jenna reached her house she knocked on the door before remembering that her mother didn't know she had gotten out of their backyard. Trying to figure out what to do she suddenly heard Lucy and panicked, frantically running to the side of her house that was farthest form Lucy.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------

Lucy walked to where the Bottle of Jumbo-Gro was in her front yard smiling. "There you are,"She picked the bottle up, pressing into her check in a sort of hug. "I thought i had lost you and wouldn't get to be as big as the building mommy works in." Lucy was about to take another drink when she heard someone call out her name.

"LUCY!?" Jenna's mother shouted upon seeing the 60 foot tall little girl after answering the door.

"Hi Mrs. Jenna's mom" Lucy turned around and waved at Jenna's mother with her free hand. "I grew."

"I...i...i can see that..." Jenna's mother started slack jawed at the giant little girl.

"And I'm gonna get even bigger..." As if on cue a strange feeling came over Lucy as the second gulp of Jumbo-Gro form a few minutes ago took effect and she rocketed up to 100 feet tall in a single spurt. She wasn't disoriented for as long as with the last spurt and was soon smiling at Jenna's mother.

"Tha...thats... ni..." Jenna's mother fainted in their front door.

Lucy stopped smiling a look of concern on her face as she jogged over to Jenna's house and dropped to her knees. Setting down the Bottle of Jumbo-Gro in Jenna's front yard, Lucy got on all fours right over Jenna's mother. "Are you ok Mrs. Jenna's mom?"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------

Jenna was worried about her mother, but also scared of Lucy who was no doubt now in her front yard given the Jug of Jumbo-Gro Jenna could see in her front yard. Since she hadn't yet grown it was still too big for her to easily carry, and with Lucy in her yard as well grabbing the bottle and running would probably be the only chance she would get.

Trying to figure out what to do Jenna glanced at the bucket full of Jumbo Drink and wondered if drinking more of it would speed up her growth. figuring she had nothing to lose she brought the bucket to her lips and started chugging its contents down. she started growing in the midst of this and by the time she was done she was already bigger than Lucy was when Jenna first spotted and still growing. she wanted to go for the Jumbo-Gro right away, but since Lucy had been briefly disoriented after growing she thought it better to wait the growth spurt out first. Smiling confidently, Jenna tossed aside the now empty bucket and waited for the moment to strike.

In this option, there are two main characters, Ethan Weaver and Jeremy Wright. Both of them are in the sixth grade, and both have been friends for years since they're always been seated next to each other at school. Jeremy was born in October and Ethan was born in early September, so because of the minimum entry age for school Jeremy is almost a year older than Ethan; he is 12 and Ethan is 11.
